MurkysAndaSharkToo_murky.name: Murky's ... And a Shark Too!
MurkysAndaSharkToo_murky.description: Increase the damage of Octo-Grab by 13700% (+4% per level).

TheLostVikingss64KBMarathon_thelostvikin.name: The Lost Vikings's 64 KB Marathon
TheLostVikingss64KBMarathon_thelostvikin.description: Gain an additional 40% Movement Speed when activating Go Go Go! that decays over 4 seconds.  Additionally, the Vikings will break out of Roots and Slows.

MurkysAFishyDeal_murky.name: Murky's A Fishy Deal
MurkysAFishyDeal_murky.description: Killing a Minion with Pufferfish grants a stack of Bribe. Use 8 stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Bosses.  Maximum of 32 stacks of Bribe.

ChromiesAProperGreeting_chromie.name: Chromie's A Proper Greeting
ChromiesAProperGreeting_chromie.description: Damaging a Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed enemy Hero grants 25% additional damage for 5 seconds.

ChensATouchofHoney_chen.name: Chen's A Touch of Honey
ChensATouchofHoney_chen.description: Increase the Slows from Keg Smash by 15% and its duration by 0.5 seconds.

MephistosAbhorredSkull_mephisto.name: Mephisto's Abhorred Skull
MephistosAbhorredSkull_mephisto.description: Hitting a Hero with Skull Missile grants 20% Spell Power for 6 seconds.

DVasAblativeArmor_dva.name: D.Va's Ablative Armor
DVasAblativeArmor_dva.description: Damage against D.Va's Mech that would deal 4% or less of its maximum Health are reduced by 50%.  This does not decrease the amount of Self-Destruct Charge gained.

LunarasAbolishMagic_lunara.name: Lunara's Abolish Magic
LunarasAbolishMagic_lunara.description: Target an Ally to remove all damage over time and disabling effects from them and Lunara. For 2 seconds after, the duration of disabling effects is reduced by 50%.

ArthassAbsoluteZero_arthas.name: Arthas's Absolute Zero
ArthassAbsoluteZero_arthas.description: Sindragosa flies twice as far.  Enemy Heroes are rooted for 2 seconds, and then slowed by 60% for 3.5 seconds.

OrpheasAbyssalSymbiosis_orphea.name: Orphea's Abyssal Symbiosis
OrpheasAbyssalSymbiosis_orphea.description: Hitting a Hero with Chomp instantly grants Orphea maximum Chaos.

LuciosAccelerando_lucio.name: Lúcio's Accelerando
LuciosAccelerando_lucio.description: Wall Ride's Movement Speed bonus gradually increases to 40% over 4 seconds while Lúcio maintains its effect.

LunarasAcceleratedContamination_lunara.name: Lunara's Accelerated Contamination
LunarasAcceleratedContamination_lunara.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Noxious Blossom from 60 to 40. While at least 2 enemy Heroes are afflicted with Nature's Toxin, Noxious Blossom's cooldown recharges 100% faster.

KelThuzadsAcceleratedDecay_kelthuzad.name: Kel'Thuzad's Accelerated Decay
KelThuzadsAcceleratedDecay_kelthuzad.description: Each time a Hero is hit by Death and Decay's pool, they take 20% more periodic damage from Death and Decay for the next 4 seconds, stacking up to 6 times.

ChensAccumulatingFlame_chen.name: Chen's Accumulating Flame
ChensAccumulatingFlame_chen.description: Increase Ignited damage by 25%. Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes who are Ignited increase its duration by 0.75 seconds.

RaynorsAceintheHole_raynor.name: Raynor's Ace in the Hole
RaynorsAceintheHole_raynor.description: Deal 15% more damage to Stunned or Slowed Heroes.

AnubaraksAcidDrenchedMandibles_anubarak.name: Anub'arak's Acid Drenched Mandibles
AnubaraksAcidDrenchedMandibles_anubarak.description: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases Anub'arak's Basic Attack damage by 70% for 3 seconds.

AnasActiveReload_ana.name: Ana's Active Reload
AnasActiveReload_ana.description: Activate to instantly gain 3 charges of Healing Dart.

FenixsAdaniumShell_fenix.name: Fenix's Adanium Shell
FenixsAdaniumShell_fenix.description: After arriving with Warp, gain 50 Armor for 4 seconds.

DehakasAdaptation_dehaka.name: Dehaka's Adaptation
DehakasAdaptation_dehaka.description: After 4 seconds, heal for 100% of the damage Dehaka took over this period.

BlazesAdhesivePetroleum_blaze.name: Blaze's Adhesive Petroleum
BlazesAdhesivePetroleum_blaze.description: Enemies standing in Oil Spill when it is Ignited are Slowed by 30% for 2.5 seconds.

AbathursAdrenalOverload_abathur.name: Abathur's Adrenal Overload
AbathursAdrenalOverload_abathur.description: Symbiote host gains 25% increased Attack Speed.

AbathursAdrenalineBoost_abathur.name: Abathur's Adrenaline Boost
AbathursAdrenalineBoost_abathur.description: Symbiote's Carapace increases the Movement Speed of the target by 40% for 3.5 seconds.

ValeerasAdrenalineRush_valeera.name: Valeera's Adrenaline Rush
ValeerasAdrenalineRush_valeera.description: While in the Smoke Bomb, Valeera regenerates an additional 40 Energy per second.

BlazesAdrenalineStimpack_blaze.name: Blaze's Adrenaline Stimpack
BlazesAdrenalineStimpack_blaze.description: Activate to gain 100% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed for 5 seconds.

TassadarsAdunsWisdom_tassadar.name: Tassadar's Adun's Wisdom
TassadarsAdunsWisdom_tassadar.description: While Oracle is active, Basic Abilities cooldown 50% faster.

SgtHammersAdvancedArtillery_sgthammer.name: Sgt. Hammer's Advanced Artillery
SgtHammersAdvancedArtillery_sgthammer.description: Increase Siege Mode's splash damage to 25.25% of Basic Attack damage, and increase its splash radius by 25%.

NovasAdvancedCloaking_nova.name: Nova's Advanced Cloaking
NovasAdvancedCloaking_nova.description: After being Stealthed for 2 seconds, gain an additional 10% Movement Speed. While Stealthed, regenerate 2 Mana per second.

SgtHammersAdvancedLavaStrike_sgthammer.name: Sgt. Hammer's Advanced Lava Strike
SgtHammersAdvancedLavaStrike_sgthammer.description: Napalm Strike's range is increased by 75% and its impact does 50% more damage.

FenixsAdvancedTargeting_fenix.name: Fenix's Advanced Targeting
FenixsAdvancedTargeting_fenix.description: Quest: Hitting enemy Heroes with Plasma Cutter permanently increases Fenix's Basic Attack damage by 0.5, up to 60. Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, Plasma Cutter circles an additional time.

YrelsAegisofLight_yrel.name: Yrel's Aegis of Light
YrelsAegisofLight_yrel.description: Upon landing, Avenging Wrath grants other nearby allied Heroes 35 Armor for 5 seconds.

FalstadsAerieGusts_falstad.name: Falstad's Aerie Gusts
FalstadsAerieGusts_falstad.description: Reduces the activation time for Tailwind from 6 to 3 seconds, and increases the Movement Speed bonus from 15% to 25%.

LiMingsAetherWalker_liming.name: Li-Ming's Aether Walker
LiMingsAetherWalker_liming.description: Teleport costs no Mana. If Li-Ming hasn't taken damage in the last 3 seconds, Teleport's cooldown is decreased by 2 seconds. Casting Teleport causes Li-Ming's next cast of Magic Missiles to deal 10% bonus damage.

FalstadsAfterburner_falstad.name: Falstad's Afterburner
FalstadsAfterburner_falstad.description: Barrel Roll increases Movement Speed by 60%, decaying over 3 seconds.

DVasAggressionMatrix_dva.name: D.Va's Aggression Matrix
DVasAggressionMatrix_dva.description: Basic Attacks in Mech Mode against Heroes lower the cooldown of Defense Matrix by 0.25 seconds.

ProbiussAggressiveMatrix_probius.name: Probius's Aggressive Matrix
ProbiussAggressiveMatrix_probius.description: Pylon's Power Field grants allied Heroes 35% increased Attack Damage.

AggressiveShredding_etc.name: Aggressive Shredding
AggressiveShredding_etc.description: E.T.C.'s Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Guitar Solo by 0.75 second.

GenjisAgileDismount_genji.name: Genji's Agile Dismount
GenjisAgileDismount_genji.description: While mounted, the range of Cyber Agility is increased by 70% and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.

KharazimsAirAlly_kharazim.name: Kharazim's Air Ally
KharazimsAirAlly_kharazim.description: Place an Air Ally that grants vision and reveals a large area around it. Has 75 (+4% per level) Health and lasts 40 seconds. Kharazim can Radiant Dash to Air Allies.  Stores up to 2 charges.

YrelsAldorPeacekeeper_yrel.name: Yrel's Aldor Peacekeeper
YrelsAldorPeacekeeper_yrel.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Vindication at maximum charge deal 40% less damage for 3 seconds.

LuciosAllTogether_lucio.name: Lúcio's All Together
LuciosAllTogether_lucio.description: For each ally affected by Crossfade, Lúcio gains 5% Movement Speed that stacks with other bonuses.

OrpheasAllegrissimo_orphea.name: Orphea's Allegrissimo
OrpheasAllegrissimo_orphea.description: Hitting Heroes with the end of Shadow Waltz sets its cooldown to .75 second.

MalGanissAloneintheDark_malganis.name: Mal'Ganis's Alone in the Dark
MalGanissAloneintheDark_malganis.description: Enemy Heroes put to Sleep by Night Rush have their vision greatly reduced during the Sleep and for 2 seconds after.

GreymanesAlphaKiller_greymane.name: Greymane's Alpha Killer
GreymanesAlphaKiller_greymane.description: Worgen Basic Attacks against Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 3% of the Hero's maximum Health.

ThrallsAlphaWolf_thrall.name: Thrall's Alpha Wolf
ThrallsAlphaWolf_thrall.description: For 3 seconds after a Hero is hit by Feral Spirit, Thrall's Basic Attacks against them deal an additional 3% of the target's maximum Health as damage.  Passive: Increase the duration of Feral Spirit's Root to 1.5 seconds.

ZuljinsAmaniHide_zuljin.name: Zul'jin's Amani Hide
ZuljinsAmaniHide_zuljin.description: Lower the cooldown of Amani Rage by 10 seconds and gain 15 Armor while you are regenerating Health from it.

ZuljinsAmaniRage_zuljin.name: Zul'jin's Amani Rage
ZuljinsAmaniRage_zuljin.description: Activate to cause Zul'jin to instantly lose 50% of his current Health and heal for that amount over 10 seconds. Zul'jin gains 5 Armor while regenerating health from Amani Rage.

ZuljinsAmaniResilience_zuljin.name: Zul'jin's Amani Resilience
ZuljinsAmaniResilience_zuljin.description: Increase Taz'dingo's duration by 1 second. Upon expiring, Zul'jin heals for 50% of the damage he dealt during Taz'dingo.

ArtanissAmateurOpponent_artanis.name: Artanis's Amateur Opponent
ArtanissAmateurOpponent_artanis.description: Twin Blades attacks deal 150% bonus damage to non-Heroes.

SgtHammersAmbush_sgthammer.name: Sgt. Hammer's Ambush
SgtHammersAmbush_sgthammer.description: Gain Stealth when entering Siege Mode or after not taking or dealing damage for 3 seconds while in Siege Mode. Basic Attacks while Stealthed deal 100% more damage.

XulsAmplifyDamage_xul.name: Xul's Amplify Damage
XulsAmplifyDamage_xul.description: Enemies Rooted by Bone Prison lose 25 Armor for 1.75 seconds.

RehgarsAncestralHealing_rehgar.name: Rehgar's Ancestral Healing
RehgarsAncestralHealing_rehgar.description: After 1 second, heal an allied Hero for 1180 (+4% per level) Health.

OrpheasAncestralStrength_orphea.name: Orphea's Ancestral Strength
OrpheasAncestralStrength_orphea.description: Non-Heroic Abilities deal 20% more damage to Stunned, Rooted, Silenced or Slowed enemies and grant 1 additional Chaos when hitting Heroes.

ThrallsAncestralWrath_thrall.name: Thrall's Ancestral Wrath
ThrallsAncestralWrath_thrall.description: Activate to consume 8 stacks of Ancestral Wrath, damaging a target enemy Hero for 15% of their maximum Health over 3 seconds, and healing Thrall for 150% of the damage dealt.  Gain 1 stack of Ancestral Wrath every time Frostwolf Resilience activates.

DeckardsAncientBlessings_deckard.name: Deckard's Ancient Blessings
DeckardsAncientBlessings_deckard.description: Activate Fortitude of the Faithful to empower nearby allied Hero Basic Attacks for 8 seconds, causing them to deal an additional 62 damage in an area and heal for 90 for each Hero hit.

AlexstraszasAncientFlame_alexstrasza.name: Alexstrasza's Ancient Flame
AlexstraszasAncientFlame_alexstrasza.description: While Dragonqueen is active, Alexstrasza's Basic Attacks apply Flame Buffet, but her Attack Speed is reduced by 24.699%.

XulsAndarielsVisage_xul.name: Xul's Andariel's Visage
XulsAndarielsVisage_xul.description: Poison Nova heals for 50% of the damage dealt.  Passive: Skeletal Warriors deal 50% increased damage.

ChromiesAndorhalAnomaly_chromie.name: Chromie's Andorhal Anomaly
ChromiesAndorhalAnomaly_chromie.description: Increase the charges and maximum active Time Traps to 3, and reduce its cooldown by 8 seconds.

MalthaelsAngelofDeath_malthael.name: Malthael's Angel of Death
MalthaelsAngelofDeath_malthael.description: Last Rites heals for 100% of the damage dealt, and its current and future cooldown reduction bonuses are doubled.

TyraelsAngelofJustice_tyrael.name: Tyrael's Angel of Justice
TyraelsAngelofJustice_tyrael.description: Increases the cast range of Judgment by 50%, and reduces the cooldown by 40 seconds.

ImperiussAngelicArmaments_imperius.name: Imperius's Angelic Armaments
ImperiussAngelicArmaments_imperius.description: Summon a ring of blazing swords that grants 1000 Shield for 3 seconds.  If the Shield lasts the full duration, this ability can be reactivated within 5 seconds to launch 6 swords toward an area, each dealing 140 damage to the first enemy hit.

AurielsAngelicFlight_auriel.name: Auriel's Angelic Flight
AurielsAngelicFlight_auriel.description: After 2 seconds, fly to a target location.

RexxarsAnimalHusbandry_rexxar.name: Rexxar's Animal Husbandry
RexxarsAnimalHusbandry_rexxar.description: Rexxar and Misha gain 2 Maximum Health every second Rexxar remains alive. These bonuses are lost on Rexxar's death.

MephistosAnimosity_mephisto.name: Mephisto's Animosity
MephistosAnimosity_mephisto.description: Activate to extend the duration of Lightning Nova by 2.5 seconds.  Passive: Basic Attacks while Lightning Nova is active cause an immediate pulse of Lightning Nova damage.

NazeebosAnnihilatingSpirit_nazeebo.name: Nazeebo's Annihilating Spirit
NazeebosAnnihilatingSpirit_nazeebo.description: Increases the range of Ravenous Spirit by 50% and Movement Speed by 30%.

NovasAntiArmorShells_nova.name: Nova's Anti-Armor Shells
NovasAntiArmorShells_nova.description: Nova's Basic Attacks deal 250% damage and decrease the Physical Armor of Heroic targets by 10 for 3 seconds, but her Attack Speed is proportionally slower.

AnasAntiHealer_ana.name: Ana's Anti-Healer
AnasAntiHealer_ana.description: Increase the area of Biotic Grenade by 25% and the duration of the healing reduction by 25%.

ArthassAntiMagicShell_arthas.name: Arthas's Anti-Magic Shell
ArthassAntiMagicShell_arthas.description: Activate to make Arthas immune to Spell Damage for 3 seconds and heal Arthas for 25% of the damage prevented.

DehakasApexPredator_dehaka.name: Dehaka's Apex Predator
DehakasApexPredator_dehaka.description: Reduces Brushstalker's cooldown by 25 seconds and the cast time by 0.5 seconds.

DiablosApocalypse_diablo.name: Diablo's Apocalypse
DiablosApocalypse_diablo.description: Create a demonic rune under each enemy Hero on the battleground. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 137 (+4% per level) damage and stunning them for 1.75 seconds.

NovasApolloSuit_nova.name: Nova's Apollo Suit
NovasApolloSuit_nova.description: Reduce the cooldown of Permanent Cloak from by 2 seconds.

AlaraksAppliedForce_alarak.name: Alarak's Applied Force
AlaraksAppliedForce_alarak.description: Reduce Sadism by 10%, but Telekinesis pushes 20% further and has 20% increased range.

MedivhsArcaneBrilliance_medivh.name: Medivh's Arcane Brilliance
MedivhsArcaneBrilliance_medivh.description: Activate to instantly restore 200 mana to all nearby allied Heroes and grant them 15% Spell Power for 10 seconds.

MedivhsArcaneCharge_medivh.name: Medivh's Arcane Charge
MedivhsArcaneCharge_medivh.description: When Arcane Rift damages an enemy Hero, the next Arcane Rift deals 15% more damage.

KelThuzadsArcaneEchoes_kelthuzad.name: Kel'Thuzad's Arcane Echoes
KelThuzadsArcaneEchoes_kelthuzad.description: Whenever Kel'Thuzad hits an enemy Hero with Death and Decay's explosion, its cooldown is reduced by 1.5 seconds.

MedivhsArcaneExplosion_medivh.name: Medivh's Arcane Explosion
MedivhsArcaneExplosion_medivh.description: When Force of Will expires, it deals 80 damage to nearby enemies, plus 50% of the damage it prevented, up to 315 additional damage.

JainasArcaneIntellect_jaina.name: Jaina's Arcane Intellect
JainasArcaneIntellect_jaina.description: Dealing damage to a Chilled target returns Mana to Jaina. Basic Attacks return 5 Mana and Abilities return 20.

LiMingsArcaneOrbit_liming.name: Li-Ming's Arcane Orbit
LiMingsArcaneOrbit_liming.description: Arcane Orb travels 25% farther, doing up to 25% more damage.

ZuljinsArcaniteAxes_zuljin.name: Zul'jin's Arcanite Axes
ZuljinsArcaniteAxes_zuljin.description: Quest: Twin Cleave's damage is permanently increased by 0.75 every time it hits a Hero.

TassadarsArchon_tassadar.name: Tassadar's Archon
TassadarsArchon_tassadar.description: Tassadar transforms into an Archon and gains a Plasma Shield. His Basic Attacks deal 158 (+4% per level) damage, slow the target by 30% for 1 second and splash for 79 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within 2.5 range. Lasts for 10 seconds.  Passive: Archon refreshes the cooldown of Dimensional Shift.

LiMingsArchonPurePower_liming.name: Li-Ming's Archon: Pure Power
LiMingsArchonPurePower_liming.description: Activate to enter Archon form, allowing Li-Ming to repeatedly use Disintegrate, but be unable to cast other Abilities.

YrelsArdentDefender_yrel.name: Yrel's Ardent Defender
YrelsArdentDefender_yrel.description: Surround Yrel in a barrier for 3 seconds, absorbing all damage taken and healing her for 50% of the damage received.

TyraelsArdentRestoration_tyrael.name: Tyrael's Ardent Restoration
TyraelsArdentRestoration_tyrael.description: Dealing damage to a Hero heals Tyrael for 17.5 Health over 5 seconds. Dealing damage resets this timer, and the heal amount stacks up to 10 times.

GazlowesARKReaktor_gazlowe.name: Gazlowe's ARK Reaktor
GazlowesARKReaktor_gazlowe.description: Reduces Xplodium Charge's cooldown by 2 seconds.  If Xplodium Charge hits an enemy Hero, gain 2 charges of Rock-It! Turret.

UthersArmorofFaith_uther.name: Uther's Armor of Faith
UthersArmorofFaith_uther.description: Being Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced grants Uther 90 Mana and causes Holy Light's cooldown to recharge 200% faster for 6 seconds. This effect has a 20 second cooldown.

KelThuzadsArmoroftheArchlich_kelthuzad.name: Kel'Thuzad's Armor of the Archlich
KelThuzadsArmoroftheArchlich_kelthuzad.description: Activate to gain 50 Physical Armor for 4 seconds. Upon activation, nearby enemies take 45 (+4% per level) damage and are Slowed by 35% for 4 seconds.

TychussArmorPiercingRounds_tychus.name: Tychus's Armor Piercing Rounds
TychussArmorPiercingRounds_tychus.description: Increases Overkill's damage to the primary target by 50%.

MaievsArmoredAssault_maiev.name: Maiev's Armored Assault
MaievsArmoredAssault_maiev.description: While Maiev has positive Armor of any kind, all Physical Damage dealt is increased by 20%.

AnasArmoredStance_ana.name: Ana's Armored Stance
AnasArmoredStance_ana.description: Increase Shrike's damage by 50%. While Aim Down Sights is active, gain 25 Armor.

AzmodansArmyofHell_azmodan.name: Azmodan's Army of Hell
AzmodansArmyofHell_azmodan.description: Summon Demon Warrior spawns an additional Demon, but its cooldown is increased by 10 seconds.

ArthassArmyoftheDead_arthas.name: Arthas's Army of the Dead
ArthassArmyoftheDead_arthas.description: Summons Ghouls that last 15 seconds. Sacrifice Ghouls to heal for 267 (+4% per level) Health.

SonyasArreatCrater_sonya.name: Sonya's Arreat Crater
SonyasArreatCrater_sonya.description: Leap leaves behind an impassable crater for 5 seconds.  Reduces Leap's cooldown by 20 seconds.

VallasArsenal_valla.name: Valla's Arsenal
VallasArsenal_valla.description: Multishot also fires 3 grenades which deal 120 (+4% per level) damage. Each enemy Hero hit by a grenade reduces the cooldown of Multishot by 2 seconds.

FenixsArsenalOvercharge_fenix.name: Fenix's Arsenal Overcharge
FenixsArsenalOvercharge_fenix.description: Fenix's Basic Attacks reduce his Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.

FenixsArsenalSynergy_fenix.name: Fenix's Arsenal Synergy
FenixsArsenalSynergy_fenix.description: After hitting enemy Heroes with Basic Attacks 3 times while Repeater Cannon is active, the next Basic Attack with Phase Bomb deals 150% more damage and splashes in a 50% larger area.

AzmodansArtofChaos_azmodan.name: Azmodan's Art of Chaos
AzmodansArtofChaos_azmodan.description: If Globe of Annihilation hits 2 or more Heroes, restore 40 Mana and gain an extra 4 Annihilation.

RexxarsAspectoftheBeast_rexxar.name: Rexxar's Aspect of the Beast
RexxarsAspectoftheBeast_rexxar.description: Misha's Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Misha, Charge! by 1 seconds.

RexxarsAspectoftheHawk_rexxar.name: Rexxar's Aspect of the Hawk
RexxarsAspectoftheHawk_rexxar.description: When Spirit Swoop hits an enemy Hero, Rexxar gains 125% Attack Speed for 4 seconds. Misha's Basic Attacks increase the duration of this buff by 0.75 seconds.

ValeerasAssassinate_valeera.name: Valeera's Assassinate
ValeerasAssassinate_valeera.description: Ambush deals 50% additional damage and reduces the target's Armor by an additional 10 if no other enemy Heroes are within 4 range of the victim.

KerrigansAssimilationBlades_kerrigan.name: Kerrigan's Assimilation Blades
KerrigansAssimilationBlades_kerrigan.description: Damaging an enemy increase Basic Attack damage by 2% for 5 seconds, up to 40%.

KerrigansAssimilationMastery_kerrigan.name: Kerrigan's Assimilation Mastery
KerrigansAssimilationMastery_kerrigan.description: Regeneration Globe healing grants 45 points of Assimilation Shields per second while active. While Assimilation is active, Kerrigan's Health and Mana regeneration is increased by 150%.

MalfurionsAstralCommunion_malfurion.name: Malfurion's Astral Communion
MalfurionsAstralCommunion_malfurion.description: Activate to Channel for 1 second, and then instantly teleport and cast Twilight Dream at the targeted location.  Cooldown is shared with Twilight Dream.  Passive: Increase Twilight Dream's Silence duration to 4 seconds.

LiMingsAstralPresence_liming.name: Li-Ming's Astral Presence
LiMingsAstralPresence_liming.description: Li-Ming's Mana regeneration is increased by 100% while below 25% Mana.

GenjisAugmentedGuard_genji.name: Genji's Augmented Guard
GenjisAugmentedGuard_genji.description: When Deflect ends, Genji gains a Shield equal to 50% of the damage blocked for 4 seconds.

FenixsAuxiliaryShields_fenix.name: Fenix's Auxiliary Shields
FenixsAuxiliaryShields_fenix.description: Permanently reduce Fenix's maximum Health by 30% but increase Shield Capacitor's Shield by 40%. Basic Attacks regenerate Shields equal to 10% of the damage dealt.

MuradinsAvatar_muradin.name: Muradin's Avatar
MuradinsAvatar_muradin.description: Transform for 20 seconds, gaining 1053 (+4% per level) Health.

OrpheasBackbiter_orphea.name: Orphea's Backbiter
OrpheasBackbiter_orphea.description: If Chomp hits a Hero, Orphea immediately dashes a short distance backwards.  Passive: Gain 15%  maximum Health.

KaelthassBackdraft_kaelthas.name: Kael'thas's Backdraft
KaelthassBackdraft_kaelthas.description: Living Bomb's explosion slows enemy Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds.

XulsBacklash_xul.name: Xul's Backlash
XulsBacklash_xul.description: When Bone Armor expires, nearby enemy Heroes take damage equal to 12% of their maximum Health.

TheLostVikingssBaleogtheFierce_thelostvi.name: The Lost Vikings's Baleog the Fierce
TheLostVikingssBaleogtheFierce_thelostvi.description: Baleog's Basic Attacks increase his Attack Speed by 8%, stacking up to 5 times. After 3 seconds of not attacking, these stacks will rapidly decay.

CassiasBallLightning_cassia.name: Cassia's Ball Lightning
CassiasBallLightning_cassia.description: Throw a ball of lightning at an enemy Hero that bounces up to 6 times between nearby enemy Heroes and Cassia, dealing 180 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit.

ZagarasBanelingMassacre_zagara.name: Zagara's Baneling Massacre
ZagarasBanelingMassacre_zagara.description: Gain 2 additional charges of Banelings, and they deal 20% more damage.

VariansBannerofDalaran_varian.name: Varian's Banner of Dalaran
VariansBannerofDalaran_varian.description: Activate to place a Banner that grants 20% increased Spell Power to nearby allied Heroes. Lasts 12 seconds.

VariansBannerofIronforge_varian.name: Varian's Banner of Ironforge
VariansBannerofIronforge_varian.description: Activate to place a Banner that grants 20 Armor to nearby allied Heroes, reducing damage taken by 20%. Lasts 12 seconds.

VariansBannerofStormwind_varian.name: Varian's Banner of Stormwind
VariansBannerofStormwind_varian.description: Activate to place a Banner that grants 25% increased Movement Speed to nearby allied Heroes. Lasts 12 seconds.

KelThuzadsBarbedChains_kelthuzad.name: Kel'Thuzad's Barbed Chains
KelThuzadsBarbedChains_kelthuzad.description: Increase Chains of Kel'Thuzad damage by 125%. After gaining 30 Blight, Chains of Kel'Thuzad reduces the Armor of pulled Heroes by 10 for 4 seconds.

SylvanassBarbedShot_sylvanas.name: Sylvanas's Barbed Shot
SylvanassBarbedShot_sylvanas.description: Hitting the same enemy with 5 shots of Withering Fire causes the 5th shot to deal 350% bonus damage.

SgtHammersBarricade_sgthammer.name: Sgt. Hammer's Barricade
SgtHammersBarricade_sgthammer.description: Concussive Blast creates an impassable wall in front of Sgt. Hammer for 4 seconds.

IllidansBatteredAssault_illidan.name: Illidan's Battered Assault
IllidansBatteredAssault_illidan.description: Increase Sweeping Strike's Basic Attack damage bonus duration from 3 to 5 seconds. If Sweeping Strike hits 2 Heroes its damage bonus is increased from 35% to 125%.

ImperiussBattleHunger_imperius.name: Imperius's Battle Hunger
ImperiussBattleHunger_imperius.description: Increase the healing of Valorous Brand by 50%.

SonyasBattleRage_sonya.name: Sonya's Battle Rage
SonyasBattleRage_sonya.description: Activate to instantly restore 10% of Sonya's maximum Health. Stores up to 3 charges.  Passive: Sonya deals 25% more damage to Mercenaries.

AzmodansBattleborn_azmodan.name: Azmodan's Battleborn
AzmodansBattleborn_azmodan.description: Azmodan's Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Summon Demon Warrior by 0.75 seconds and Demon Lieutenant by 1.5 second.

UthersBeaconofLight_uther.name: Uther's Beacon of Light
UthersBeaconofLight_uther.description: While below 50% Health, Uther receives 200% more self-healing when healing others with Holy Light.

AnubaraksBedofBarbs_anubarak.name: Anub'arak's Bed of Barbs
AnubaraksBedofBarbs_anubarak.description: Create a bed of spikes along Impale's path that slows enemies by 25% and deals 21 (+4% per level) damage per second.  Spikes persist for 3.5 seconds.

AnubaraksBeetleJuiced_anubarak.name: Anub'arak's Beetle, Juiced
AnubaraksBeetleJuiced_anubarak.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack against enemy Heroes spawns a Beetle.

RaynorsBehemothArmor_raynor.name: Raynor's Behemoth Armor
RaynorsBehemothArmor_raynor.description: Gain 200 bonus maximum Health. Quest: Every time Give 'Em Some Pepper's primary target is a Hero, gain an additional 5 maximum Health.

UthersBenediction_uther.name: Uther's Benediction
UthersBenediction_uther.description: Activate to reduce the Mana cost of Uther's next Basic Ability by 50 and its cooldown by 10 seconds.

RexxarsBestialWrath_rexxar.name: Rexxar's Bestial Wrath
RexxarsBestialWrath_rexxar.description: Increases Misha's Basic Attack damage by 200% for 12 seconds.

JunkratsBigAs_junkrat.name: Junkrat's Big As
JunkratsBigAs_junkrat.description: Increase Steel Trap's radius and damage by 50%.

TychussBigRedButton_tychus.name: Tychus's Big Red Button
TychussBigRedButton_tychus.description: Odin lasts 50% longer and Ragnarok Missiles also launches a Nuclear Missile which lands 2.5 seconds later.

DVasBigShot_dva.name: D.Va's Big Shot
DVasBigShot_dva.description: Deal 250 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in a line. The cooldown of Call Mech is reduced by 8 seconds for each enemy Hero hit.  Requires Pilot Mode.

MurkysBigTunaKahuna_murky.name: Murky's Big Tuna Kahuna
MurkysBigTunaKahuna_murky.description: Murky's maximum Health and Egg respawn time are doubled.

NazeebosBigVoodoo_nazeebo.name: Nazeebo's Big Voodoo
NazeebosBigVoodoo_nazeebo.description: Increases the Health and Mana bonuses from Voodoo Ritual by 100%.

ZagarasBileDrop_zagara.name: Zagara's Bile Drop
ZagarasBileDrop_zagara.description: Quest: Passively increase the impact radius of Infested Drop by 20%. Reward: After hitting 12 Heroes with Infested Drop, it spawns an additional Roachling.

AnduinsBindingHeal_anduin.name: Anduin's Binding Heal
AnduinsBindingHeal_anduin.description: Casting Flash Heal on an ally heals Anduin for 104.

StukovsBioExplosionSwitch_stukov.name: Stukov's Bio-Explosion Switch
StukovsBioExplosionSwitch_stukov.description: Bio-Kill Switch now also detonates Lurking Arm, applying a Weighted Pustule to enemy Heroes inside and Silencing them for 2 seconds.

StukovsBioticArmor_stukov.name: Stukov's Biotic Armor
StukovsBioticArmor_stukov.description: Healing Pathogen grants 15 Physical Armor to its targets while active on them. Detonating Bio-Kill Switch increases this bonus to 75 for 2.5 seconds.

AnasBioticEnhancements_ana.name: Ana's Biotic Enhancements
AnasBioticEnhancements_ana.description: Increase the bonus healing duration of Biotic Grenade by 50% and reduce its cooldown by 2 seconds.

RexxarsBirdofPrey_rexxar.name: Rexxar's Bird of Prey
RexxarsBirdofPrey_rexxar.description: Increases Spirit Swoop's damage by 150% to Minions.

MedivhsBirdsEyeView_medivh.name: Medivh's Bird's Eye View
MedivhsBirdsEyeView_medivh.description: Permanently increase Raven Form's vision range by 25%. Activate to increase this bonus to 200% for 5 seconds.

ArthassBitingCold_arthas.name: Arthas's Biting Cold
ArthassBitingCold_arthas.description: Each second an enemy is damaged by Frozen Tempest, it deals 12.5% bonus damage, up to a 50% bonus.

MalGanissBlackClaws_malganis.name: Mal'Ganis's Black Claws
MalGanissBlackClaws_malganis.description: After Mal'Ganis hits an enemy Hero with Fel Claws, his next Basic Attack deals 60% more damage.

MalthaelsBlackHarvest_malthael.name: Malthael's Black Harvest
MalthaelsBlackHarvest_malthael.description: Quest: Apply Reaper's Mark to Heroes for a total of 180 seconds. Reward: Permanently increase Reaper's Mark's duration by 2 seconds.

AzmodansBlackPool_azmodan.name: Azmodan's Black Pool
AzmodansBlackPool_azmodan.description: Globes of Annihilation empowered by Tide of Sin also leave a Black Pool at their impact location for 5 seconds. Enemies within the pool lose 8 per second, up to 56 damage per second.

MaievsBladeDance_maiev.name: Maiev's Blade Dance
MaievsBladeDance_maiev.description: Using Fan of Knives deals 50 Physical Damage to enemies around Maiev.

AlaraksBladeoftheHighlord_alarak.name: Alarak's Blade of the Highlord
AlaraksBladeoftheHighlord_alarak.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes increase Sadism by 2% up to 40%.  Sadism gained from Blade of the Highlord is lost on death.

MaievsBladedArmor_maiev.name: Maiev's Bladed Armor
MaievsBladedArmor_maiev.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Fan of Knives grants 5 Armor for 5 seconds, up to 20 Armor.

KerrigansBladedMomentum_kerrigan.name: Kerrigan's Bladed Momentum
KerrigansBladedMomentum_kerrigan.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes reduce the cooldown of Kerrigan's Basic Abilities by 0.6 seconds.

SamurosBlademastersPursuit_samuro.name: Samuro's Blademaster's Pursuit
SamurosBlademastersPursuit_samuro.description: Advancing Strikes grants an additional 15% bonus Movement Speed, and its duration is increased by 2 seconds.

ArtanissBladesofaTemplar_artanis.name: Artanis's Blades of a Templar
ArtanissBladesofaTemplar_artanis.description: Increase Attack Speed by 30%. Basic Attacks Slow by 20% for 1.25 seconds.

IllidansBladesofAzzinoth_illidan.name: Illidan's Blades of Azzinoth
IllidansBladesofAzzinoth_illidan.description: Hitting 5 Heroes with Sweeping Strike allows Blades of Azzinoth to be activated, increasing Basic Attack damage by 75% for 8 seconds.

SamurosBladestorm_samuro.name: Samuro's Bladestorm
SamurosBladestorm_samuro.description: Become an Unstoppable whirlwind of death, dealing 235 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

RagnarossBlastEcho_ragnaros.name: Ragnaros's Blast Echo
RagnarossBlastEcho_ragnaros.description: After Blast Wave explodes, another Blast Wave is created on Ragnaros.

LtMoralessBlastShield_ltmorales.name: Lt. Morales's Blast Shield
LtMoralessBlastShield_ltmorales.description: Heroes hit by Displacement Grenade generate 2 Energy and grant Lt. Morales a Shield equal to 6% of her maximum Health, stacking up to 5 times.

ImperiussBlazeofGlory_imperius.name: Imperius's Blaze of Glory
ImperiussBlazeofGlory_imperius.description: Solarion's Fire leaves a line of scorched earth along its center, exploding after 2 seconds and dealing 125 damage. This explosion benefits from and consumers Valorous Brand marks.

KharazimsBlazingFists_kharazim.name: Kharazim's Blazing Fists
KharazimsBlazingFists_kharazim.description: Increase the duration of Deadly Reach by 100%. Every 3rd Basic Attack reduces the cooldown of Deadly Reach by 0.75 seconds.

UthersBlessedChampion_uther.name: Uther's Blessed Champion
UthersBlessedChampion_uther.description: For the next 5 seconds after using Holy Light, Uther's Basic Attacks heal him and nearby allies for 15% of the total amount healed by Holy Light.

JohannasBlessedHammer_johanna.name: Johanna's Blessed Hammer
JohannasBlessedHammer_johanna.description: Activate to create 2 hammers that spiral outward from Johanna, dealing 84 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit.  Hitting Heroes with Shield Glare reduces the cooldown of this Ability by 8 seconds.

BlessedMomentum_johanna.name: Blessed Momentum
BlessedMomentum_johanna.description: Basic Attacks reduce Johanna's Basic Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.

AnduinsBlessedRecovery_anduin.name: Anduin's Blessed Recovery
AnduinsBlessedRecovery_anduin.description:
If Anduin loses more than 8% of his maximum Health at once, recover 15% Health over 3 seconds.  This effect has a 10 seconds cooldown. 
Current Health required: 133

JohannasBlessedShield_johanna.name: Johanna's Blessed Shield
JohannasBlessedShield_johanna.description: Deal 114 (+4% per level) damage and Stun the first enemy hit for 1.5 seconds. Blessed Shield then bounces to 2 nearby enemies, dealing 57 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.75 seconds.

ChromiesBlessingoftheBronze_chromie.name: Chromie's Blessing of the Bronze
ChromiesBlessingoftheBronze_chromie.description: Activate to cause Chromie and all allied Heroes gain 20% Movement Speed and their Basic Abilities recharge 35% faster for 8 seconds.

AlexstraszasBlessingoftheRed_alexstrasza.name: Alexstrasza's Blessing of the Red
AlexstraszasBlessingoftheRed_alexstrasza.description: Activate to grant an allied Hero 500 bonus maximum Health until they die.  Cannot be used on Alexstrasza, or on a Hero who already has Blessing of the Red.

LiLisBlessingsOfYulon_lili.name: Li Li's Blessings Of Yu'lon
LiLisBlessingsOfYulon_lili.description: Cloud Serpent heals its bearer for 1% of their maximum Health each time it attacks.

StitchessBlight_stitches.name: Stitches's Blight
StitchessBlight_stitches.description: Activate to apply Vile Gas to all nearby enemies. Enemy heroes hit receive 20% less healing for 5 seconds.  Passive: Vile Gas heals Stitches for 33% of the damage dealt.

KelThuzadsBlightedFrost_kelthuzad.name: Kel'Thuzad's Blighted Frost
KelThuzadsBlightedFrost_kelthuzad.description: Frost Nova deals 75% more damage to enemies in the center. After gaining 30 Blight, increase Frost Nova's Root duration by 0.5 seconds.

ValeerasBlind_valeera.name: Valeera's Blind
ValeerasBlind_valeera.description: Increase the duration of Cheap Shot's Blind by 2.5 seconds.

MalGanissBlindasaBat_malganis.name: Mal'Ganis's Blind as a Bat
MalGanissBlindasaBat_malganis.description: Activate to erupt with blind rage, removing the cooldown and Mana cost of Fel Claws, but losing all vision. Lasts 6 seconds.

JohannasBlindedByTheLight_johanna.name: Johanna's Blinded By The Light
JohannasBlindedByTheLight_johanna.description: Activate to grant nearby allied Heroes a Shield equal to 25% of their maximum Health for 3 seconds.  Hitting Heroes with Shield Glare reduces the cooldown of this Ability by 5 seconds.

AurielsBlindingFlash_auriel.name: Auriel's Blinding Flash
AurielsBlindingFlash_auriel.description: Enemies hit by the center area of Sacred Sweep are blinded for 2 seconds.

KharazimsBlindingSpeed_kharazim.name: Kharazim's Blinding Speed
KharazimsBlindingSpeed_kharazim.description: Decreases Radiant Dash's cooldown by 2 seconds and increases the maximum number of charges by 1.

BrightwingsBlinkHeal_brightwing.name: Brightwing's Blink Heal
BrightwingsBlinkHeal_brightwing.description: Teleport to a nearby ally. When teleporting to a Hero, heal them for 200.  Stores up to 2 charges.

RagnarossBlisteringAttacks_ragnaros.name: Ragnaros's Blistering Attacks
RagnarossBlisteringAttacks_ragnaros.description: Every 10 seconds, Ragnaros's next Basic Attack against a Hero deals 60% bonus damage. Hitting enemies with Basic Abilities reduces this cooldown by 1 second.

Block_muradin.name: Block
Block_muradin.description: Every 5 seconds, gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

BlockParty_etc.name: Block Party
BlockParty_etc.description: Using a Basic or Heroic ability also gives nearby allied Heroes a stack of Block, granting 75 Physical Armor against the next Hero Basic Attack for 8 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%. Maximum 2 stacks of Block.

BloodandThunder_rehgar.name: Blood and Thunder
BloodandThunder_rehgar.description: Ghost Wolf attacks reduce Basic Ability cooldowns by 2 seconds.

TheButchersBloodFrenzy_thebutcher.name: The Butcher's Blood Frenzy
TheButchersBloodFrenzy_thebutcher.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant 5% increased Attack and Movement Speed for 3 seconds, up to 25%.

NazeebosBloodRitual_nazeebo.name: Nazeebo's Blood Ritual
NazeebosBloodRitual_nazeebo.description: If an enemy dies while poisoned by Voodoo Ritual, restore 2% of Nazeebo's maximum Health and Mana.

MalGanissBloodRush_malganis.name: Mal'Ganis's Blood Rush
MalGanissBloodRush_malganis.description: When Mal'Ganis is healed by a Hero, he gains 1% Movement Speed for 8 seconds, up to 15%.

GarroshsBloodcraze_garrosh.name: Garrosh's Bloodcraze
GarroshsBloodcraze_garrosh.description: When hitting a Hero, Bloodthirst heals for an additional 15% of Garrosh's maximum Health over 3 seconds.

RehgarsBloodlust_rehgar.name: Rehgar's Bloodlust
RehgarsBloodlust_rehgar.description: Grant nearby allied Heroes 40% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed and causes them to heal for 30% of the Basic Attack damage to their primary target. Lasts for 8 seconds.

LunarasBlossomSwell_lunara.name: Lunara's Blossom Swell
LunarasBlossomSwell_lunara.description: Increases Noxious Blossom's range by 25% and its radius by 20%. Hitting an enemy Hero with Noxious Blossom increases Lunara's Movement Speed by 15% for 3 seconds. This stacks with other Movement Speed bonuses.

SgtHammersBluntForceGun_sgthammer.name: Sgt. Hammer's Blunt Force Gun
SgtHammersBluntForceGun_sgthammer.description: Fire a missile across the battlefield, dealing 500 (+3% per level) damage to non-Structure enemies in its path.

TychussBobandWeave_tychus.name: Tychus's Bob and Weave
TychussBobandWeave_tychus.description: Increase Tychus's Basic Attack range by 1.5. Run and Gun and Odin's Thrusters gain 2 additional charges and reduces Run and Gun's Mana cost from 50 to 25.

GarroshsBodyCheck_garrosh.name: Garrosh's Body Check
GarroshsBodyCheck_garrosh.description: Activate to deal 111 (+4% per level) damage to a target enemy and Slow them by 35% for 2 seconds. Enemy Heroes hit receive 30% reduced healing for 3 seconds.

JunkratsBoggedDown_junkrat.name: Junkrat's Bogged Down
JunkratsBoggedDown_junkrat.description: Enemies launched by Concussion Mine are Slowed by 60% for 2 seconds upon landing.

AnduinsBoldStrategy_anduin.name: Anduin's Bold Strategy
AnduinsBoldStrategy_anduin.description: Anduin gains his other level 1 Talents, but Flash Heal's cooldown is increased by 2 second.

BoltoftheStorm_etc.name: Bolt of the Storm
BoltoftheStorm_etc.description: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

GallsBombsAway_gall.name: Gall's Bomb's Away
GallsBombsAway_gall.description: Quest: Damaging a Hero with Runic Blast increases its damage by 5, up to 200. Reward: After damaging 20 Heroes, the range and speed of Cho's Rune Bomb is increased by 20%.

AbathursBombardStrain_abathur.name: Abathur's Bombard Strain
AbathursBombardStrain_abathur.description: Locust's Basic Attacks become a long-range siege attack and their duration is increased by 75%.

AzmodansBombardment_azmodan.name: Azmodan's Bombardment
AzmodansBombardment_azmodan.description: After casting Globe of Annihilation, Azmodan's Basic Attacks within the next 3 seconds have an additional 1.5 range and can hit 2 additional targets. Hitting Heroes with Basic Attacks empowered by Bombardment grant 1 Annihilation.

OrpheasBondofAnguish_orphea.name: Orphea's Bond of Anguish
OrpheasBondofAnguish_orphea.description: Shadow Waltz deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 3% of their maximum Health, healing Orphea for 50% of damage dealt.

MaievsBondsofCorruption_maiev.name: Maiev's Bonds of Corruption
MaievsBondsofCorruption_maiev.description: Enemy Heroes pulled by Umbral Bind have their Armor reduced by 10 for 4 seconds.

MaievsBondsofJustice_maiev.name: Maiev's Bonds of Justice
MaievsBondsofJustice_maiev.description: Quest: Each tether applied to a secondary target of Umbral Bind permanently increases Umbral Bind's pull damage by 15. Reward: After applying 5 tethers to secondary targets, increase Umbral Bind's pull damage by 75. Reward: After applying 10 tethers to secondary targets, increase Umbral Bind's cleave damage by 30%.

XulsBoneSpear_xul.name: Xul's Bone Spear
XulsBoneSpear_xul.description: Deal 230 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a line.

ZuljinsBoneslicer_zuljin.name: Zul'jin's Boneslicer
ZuljinsBoneslicer_zuljin.description: Grievous Throw now pierces through all enemies hit and restores 15 Mana per Hero hit. Additionally, Grievous Throw's mark is no longer removed by Basic Attacks.

JunkratsBonzerHits_junkrat.name: Junkrat's Bonzer Hits
JunkratsBonzerHits_junkrat.description: Quest: Hit enemy Heroes 12 times with Concussion Mine. Reward: Concussion Mine deals 40% more damage and knocks enemies back 30% farther.

JunkratsBOOMPOW_junkrat.name: Junkrat's BOOM POW
JunkratsBOOMPOW_junkrat.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Concussion Mine reduces its cooldown by 12 seconds.

LuciosBoombox_lucio.name: Lúcio's Boombox
LuciosBoombox_lucio.description: Place a boombox that plays Lúcio's active Crossfade track for 30 seconds. Its volume adjusts with Amp It up.  Crossfade tracks do not stack.

FalstadsBOOMerang_falstad.name: Falstad's BOOMerang
FalstadsBOOMerang_falstad.description: Reactivate Hammerang mid-flight to deal 165 (+4% per level) damage around the hammer.

QhirasBoomingKick_qhira.name: Qhira's Booming Kick
QhirasBoomingKick_qhira.description: Increase the Stun duration of Revolving Sweep's reactivation by .25 seconds. Other nearby enemy Heroes are also Stunned.

ZaryasBorninBattle_zarya.name: Zarya's Born in Battle
ZaryasBorninBattle_zarya.description: While at or above 75 Energy, Zarya's cooldowns regenerate 25% faster.

LuciosBossaNova_lucio.name: Lúcio's Bossa Nova
LuciosBossaNova_lucio.description: Reduce the cooldown of Sound Barrier to 30 seconds, but the shield now decays over 4 seconds.

DeckardsBottomlessFlask_deckard.name: Deckard's Bottomless Flask
DeckardsBottomlessFlask_deckard.description: After use, Healing Potions recharge after 8 seconds.

JunkratsBouncyBouncy_junkrat.name: Junkrat's Bouncy Bouncy
JunkratsBouncyBouncy_junkrat.description: Upon colliding with terrain for the first time, Frag Launcher grenades deal 20% more damage.

TyraelsBoundbyLaw_tyrael.name: Tyrael's Bound by Law
TyraelsBoundbyLaw_tyrael.description: Increase El'druin's Might's Slow by 10%. Tyrael's Basic Attacks against enemies Slowed by El'druin's Might increase the Slow duration by 1 second, up to 4 seconds.

GuldansBoundbyShadow_guldan.name: Gul'dan's Bound by Shadow
GuldansBoundbyShadow_guldan.description: Each enemy Hero hit with Fel Flame reduces the cooldown of Corruption by 1.5 second.

KerrigansBoundlessFury_kerrigan.name: Kerrigan's Boundless Fury
KerrigansBoundlessFury_kerrigan.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Ravage grants a charge of Ravage. Can only occur once every 10 seconds per Hero.

LunarasBoundlessStride_lunara.name: Lunara's Boundless Stride
LunarasBoundlessStride_lunara.description: All Leaping Strike charges are returned every 15 seconds. Leaping Strike can be used on allies.

RaynorsBountyHunter_raynor.name: Raynor's Bounty Hunter
RaynorsBountyHunter_raynor.description: If Give 'Em Some Pepper's target is a Hero, it deals an additional 3% of their maximum Health as damage and grants Raynor 10 Armor for 3 seconds.  Active Give 'Em Some Pepper to apply it to Raynor's next Basic Attack.

ImperiussBrandofSolarion_imperius.name: Imperius's Brand of Solarion
ImperiussBrandofSolarion_imperius.description: Reduce the duration of Valorous Brand to 3 seconds, but it is no longer consumed when triggered.

GazlowesBreakitDown_gazlowe.name: Gazlowe's Break it Down!
GazlowesBreakitDown_gazlowe.description: Scrap causes Abilities to cooldown four times as fast for 3 seconds.

ChensBrewmastersBalance_chen.name: Chen's Brewmaster's Balance
ChensBrewmastersBalance_chen.description: While at or below 50 Brew, gain 20% Movement Speed. While at or above 50 Brew, regenerate an additional 18 (+4% per level) Health per second.

DVasBringItOn_dva.name: D.Va's Bring It On
DVasBringItOn_dva.description: Self-Destruct's Charge amount gained from losing Mech Health is increased by 30%.

ChromiesBronzeTalons_chromie.name: Chromie's Bronze Talons
ChromiesBronzeTalons_chromie.description: Hitting a Hero with Sand Blast grants 30% additional Basic Attack damage for 5 seconds.

MuradinsBronzebeardRage_muradin.name: Muradin's Bronzebeard Rage
MuradinsBronzebeardRage_muradin.description: Deal 20 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies and heal for 75% of the damage dealt this way. Basic Attacks against a Hero that is Rooted, Stunned or Slowed increase this damage by 100% for 3 seconds.

ZagarasBroodExpansion_zagara.name: Zagara's Brood Expansion
ZagarasBroodExpansion_zagara.description: Reduces the cooldown of Hunter Killer by 7 seconds and its Mana cost by 30.

TheButchersBrutalStrike_thebutcher.name: The Butcher's Brutal Strike
TheButchersBrutalStrike_thebutcher.description: After using Hamstring, The Butcher's next 3 Basic Attacks within 5 seconds deal an additional 15% damage.

AzmodansBrutishVanguard_azmodan.name: Azmodan's Brutish Vanguard
AzmodansBrutishVanguard_azmodan.description: Demon Warriors and Lieutenants gain 25% increased Health. Demon Warriors Slow nearby enemies by 20%.

YrelsBubbleHearth_yrel.name: Yrel's Bubble Hearth
YrelsBubbleHearth_yrel.description: After 1 second, Yrel becomes Invulnerable and casts Hearthstone. Cannot be canceled.

TracersBulletSpray_tracer.name: Tracer's Bullet Spray
TracersBulletSpray_tracer.description: Increases Melee's radius by 40%, and causes it to damage all enemies in range.

TracersBulletTime_tracer.name: Tracer's Bullet Time
TracersBulletTime_tracer.description: Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Blink by 0.15 seconds.

SgtHammersBullheadMines_sgthammer.name: Sgt. Hammer's Bullhead Mines
SgtHammersBullheadMines_sgthammer.description: Middle Spider Mine knocks target back a short distance.

HanzosBullseye_hanzo.name: Hanzo's Bullseye
HanzosBullseye_hanzo.description: Increase Sonic Arrow's speed and center radius by 100%. Additionally, Heroes hit by Sonic Arrow's center are Stunned for 1 second.

UthersBulwarkofLight_uther.name: Uther's Bulwark of Light
UthersBulwarkofLight_uther.description: Divine Shield lasts 2 seconds longer and its cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds.

BlazesBunkerDrop_blaze.name: Blaze's Bunker Drop
BlazesBunkerDrop_blaze.description: After 0.5 seconds, deploy and enter a Bunker with 1300 Health. Blaze and his allies can enter and exit the Bunker at will. While in the Bunker, occupants gain access to Flamethrower, dealing 179 damage to enemies in a line.  Exiting the Bunker 25 Armor for 2 seconds. Bunkers last 10 seconds, or until destroyed.

DVasBunnyHop_dva.name: D.Va's Bunny Hop
DVasBunnyHop_dva.description: D.Va's Mech becomes Unstoppable and stomps every 0.5 seconds, dealing 60 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing enemies by 40%. Lasts 4 seconds.  Requires Mech Mode.

LeoricsBuriedAlive_leoric.name: Leoric's Buried Alive
LeoricsBuriedAlive_leoric.description: The duration of Entomb is lowered by 1 second, but enemies trapped inside are Silenced and take 50 (+4% per level) damage every 1 second.

BlazesBurnNotice_blaze.name: Blaze's Burn Notice
BlazesBurnNotice_blaze.description: Basic Attacks Slow enemies by 5% and deal an additional 18 damage over 2.5 seconds. Stacks up to 5 times.

ImperiussBurnTheImpure_imperius.name: Imperius's Burn The Impure
ImperiussBurnTheImpure_imperius.description: Consuming a Valorous Brand mark deals bonus damage equal to 2.5% of the Hero's maximum Health.

KaelthassBurnedFlesh_kaelthas.name: Kael'thas's Burned Flesh
KaelthassBurnedFlesh_kaelthas.description: When Flamestrike damages 2 or more Heroes, they take additional damage equal to 8% of their maximum Health.

SamurosBurningBlade_samuro.name: Samuro's Burning Blade
SamurosBurningBlade_samuro.description: Critical Strikes unleash a burst of flame, dealing an additional 50% of Samuro's Basic Attack damage to the target and nearby enemies.

LeoricsBurningDespair_leoric.name: Leoric's Burning Despair
LeoricsBurningDespair_leoric.description: Deal 40 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. The damage and area is increased by 100% while Drain Hope is active.

TyraelsBurningHalo_tyrael.name: Tyrael's Burning Halo
TyraelsBurningHalo_tyrael.description: While El'Druin's Might is active, both Tyrael and El'druin deal 18 damage per second to nearby enemies. For 2 seconds after teleporting, Tyrael continues to deal this damage and the damage amount is increased by 150%.

AnubaraksBurningRage_anubarak.name: Anub'arak's Burning Rage
AnubaraksBurningRage_anubarak.description: Deal 23 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.

JunkratsBurstFire_junkrat.name: Junkrat's Burst Fire
JunkratsBurstFire_junkrat.description: Frag Launcher fires all of its charges in a continuous burst, its cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds, but it loses 1 maximum charge.

ZuljinsBuzzsaw_zuljin.name: Zul'jin's Buzzsaw
ZuljinsBuzzsaw_zuljin.description: After impact, Guillotine continues forward, dealing 75% damage to enemies hit. If a Hero is killed by Guillotine, Zul'jin is instantly healed to full.

ChosCThunsGift_cho.name: Cho's C'Thun's Gift
ChosCThunsGift_cho.description: Cho's Basic Attack becomes ranged and slows targets by 20% for 2 seconds.

LtMoralessCaduceusFeedback_ltmorales.name: Lt. Morales's Caduceus Feedback
LtMoralessCaduceusFeedback_ltmorales.description: Increases Attack Range by 1.1 and Basic Attacks against Heroes generate 4 Energy.

LtMoralessCaduceusReactor20_ltmorales.name: Lt. Morales's Caduceus Reactor 2.0
LtMoralessCaduceusReactor20_ltmorales.description: Increase the healing provided by Caduceus Reactor from 2% to 6% of Lt. Morales's maximum Health per second.

LiMingsCalamity_liming.name: Li-Ming's Calamity
LiMingsCalamity_liming.description: Teleport does 300 (+3% per level) damage to enemy Heroes near the destination.

FalstadsCalloftheWildhammer_falstad.name: Falstad's Call of the Wildhammer
FalstadsCalloftheWildhammer_falstad.description: Hinterland Blast has double the range and deals 25% more damage.

AbathursCalldownMULE_abathur.name: Abathur's Calldown: MULE
AbathursCalldownMULE_abathur.description: Activate to calldown a Mule that repairs Structures, one at a time, near target point for 40 seconds, healing for 90 Health every 1 second.

ChosCallousedHide_cho.name: Cho's Calloused Hide
ChosCallousedHide_cho.description: Ogre Hide also increases healing received by 15%.

VallasCaltrops_valla.name: Valla's Caltrops
VallasCaltrops_valla.description: Drop 3 Caltrops while Vaulting. Caltrops do 60 (+4% per level) damage and slow enemies by 40% for 1 second. Quest: Spend 160 seconds at 10 stacks of Hatred. Reward: Vault cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

StitchessCannibalize_stitches.name: Stitches's Cannibalize
StitchessCannibalize_stitches.description: Hitting Heroes with Basic Attacks or the inner impact area of Slam heals Stitches for 2% of his maximum Health.

JunkratsCannonball_junkrat.name: Junkrat's Cannonball!
JunkratsCannonball_junkrat.description: Increase the radius and explosion radius of grenades from Basic Attacks and Frag Launcher by -98.5%.

LiMingsCannoneer_liming.name: Li-Ming's Cannoneer
LiMingsCannoneer_liming.description: When Li-Ming uses an Ability, her next Basic Attack's damage is increased by 75% and deals Spell damage instead of Physical.  Stacks up to 3 times.

MalGanissCarrionSwarm_malganis.name: Mal'Ganis's Carrion Swarm
MalGanissCarrionSwarm_malganis.description: After 1 second, disperse into an Invulnerable swarm of bats for 3 seconds, dealing 126 damage per second to enemies. Vampiric Touch heals for 100% of Carrion Swarm's damage to Heroes.

RagnarossCatchingFire_ragnaros.name: Ragnaros's Catching Fire
RagnarossCatchingFire_ragnaros.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Ragnaros' Health Regeneration by 1.25 per second, up to 18.75. Reward: After gathering 15 Regeneration Globes, activate Catching Fire to gain 25 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

RagnarossCauterizeWounds_ragnaros.name: Ragnaros's Cauterize Wounds
RagnarossCauterizeWounds_ragnaros.description: Empower Sulfuras heals for an additional 40% of damage dealt to Heroes over 2 seconds.

ChensCelerity_chen.name: Chen's Celerity
ChensCelerity_chen.description: Basic Attacks against Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed enemy Heroes reduce the cooldown of Stagger by 1.5 seconds and grant Chen 20 Armor for 3 seconds.

MalfurionsCelestialAlignment_malfurion.name: Malfurion's Celestial Alignment
MalfurionsCelestialAlignment_malfurion.description: Increases Moonfire's reveal duration by 1 second. Malfurion's basic attacks against Heroes revealed by Moonfire deal 75% more damage.

TyrandesCelestialAttunement_tyrande.name: Tyrande's Celestial Attunement
TyrandesCelestialAttunement_tyrande.description: Light of Elune removes Stuns, Silences, and Slows from its target.

ImperiussCelestialSwiftness_imperius.name: Imperius's Celestial Swiftness
ImperiussCelestialSwiftness_imperius.description: Gain 20% Movement Speed for and 5 seconds after casting Celestial Charge. Gain 40% Attack Speed for 5 seconds for  each Hero stunned with Celestial Charge.

TyrandesCelestialWrath_tyrande.name: Tyrande's Celestial Wrath
TyrandesCelestialWrath_tyrande.description: Starfall applies Hunter's Mark to enemy Heroes while inside of its area of effect.

LtMoralessCellularReactor_ltmorales.name: Lt. Morales's Cellular Reactor
LtMoralessCellularReactor_ltmorales.description: Consume 30 Energy to heal Lt. Morales for 40% of her maximum Health over 4 seconds. Caduceus Reactor is disabled while this is active.

MaievsChainGang_maiev.name: Maiev's Chain Gang
MaievsChainGang_maiev.description: Tethering at least 2 enemy Heroes with Umbral Bind grants 35 Armor for 4 seconds.

AzmodansChainofCommand_azmodan.name: Azmodan's Chain of Command
AzmodansChainofCommand_azmodan.description: The cooldown of Demon Lieutenants' Demonic Smite is reduced by 2 seconds and they grant 25% increased damage to nearby friendly Minions, Mercenaries, and Azmodan's summoned Demons.

KelThuzadsChainLink_kelthuzad.name: Kel'Thuzad's Chain-Link
KelThuzadsChainLink_kelthuzad.description: Pulling a Hero with Chains of Kel'Thuzad reduces its cooldown by 5 seconds and refunds its Mana cost.

KelThuzadsChainsofIce_kelthuzad.name: Kel'Thuzad's Chains of Ice
KelThuzadsChainsofIce_kelthuzad.description: After Chains of Kel'Thuzad's Stun expires, the enemy is also Slowed by 60% for 1 second.

QhirasChainsaw_qhira.name: Qhira's Chainsaw
QhirasChainsaw_qhira.description: Carnage's cooldown regenerates 100% faster while an enemy Hero has maximum Blood Rage stacks.

DehakasChangeIsSurvival_dehaka.name: Dehaka's Change Is Survival
DehakasChangeIsSurvival_dehaka.description: Increases Adaptation healing to 200% of the damage received and reduces the cooldown by 30 seconds.

AlaraksChaosReigns_alarak.name: Alarak's Chaos Reigns
AlaraksChaosReigns_alarak.description: Quest: Hit Heroes with Discord Strike. Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, increase Discord Strike's damage by 60. Reward: After hitting 2 Heroes with a single Discord Strike, increase its damage by 60. Reward: After hitting 3 Heroes with a single Discord Strike, increase its damage by 100 and instantly gain all other Rewards.

GuldansChaoticEnergy_guldan.name: Gul'dan's Chaotic Energy
GuldansChaoticEnergy_guldan.description: Increases the cast range of Drain Life by 25%. Quest: The healing provided by Regen Globes is increased by 50%. Reward: After Gathering 15 Regen Globes Gul'dan's Basic Ability Mana costs are permanently reduced by 20.

LiMingsChargedBlast_liming.name: Li-Ming's Charged Blast
LiMingsChargedBlast_liming.description: Basic Attacking a target recently hit by a Magic Missile does an extra 87 (+4% per level) damage.

CassiasChargedStrikes_cassia.name: Cassia's Charged Strikes
CassiasChargedStrikes_cassia.description: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage by 20% and cause Basic Attacks against non-Structures to bounce to nearby enemy Heroes for 8 seconds.

FalstadsChargedUp_falstad.name: Falstad's Charged Up
FalstadsChargedUp_falstad.description: Increases the number of Lightning Rod strikes by 2 and its range by 25%.

JunkratsChatteringTeeth_junkrat.name: Junkrat's Chattering Teeth
JunkratsChatteringTeeth_junkrat.description: Steel Traps will slowly chase nearby enemy Heroes.

TheButchersCheapShot_thebutcher.name: The Butcher's Cheap Shot
TheButchersCheapShot_thebutcher.description: Hamstring does 100% more damage to targets affected by a Slow, Root, or Stun.

TheLostVikingssCheckpointReached_thelost.name: The Lost Vikings's Checkpoint Reached
TheLostVikingssCheckpointReached_thelost.description: 10 seconds after using Play Again!, any dead Vikings are revived and summoned again, and all are healed to full.

KelThuzadsChillingTouch_kelthuzad.name: Kel'Thuzad's Chilling Touch
KelThuzadsChillingTouch_kelthuzad.description: Every 8 seconds, Kel'Thuzad's next Basic Attack hits nearby enemies, deals Spell damage instead of Physical, and Slows by 30% for 2 seconds.

AnubaraksChitinousPlating_anubarak.name: Anub'arak's Chitinous Plating
AnubaraksChitinousPlating_anubarak.description: While Harden Carapace is active, taking damage from enemy Abilities reduces its cooldown by 1 second, up to 3 seconds.

LunarasChokingPollen_lunara.name: Lunara's Choking Pollen
LunarasChokingPollen_lunara.description: Noxious Blossom deals 100% more damage to enemies afflicted by Nature's Toxin, increased to 150% against enemies with 3 stacks.

StitchessChopChop_stitches.name: Stitches's Chop Chop
StitchessChopChop_stitches.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with the inner impact area of Slam grants 50% increased Attack Speed for 6 seconds.

TheButchersChopMeat_thebutcher.name: The Butcher's Chop Meat
TheButchersChopMeat_thebutcher.description: Increases Hamstring damage by 100% to Minions and Mercenaries.

ChromiesChronicConditions_chromie.name: Chromie's Chronic Conditions
ChromiesChronicConditions_chromie.description: After its Time Stop ends, enemies affected by Time Trap are Slowed by 30% for 3 seconds and allies gain 25% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

ArtanissChronoSurge_artanis.name: Artanis's Chrono Surge
ArtanissChronoSurge_artanis.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Phase Prism grants 75% bonus Attack Speed for 5 seconds.

KerrigansChrysalis_kerrigan.name: Kerrigan's Chrysalis
KerrigansChrysalis_kerrigan.description: Activate to place Kerrigan in a Chrysalis with 750 Health for 4 seconds. While inside, Kerrigan regenerates 5% of her maximum Health per second.  Enemies can destroy the Chrysalis to end its effects early.

AlexstraszasCircleofLife_alexstrasza.name: Alexstrasza's Circle of Life
AlexstraszasCircleofLife_alexstrasza.description: Quest: Collect Regeneration Globes. Reward: After collecting 15 Regeneration Globes, Abundance heals for an additional 5% maximum Health. Reward: After collecting 25 Regeneration Globes, Abundance's healing burst creates a Regeneration Globe.

MedivhsCircleofProtection_medivh.name: Medivh's Circle of Protection
MedivhsCircleofProtection_medivh.description: Force of Will also applies to allies near the target, but its cooldown is increased by 2 seconds.

RehgarsCleanse_rehgar.name: Rehgar's Cleanse
RehgarsCleanse_rehgar.description: Activate to make target ally Unstoppable for 1 second. Cannot be cast on yourself.

AlexstraszasCleansingFlame_alexstrasza.name: Alexstrasza's Cleansing Flame
AlexstraszasCleansingFlame_alexstrasza.description: After 1.25 seconds, take to the sky and drop 5 fireballs over 5.938 seconds at the position of the mouse cursor. Fireballs deal 150 (+4% per level) damage to enemies and heal allied Heroes for 300 (+4% per level) Health.  2 seconds after dropping all fireballs, Alexstrasza lands at the position of the mouse cursor.

ZaryasCleansingShield_zarya.name: Zarya's Cleansing Shield
ZaryasCleansingShield_zarya.description: Causes Shield Ally to remove all disabling effects and reduces its cooldown by 3 seconds.

KharazimsCleansingTouch_kharazim.name: Kharazim's Cleansing Touch
KharazimsCleansingTouch_kharazim.description: Radiant Dashing to an ally makes them Unstoppable for 1 second.

ZaryasClearOut_zarya.name: Zarya's Clear Out
ZaryasClearOut_zarya.description: Increases Expulsion Zone's duration by 1.5 seconds and its radius by 15%.

LtMoralessClear_ltmorales.name: Lt. Morales's Clear!
LtMoralessClear_ltmorales.description: Quest: Hit Heroes with Displacement Grenade. Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, reduce the cooldown of Displacement Grenade from 12 seconds to 3 seconds. Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, increase the detonation area of Displacement Grenade by 25%.

TheButchersCleaver_thebutcher.name: The Butcher's Cleaver
TheButchersCleaver_thebutcher.description: Basic Attacks deal 35% of The Butcher's Basic Attack Damage in an area around the target.

WhitemanesClemency_whitemane.name: Whitemane's Clemency
WhitemanesClemency_whitemane.description: Activate to cast Inquisition on an allied Hero, healing them for up to 371 over 3 seconds while Channeling.  Passive: Reduce Inquisition's cooldown by 3 seconds.

ValeerasCloakofShadows_valeera.name: Valeera's Cloak of Shadows
ValeerasCloakofShadows_valeera.description: Valeera is enveloped in a Cloak of Shadows, which immediately removes all damage over time effects from her. For 1.5 seconds, she becomes Unstoppable and gains 75 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 75%.  Using this Ability does not break Vanish.

GazlowesClockwerkSteamFists_gazlowe.name: Gazlowe's Clockwerk Steam Fists
GazlowesClockwerkSteamFists_gazlowe.description: Quest: Basic Attacks increase the duration of active Rock-It! Turrets by 1.5 seconds. Reward: After increasing turret duration by 600 total seconds, reduce the charge cooldown of Rock-It! Turret by 3 seconds.

AnubaraksCocoon_anubarak.name: Anub'arak's Cocoon
AnubaraksCocoon_anubarak.description: Wraps target enemy Hero in a cocoon, rendering them unable to act or be targeted for 7 seconds. Allies of the Hero can attack the cocoon to break it and free them early.

SylvanassColdEmbrace_sylvanas.name: Sylvanas's Cold Embrace
SylvanassColdEmbrace_sylvanas.description: Shadow Dagger reduces the Armor of the initial target by 25 and any enemy it spreads to by 10 for 2.5 seconds.

MalthaelsColdHand_malthael.name: Malthael's Cold Hand
MalthaelsColdHand_malthael.description: Soul Rip Slows enemies by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

XulsColdHandofDeath_xul.name: Xul's Cold Hand of Death
XulsColdHandofDeath_xul.description: Increase the Slow of Frost Mages by 20%.  Passive: Skeletal Warrior attacks Slow enemies by 30% for 2 seconds.

JainasColdSnap_jaina.name: Jaina's Cold Snap
JainasColdSnap_jaina.description: The center area of Ring of Frost deals 310 (+4% per level) damage and Roots enemies after the outer ring expires. Each enemy Hero hit reduces its cooldown by 10 seconds.

RehgarsColossalTotem_rehgar.name: Rehgar's Colossal Totem
RehgarsColossalTotem_rehgar.description: Increases the area and range of Earthbind Totem by 50%.

VariansColossusSmash_varian.name: Varian's Colossus Smash
VariansColossusSmash_varian.description: Smash a target enemy, dealing 160 (+4% per level) damage and lowering their Armor by 20 for 3 seconds, causing them to take 20% increased damage.  Passive: Base Attack Damage increased by 100%. Passive: Maximum Health reduced by 10%.

FenixsCombatAdvantage_fenix.name: Fenix's Combat Advantage
FenixsCombatAdvantage_fenix.description: Plasma Cutter deals 35% more damage to Slowed targets.

ValeerasCombatReadiness_valeera.name: Valeera's Combat Readiness
ValeerasCombatReadiness_valeera.description: Each Combo Point spent grants 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing its damage by 75%. Stores up to 3 charges.

TychussCombatTactician_tychus.name: Tychus's Combat Tactician
TychussCombatTactician_tychus.description: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Run and Gun by 0.8 seconds.

ChensComboStrikes_chen.name: Chen's Combo Strikes
ChensComboStrikes_chen.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack against the same target deals 75% bonus damage. While Chen has Shields from Fortifying Brew and for 2 seconds after, he gains 50% Attack Speed.

BlazesCombustion_blaze.name: Blaze's Combustion
BlazesCombustion_blaze.description: Channel for up to 2.6 seconds. Upon ending, Slow nearby enemies by 60% and deal 52 damage to them every 0.5 seconds. Combustion's Slow and damage over time duration is extended the longer Blaze Channels, from 1 second up to 5 seconds.  Blaze's Movement Speed is reduced by 50% while Channeling.

DVasComingThrough_dva.name: D.Va's Coming Through
DVasComingThrough_dva.description: Knockback distance of Boosters is increased by 100%.

TychussCommandeerOdin_tychus.name: Tychus's Commandeer Odin
TychussCommandeerOdin_tychus.description: Call down an Odin to pilot. The Odin deals increased Damage, has 100% increased Basic Attack range, and uses different Abilities. The Odin has 25 Armor and lasts 23 seconds.

SonyasCompositeSpear_sonya.name: Sonya's Composite Spear
SonyasCompositeSpear_sonya.description: Increases Ancient Spear's range by 50%. Hitting an enemy Hero with Ancient Spear grants 25 Armor for 4 seconds.

TracersCompositionB_tracer.name: Tracer's Composition B
TracersCompositionB_tracer.description: Successfully sticking a Pulse Bomb to an enemy Hero also drops another one at their feet that deals 50% damage and explodes slightly earlier.

AnasConcentratedDoses_ana.name: Ana's Concentrated Doses
AnasConcentratedDoses_ana.description: Increase Healing Dart's healing by 10% for each Dose active on enemy Heroes.

TychussConcussionGrenade_tychus.name: Tychus's Concussion Grenade
TychussConcussionGrenade_tychus.description: Increases Frag Grenade's radius by 25% and the knockback distance by 100%.

DVasConcussivePulse_dva.name: D.Va's Concussive Pulse
DVasConcussivePulse_dva.description: D.Va gains the Concussive Pulse ability, allowing her to deal 141 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a cone and knock them back.  Requires Pilot Mode.

ProbiussConstructAdditionalPylons_probiu.name: Probius's Construct Additional Pylons
ProbiussConstructAdditionalPylons_probiu.description: Probius can now have up to 3 active Pylons, and increase the damage of Pylon Overcharge by 25%.

GuldansConsumeSoul_guldan.name: Gul'dan's Consume Soul
GuldansConsumeSoul_guldan.description: Instantly kill an enemy Minion and heal for 365 (+4% per level) Health.  Stores up to 2 charges.

MephistosConsumeSouls_mephisto.name: Mephisto's Consume Souls
MephistosConsumeSouls_mephisto.description: Channel for 2.5 seconds, revealing all enemy Heroes. After the Channel completes, all enemy Heroes take 357 damage and are Slowed by 40% for 2.5 seconds.

LeoricsConsumeVitality_leoric.name: Leoric's Consume Vitality
LeoricsConsumeVitality_leoric.description: Skeletal Swing's cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds. Enemy Heroes hit heal Leoric for 4% of his maximum Health.

MephistosConsumedbyHatred_mephisto.name: Mephisto's Consumed by Hatred
MephistosConsumedbyHatred_mephisto.description: Consume Souls deals bonus damage equal to 10% of the target's missing Health. If Consume Souls initial cast kills a Hero it will cast 1 additional time.

ChosConsumingFire_cho.name: Cho's Consuming Fire
ChosConsumingFire_cho.description: Consuming Blaze heals for 150% more when a Hero is Ignited.

ImperiussConsumingFlame_imperius.name: Imperius's Consuming Flame
ImperiussConsumingFlame_imperius.description: Increase the center damage of Solarion's Fire by an additional 100% and its Slow amount by 15%. The first enemy Hero hit with Solarion's Fire restores 30 Mana.

AnasContactHealing_ana.name: Ana's Contact Healing
AnasContactHealing_ana.description: Biotic Grenade heals for 30% more per allied and enemy Hero hit.

DehakasContagion_dehaka.name: Dehaka's Contagion
DehakasContagion_dehaka.description: Isolation hits all Heroes near the first target.

MaievsContainmentDisc_maiev.name: Maiev's Containment Disc
MaievsContainmentDisc_maiev.description: Throw a glaive in the target direction. If an enemy Hero is hit, Containment Disc can be reactivated to remove their vision and Time Stop them for 4 seconds.  Containment Disc automatically activates 6 seconds after hitting a Hero.

StukovsControlledChaos_stukov.name: Stukov's Controlled Chaos
StukovsControlledChaos_stukov.description: Flailing Swipe gains 2 additional charges, but each use only swings 1 time, at maximum range. Additionally, its cooldown is decreased to 30 seconds, and its Mana cost is reduced from 100 to 50.

KaelthassConvection_kaelthas.name: Kael'thas's Convection
KaelthassConvection_kaelthas.description: Quest: Damaging an enemy Hero with Flamestrike increase its damage by 5, up to 100. This bonus is lost on death. Reward: After hitting 20 enemy Heroes, increase Flamestrike damage by an additional 100 and no longer lose any bonuses on death.

AurielsConvergingForce_auriel.name: Auriel's Converging Force
AurielsConvergingForce_auriel.description: Enemies hit by the outer area are pushed slightly toward the center.

JohannasConviction_johanna.name: Johanna's Conviction
JohannasConviction_johanna.description: Movement Speed is increased by 25% while Condemn is charging up.

XulsCorpseExplosion_xul.name: Xul's Corpse Explosion
XulsCorpseExplosion_xul.description: When Skeletal Warriors die they explode for 55 (+4% per level) damage in a small area. Deals 100% increased damage to non-Heroic enemies.

ZagarasCorpseFeeders_zagara.name: Zagara's Corpse Feeders
ZagarasCorpseFeeders_zagara.description: Reduces the cooldown of Infested Drop by 3 seconds and Roachlings take 50% less damage from non-Heroic sources.

ZagarasCorrosiveSaliva_zagara.name: Zagara's Corrosive Saliva
ZagarasCorrosiveSaliva_zagara.description: When used against Heroes, Hunter Killers deal additional damage equal to 2.5% of their maximum Health.

AlaraksCounterStrike_alarak.name: Alarak's Counter-Strike
AlaraksCounterStrike_alarak.description: Alarak targets an area and channels for 1 second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals 275 (+4% per level) damage.  This ability will take over your Trait button.

NovasCovertMission_nova.name: Nova's Covert Mission
NovasCovertMission_nova.description: Enemy Minions killed near Nova grant a stack of Bribe. Hero Takedowns grant 10 stacks of Bribe. Use 25 stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them.  Does not work on Bosses.  Maximum of 100 stacks. If a camp is defeated entirely with Bribe, the camp respawns 50% faster.

NovasCovertOps_nova.name: Nova's Covert Ops
NovasCovertOps_nova.description: After being Stealthed for 4 seconds, Pinning Shot's slow is increased to 55% and costs no Mana. Bonus is lost after losing Stealth for 1 second.

DVasCrashCourse_dva.name: D.Va's Crash Course
DVasCrashCourse_dva.description: Quest:Damage enemy Heroes with Boosters. Reward: After damaging 20 Heroes, each use of Boosters lowers its cooldown by 1 second per Hero hit.

ThrallsCrashLightning_thrall.name: Thrall's Crash Lightning
ThrallsCrashLightning_thrall.description: Repeatable Quest: Hitting at least 2 Heroes with a single use of Chain Lightning increases the damage of its bounces by 12, up to 360. Reward: After hitting multiple Heroes 30 times, Chain Lightning prioritizes bouncing to Heroes.

VallasCreedoftheHunter_valla.name: Valla's Creed of the Hunter
VallasCreedoftheHunter_valla.description: Increases Attack Speed by 10%. Quest: Use 100 Basic Attacks against Heroes. Reward: Hatred grants an additional 2% Basic Attack Damage per stack.

ValeerasCripplingPoison_valeera.name: Valeera's Crippling Poison
ValeerasCripplingPoison_valeera.description: Activate to cause Valeera's next damaging Ability and subsequent Abilities within 4 seconds Slow targets by 20% for 4 seconds.  Activating Crippling Poison does not break Stealth.

NovasCripplingShot_nova.name: Nova's Crippling Shot
NovasCripplingShot_nova.description: Pinning Shot lowers a Hero's Armor by 20 for the duration of the slow, causing them to take 20% increased damage.

TheButchersCripplingSlam_thebutcher.name: The Butcher's Crippling Slam
TheButchersCripplingSlam_thebutcher.description: Hamstring's slow no longer fades out, and the duration is increased by 30%.

RexxarsCripplingTalons_rexxar.name: Rexxar's Crippling Talons
RexxarsCripplingTalons_rexxar.description: Increases Spirit Swoop's slow amount to 50% and its duration to 3 seconds.

BrightwingsCriticalMist_brightwing.name: Brightwing's Critical Mist
BrightwingsCriticalMist_brightwing.description: If Soothing Mist removes a disabling effect from an ally, heal them for 250.

BrightwingsCritterize_brightwing.name: Brightwing's Critterize
BrightwingsCritterize_brightwing.description: While Polymorphed, the target's Armor is reduced by 25, increasing the damage they take by 25%.

BlazesCrossfire_blaze.name: Blaze's Crossfire
BlazesCrossfire_blaze.description: Hitting an enemy with both streams of Flame Stream deals 139 bonus damage.

MuradinsCrowdControl_muradin.name: Muradin's Crowd Control
MuradinsCrowdControl_muradin.description: Each enemy hit by Thunder Clap reduces its cooldown by 0.75 seconds and restores 5 Mana, to a maximum of 9 targets.

CrowdPleaser_etc.name: Crowd Pleaser
CrowdPleaser_etc.description: Stage Dive's impact area is 50% bigger, and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds for every enemy Hero hit.

CrowdSurfer_etc.name: Crowd Surfer
CrowdSurfer_etc.description: Allows Powerslide to travel over walls and terrain.

MaievsCruelChain_maiev.name: Maiev's Cruel Chain
MaievsCruelChain_maiev.description: Umbral Bind grants 25% Movement Speed for 2.5 seconds. In addition, each time Maiev deals damage to tethered targets, Umbral Bind's pull damage to all targets is increased by 30%, up to 150%.

DiablosCruelty_diablo.name: Diablo's Cruelty
DiablosCruelty_diablo.description: Stunning an enemy with Shadow Charge or Overpower increases Diablo's Attack Speed by 50% for 7 seconds, up to 100%.

SamurosCrushingBlows_samuro.name: Samuro's Crushing Blows
SamurosCrushingBlows_samuro.description: Critical Strike now has 2 charges. Samuro's Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Critical Strike by 1.75 seconds.

LeoricsCrushingHope_leoric.name: Leoric's Crushing Hope
LeoricsCrushingHope_leoric.description: If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, it instantly deals an additional 15% of the target's maximum Health as damage. This damage does not heal Leoric.

OrpheasCrushingJaws_orphea.name: Orphea's Crushing Jaws
OrpheasCrushingJaws_orphea.description: After 1.25 seconds, pulls enemies in an area towards the center, dealing 250 damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.

AnubaraksCryptweave_anubarak.name: Anub'arak's Cryptweave
AnubaraksCryptweave_anubarak.description: Staying near the Cocoon allows Anub'arak to extend the duration by up to 4 seconds per Cocoon.

AurielsCrystalAegis_auriel.name: Auriel's Crystal Aegis
AurielsCrystalAegis_auriel.description: Place an allied Hero into Stasis for 2 seconds. Upon expiration, Crystal Aegis deals 255 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies.

DeckardsCubeMastery_deckard.name: Deckard's Cube Mastery
DeckardsCubeMastery_deckard.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Scoll of Sealing from 40 to 30. Each enemy Hero hit by Horadric Cube reduces the cooldown of Scroll of Sealing by 3 seconds.

GuldansCurseofExhaustion_guldan.name: Gul'dan's Curse of Exhaustion
GuldansCurseofExhaustion_guldan.description: Drain Life deals 50% more damage and slows the target's movement speed by 50% if they are afflicted by Corruption.

GreymanesCursedBullet_greymane.name: Greymane's Cursed Bullet
GreymanesCursedBullet_greymane.description: Greymane shapeshifts into a Human and fires a bullet that hits the first enemy Hero in its path, dealing 40% of their current Health in damage.  Does not affect Vehicles.

GenjisCyberShield_genji.name: Genji's Cyber Shield
GenjisCyberShield_genji.description: Using Cyber Agility grants 50 Spell Armor for 2.5 seconds.

AzmodansCydaeasKiss_azmodan.name: Azmodan's Cydaea's Kiss
AzmodansCydaeasKiss_azmodan.description: Reduces the Channel time of All Shall Burn by 0.5 seconds. If All Shall Burn's Channel lasts its full duration against a Hero, Azmodan is healed for 8% of his maximum Health.

FenixsDampeningField_fenix.name: Fenix's Dampening Field
FenixsDampeningField_fenix.description: Fenix gains 25 Spell Armor while he has a Shield from Shield Capacitor.

SamurosDanceOfDeath_samuro.name: Samuro's Dance Of Death
SamurosDanceOfDeath_samuro.description: Mirror Images use Bladestorm when Samuro does.

GuldansDarkBargain_guldan.name: Gul'dan's Dark Bargain
GuldansDarkBargain_guldan.description: Gul'dan's maximum Health is permanently increased by 30% but his Death Respawn time is increased by 15 seconds.

MalGanissDarkConversion_malganis.name: Mal'Ganis's Dark Conversion
MalGanissDarkConversion_malganis.description: Channel on an enemy Hero for 0.75 seconds, then swap Health percentages with the target over 3 seconds.

SylvanassDarkLadysCall_sylvanas.name: Sylvanas's Dark Lady's Call
SylvanassDarkLadysCall_sylvanas.description: Heroes hit by Mind Control have their vision radius greatly reduced for 5 seconds. Mind Control's cooldown is reduced by 30 seconds.

ZeratulsDarknessDescends_zeratul.name: Zeratul's Darkness Descends
ZeratulsDarknessDescends_zeratul.description: Activate to gain 40% Attack Speed for 5 seconds.  Passive: Gain 20% Attack Speed.

GuldansDarknessWithin_guldan.name: Gul'dan's Darkness Within
GuldansDarknessWithin_guldan.description: After using Life Tap, the next Ability Gul'dan casts has 30% increased Spell Power.
