TyrandesDarnassianArchery_tyrande.name: Tyrande's Darnassian Archery
TyrandesDarnassianArchery_tyrande.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant a stacking 10% increased Attack Damage bonus for 6 seconds. This bonus is lost when Basic Attacking non-Heroes.

TychussDash_tychus.name: Tychus's Dash
TychussDash_tychus.description: Quest: Run and Gun increases Tychus's Movement Speed by 1% for each Regeneration Globe gathered, up to 25%. Lasts 2 seconds. Reward: Once 25 Regeneration Globes have been gathered, the range of Run and Gun is increased by 50%.

YrelsDauntless_yrel.name: Yrel's Dauntless
YrelsDauntless_yrel.description: Casting a Basic Ability grants Yrel 50 Physical Armor for 2 seconds.

DVasDazerZone_dva.name: D.Va's Dazer Zone
DVasDazerZone_dva.description: Enemy Heroes affected by Defense Matrix are Slowed by 20%.

OrpheasDeadMagic_orphea.name: Orphea's Dead Magic
OrpheasDeadMagic_orphea.description: Basic Attacks that consume Chaos ignore Armor and deal 115 Spell Damage to all enemies around the target.

NazeebosDeadRush_nazeebo.name: Nazeebo's Dead Rush
NazeebosDeadRush_nazeebo.description: Zombie Wall deals 75% more damage. When it expires up to 5 remaining Zombies uproot and attack nearby enemies for 3 seconds.

AnasDeadeye_ana.name: Ana's Deadeye
AnasDeadeye_ana.description: Increase Eye Of Horus' healing and damage by 4% for every Hero hit. This bonus resets after all shots have been fired.

GarroshsDeadlyCalm_garrosh.name: Garrosh's Deadly Calm
GarroshsDeadlyCalm_garrosh.description: Heroes hit by Decimate deal 25% less damage for 3 seconds.

AlaraksDeadlyCharge_alarak.name: Alarak's Deadly Charge
AlaraksDeadlyCharge_alarak.description:
After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 200 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.6 seconds.  Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling. 
This ability will take over your Trait button.

ChensDeadlyStrike_chen.name: Chen's Deadly Strike
ChensDeadlyStrike_chen.description: Flying Kick no longer costs Brew. Additionally, its damage is increased by 100% while Chen has Shields from Fortifying Brew.

GallsDeafeningBlast_gall.name: Gall's Deafening Blast
GallsDeafeningBlast_gall.description: Runic Blast silences enemy Heroes for 1.25 seconds.

SylvanassDeafeningBlast_sylvanas.name: Sylvanas's Deafening Blast
SylvanassDeafeningBlast_sylvanas.description: Enemies at the center of Wailing Arrow's explosion take 50% more damage and are silenced for twice as long.

VallasDeathDealer_valla.name: Valla's Death Dealer
VallasDeathDealer_valla.description: Increases Vault Basic Attack damage bonus from 6% to 14% per stack of Hatred. If this attack kills its victim, the Mana cost and cooldown of Vault are refunded.

ValeerasDeathFromAbove_valeera.name: Valeera's Death From Above
ValeerasDeathFromAbove_valeera.description: Teleporting with Ambush reduces the cooldown of Vanish by 4 seconds.

LeoricsDeathMarch_leoric.name: Leoric's Death March
LeoricsDeathMarch_leoric.description: The final swing of March of the Black King also applies Drain Hope to nearby enemy Heroes.

ETCsDeathMetal_etc.name: E.T.C.'s Death Metal
ETCsDeathMetal_etc.description: Upon dying, a ghost uses Mosh Pit at E.T.C's location.

VallasDeathSiphon_valla.name: Valla's Death Siphon
VallasDeathSiphon_valla.description: Strafe also fires penetrating bolts in a line for 34 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds. 25% of the damage dealt with Strafe is returned as Health.

GarroshsDeathWish_garrosh.name: Garrosh's Death Wish
GarroshsDeathWish_garrosh.description: If an enemy Hero is killed while Taunted by Warlord's Challenge, its cooldown is reduced by 45 seconds.

ArthassDeathsAdvance_arthas.name: Arthas's Death's Advance
ArthassDeathsAdvance_arthas.description: Activate to increase Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds.  Passive: Increases Movement Speed by 10%.

KelThuzadsDeathchill_kelthuzad.name: Kel'Thuzad's Deathchill
KelThuzadsDeathchill_kelthuzad.description: When Frost Blast's Root expires, enemies are Slowed by 40% for 3 seconds. Heroes killed while under the effects of Frost Blast instantly release another Frost Blast explosion.

ArthassDeathlord_arthas.name: Arthas's Deathlord
ArthassDeathlord_arthas.description: Reduces Death Coil's cooldown by 3 seconds and increase its range by 30%.

AnasDebilitatingDart_ana.name: Ana's Debilitating Dart
AnasDebilitatingDart_ana.description: Activate to fire a dart which Slows the Movement Speed and reduces the damage dealt by the first enemy Hero it hits by 50% for 4 seconds.

DiablosDebilitatingFlames_diablo.name: Diablo's Debilitating Flames
DiablosDebilitatingFlames_diablo.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Fire Stomp are Slowed by 5% for 4 seconds, up to 50%. Heroes Slowed by 25% or more by Debilitating Flames deal 50% less damage.

RaynorsDebilitatingRounds_raynor.name: Raynor's Debilitating Rounds
RaynorsDebilitatingRounds_raynor.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Penetrating Round from 65 to 45, and its cooldown by 3 seconds. While Inspire is active, Penetrating Round's Slow is increased by 20%.

AnubaraksDebilitation_anubarak.name: Anub'arak's Debilitation
AnubaraksDebilitation_anubarak.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Burrow Charge have their Spell Power reduced by 50% for 4 seconds.

GarroshsDecimate_garrosh.name: Garrosh's Decimate
GarroshsDecimate_garrosh.description: Deal 50 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and Slow them by 40% for 1.5 seconds. Deals 100% more damage to Heroes, and each Hero hit reduces the cooldown by 1 second.  Stores up to 3 charges.

ChromiesDeepBreathing_chromie.name: Chromie's Deep Breathing
ChromiesDeepBreathing_chromie.description: Quest: Every time Dragon's Breath hits a Hero increase its damage by 3, up to 60. Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes, increase its damage by an additional 60 and also increase Chromie's vision radius by 100%.

JainasDeepChill_jaina.name: Jaina's Deep Chill
JainasDeepChill_jaina.description: Frostbite's Chill can now stacks a second time, slowing targets up to 40%.

GuldansDeepImpact_guldan.name: Gul'dan's Deep Impact
GuldansDeepImpact_guldan.description: Rain of Destruction slows enemies Movement Speed by 90% for 0.5 seconds.

MalfurionsDeepRoots_malfurion.name: Malfurion's Deep Roots
MalfurionsDeepRoots_malfurion.description: Entangling Roots grows 25% larger and persist on the ground 40% longer.

TassadarsDeepShift_tassadar.name: Tassadar's Deep Shift
TassadarsDeepShift_tassadar.description: Dimensional Shift's duration and Movement Speed bonuses are increased by 50%.

MalGanissDeepSleep_malganis.name: Mal'Ganis's Deep Sleep
MalGanissDeepSleep_malganis.description: Increase Night Rush's Sleep duration by 0.75 seconds and its Movement Speed bonus by 10%.

TyraelsDefenseoftheAngels_tyrael.name: Tyrael's Defense of the Angels
TyraelsDefenseoftheAngels_tyrael.description: Activate to gain 50 Armor for 5 seconds.  Each time Righteousness's Shield absorbs damage, Defense of the Angel's cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds.

GarroshsDefensiveMeasures_garrosh.name: Garrosh's Defensive Measures
GarroshsDefensiveMeasures_garrosh.description: Stunning a Hero with Groundbreaker grants Garrosh a 350 (+4% per level) Shield for 6 seconds.

ZaryasDefensiveShielding_zarya.name: Zarya's Defensive Shielding
ZaryasDefensiveShielding_zarya.description: Upon expiration or breaking, Personal Barrier and Shield Ally grant 75 Physical Armor against the next 2 Hero Basic Attacks for 6 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%.

SamurosDeflection_samuro.name: Samuro's Deflection
SamurosDeflection_samuro.description: Advancing Strikes grants 30 Physical Armor against Hero Basic Attacks, reducing their damage by 25%.

ZaryasDemolitionsExpert_zarya.name: Zarya's Demolitions Expert
ZaryasDemolitionsExpert_zarya.description: Quest: For every 5 enemy Heroes hit by Particle Grenade, its recharge rate lowers by 0.4375 seconds, up to 3.5 seconds. Reward: Once Particle Grenade has hit 40 enemy Heroes, its radius is increased by 15%.

GuldansDemonicCircle_guldan.name: Gul'dan's Demonic Circle
GuldansDemonicCircle_guldan.description: Summon a Demonic Circle at Gul'dan's location. Activate to teleport Gul'dan to the Demonic Circle.

IllidansDemonicForm_illidan.name: Illidan's Demonic Form
IllidansDemonicForm_illidan.description: Permanently remain in Demonic Form. Metamorphosis also increases Attack Speed by 20% and reduces the duration of slows, roots, and stuns by 50%. Illidan can now mount in Demonic Form.

AzmodansDemonicInvasion_azmodan.name: Azmodan's Demonic Invasion
AzmodansDemonicInvasion_azmodan.description: Rain a small army of Demonic Grunts down on enemies, dealing 65 damage per impact. Grunts deal 42 damage, have 750 health and last up to 10 seconds. When Grunts die they explode, dealing 98 damage to nearby enemies.

VariansDemoralizingShout_varian.name: Varian's Demoralizing Shout
VariansDemoralizingShout_varian.description: Activate to demoralize nearby enemy Heroes, reducing damage they deal by 40% for 5 seconds.

AnduinsDesperatePrayer_anduin.name: Anduin's Desperate Prayer
AnduinsDesperatePrayer_anduin.description: Activate to desperately heal an allied Hero for 540, but kneel for 2 seconds, unable to act.  Using Desperate Prayer places Flash Heal on a 10 second cooldown.

AnasDetachableBoxMagazine_ana.name: Ana's Detachable Box Magazine
AnasDetachableBoxMagazine_ana.description: Quest: Stack 5 Doses on an enemy Hero. Reward: After reaching maximum Dosage 12 times, unlock the Active Reload Ability, which can be activated to instantly gain 3 charges of Healing Dart.

OrpheasDetermination_orphea.name: Orphea's Determination
OrpheasDetermination_orphea.description: After dashing with Shadow Waltz, Orphea gains 50 Spell Armor, stacking up to 2 times. While Orphea has Determination, her Physical damage is increased by 15%.

DiablosDevastatingCharge_diablo.name: Diablo's Devastating Charge
DiablosDevastatingCharge_diablo.description: Increase Shadow Charge's terrain collision damage by 80%. Quest: Each time an enemy Hero takes terrain collision damage, increase this bonus by 20%, to a maximum of 120%.

DiablosDevilsDue_diablo.name: Diablo's Devil's Due
DiablosDevilsDue_diablo.description: Black Soulstone increases the effects of Regen Globes and Healing Fountains by 2.25% per Soul.

ZagarasDevouringMaw_zagara.name: Zagara's Devouring Maw
ZagarasDevouringMaw_zagara.description: Summon a Devouring Maw that devours enemies for 4 seconds. Devoured enemies cannot fight and take 88 (+4% per level) damage per second.  Usable on Unstoppable enemies.

DiablosDiabolicalMomentum_diablo.name: Diablo's Diabolical Momentum
DiablosDiabolicalMomentum_diablo.description: When Diablo's Basic Attacks damage enemies, reduce the cooldown of his Basic Abilities by 0.75 second.

AurielsDiamondResolve_auriel.name: Auriel's Diamond Resolve
AurielsDiamondResolve_auriel.description: When Crystal Aegis expires, it grants the target 75 Armor for 5 seconds, reducing damage taken by 75%.

LiMingsDiamondSkin_liming.name: Li-Ming's Diamond Skin
LiMingsDiamondSkin_liming.description: Teleport grants a Shield equal to 25% of Li-Ming's maximum Health for 4 seconds.

MalthaelsDieAlone_malthael.name: Malthael's Die Alone
MalthaelsDieAlone_malthael.description: Soul Rip deals 50% more damage to Heroes if it hits only one Hero.

StitchessDigestiveJuices_stitches.name: Stitches's Digestive Juices
StitchessDigestiveJuices_stitches.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Devour reduces its cooldown by 5 seconds and causes the Hero hit to deal 50% reduced damage for 5 seconds.

RexxarsDireBeast_rexxar.name: Rexxar's Dire Beast
RexxarsDireBeast_rexxar.description: Rexxar and Misha's Basic Attacks increase the damage of the next Misha, Charge! by 15%, stacking up to a 150% bonus.

LiMingsDisintegrate_liming.name: Li-Ming's Disintegrate
LiMingsDisintegrate_liming.description: Channel a powerful beam, dealing 440 (+5% per level) damage over 2.5 seconds to enemies while they are in it. The direction of the beam changes with your mouse cursor position.

AlaraksDissonance_alarak.name: Alarak's Dissonance
AlaraksDissonance_alarak.description: Increase Discord Strike's Silence duration by 0.75 seconds.

FenixsDivertPowerWeapons_fenix.name: Fenix's Divert Power: Weapons
FenixsDivertPowerWeapons_fenix.description: Activate to gain 40% Basic Attack damage for 5 seconds. Basic Attacking a Hero refreshes this duration. Once Divert Power: Weapons ends, drain all of Shield Capacitor's Shields.

DVasDivertingPower_dva.name: D.Va's Diverting Power
DVasDivertingPower_dva.description: The area of Defense Matrix is 100% wider and 25% longer, but D.Va's Movement Speed is reduced by an additional 30% for the duration.

YrelsDivineFavor_yrel.name: Yrel's Divine Favor
YrelsDivineFavor_yrel.description: Casting a Basic Ability reduces the cooldown of Divine Purpose by 1.5 seconds.

UthersDivineHurricane_uther.name: Uther's Divine Hurricane
UthersDivineHurricane_uther.description: Divine Storm's radius is increased by 50% and its cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds.

KharazimsDivinePalm_kharazim.name: Kharazim's Divine Palm
KharazimsDivinePalm_kharazim.description: Protect an allied Hero from death, causing them to be healed for 1200 (+4% per level) if they take fatal damage in the next 3 seconds.

UthersDivineProtection_uther.name: Uther's Divine Protection
UthersDivineProtection_uther.description: Devotion now stacks twice, and its duration is refreshed when applied.

ImperiussDivineRage_imperius.name: Imperius's Divine Rage
ImperiussDivineRage_imperius.description: Consuming a Valorous Brand mark reduces the cooldown of Molten Armor by 1 second.

WhitemanesDivineReckoning_whitemane.name: Whitemane's Divine Reckoning
WhitemanesDivineReckoning_whitemane.description: After 1 second, consecrate an area for 4 seconds, dealing 50 damage every 0.5 seconds to enemies inside.

UthersDivineShield_uther.name: Uther's Divine Shield
UthersDivineShield_uther.description: Make an allied Hero Invulnerable and increase their Movement Speed by 20% for 3 seconds.

YrelsDivineSteed_yrel.name: Yrel's Divine Steed
YrelsDivineSteed_yrel.description: Mounting is instant and grants 60% Movement Speed that decays over 3 seconds.

UthersDivineStorm_uther.name: Uther's Divine Storm
UthersDivineStorm_uther.description: Deal 170 (+4% per level) damage and Stun nearby enemies for 1.75 seconds.

TyraelsDivineVigor_tyrael.name: Tyrael's Divine Vigor
TyraelsDivineVigor_tyrael.description: If Smite hits an enemy, Tyrael's Basic Attacks within the next 4 seconds heal for 60% of the damage dealt.

GenjisDodge_genji.name: Genji's Dodge
GenjisDodge_genji.description: Genji dodges 1 Heroic Basic Attack every 8 seconds.

LiMingsDominance_liming.name: Li-Ming's Dominance
LiMingsDominance_liming.description: Takedowns restore 30% of Li-Ming's missing Health.

DiablosDomination_diablo.name: Diablo's Domination
DiablosDomination_diablo.description: Casting Overpower resets the cooldown of Shadow Charge.

GallsDoubleBack_gall.name: Gall's Double Back
GallsDoubleBack_gall.description: Activate Dread Orb before the second bounce ends to reverse the direction of the third bounce.  Passive: The third bounce of Dread Orb deals 50% more damage to Heroic targets, and 200% more damage to Non-Heroic targets.

LiLisDoubleDragon_lili.name: Li Li's Double Dragon
LiLisDoubleDragon_lili.description: After hitting a target with Water Dragon, another Water Dragon is summoned at the point of impact.

NovasDoubleTap_nova.name: Nova's Double Tap
NovasDoubleTap_nova.description: Pinning Shot now has 2 charges but it's cooldown is increased by 2 seconds.

GallsDoubleTrouble_gall.name: Gall's Double Trouble
GallsDoubleTrouble_gall.description: Quest: If Shadowflame hits an enemy Hero that is afflicted by Cho's Consuming Blaze, its cooldown is reduced by 0.5 second. Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, Shadowflame's cooldown is instead permanently reduced by 1 second.

GarroshsDoubleUp_garrosh.name: Garrosh's Double Up
GarroshsDoubleUp_garrosh.description: Armor Up can be activated to increase its Armor bonus by 100% for 3 seconds.  Double Up's activation has a 30 second cooldown.

ChromiesDraconicBarrage_chromie.name: Chromie's Draconic Barrage
ChromiesDraconicBarrage_chromie.description: Increase the damage from Bronze Talons by an additional 100%. Hitting an enemy Hero with Sand Blast applies Bronze Talons to Chromie's next 2 Basic Attacks.

GenjisDragonClaw_genji.name: Genji's Dragon Claw
GenjisDragonClaw_genji.description: After Genji blocks 330 (+4% per level) damage with Deflect, activate to release a Dragon Claw, dealing 190 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies.

AlexstraszasDragonScales_alexstrasza.name: Alexstrasza's Dragon Scales
AlexstraszasDragonScales_alexstrasza.description: Gain 40 Armor while Stunned, Silenced, or Rooted, and for 2 seconds after. Can only trigger once every 10 seconds.

HanzosDragonsArrow_hanzo.name: Hanzo's Dragon's Arrow
HanzosDragonsArrow_hanzo.description:
Fire a missile that travels across the battleground. Explodes upon hitting an enemy Hero, dealing 100 damage to all nearby enemies and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.  After traveling a medium distance, the damage is increased to 200 and the Stun duration to 1.25 seconds. 
After traveling a long distance, the damage is increased to 350 and the Stun duration to 2 seconds.

GenjisDragonblade_genji.name: Genji's Dragonblade
GenjisDragonblade_genji.description: Unleash the Dragonblade for 8 seconds. While active, Dragonblade can be reactivated to lunge forward and slash in a huge arc, dealing 240 (+4% per level) damage.

HanzosDragonstrike_hanzo.name: Hanzo's Dragonstrike
HanzosDragonstrike_hanzo.description: After 1.5 seconds, summon a pair of Spirit Dragons which travel forward, dealing 70 damage every 0.25 seconds to enemy Heroes in its area. Enemies in the center take 150% damage.

LeoricsDrainMomentum_leoric.name: Leoric's Drain Momentum
LeoricsDrainMomentum_leoric.description: Drain Hope no longer Slows Leoric. If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, gain 30% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

TychussDrakkenLaserDrill_tychus.name: Tychus's Drakken Laser Drill
TychussDrakkenLaserDrill_tychus.description: Call down a Laser Drill to attack nearby enemies, dealing 142 (+4% per level) damage every second. Reactivate to assign a new target. Lasts 22 seconds.

BrightwingsDreamShot_brightwing.name: Brightwing's Dream Shot
BrightwingsDreamShot_brightwing.description: Increase Arcane Flare's range by 50%. Hitting a Hero with Arcane Flare's center reduces its cooldown to 2 seconds.

MephistosDuranceofHate_mephisto.name: Mephisto's Durance of Hate
MephistosDuranceofHate_mephisto.description: After 1 second, unleash a wave of evil spirits that Root the first enemy Hero hit for 2 seconds and deal 160 damage to them over the same duration.  Durance of Hate spreads outwards from its initial target, Rooting and damaging additional nearby enemy Heroes.

RaynorsDuskWing_raynor.name: Raynor's Dusk Wing
RaynorsDuskWing_raynor.description: Increase the damage, Health, and leash range of Raynor's Raider by 100%. When it dies, both Inspire and Adrenaline Rush are activated for free.

MedivhsDustofAppearance_medivh.name: Medivh's Dust of Appearance
MedivhsDustofAppearance_medivh.description: Activate to greatly increase sight range for 5 seconds and reveal enemy Heroes in the area for 8 seconds. Does not cancel Raven Form.  Passive: Increase Medivh's sight range while in Raven Form by 25%.

MedivhsDustofDisappearance_medivh.name: Medivh's Dust of Disappearance
MedivhsDustofDisappearance_medivh.description: Stealth an allied Hero for 40 seconds.  Stores up to 2 charges.

MuradinsDwarfLaunch_muradin.name: Muradin's Dwarf Launch
MuradinsDwarfLaunch_muradin.description: Increase the range of Dwarf Toss by 40%. Hitting an enemy Hero with Dwarf Toss reduces its cooldown by 3 seconds.

DiablosDyingBreath_diablo.name: Diablo's Dying Breath
DiablosDyingBreath_diablo.description: Apocalypse's cooldown is reduced by 25 seconds for every enemy Hero hit (to a minimum of 5 seconds) and is cast for free when Diablo dies.

AnasDynamicOptics_ana.name: Ana's Dynamic Optics
AnasDynamicOptics_ana.description: Basic Attacks increase Attack Speed by 10% for 3 seconds, up to 100%. While Aim Down Sights is active, increase your Basic Attack range by 4.

LiLisEagerAdventurer_lili.name: Li Li's Eager Adventurer
LiLisEagerAdventurer_lili.description: Increase Fast Feet's duration by 125% and increase Mana regeneration by 125% while Fast Feet is active.

GreymanesEagerWolf_greymane.name: Greymane's Eager Wolf
GreymanesEagerWolf_greymane.description: Increases the Attack Speed bonus of Inner Beast by an additional 40% after it has been active for 4 seconds.

KharazimsEarthAlly_kharazim.name: Kharazim's Earth Ally
KharazimsEarthAlly_kharazim.description: Place an Earth Ally that grants nearby allied Heroes 50 Physical Armor against Heroic Basic Attacks, reducing damage taken by 50%. Has 400 (+4% per level) Health and lasts 10 seconds.  Kharazim can Radiant Dash to Earth Allies.

RehgarsEarthShield_rehgar.name: Rehgar's Earth Shield
RehgarsEarthShield_rehgar.description: Lightning Shield gives a Shield that absorbs damage equal to 12% of their maximum Health for 3 seconds.

ThrallsEarthenShields_thrall.name: Thrall's Earthen Shields
ThrallsEarthenShields_thrall.description: Allies within the Earthquake area gain a Shield equal to 15% of their maximum Health each pulse. This shield lasts 4 seconds.

RehgarsEarthgraspTotem_rehgar.name: Rehgar's Earthgrasp Totem
RehgarsEarthgraspTotem_rehgar.description: When Earthbind Totem is first cast, it slows nearby enemies by 90% for 1 second.

RehgarsEarthlivingEnchant_rehgar.name: Rehgar's Earthliving Enchant
RehgarsEarthlivingEnchant_rehgar.description: When Chain Heal heals a Hero below 50% Health, they are healed an additional 225 Health over 5 seconds.

ThrallsEarthquake_thrall.name: Thrall's Earthquake
ThrallsEarthquake_thrall.description: After 0.5 seconds, summon a massive Earthquake that pulses every 4 seconds. Each pulse lasts 2 seconds, Slowing all enemies in the area by 50%, and deals 50 (+4% per level) damage to enemy Heroes. Does 3 pulses.

GarroshsEarthshaker_garrosh.name: Garrosh's Earthshaker
GarroshsEarthshaker_garrosh.description: Wrecking Ball Stuns enemies near the impact area for 0.5 seconds.

RexxarsEasyPrey_rexxar.name: Rexxar's Easy Prey
RexxarsEasyPrey_rexxar.description: Increases Misha's basic attack damage to Minions and Mercenaries by 200%, and Misha gains 50% Armor against Minions and Mercenaries, reducing damage taken by 50%.

MalGanissEchoofDoom_malganis.name: Mal'Ganis's Echo of Doom
MalGanissEchoofDoom_malganis.description: When Necrotic Embrace expires, it explodes again for 50 damage. If an enemy Hero is hit, Mal'Ganis retains 25 Armor for 1 more second.  Does not wake Sleeping targets.

KharazimsEchoofHeaven_kharazim.name: Kharazim's Echo of Heaven
KharazimsEchoofHeaven_kharazim.description: Breath of Heaven heals 75% of its normal amount, but heals a second time 3 seconds later.

ThrallsEchooftheElements_thrall.name: Thrall's Echo of the Elements
ThrallsEchooftheElements_thrall.description: Quest: Kill Minions or Heroes within 1.5 seconds of hitting them with Chain Lightning. Reward: After killing 10 enemies, reduce the Mana cost of Chain Lightning from 45 to 25. Reward: After killing 20 enemies, gain a second charge of Chain Lightning.

ETCsEchoPedal_etc.name: E.T.C.'s Echo Pedal
ETCsEchoPedal_etc.description: Using a Basic or Heroic Ability releases two pulses of 15 (+4% per level) damage.  This deals 250% bonus damage to Minions and Mercenaries. The first occurs instantly, the second occurs 2 seconds later.

ProbiussEchoPulse_probius.name: Probius's Echo Pulse
ProbiussEchoPulse_probius.description: Disruption Pulse now returns to Probius 1.25 seconds after reaching its target, dealing 75% damage on the return trip.

GuldansEchoedCorruption_guldan.name: Gul'dan's Echoed Corruption
GuldansEchoedCorruption_guldan.description: Quest: Hit 40 enemy Heroes with Corruption. Reward: After the third strike, Corruption strikes 3 times in the opposite direction.

XulsEchoesofDeath_xul.name: Xul's Echoes of Death
XulsEchoesofDeath_xul.description: Spectral Scythe spawns 2 additional scythes next to the first after 1.5 seconds, dealing 60% damage.

GallsEdgeofMadness_gall.name: Gall's Edge of Madness
GallsEdgeofMadness_gall.description: Every subsequent hit of Shadowflame against the same enemy Hero deals an additional 8% damage, to a maximum of 40%. These bonuses are lost if the Hero has not been hit for 7 seconds.

MurkysEggHunt_murky.name: Murky's Egg Hunt
MurkysEggHunt_murky.description: Activate to place a fake Egg. If the fake Egg dies, it casts an untalented Slime. Maximum 3 fake Eggs.  Passive: Spawning from his Egg grants Murky Stealth for 5 seconds.

MurkysEggShell_murky.name: Murky's Egg Shell
MurkysEggShell_murky.description: Spawning from his Egg grants Murky a Shield equal to 100% of his maximum Health. The shield lasts indefinitely.

OrpheasEldritchConduit_orphea.name: Orphea's Eldritch Conduit
OrpheasEldritchConduit_orphea.description: Each Chaos consumed increases Orphea's Spell Power by 3%, up to 50%. After reaching the maximum bonus, the Spell Power is increased by an additional 30%. Lasts 10 seconds.

RehgarsElectricCharge_rehgar.name: Rehgar's Electric Charge
RehgarsElectricCharge_rehgar.description: Increases the radius of Lightning Shield by 25%.

ChensElementalConduit_chen.name: Chen's Elemental Conduit
ChensElementalConduit_chen.description: Increases the spirits' Health to 100% of Chen's maximum Health and all of their Abilities are empowered.

TyrandesElunesChosen_tyrande.name: Tyrande's Elune's Chosen
TyrandesElunesChosen_tyrande.description: Activate to make Tyrande's Basic Attacks heal the target ally for 200% of the damage dealt. Lasts for 8 seconds.

MalfurionsElunesGrace_malfurion.name: Malfurion's Elune's Grace
MalfurionsElunesGrace_malfurion.description: Increases the range of Regrowth, Moonfire, and Entangling Roots by 25%.

MaievsElunesWrath_maiev.name: Maiev's Elune's Wrath
MaievsElunesWrath_maiev.description: Hitting at least 2 Heroes with a single Fan of Knives causes the next Fan of Knives to drop a star on targets that deals 77 damage when it impacts.

ChensElusiveBrawler_chen.name: Chen's Elusive Brawler
ChensElusiveBrawler_chen.description: Activate to gain 30% Movement Speed and Evade enemy Basic Attacks for 2 seconds. Chen's Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 2 seconds.

IllidansElusiveStrike_illidan.name: Illidan's Elusive Strike
IllidansElusiveStrike_illidan.description: Sweeping Strike reduces the cooldown of Evasion by 3 seconds every time it damages an enemy Hero.

ValeerasElusiveness_valeera.name: Valeera's Elusiveness
ValeerasElusiveness_valeera.description: Increases Valeera's Movement Speed while Vanished by an additional 20%.

ArthassEmbraceDeath_arthas.name: Arthas's Embrace Death
ArthassEmbraceDeath_arthas.description: Death Coil deals more damage and heals more the lower Arthas's current health is, to a maximum of 100% bonus damage and healing.

DeckardsEmerald_deckard.name: Deckard's Emerald
DeckardsEmerald_deckard.description: Activate to make the next Horadric Cube reduce healing received by 75% for 4 seconds.  Only 1 Gem may be active at a time.

BrightwingsEmeraldWind_brightwing.name: Brightwing's Emerald Wind
BrightwingsEmeraldWind_brightwing.description: After 0.5 seconds, create an expanding nova of wind, dealing 225 (+4% per level) damage and pushing enemies away.

FenixsEmergencyProtocol_fenix.name: Fenix's Emergency Protocol
FenixsEmergencyProtocol_fenix.description: When Shield Capacitor's Shield becomes depleted, gain 25% Movement Speed for 5 seconds.

DVasEmergencyShielding_dva.name: D.Va's Emergency Shielding
DVasEmergencyShielding_dva.description: When D.Va's Mech would be destroyed, it instead gains a Shield that absorbs 210 (+4% per level) damage over 6 seconds.  This effect has a 15 second cooldown.

LtMoralessEMPGrenade_ltmorales.name: Lt. Morales's EMP Grenade
LtMoralessEMPGrenade_ltmorales.description: Displacement Grenade deals an additional 100 (+4% per level) damage over 2 seconds, and up to 400 (+4% per level) bonus damage to Shields.

AurielsEmpathicLink_auriel.name: Auriel's Empathic Link
AurielsEmpathicLink_auriel.description: Auriel stores 25% of damage taken by allies with Bestow Hope.

TyrandesEmpower_tyrande.name: Tyrande's Empower
TyrandesEmpower_tyrande.description: Reduce Sentinel's cooldown by 3 seconds. The first Hero hit by Sentinel takes bonus damage equal to 7% of their maximum Health.

OrpheasEnPointe_orphea.name: Orphea's En Pointe
OrpheasEnPointe_orphea.description: Shadow Waltz deals an increased 90% damage to enemies hit by its end.

AnduinsEnchantBootsLionsSpeed_anduin.name: Anduin's Enchant Boots - Lion's Speed
AnduinsEnchantBootsLionsSpeed_anduin.description: Gain 5% Movement Speed. This bonus is quadrupled while Leap of Faith's cooldown is available.

Encore_etc.name: Encore
Encore_etc.description: Face Melt leaves an Amp behind, which will knock enemies away again 2 seconds later.

ZagarasEndlessCreep_zagara.name: Zagara's Endless Creep
ZagarasEndlessCreep_zagara.description: The cast range for Creep Tumor is increased by 2000%. Creep Tumors now last 600 seconds. While on Creep, Zagara gains an additional 10% Movement Speed.

JunkratsEndlessNades_junkrat.name: Junkrat's Endless Nades
JunkratsEndlessNades_junkrat.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Frag Launcher reduces its cooldown by 1.5 seconds.

LunarasEndlessSpores_lunara.name: Lunara's Endless Spores
LunarasEndlessSpores_lunara.description: Casting Crippling Spores while at least 2 Heroes are afflicted by Nature's Toxin reduces the cooldown by 4 seconds.

BlazesEnduranceStimpack_blaze.name: Blaze's Endurance Stimpack
BlazesEnduranceStimpack_blaze.description: Activate to gain a Shield that absorbs 480 damage over 5 seconds.

ZaryasEnduranceTraining_zarya.name: Zarya's Endurance Training
ZaryasEnduranceTraining_zarya.description: While at or above 75 Energy, Zarya gains 20 Armor, reducing all damage taken by 20%.

DehakasEnduringSwarm_dehaka.name: Dehaka's Enduring Swarm
DehakasEnduringSwarm_dehaka.description: Dark Swarm's duration is increased by 0.5 seconds and grants 50 Spell Armor while active.

MedivhsEnduringWill_medivh.name: Medivh's Enduring Will
MedivhsEnduringWill_medivh.description: Preventing at least 268 damage with Force of Will reduces its cooldown to 4 seconds.

AurielsEnergizedCord_auriel.name: Auriel's Energized Cord
AurielsEnergizedCord_auriel.description: Increases the energy stored from Auriel's Basic Attacks to 100% of the damage against Heroes and 40% of the damage against non-Heroes.  Does not affect Auriel's Bestow Hope ally.

ChensEnergizingBrew_chen.name: Chen's Energizing Brew
ChensEnergizingBrew_chen.description: If Chen channels Fortifying Brew for its full duration, then he gains 20% bonus Health and 20% bonus damage for 25 seconds.

KaelthassEnergyRoil_kaelthas.name: Kael'thas's Energy Roil
KaelthassEnergyRoil_kaelthas.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Gravity Lapse by 70. If Gravity Lapse hits a Hero, reduce its cooldown by 9 seconds.

GazlowesEngineGunk_gazlowe.name: Gazlowe's Engine Gunk
GazlowesEngineGunk_gazlowe.description: Rock-It! Turret attacks slow enemies by 20% for 2 seconds.

RagnarossEngulfingFlame_ragnaros.name: Ragnaros's Engulfing Flame
RagnarossEngulfingFlame_ragnaros.description: Increase Blast Wave's damage by 75% and its radius by 15%.

OrpheasEngulfingOblivion_orphea.name: Orphea's Engulfing Oblivion
OrpheasEngulfingOblivion_orphea.description: Crushing Jaws reduces the Armor of Heroes hit by 25 for 2 seconds. Takedowns set its cooldown to 5 seconds.

DehakasEnhancedAgility_dehaka.name: Dehaka's Enhanced Agility
DehakasEnhancedAgility_dehaka.description: Brushstalker's Movement Speed bonus now lasts for 5 seconds after leaving a bush. Repeatable Quest: Every 50 Essence collected permanently increases the Movement Speed bonus of Brushstalker by 2%, up to 20%.

ChensEnoughtoShare_chen.name: Chen's Enough to Share
ChensEnoughtoShare_chen.description: Fortifying Brew instantly grants Chen a Shield that absorbs 180 (+4% per level) damage, and each second grants nearby allied Heroes a Shield that absorbs 140 (+4% per level) damage, up to 420 (+4% per level).

TheButchersEnraged_thebutcher.name: The Butcher's Enraged
TheButchersEnraged_thebutcher.description: While below 50% of his maximum Health, taking damage causes The Butcher to become Enraged for 10 seconds, gaining 40% Attack Speed and 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25%.  This effect has a 25 second cooldown.

ChosEnragedRegeneration_cho.name: Cho's Enraged Regeneration
ChosEnragedRegeneration_cho.description: While Gall's Ogre Rage is active, Cho's Health Regeneration is increased by 200%.

ZuljinsEnsnare_zuljin.name: Zul'jin's Ensnare
ZuljinsEnsnare_zuljin.description: Throw a net forward, Rooting the first enemy Hero hit for 1.5 seconds.

QhirasEnsnaringSwing_qhira.name: Qhira's Ensnaring Swing
QhirasEnsnaringSwing_qhira.description: While Qhira is attached to an enemy Hero, they are Slowed by 25%. Secondary enemies hit by Revolving Sweep's swing are Slowed by 35% for 3  seconds.

LeoricsEntomb_leoric.name: Leoric's Entomb
LeoricsEntomb_leoric.description: Create an unpassable tomb for 4 seconds.

SgtHammersEntrenched_sgthammer.name: Sgt. Hammer's Entrenched
SgtHammersEntrenched_sgthammer.description: While in Siege Mode, Concussive Blasts's damage and knockback distance are increased by 75%.

ValeerasEnvelopingShadows_valeera.name: Valeera's Enveloping Shadows
ValeerasEnvelopingShadows_valeera.description: Whenever Valeera uses Vanish, she also gains Cloak of Shadows.

AbathursEnvenomedNest_abathur.name: Abathur's Envenomed Nest
AbathursEnvenomedNest_abathur.description: Toxic Nests deal 75% more damage over 3 seconds.

AbathursEnvenomedSpikes_abathur.name: Abathur's Envenomed Spikes
AbathursEnvenomedSpikes_abathur.description: Abathur's Symbiote's Spike Burst also slows enemy Movement Speed by 40% for 2 seconds.

ZagarasEnvenomedSpines_zagara.name: Zagara's Envenomed Spines
ZagarasEnvenomedSpines_zagara.description: Activate to have Zagara's next Basic Attack apply 230 (+4% per level) damage over 5 seconds.

FalstadsEpicMount_falstad.name: Falstad's Epic Mount
FalstadsEpicMount_falstad.description: Reduce the cooldown of Flight to 35 seconds, reduce the cast time before flying to 0.5 seconds, and increase the speed by 50%.

AnubaraksEpicenter_anubarak.name: Anub'arak's Epicenter
AnubaraksEpicenter_anubarak.description: Increases Burrow Charge impact area by 60% and lowers the cooldown by 1 second for each Hero hit.

KharazimsEpiphany_kharazim.name: Kharazim's Epiphany
KharazimsEpiphany_kharazim.description: Activate to restore 33% of Kharazim's maximum Mana and refill 2 charges of Radiant Dash.

TheLostVikingssEriktheSwift_thelostvikin.name: The Lost Vikings's Erik the Swift
TheLostVikingssEriktheSwift_thelostvikin.description: Permanently increases Erik's base Movement Speed by 10%, and as long as Erik is moving he heals 34 (+4% per level) Health per second.

DehakasEssenceClaws_dehaka.name: Dehaka's Essence Claws
DehakasEssenceClaws_dehaka.description: Dehaka's Basic Attacks slow the target by 20% for 1 second. If the target is a Hero, Dehaka gains 5 Essence.

OrpheasEternalFeast_orphea.name: Orphea's Eternal Feast
OrpheasEternalFeast_orphea.description: After 1.5 seconds, deal 210 damage in an area. Eternal Feast repeats every 1 second as long as it hits an enemy Hero.

DiablosEternalFlames_diablo.name: Diablo's Eternal Flames
DiablosEternalFlames_diablo.description: When Diablo Stuns an enemy Hero with Shadow Charge or Overpower, reset the cooldown of Fire Stomp.

ArthassEternalHunger_arthas.name: Arthas's Eternal Hunger
ArthassEternalHunger_arthas.description: Quest: Use Frostmourne Hungers on an enemy Hero. Reward: Increases the Mana it restores by 4, to a maximum of 40, and its damage by 4.

JohannasEternalRetaliation_johanna.name: Johanna's Eternal Retaliation
JohannasEternalRetaliation_johanna.description: Lower the cooldown of Condemn by 0.75 seconds and refund 3 Mana for every enemy hit. Maximum of 8 targets.

MalthaelsEtherealExistence_malthael.name: Malthael's Ethereal Existence
MalthaelsEtherealExistence_malthael.description: Gain 10 Physical Armor per enemy Hero afflicted by Reaper's Mark, up to a maximum of 30.

SylvanassEvasiveFire_sylvanas.name: Sylvanas's Evasive Fire
SylvanassEvasiveFire_sylvanas.description: Hitting an enemy with Withering Fire grants 6% Movement Speed for 2 seconds, up to 30%. Basic Attacks refresh this duration.

AnduinsEvenhandedBlessings_anduin.name: Anduin's Evenhanded Blessings
AnduinsEvenhandedBlessings_anduin.description: If Flash Heal is cast on a different target from its last, refund 50% of its cooldown.

TyrandesEverlastingLight_tyrande.name: Tyrande's Everlasting Light
TyrandesEverlastingLight_tyrande.description: If Light of Elune's second charge is cast on a different target from the first, it heals for 40% more.

AbathursEvolutionComplete_abathur.name: Abathur's Evolution Complete
AbathursEvolutionComplete_abathur.description: Increase Monstrosity's Basic Attack damage by 100%.

AbathursEvolutionaryLink_abathur.name: Abathur's Evolutionary Link
AbathursEvolutionaryLink_abathur.description: Increase the duration of Ultimate Evolution by 50%. As long as the Ultimate Evolution is alive, the original target of the clone gains a Shield equal to 25% of their maximum Health. Refreshes every 5 seconds.

AbathursEvolveMonstrosity_abathur.name: Abathur's Evolve Monstrosity
AbathursEvolveMonstrosity_abathur.description: Turn an allied Minion or Locust into a Monstrosity. When enemy Minions near the Monstrosity die, it gains 2% Health and 2% Basic Attack damage, stacking up to 40 times.  The Monstrosity can be healed by Carapace and has the ability to Burrow to a visible location every 80 seconds.  Using Symbiote on the Monstrosity allows Abathur to control it, in addition to Symbiote's normal benefits.  This Ability can be reactivated to automatically cast Symbiote on his Monstrosity.

RaynorsExecute_raynor.name: Raynor's Execute
RaynorsExecute_raynor.description: Increase Attack Speed by 20%. Basic Attack damage is increased by 25% against targets below 50% Health.

Executioner_greymane.name: Executioner
Executioner_greymane.description: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds.

DVasExpensivePlating_dva.name: D.Va's Expensive Plating
DVasExpensivePlating_dva.description: Increase Mech Health by 20%, but also increase the cooldown of Call Mech by 15 seconds.  This does not decrease the amount of Self-Destruct Charge gained.

HanzosExplosiveArrows_hanzo.name: Hanzo's Explosive Arrows
HanzosExplosiveArrows_hanzo.description: Upon hitting a Minion or Monster, Storm Bow deals 75% of its damage to enemies around its target.

TheLostVikingssExplosiveAttacks_thelostv.name: The Lost Vikings's Explosive Attacks
TheLostVikingssExplosiveAttacks_thelostv.description: Increases Baleog's splash damage against non-Heroes to 100%.

ZaryasExplosiveBarrier_zarya.name: Zarya's Explosive Barrier
ZaryasExplosiveBarrier_zarya.description: Upon expiration or breaking, Personal Barrier explodes, dealing 100 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

NovasExplosiveRound_nova.name: Nova's Explosive Round
NovasExplosiveRound_nova.description: Snipe also deals 90% damage to enemies near the impact.

ZaryasExpulsionZone_zarya.name: Zarya's Expulsion Zone
ZaryasExpulsionZone_zarya.description: Launch a gravity bomb that deals 124 (+4% per level) damage and creates an expulsion zone for 3.5 seconds. Enemies who enter the affected area are knocked back and have their Movement Speed reduced by 50% for 1 second.

LtMoralessExtendedCare_ltmorales.name: Lt. Morales's Extended Care
LtMoralessExtendedCare_ltmorales.description: Increase the range of Healing Beam by 30%.

AlaraksExtendedLightning_alarak.name: Alarak's Extended Lightning
AlaraksExtendedLightning_alarak.description:
Reduce Sadism by 10%. Quest: Hit Heroes with the center of Lightning Surge. Reward: After hitting 5 Heroes, increase Lightning Surge's range by 20%. Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, Lightning Surge's center also Slows enemies by 40% for 2 seconds.
Reward: After hitting 3 Heroes with the center of a single cast, increase Sadism by 10% and instantly gain all other Rewards.

RaynorsExterminator_raynor.name: Raynor's Exterminator
RaynorsExterminator_raynor.description: Basic Attacks deal 50% more damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters. This is increased to 100% while Inspire is active.

JunkratsExtraOomph_junkrat.name: Junkrat's Extra Oomph
JunkratsExtraOomph_junkrat.description: Increase RIP-Tire's knockback distance by 50%, and its cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds for each enemy Hero hit.

GazlowesExtraTNT_gazlowe.name: Gazlowe's Extra TNT
GazlowesExtraTNT_gazlowe.description: Increases Xplodium Charge damage by 10% per target hit, up to 100%.

JunkratsExtraWoundTimers_junkrat.name: Junkrat's Extra-Wound Timers
JunkratsExtraWoundTimers_junkrat.description: Frag Launcher grenades last an additional 2 seconds before automatically detonating.

AlexstraszasExuberance_alexstrasza.name: Alexstrasza's Exuberance
AlexstraszasExuberance_alexstrasza.description: While above 75% Health, gain 15% Movement Speed.

AnasEyeofHorus_ana.name: Ana's Eye of Horus
AnasEyeofHorus_ana.description: Assume a sniping position, gaining the ability to fire up to 6 specialized rounds with unlimited range. Rounds pierce allied or enemy Hero but collide with enemy Structures in their path. Allies are healed for 234 (+4% per level) and enemies are damaged for 140 (+4% per level). Deals 50% less damage to Structures.  Ana is unable to move while Eye of Horus is active.

ChensEyeoftheTiger_chen.name: Chen's Eye of the Tiger
ChensEyeoftheTiger_chen.description: Basic Attacks against Brew-soaked enemy Heroes deal 50% more damage and heal Chen for 50% of the damage done.

ZuljinsEyeofZuljin_zuljin.name: Zul'jin's Eye of Zul'jin
ZuljinsEyeofZuljin_zuljin.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant Zul'jin 6% Movement Speed for 2 seconds, up to 30%.

TyrandesEyesoftheHuntress_tyrande.name: Tyrande's Eyes of the Huntress
TyrandesEyesoftheHuntress_tyrande.description: Shadowstalk reveals all enemy Heroes for 2 seconds and heals allies below 50% for 50% more.

GazlowesEZPZDimensionalRipper_gazlowe.name: Gazlowe's EZ-PZ Dimensional Ripper
GazlowesEZPZDimensionalRipper_gazlowe.description: Deth Lazor slows Heroes by 50% and freezes non-Heroes for 3 seconds.

ETCsFaceSmelt_etc.name: E.T.C.'s Face Smelt
ETCsFaceSmelt_etc.description: Face Melt slows enemies by 50% fading over 2 seconds.

BrightwingsFaerieProtector_brightwing.name: Brightwing's Faerie Protector
BrightwingsFaerieProtector_brightwing.description: Activate to apply Pixie Dust to all nearby Heroes.

JohannasFallingSword_johanna.name: Johanna's Falling Sword
JohannasFallingSword_johanna.description: Johanna leaps towards an area.  While in the air, she can steer the landing location by moving.  After 2 seconds Johanna lands, dealing 210 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies, Stunning them for 0.2 seconds, and Slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds.

WhitemanesFanaticalPower_whitemane.name: Whitemane's Fanatical Power
WhitemanesFanaticalPower_whitemane.description: Activate to gain 50% Spell Power and lose 25 Armor for 5 seconds.

JohannasFanaticism_johanna.name: Johanna's Fanaticism
JohannasFanaticism_johanna.description: Increase the duration of Iron Skin by 2 seconds. While Iron Skin is active, Johanna gains 8% Movement Speed each time she takes damage, up to 40%.

VallasFarflightQuiver_valla.name: Valla's Farflight Quiver
VallasFarflightQuiver_valla.description: Increases Valla's Basic Attack range by 2.2.

RehgarsFarseersBlessing_rehgar.name: Rehgar's Farseer's Blessing
RehgarsFarseersBlessing_rehgar.description: Increases healing amount by 75%. Allies near the target are healed for 75% of the amount of health regained.

RehgarsFarsight_rehgar.name: Rehgar's Farsight
RehgarsFarsight_rehgar.description: Activate to reveal an area for 5 seconds. Enemies in the area are revealed for 3 seconds.

ChromiesFastForward_chromie.name: Chromie's Fast Forward
ChromiesFastForward_chromie.description: If Sand Blast travels at least 50% of its base distance and hits a Hero, its cooldown is reduced to 0.5 seconds.

NovasFastReload_nova.name: Nova's Fast Reload
NovasFastReload_nova.description: Triple Tap's cooldown is reset if it kills an enemy Hero.

ValeerasFatalFinesse_valeera.name: Valeera's Fatal Finesse
ValeerasFatalFinesse_valeera.description: Quest: Each time Blade Flurry damages an enemy Hero, its damage increases by 6, up to 90. Reward: After damaging 15 Heroes with Blade Flurry, permanently reduce its Energy cost by 20.

QhirasFatalWounds_qhira.name: Qhira's Fatal Wounds
QhirasFatalWounds_qhira.description: While at maximum stacks, Blood Rage's bleed deals 50% more damage to enemy Heroes below 50% Health. Quest: Damage Heroes with Blood Rage's bleed. Reward: After 125 instances of damage, increase Blood Rage's duration by 2 seconds.

ChosFavoroftheOldGods_cho.name: Cho's Favor of the Old Gods
ChosFavoroftheOldGods_cho.description: Upheaval roots enemy Heroes for 1.5 seconds.

LeoricsFealtyUntoDeath_leoric.name: Leoric's Fealty Unto Death
LeoricsFealtyUntoDeath_leoric.description: When a nearby friendly or enemy Minion dies, Leoric restores 1.25% (+4% per level) of his maximum Health and 6 Mana.

MalthaelsFeartheReaper_malthael.name: Malthael's Fear the Reaper
MalthaelsFeartheReaper_malthael.description: Activate to increase Movement Speed by 25% and pass through other units for 4 seconds.

DiablosFeastonFear_diablo.name: Diablo's Feast on Fear
DiablosFeastonFear_diablo.description: Stunning an enemy Hero with Shadow Charge or Overpower heals Diablo for 12% of his maximum Health over 3 seconds.

DehakasFeedingFrenzy_dehaka.name: Dehaka's Feeding Frenzy
DehakasFeedingFrenzy_dehaka.description: Basic Attacks reduce Drag's cooldown by 2 seconds.

ZaryasFeeltheHeat_zarya.name: Zarya's Feel the Heat
ZaryasFeeltheHeat_zarya.description: Zarya's Basic Attack deals 50% additional damage to enemies in melee range.

RexxarsFeignDeath_rexxar.name: Rexxar's Feign Death
RexxarsFeignDeath_rexxar.description: Rexxar fakes his death, becoming Invulnerable and untargetable for 5 seconds. During this time you control Misha.

GuldansFelArmor_guldan.name: Gul'dan's Fel Armor
GuldansFelArmor_guldan.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Fel Flame grants 40 Spell Armor for 2.5 seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by 40%.

KaelthassFelInfusion_kaelthas.name: Kael'thas's Fel Infusion
KaelthassFelInfusion_kaelthas.description: Increases Kael'thas's Spell Power by 4%. Kael'thas heals for 94 (+4% per level) Health when activating Verdant Spheres.

RehgarsFeralHeart_rehgar.name: Rehgar's Feral Heart
RehgarsFeralHeart_rehgar.description: Increases Health and Mana Regeneration by 75% while in Ghost Wolf form.

ThrallsFeralResilience_thrall.name: Thrall's Feral Resilience
ThrallsFeralResilience_thrall.description: Heroes damaged by Feral Spirit grant 3 stacks of Frostwolf Resilience, and 2 stacks of Feral Resilience, granting 50 Physical Armor against the next incoming Hero Basic Attack.  Stacks are consumed on the next cast of Feral Spirit.

DehakasFerociousStalker_dehaka.name: Dehaka's Ferocious Stalker
DehakasFerociousStalker_dehaka.description: Dark Swarm Slows enemy Heroes by 15% for 0.75 seconds and deals 50% more damage while Brushstalker's Movement Speed bonus is active

ZuljinsFerocity_zuljin.name: Zul'jin's Ferocity
ZuljinsFerocity_zuljin.description: Increases the Attack Speed bonus of Berserker by 40%.

SylvanassFesteringWounds_sylvanas.name: Sylvanas's Festering Wounds
SylvanassFesteringWounds_sylvanas.description: Increase Haunting Wave's damage by 25%. Haunting Wave applies 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse.

StukovsFetidTouch_stukov.name: Stukov's Fetid Touch
StukovsFetidTouch_stukov.description: Quest: Hit Heroes with Weighted Pusule. Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, reduce the cooldown of Weighted Pustule by 2.5 seconds and its Mana cost by 25. Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, reduce the cooldown of Weighted Pustule by an additional 2.5 seconds and remove its Mana cost.

DeckardsFieldStudy_deckard.name: Deckard's Field Study
DeckardsFieldStudy_deckard.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Scroll of Sealing grants 20% Spell Power for 16 seconds, up to 40%.

IllidansFieryBrand_illidan.name: Illidan's Fiery Brand
IllidansFieryBrand_illidan.description: Every 4th attack against the same Hero deals an additional 8% of their maximum Health as damage.

RaynorsFightorFlight_raynor.name: Raynor's Fight or Flight
RaynorsFightorFlight_raynor.description: Reduce Adrenaline Rush's cooldown by 10 seconds. Casting Adrenaline Rush grants 25 Armor for 3 seconds.

MalthaelsFinalCurtain_malthael.name: Malthael's Final Curtain
MalthaelsFinalCurtain_malthael.description: Death Shroud leaves a trail in its wake for 4 seconds, applying Reaper's Mark to enemies in its area.

GenjisFinalCut_genji.name: Genji's Final Cut
GenjisFinalCut_genji.description: After 1 second, Swift Strike deals an additional 125 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in the area.

QhirasFinalStrike_qhira.name: Qhira's Final Strike
QhirasFinalStrike_qhira.description: After 1 second, strike your sword in a line to deal 432 damage to all enemies in its path. This damage is increased by 25% to any enemy below 50% Health.

OrpheasFinalToccata_orphea.name: Orphea's Final Toccata
OrpheasFinalToccata_orphea.description: Activate to instantly reset the cooldown of Shadow Waltz. For the next 6 seconds, dashing with Shadow Waltz resets its cooldown.

JainasFingersofFrost_jaina.name: Jaina's Fingers of Frost
JainasFingersofFrost_jaina.description: Quest: Gathering Regeneration Globes to increase Jaina's Mana regeneration by 0.1 per second, up to 2 per second. Reward: After gathering 20 Globes, the damage bonus from Frostbite is increased by 10%.

QhirasFinishingTouch_qhira.name: Qhira's Finishing Touch
QhirasFinishingTouch_qhira.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes below 50% Health deal an additional 20% damage and grant 35% Attack Speed for 2.5 seconds.

RagnarossFireWard_ragnaros.name: Ragnaros's Fire Ward
RagnarossFireWard_ragnaros.description: When Living Meteor hits an enemy Hero, gain a charge of Spell Block, reducing damage from the next enemy ability by 50%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

AlexstraszasFireWithin_alexstrasza.name: Alexstrasza's Fire Within
AlexstraszasFireWithin_alexstrasza.description: Hitting a Burning Hero with Flame Buffet heals Alexstrasza for 10% of her maximum Health.

LiMingsFireflies_liming.name: Li-Ming's Fireflies
LiMingsFireflies_liming.description: Drastically increases Magic Missiles speed. Its cooldown is reduced by 1 second, and its Mana cost is reduced by 5.

TheButchersFiresofHell_thebutcher.name: The Butcher's Fires of Hell
TheButchersFiresofHell_thebutcher.description: Furnace Blast explodes a second time 3 seconds after the initial explosion.

ChosFirestarter_cho.name: Cho's Firestarter
ChosFirestarter_cho.description: Basic Attacks against ignited Heroes decreases the cooldown of Consuming Blaze by 1 second.  Passive: Reduce the cooldown of Consuming Blaze by 3 seconds.

GazlowesFirinMahLazorz_gazlowe.name: Gazlowe's Firin' Mah Lazorz
GazlowesFirinMahLazorz_gazlowe.description: Firing Deth Lazor causes all of Gazlowe's Rock-It! Turrets to fire a Deth Lazor of their own that deals 137 (+4% per level) damage.

LtMoralessFirstResponder_ltmorales.name: Lt. Morales's First Responder
LtMoralessFirstResponder_ltmorales.description: While above 70 Energy, Healing Beam's healing is increased by 25%.

SgtHammersFirstStrike_sgthammer.name: Sgt. Hammer's First Strike
SgtHammersFirstStrike_sgthammer.description: Basic Attacks deal 25% more damage if Sgt. Hammer hasn't been attacked within the last 5 seconds.

MurkysFishEye_murky.name: Murky's Fish Eye
MurkysFishEye_murky.description: Egg's Health is increased by 100%, its sight radius is increased by 300% and it can see Stealthed enemies.  Passive: Spawning from his Egg increases Murky's mount speed to 45% for 5 seconds.

MurkysFishOil_murky.name: Murky's Fish Oil
MurkysFishOil_murky.description: The Pufferfish casts Slime at its location upon landing.

MurkysFishTank_murky.name: Murky's Fish Tank
MurkysFishTank_murky.description: Murky is healed for 25% of the damage he deals with Basic Attacks and Basic Abilities.

KaelthassFissionBomb_kaelthas.name: Kael'thas's Fission Bomb
KaelthassFissionBomb_kaelthas.description: Increases Living Bomb's explosion radius by 20%.

TheButchersFlailAxe_thebutcher.name: The Butcher's Flail Axe
TheButchersFlailAxe_thebutcher.description: Increases the length of Hamstring by 40%.

StukovsFlailingSwipe_stukov.name: Stukov's Flailing Swipe
StukovsFlailingSwipe_stukov.description: Swipe 3 times in front of Stukov over 1.75 seconds, dealing 48 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit and knocking them away. Each swipe is larger than the previous.

AlexstraszasFlamesofFury_alexstrasza.name: Alexstrasza's Flames of Fury
AlexstraszasFlamesofFury_alexstrasza.description: Quest: Hit 20 Burning Heroes with Flame Buffet. Reward: Hitting a Burning Hero with Flame Buffet reduces Dragonqueen's cooldown by 5 seconds.

RagnarossFlamesofSulfuron_ragnaros.name: Ragnaros's Flames of Sulfuron
RagnarossFlamesofSulfuron_ragnaros.description: Sulfuras Smash slows enemies by 50% for 2.5 seconds, and enemies in the center are stunned for an additional 1 seconds.

KaelthassFlamethrower_kaelthas.name: Kael'thas's Flamethrower
KaelthassFlamethrower_kaelthas.description: Increases the cast range of Flamestrike by 40%. If Flamestrike hits 2 or more Heroes, its cooldown is reduced by 4 seconds.

RexxarsFlare_rexxar.name: Rexxar's Flare
RexxarsFlare_rexxar.description: Fire a flare at an area, revealing it for 20 seconds.

BlazesFlashFire_blaze.name: Blaze's Flash Fire
BlazesFlashFire_blaze.description: While Channeling Combustion, Blaze's Movement Speed is no longer reduced, and nearby enemies are Slowed by 60%

ImperiussFlashofAnger_imperius.name: Imperius's Flash of Anger
ImperiussFlashofAnger_imperius.description: Consuming a mark from Celestial Charge deals 180 damage around the target and grants Imperius 300 point Shield for 4 seconds.

HanzosFlawlessTechnique_hanzo.name: Hanzo's Flawless Technique
HanzosFlawlessTechnique_hanzo.description: Hitting Heroes with Storm Bow increases the damage of Hanzo's next Basic Attack within 5 seconds by 30%. Basic Attacks against Heroes increase the damage of Hanzo's next Storm Bow within 5 seconds by 30%.

HanzosFleetofFoot_hanzo.name: Hanzo's Fleet of Foot
HanzosFleetofFoot_hanzo.description: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow grants 10% Movement Speed for 6 seconds, up to 30%.

GenjisFlowLikeWater_genji.name: Genji's Flow Like Water
GenjisFlowLikeWater_genji.description: Each enemy Hero hit with Swift Strike reduces its cooldown by 3 seconds.

FalstadsFlowRider_falstad.name: Falstad's Flow Rider
FalstadsFlowRider_falstad.description: While Tailwind is active, Falstad's Basic Abilities recharge 100% faster.

XulsFlowingWounds_xul.name: Xul's Flowing Wounds
XulsFlowingWounds_xul.description: Reduces Spectral Scythe's cooldown by 5 seconds if an enemy Hero is hit.

ChensFlyingLeap_chen.name: Chen's Flying Leap
ChensFlyingLeap_chen.description: Increases Flying Kick's range by 15% and reduce its cooldown by 0.5 seconds each time an enemy Hero takes damage from being Ignited.

TracersFocusFire_tracer.name: Tracer's Focus Fire
TracersFocusFire_tracer.description: If an entire ammo magazine is unloaded on an enemy, the last bullet will deal 94 (+4% per level) bonus damage.  This is equal to 35% of the total magazine.

TassadarsFocusedBeam_tassadar.name: Tassadar's Focused Beam
TassadarsFocusedBeam_tassadar.description: While Oracle is active, Basic Attacks against Heroes deal an additional 1% of the target's maximum Health as damage.

TychussFocusingDiodes_tychus.name: Tychus's Focusing Diodes
TychussFocusingDiodes_tychus.description: Increases the range of the Drakken Laser Drill by 50%.  Deals increasing damage the longer it remains on a single target, up to 100% extra damage.

FollowThrough_artanis.name: Follow Through
FollowThrough_artanis.description: After using an Ability, your next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% additional damage.

LiMingsForceArmor_liming.name: Li-Ming's Force Armor
LiMingsForceArmor_liming.description: When Magic Missiles damages an enemy Hero, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability, reducing the damage taken by 50%. Gain 1 charge per cast.  Stores up to 4 charges.

TassadarsForceBarrier_tassadar.name: Tassadar's Force Barrier
TassadarsForceBarrier_tassadar.description: Force Wall's Range is increased by 100% and its cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

MedivhsForceofMagic_medivh.name: Medivh's Force of Magic
MedivhsForceofMagic_medivh.description: Preventing at least 268 damage with a single cast of Force of Will grants 30% Spell Power for 15 seconds. This can stack up to 2 times.

ArtanissForceofWill_artanis.name: Artanis's Force of Will
ArtanissForceofWill_artanis.description: Casting Basic Abilities reduces the cooldown of Shield Overload by 5 seconds.

TassadarsForceWall_tassadar.name: Tassadar's Force Wall
TassadarsForceWall_tassadar.description: Create a wall that blocks all units from moving through it for 2 seconds.  Passive: Increases the slow amount of Distortion Beam to 30%.

ZuljinsForestMedicine_zuljin.name: Zul'jin's Forest Medicine
ZuljinsForestMedicine_zuljin.description: Regeneration is no longer Channeled, and cannot be interrupted.

LunarasForestsWrath_lunara.name: Lunara's Forest's Wrath
LunarasForestsWrath_lunara.description: Thornwood Vine now applies 2 stacks of Nature's Toxin. Increases Thornwood Vine's range by 30% and Lunara's vision radius by 35%.

BlazesFortifiedBunker_blaze.name: Blaze's Fortified Bunker
BlazesFortifiedBunker_blaze.description: Occupants can cast Oil Spill from Bunker Drop every 6 seconds. Additionally, Bunker Drop's Armor bonus upon exiting is increased by 25, and its duration by 1 second.

LiLisFreeDrinks_lili.name: Li Li's Free Drinks
LiLisFreeDrinks_lili.description: Healing Brew's cooldown is reduced by 1 second and its Mana cost is refunded if it heals a Hero under 50% Health.

MalGanissFrenziedAssault_malganis.name: Mal'Ganis's Frenzied Assault
MalGanissFrenziedAssault_malganis.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes with a higher Health percentage grant 50% Attack Speeed and 20% increased Physical Damage for 3% seconds.

ChosFrenziedFists_cho.name: Cho's Frenzied Fists
ChosFrenziedFists_cho.description: Gain 75% Attack Speed for 5 seconds after using Surging Fist.

VariansFrenzy_varian.name: Varian's Frenzy
VariansFrenzy_varian.description: Twin Blades of Fury increases Varian's Attack Speed by an additional 15%, and Basic Attacks increase his Movement Speed by an additional 10%.

RexxarsFrenzyofKalimdor_rexxar.name: Rexxar's Frenzy of Kalimdor
RexxarsFrenzyofKalimdor_rexxar.description: Rexxar's Basic Attacks deal 10% more damage, and Misha's Basic Attacks slow the target by 20% for 1.25 seconds.

ChensFreshestIngredients_chen.name: Chen's Freshest Ingredients
ChensFreshestIngredients_chen.description: Increase the healing duration of Regeneration Globes by 100%. Quest: Gather 15 Regeneration Globes. Reward: Reduce Fortifying Brew's cooldown by 1 second, and 50% of the Shield from Fortifying Brew persists indefinitely after drinking.

IllidansFriendorFoe_illidan.name: Illidan's Friend or Foe
IllidansFriendorFoe_illidan.description: Increases the range of Dive by 20% and allows it to be used to dive to allied Heroes.

OrpheasFright_orphea.name: Orphea's Fright
OrpheasFright_orphea.description: Dread's Slow also applies to enemies in Dread's path.

JainasFrostArmor_jaina.name: Jaina's Frost Armor
JainasFrostArmor_jaina.description: Enemies that attack Jaina are Chilled. Additionally, every 10 seconds, Jaina gains 50 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 50%.

KelThuzadsFrostBlast_kelthuzad.name: Kel'Thuzad's Frost Blast
KelThuzadsFrostBlast_kelthuzad.description: Launch a meteor of ice at an enemy Hero. Upon impact, the meteor deals 115 (+2.5% per level) damage to its target and 275 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemies in the area. All enemies hit by Frost Blast are Rooted for 1.5 seconds.

ArthassFrostPresence_arthas.name: Arthas's Frost Presence
ArthassFrostPresence_arthas.description: Quest: Root enemy Heroes with Howling Blast. Reward: After rooting 5 Heroes, Howling Blast's cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds. Reward: After rooting 10 Heroes, Howling Blast's range is increased by 30%. Reward: After rooting 20 Heroes, Howling Blast also roots enemies in its path.

JainasFrostShards_jaina.name: Jaina's Frost Shards
JainasFrostShards_jaina.description: Frostbolt will now pierce the first target to hit an additional target behind them.

VallasFrostShot_valla.name: Valla's Frost Shot
VallasFrostShot_valla.description: Increases the range of Multishot by 20% and it also slows by 25% for 1.5 seconds.

MephistosFrostStorm_mephisto.name: Mephisto's Frost Storm
MephistosFrostStorm_mephisto.description: Enemies near Shade of Mephisto are Slowed by 50% for 2 seconds. Hitting enemies with Skull Missile while Shade of Mephisto is active increases its Slow to 50%.

ArthassFrostStrike_arthas.name: Arthas's Frost Strike
ArthassFrostStrike_arthas.description: Reduces Frostmourne Hungers' cooldown by 2 seconds. Frostmourne Hungers also slows the enemy by 50% for 1.5 seconds.

ArthassFrostmourneFeeds_arthas.name: Arthas's Frostmourne Feeds
ArthassFrostmourneFeeds_arthas.description: Increases the amount of Basic Attacks empowered by Frostmourne Hungers to 2.

ThrallsFrostwolfPack_thrall.name: Thrall's Frostwolf Pack
ThrallsFrostwolfPack_thrall.description: Quest: Hit 6 Heroes with Feral Spirit. Progress is lost on death and when Thrall fails to hit a Hero. Reward: Reduce the cooldown and Mana cost of Feral Spirit by 50%.

ThrallsFrostwolfsGrace_thrall.name: Thrall's Frostwolf's Grace
ThrallsFrostwolfsGrace_thrall.description: Frostwolf Resilience can be activated to instantly heal for 150% of its normal amount.  Frostwolf's Grace's activation has a 15 second cooldown.

ArthassFrozenWastes_arthas.name: Arthas's Frozen Wastes
ArthassFrozenWastes_arthas.description: Frozen Tempest Mana cost reduced by 2 per second. Quest: Damage enemy Heroes with Frozen Tempest. Reward: After damaging enemy Heroes 150 times with Frozen Tempest, the Movement and Attack Speed slows of Frozen Tempest last an extra 1.5 seconds against enemy Heroes.

ChosFuelfortheFlame_cho.name: Cho's Fuel for the Flame
ChosFuelfortheFlame_cho.description: Quest: Every Minion killed near Cho increases the amount healed by Consuming Blaze by 0.3%. Quest: Every Hero Takedown increases the amount healed by Consuming Blaze by 3%.

BlazesFuelLeak_blaze.name: Blaze's Fuel Leak
BlazesFuelLeak_blaze.description: Jet Propulsion creates Oil Spills along Blaze's path. If Jet Propulsion impacts an enemy Hero, an additional Oil Spill is created underneath them.

RaynorsFuelTheRush_raynor.name: Raynor's Fuel The Rush
RaynorsFuelTheRush_raynor.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Adrenaline Rush from 75 to 50. While Inspire is active, increase Adrenaline Rush's cooldown reduction from Basic Attacks by 200%.

MalGanissFueledbyTorment_malganis.name: Mal'Ganis's Fueled by Torment
MalGanissFueledbyTorment_malganis.description: While Necrotic Embrace is active, Mal'Ganis heals for 11 when damage is taken and Vampiric Touch converts 15% more Hero damage into healing.

SonyasFuriousBlow_sonya.name: Sonya's Furious Blow
SonyasFuriousBlow_sonya.description: Every 4th cast of Seismic Slam deals 50% more damage to the primary target and costs no Fury.

MephistosFuriousSpark_mephisto.name: Mephisto's Furious Spark
MephistosFuriousSpark_mephisto.description: Every 5th hit from Lightning Nova against the same target deals 95 bonus damage.

TheButchersFurnaceBlast_thebutcher.name: The Butcher's Furnace Blast
TheButchersFurnaceBlast_thebutcher.description: After a 3 second delay, fire explodes around The Butcher dealing 500 (+4% per level) damage to enemies.  Can be cast while using Ruthless Onslaught.

FuryoftheStorm_nazeebo.name: Fury of the Storm
FuryoftheStorm_nazeebo.description: Every 5 seconds, your next Basic Attack will deal an additional 91 (+4% per level) damage to the target, and 228 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

KaelthassFuryoftheSunwell_kaelthas.name: Kael'thas's Fury of the Sunwell
KaelthassFuryoftheSunwell_kaelthas.description: Flamestrike will explode a second time 1.5 seconds later.

KerrigansFuryoftheSwarm_kerrigan.name: Kerrigan's Fury of the Swarm
KerrigansFuryoftheSwarm_kerrigan.description: Gain 10% more Assimilation Shields from Basic Attacks. After casting Ravage, Kerrigan's next Basic Attack within 3 seconds splashes for 100% damage around the target.

DVasFusionGenerator_dva.name: D.Va's Fusion Generator
DVasFusionGenerator_dva.description: Every time an enemy Hero deals damage while inside Defense Matrix, D.Va's Self-Destruct Charge increases by 1%.  Max of 15% Charge gained per use.

ZaryasGainTrain_zarya.name: Zarya's Gain Train
ZaryasGainTrain_zarya.description: Shield Ally now grants an untalented shield to a nearby ally upon impact.

LiLisGaleForce_lili.name: Li Li's Gale Force
LiLisGaleForce_lili.description: Increase Blinding Wind's duration by .75 second. Li Li's Basic Attacks against Blinded Heroes deal 75% increased damage.

LunarasGallopingGait_lunara.name: Lunara's Galloping Gait
LunarasGallopingGait_lunara.description: Activate to increase the Movement Speed bonus of Dryad's Swiftness to 80% for 6 seconds.  Galloping Gait's activation has a 30 second cooldown.

NazeebosGargantuan_nazeebo.name: Nazeebo's Gargantuan
NazeebosGargantuan_nazeebo.description: Summon a Gargantuan to guard an area for 20 seconds. Deals 100 (+4% per level) damage when summoned, attacks for 140 (+4% per level) damage, and can be ordered to stomp nearby enemies.

StitchessGasFlare_stitches.name: Stitches's Gas Flare
StitchessGasFlare_stitches.description: Deals 15 damage per second to nearby Enemies. Hitting an enemy Hero with Hook increases this damage by 150% for 8 seconds.

ProbiussGateKeeper_probius.name: Probius's Gate Keeper
ProbiussGateKeeper_probius.description: Null Gate lasts indefinitely if either end is within a Power Field.  Only one Null Gate may be active at a time.

ProbiussGatherMinerals_probius.name: Probius's Gather Minerals
ProbiussGatherMinerals_probius.description: Quest: Enemy Heroes and Minions drop Minerals when killed. Collect them to increase the Health of Photon Cannons by 8, up to 560. Reward: After collecting 70 Minerals, Photon Cannons deal 35% more damage, can see over obstacles, and reveal nearby Cloaked units.

FalstadsGatheringStorm_falstad.name: Falstad's Gathering Storm
FalstadsGatheringStorm_falstad.description: Quest: Every time Hammerang hits a Hero increase its damage by 1.5 and refund 10 Mana.

TracersGetStuffed_tracer.name: Tracer's Get Stuffed!
TracersGetStuffed_tracer.description: Reduces Melee's cooldown by 3 seconds. Hitting an enemy with Melee who is stuck with a Pulse Bomb causes the bomb to instantly explode and knocks the target away.

DVasGetThroughThis_dva.name: D.Va's Get Through This!
DVasGetThroughThis_dva.description: Increase the duration of Defense Matrix by 3 seconds.

DVasGGWP_dva.name: D.Va's GG, WP
DVasGGWP_dva.description: Increase Pilot Mode Basic Attack damage by 50%. Participating in a Takedown while in Pilot Mode instantly refreshes the cooldown of Call Mech.

MephistosGhastlyArmor_mephisto.name: Mephisto's Ghastly Armor
MephistosGhastlyArmor_mephisto.description: Shade of Mephisto grants 20 Armor while active and for 2.5 seconds after it ends.

LeoricsGhastlyReach_leoric.name: Leoric's Ghastly Reach
LeoricsGhastlyReach_leoric.description: Increase the range of Skeletal Swing by 25%.

NovasGhostProtocol_nova.name: Nova's Ghost Protocol
NovasGhostProtocol_nova.description: Activate to gain Stealth and become Unrevealable for 2 seconds. Nova's attacks and Abilities will also not break Stealth during this time.

SgtHammersGiantKiller_sgthammer.name: Sgt. Hammer's Giant Killer
SgtHammersGiantKiller_sgthammer.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1.5% of the Hero's maximum Health.

FalstadsGiantKiller_falstad.name: Falstad's Giant Killer
FalstadsGiantKiller_falstad.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1.5% of the Hero's maximum Health.

RagnarossGiantScorcher_ragnaros.name: Ragnaros's Giant Scorcher
RagnarossGiantScorcher_ragnaros.description: Empower Sulfuras burns enemy Heroes for 9% of their maximum Health over 3 seconds. This additional damage does not heal Ragnaros.

SonyasGiantSlammer_sonya.name: Sonya's Giant Slammer
SonyasGiantSlammer_sonya.description: Basic Attacks and Seismic Slam deal an additional 1.25% of Heroes' maximum Health as damage and heal Sonya for the damage dealt.

HanzosGiantSlayer_hanzo.name: Hanzo's Giant Slayer
HanzosGiantSlayer_hanzo.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Scatter Arrow and Basic Attacks take a bonus 2% of their maximum Health as damage.

RaynorsGiddyUp_raynor.name: Raynor's Giddy-Up
RaynorsGiddyUp_raynor.description: Gain 8% Movement Speed while mounted and unmounted. Inspire grants 8% more Movement Speed.

YrelsGiftoftheNaaru_yrel.name: Yrel's Gift of the Naaru
YrelsGiftoftheNaaru_yrel.description: Divine Purpose heals the lowest Health nearby allied Hero other than Yrel for 275.

ChensGiftoftheOx_chen.name: Chen's Gift of the Ox
ChensGiftoftheOx_chen.description: Increase the duration of Stagger's damage prevention by 0.5 seconds, and reduce the amount of damage taken over time to 60% of damage taken.

ZeratulsGiftoftheXelNaga_zeratul.name: Zeratul's Gift of the Xel'Naga
ZeratulsGiftoftheXelNaga_zeratul.description: Allies are no longer affected by Void Prison, and enemies are slowed by 50% for 3 seconds once Void Prison ends.

GreymanesGilneanRoulette_greymane.name: Greymane's Gilnean Roulette
GreymanesGilneanRoulette_greymane.description: Cursed Bullet now hits all enemy heroes in its path and has its cooldown reduced by 5 seconds per hit.

MuradinsGiveemtheAxe_muradin.name: Muradin's Give 'em the Axe!
MuradinsGiveemtheAxe_muradin.description: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases Muradin's Basic Attack damage by 50% for 3 seconds.

RaynorsGiveMeMore_raynor.name: Raynor's Give Me More!
RaynorsGiveMeMore_raynor.description: Increase Adrenaline Rush healing by 50%. While Inspire is active, gain 1 Basic Attack range.

ZaryasGiveMeTwenty_zarya.name: Zarya's Give Me Twenty
ZaryasGiveMeTwenty_zarya.description: Quest: Regeneration Globes increase Shield Ally absorb amount by 15, up to 300 permanently. Reward: After collecting 20 Regen Globes, permanently reduce the cooldown of Shield Ally by 2 seconds.

RehgarsGladiatorsWarShout_rehgar.name: Rehgar's Gladiator's War Shout
RehgarsGladiatorsWarShout_rehgar.description: Increases Bloodlust's healing from 30% to 60% of Basic Attack damage done.

LiMingsGlassCannon_liming.name: Li-Ming's Glass Cannon
LiMingsGlassCannon_liming.description: Increase Li-Ming's Spell Power by 15%, but decrease her maximum Health by 15%.

AurielsGlimmerofHope_auriel.name: Auriel's Glimmer of Hope
AurielsGlimmerofHope_auriel.description: Collecting a Regeneration Globe reduces the cost of Auriel's next Ray of Heaven by 75%.

VallasGloom_valla.name: Valla's Gloom
VallasGloom_valla.description: Activate to consume all Hatred, granting 3 Spell Armor per Hatred consumed for 5 seconds.  Passive: Permanently gain 20 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 20%.

VariansGlorytotheAlliance_varian.name: Varian's Glory to the Alliance
VariansGlorytotheAlliance_varian.description: Banner now also increases health regeneration and all healing received for nearby allied Heroes by 50%, and the cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds.

AzmodansGluttony_azmodan.name: Azmodan's Gluttony
AzmodansGluttony_azmodan.description: Increase the number of stacks of Annihilation gained by hitting Heroes with Globe of Annihilation from 2 to 3. Quest: After gaining 200 Annihilation, each enemy hit by Globe of Annihilation reduces its cooldown by 0.25 seconds, doubled against Heroes.

AnduinsGlyphofFaith_anduin.name: Anduin's Glyph of Faith
AnduinsGlyphofFaith_anduin.description: Leap of Faith gains a 2nd charge.

MedivhsGlyphOfPolyBomb_medivh.name: Medivh's Glyph Of Poly Bomb
MedivhsGlyphOfPolyBomb_medivh.description: Poly Bomb explodes 1 second sooner and the spread radius is increased by 25%.

ChromiesGnomeSpeedAhead_chromie.name: Chromie's Gnome Speed Ahead!
ChromiesGnomeSpeedAhead_chromie.description: After casting Sand Blast, Chromie gains 20% Movement Speed and 200% increased Health Regeneration for 3 seconds.

GreymanesGofortheThroat_greymane.name: Greymane's Go for the Throat
GreymanesGofortheThroat_greymane.description: Leap at an enemy Hero and shapeshift into a Worgen, slashing for 355 (+4% per level) damage. If this kills them, the Ability can be used a second time within 10 seconds for free.

GazlowesGoblinFusion_gazlowe.name: Gazlowe's Goblin Fusion
GazlowesGoblinFusion_gazlowe.description: Deth Lazor can be charged for 1 additional second to increase its damage bonus by an additional 100%.

GazlowesGoblinRepairs_gazlowe.name: Gazlowe's Goblin Repairs
GazlowesGoblinRepairs_gazlowe.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 25. Reward: After gathering 25 Globes, gain an additional 15 Health Regeneration per second.

LuciosGoodVibrations_lucio.name: Lúcio's Good Vibrations
LuciosGoodVibrations_lucio.description: Hitting an enemy with Soundwave grants Lúcio a 35 point Shield for 7 seconds. Hitting enemy Heroes grants 3 times this amount.

StitchessGorge_stitches.name: Stitches's Gorge
StitchessGorge_stitches.description: Consume an enemy Hero, trapping them for 4 seconds. When Gorge ends, the enemy Hero takes 274 (+4% per level) damage. The trapped Hero cannot move or act and doesn't take damage from other sources.  Cannot be used on massive Heroes.

JunkratsGottaTrapEmAll_junkrat.name: Junkrat's Gotta Trap 'Em All!
JunkratsGottaTrapEmAll_junkrat.description: Quest: Hit 7 Heroes with Steel Trap. Reward: Reduce Steel Trap's cooldown by 3 seconds and increase the maximum number of active traps to 3.

ThrallsGraceOfAir_thrall.name: Thrall's Grace Of Air
ThrallsGraceOfAir_thrall.description: Windfury attacks grant twice as many stacks of Frostwolf Resilience.

SgtHammersGraduatingRange_sgthammer.name: Sgt. Hammer's Graduating Range
SgtHammersGraduatingRange_sgthammer.description: While in Siege Mode, Basic Attack range is increased by 1 every 3 seconds, up to 3.

MuradinsGrandSlam_muradin.name: Muradin's Grand Slam
MuradinsGrandSlam_muradin.description: Haymaker gains a 2nd charge and its damage its increased by 25%. If a Hero dies within 3 seconds of being hit by Haymaker, instantly gain 1 charge.

GazlowesGravOBomb3000_gazlowe.name: Gazlowe's Grav-O-Bomb 3000
GazlowesGravOBomb3000_gazlowe.description: After a 2 second delay, pull enemies toward the center of an area and deal 251 (+4% per level) damage.

ZaryasGravitonSurge_zarya.name: Zarya's Graviton Surge
ZaryasGravitonSurge_zarya.description: Launch a gravity bomb that detonates after 1 second and draws enemy Heroes toward the center for 2.5 seconds.

ArtanissGravitonVortex_artanis.name: Artanis's Graviton Vortex
ArtanissGravitonVortex_artanis.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Phase Prism from 70 to 25. Hitting an enemy Hero with Basic Attacks or Blade Dash reduces the cooldown of Phase Prism by 1.75 seconds.

ZaryasGravityKills_zarya.name: Zarya's Gravity Kills
ZaryasGravityKills_zarya.description: Increases Graviton Surge's duration by 1 second and it Silences Heroes caught in its area.

ProbiussGravityWell_probius.name: Probius's Gravity Well
ProbiussGravityWell_probius.description: Enemies are slowed more the closer they are to the center of the Warp Rift, up to a maximum slow of 60%.

ZeratulsGreaterCleave_zeratul.name: Zeratul's Greater Cleave
ZeratulsGreaterCleave_zeratul.description: Increases the radius of Cleave by 33%.

BrightwingsGreaterPolymorph_brightwing.name: Brightwing's Greater Polymorph
BrightwingsGreaterPolymorph_brightwing.description: Increase Polymorph's range by 30%. Hero Takedowns refresh the cooldown of Polymorph.

LunarasGreaterSpellShield_lunara.name: Lunara's Greater Spell Shield
LunarasGreaterSpellShield_lunara.description: Every 30 seconds, gain 75 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

AzmodansGreed_azmodan.name: Azmodan's Greed
AzmodansGreed_azmodan.description: Globe of Annihilation deals 20% more damage to Non-Heroic targets. Quest: After gaining 200 Annihilation, increase the range of All Shall Burn by 25% and Demon Warriors gain 20% Attack Speed and Movement Speed.

ZaryasGrenadier_zarya.name: Zarya's Grenadier
ZaryasGrenadier_zarya.description: All Particle Grenade charges are returned at once.

BlazesGrillandKill_blaze.name: Blaze's Grill and Kill
BlazesGrillandKill_blaze.description: Quest: Damage enemy Heroes with Ignited Oil Spills 60 times. Reward: Increase Oil Spill's Ignite duration by 2 seconds, and damage by 20%.

XulsGrimScythe_xul.name: Xul's Grim Scythe
XulsGrimScythe_xul.description: Each enemy hit by Cursed Strikes reduces its cooldown by 0.75 seconds, up to 12 seconds.

RexxarsGrizzledFortitude_rexxar.name: Rexxar's Grizzled Fortitude
RexxarsGrizzledFortitude_rexxar.description: Every 7 seconds, Rexxar and Misha gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%.  Stores up to 2 charges. Both Rexxar and Misha have their own charges.

CassiasGroundingBolt_cassia.name: Cassia's Grounding Bolt
CassiasGroundingBolt_cassia.description: Lightning Fury Slows enemies hit by 20% for 1.5 seconds.

StukovsGrowingInfestation_stukov.name: Stukov's Growing Infestation
StukovsGrowingInfestation_stukov.description: Lurking Arm's area expands by 50% over 2.5 seconds, but it cannot be Channeled for longer than 4 seconds.

OrpheasGrowingNightmare_orphea.name: Orphea's Growing Nightmare
OrpheasGrowingNightmare_orphea.description: When the wave of Dread hits 2 or more enemy Heroes, its eruption damage is increased by 60%.

UthersGuardianofAncientKings_uther.name: Uther's Guardian of Ancient Kings
UthersGuardianofAncientKings_uther.description: Healing a Hero that is Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced increases the Armor bonus they receive from Devotion from 15 to 50.

MedivhsGuardianofTirisfal_medivh.name: Medivh's Guardian of Tirisfal
MedivhsGuardianofTirisfal_medivh.description: Minions and Catapults hit by Arcane Rift are instantly killed.

NazeebosGuardianToads_nazeebo.name: Nazeebo's Guardian Toads
NazeebosGuardianToads_nazeebo.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Plague of Toads gives 25 Armor for 2 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.
