WhitemanesGuidingLight_whitemane.name: Whitemane's Guiding Light
WhitemanesGuidingLight_whitemane.description: Whenever Zeal is applied to allies other than Whitemane, it grants them 20% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

ZuljinsGuillotine_zuljin.name: Zul'jin's Guillotine
ZuljinsGuillotine_zuljin.description: Zul'jin launches a massive axe into the air that drops on the targeted area, dealing 330 (+4% per level) damage plus bonus damage the lower his Health is.

ETCsGuitarHero_etc.name: E.T.C.'s Guitar Hero
ETCsGuitarHero_etc.description: While Guitar Solo is active, E.T.C. heals for 60% of his damage dealt by Basic Attacks. Basic Attacks increase the duration of Guitar Solo by 0.25 seconds.

YrelsHallowedGround_yrel.name: Yrel's Hallowed Ground
YrelsHallowedGround_yrel.description: Casting Avenging Wrath while inside Sacred Ground moves Sacred Ground to Yrel's location upon landing.

FalstadsHammerGains_falstad.name: Falstad's Hammer Gains
FalstadsHammerGains_falstad.description: Basic Attacks heal for 20% of the damage dealt to the primary target.

UthersHammeroftheLightbringer_uther.name: Uther's Hammer of the Lightbringer
UthersHammeroftheLightbringer_uther.description: Quest: Basic Attack enemies 75 times. Reward: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Hammer of Justice by 1.5 second.  Passive: Basic Attacks restore 1.5% of Uther's maximum Mana.

ChosHammerofTwilight_cho.name: Cho's Hammer of Twilight
ChosHammerofTwilight_cho.description: Activate to swing the Hammer of Twilight, dealing 150 (+4.5% per level) damage, pushing enemies away, and Stunning them for 0.75 seconds.  Passive: Cho's Basic Attacks deal 25% increased damage.

Hammeron_etc.name: Hammer-on
Hammeron_etc.description: After using an Ability, E.T.C.'s next 2 Basic Attacks deal 40% more damage.

YrelsHandofFreedom_yrel.name: Yrel's Hand of Freedom
YrelsHandofFreedom_yrel.description: Grant an allied Hero 35% Movement Speed for 3 seconds and remove all Slows and Roots from them.

UthersHandofProtection_uther.name: Uther's Hand of Protection
UthersHandofProtection_uther.description: Activate to make target ally Unstoppable for 1 second. Cannot be cast on Uther. Basic Attacks reduce Hand of Protection's cooldown by 5 seconds.

RagnarossHandofRagnaros_ragnaros.name: Ragnaros's Hand of Ragnaros
RagnarossHandofRagnaros_ragnaros.description: If Empower Sulfuras hits at least 2 enemy Heroes, it restores 10 Mana and its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.

LeoricsHardenedBones_leoric.name: Leoric's Hardened Bones
LeoricsHardenedBones_leoric.description: Gain 40 Armor while Drain Hope is active. If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, retain the Armor bonus for 2 seconds.

HardenedShield_anubarak.name: Hardened Shield
HardenedShield_anubarak.description: Activate to gain 75 Armor for 4 seconds, taking 75% less damage.

RexxarsHardenedSkin_rexxar.name: Rexxar's Hardened Skin
RexxarsHardenedSkin_rexxar.description: Rexxar and Misha gain 75 Armor for 4 seconds, reducing damage taken by 75%.

WhitemanesHarshDiscipline_whitemane.name: Whitemane's Harsh Discipline
WhitemanesHarshDiscipline_whitemane.description: Hitting a Hero with Searing Lash while they are being targeted by Inquisition Roots them for 1.5 seconds.

TyrandesHarshMoonlight_tyrande.name: Tyrande's Harsh Moonlight
TyrandesHarshMoonlight_tyrande.description: Sentinel Slows the first target hit by 40% and reduces their damage dealt by 40% for 4 seconds.

SamurosHarshWinds_samuro.name: Samuro's Harsh Winds
SamurosHarshWinds_samuro.description: Attacking a Hero during Wind Walk causes them to take 30% increased damage from Samuro for 3 seconds.

GuldansHarvestLife_guldan.name: Gul'dan's Harvest Life
GuldansHarvestLife_guldan.description: Drain Life heals for 75% more Health when used on Heroes.

XulsHarvestVitality_xul.name: Xul's Harvest Vitality
XulsHarvestVitality_xul.description: Cursed Strikes heals for 60% of the damage dealt to Heroes.

AlaraksHastyBargain_alarak.name: Alarak's Hasty Bargain
AlaraksHastyBargain_alarak.description: Activate to permanently reduce Alarak's Sadism by 4% and reset the cooldowns of his Basic Abilities.

MephistosHatefulMending_mephisto.name: Mephisto's Hateful Mending
MephistosHatefulMending_mephisto.description: Skull Missile heals Mephisto for 60% of the damage it deals to Heroes.

GuldansHaunt_guldan.name: Gul'dan's Haunt
GuldansHaunt_guldan.description: Increases the duration of Horrify by 1 second, and while Feared, enemies lose 20 Armor, causing them to take 20% increased damage.

MuradinsHaymaker_muradin.name: Muradin's Haymaker
MuradinsHaymaker_muradin.description: Stun target enemy Hero, and wind up a punch dealing 319 (+4% per level) damage and knocking the target back, hitting enemies in the way for 319 (+4% per level) damage and knocking them aside.

ZuljinsHeadhunter_zuljin.name: Zul'jin's Headhunter
ZuljinsHeadhunter_zuljin.description: Quest: Zul'jin's first Takedown against each enemy Hero permanently increases his damage dealt by 2%. Reward: After getting Takedowns on every enemy Hero, Basic Attack range is increased by 1.1.

MuradinsHealingStatic_muradin.name: Muradin's Healing Static
MuradinsHealingStatic_muradin.description: Muradin heals for 5% of his Max Health for each Hero hit by Thunder Clap.

RehgarsHealingTotem_rehgar.name: Rehgar's Healing Totem
RehgarsHealingTotem_rehgar.description: Activate to place a Totem that heals allies in an area for 2% of their maximum Health every second for 10 seconds.

QhirasHealmonger_qhira.name: Qhira's Healmonger
QhirasHealmonger_qhira.description: If Blood Rage damages an enemy Hero below 50% Health, it Heals for an additional 213 Health.

GuldansHealthFunnel_guldan.name: Gul'dan's Health Funnel
GuldansHealthFunnel_guldan.description: Drain Life's cooldown recharges 100% faster while it is channeling. If an enemy dies while under the effect of Drain Life, the cooldown is instantly refreshed.

GuldansHealthstone_guldan.name: Gul'dan's Healthstone
GuldansHealthstone_guldan.description: Activate to heal for 25% of Gul'dan's maximum Health.

AlexstraszasHeatExhaustion_alexstrasza.name: Alexstrasza's Heat Exhaustion
AlexstraszasHeatExhaustion_alexstrasza.description: Increase Flame Buffet's initial Slow from 40% to 60%.

ImperiussHeatofBattle_imperius.name: Imperius's Heat of Battle
ImperiussHeatofBattle_imperius.description: Increase Molten Armor's healing against Heroes by 2% for every 1% Health Imperius is missing.

BlazesHeatTreatment_blaze.name: Blaze's Heat Treatment
BlazesHeatTreatment_blaze.description: Heal for 75% of the damage dealt by Pyromania.

JohannasHeavensFury_johanna.name: Johanna's Heaven's Fury
JohannasHeavensFury_johanna.description: While in the air, holy bolts rain down on enemies dealing 75 (+4% per level) damage and reducing the cooldown of Falling Sword by 3 seconds for each enemy hit.

ImperiussHeavenlyHost_imperius.name: Imperius's Heavenly Host
ImperiussHeavenlyHost_imperius.description: Nearby allied Heroes gain 600 Shield for 3 seconds.  If the Shield lasts the full duration, fire a sword at the nearest enemy Hero, dealing 140 damage.

KharazimsHeavenlyZeal_kharazim.name: Kharazim's Heavenly Zeal
KharazimsHeavenlyZeal_kharazim.description: Increases Breath of Heaven's Movement Speed bonus to 30%. Radiant Dashing to an ally increases the healing they receive from Breath of Heaven by 50% for 3 seconds.

AurielsHeavyBurden_auriel.name: Auriel's Heavy Burden
AurielsHeavyBurden_auriel.description: When an enemy Hero is stunned by Detainment Strike, their Movement Speed is slowed by 40% for 3 seconds after the stun.

LuciosHeavyCasters_lucio.name: Lúcio's Heavy Casters
LuciosHeavyCasters_lucio.description: Push Off no longer Slows enemies, and instead Stuns them for 0.5 seconds.

MuradinsHeavyImpact_muradin.name: Muradin's Heavy Impact
MuradinsHeavyImpact_muradin.description: Enemies hit by Dwarf Toss are slowed by 80% for 1.25 seconds.

RaynorsHeavySlugs_raynor.name: Raynor's Heavy Slugs
RaynorsHeavySlugs_raynor.description: Activate to increase the distance of the next Penetrating Round by 30% and increase its Slow duration to 6 seconds.

AzmodansHellRift_azmodan.name: Azmodan's Hell Rift
AzmodansHellRift_azmodan.description: If All Shall Burn Channels for its full duration, Demon Warrior is summoned at the target's location and all Demon Warriors deal 100% increased damage for 5 seconds.

DiablosHellfire_diablo.name: Diablo's Hellfire
DiablosHellfire_diablo.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Fire Stomp grants 2% Spell Power for 10 seconds, up to 30%.

AzmodansHellforgedArmor_azmodan.name: Azmodan's Hellforged Armor
AzmodansHellforgedArmor_azmodan.description: Demon Warriors and Lieutenants gain 25 Armor and last 4 seconds longer.

DiablosHellgate_diablo.name: Diablo's Hellgate
DiablosHellgate_diablo.description: Teleport and place a demonic rune at target location. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 137 (+4% per level) damage and stunning enemies for 1.75 seconds.

ValeerasHemorrhage_valeera.name: Valeera's Hemorrhage
ValeerasHemorrhage_valeera.description: Valeera's Basic Attacks deal 40% additional damage to enemies affected by Garrote.

ChromiesHereandThere_chromie.name: Chromie's Here and There
ChromiesHereandThere_chromie.description: Activate to teleport to an area near an Echo, swapping it with Chromie's previous location.

DehakasHeroStalker_dehaka.name: Dehaka's Hero Stalker
DehakasHeroStalker_dehaka.description: Increases Essence gained from Takedowns by 100%. Hitting enemy Heroes with Dark Swarm grants 1 Essence.

RagnarossHeroicDifficulty_ragnaros.name: Ragnaros's Heroic Difficulty
RagnarossHeroicDifficulty_ragnaros.description: Molten Core has 25% increased Health and Damage, and its cooldown is reduced by 50 seconds.

NazeebosHexedCrawlers_nazeebo.name: Nazeebo's Hexed Crawlers
NazeebosHexedCrawlers_nazeebo.description: Corpse spiders restore 1% of Nazeebo's maximum Health and Mana when they attack an enemy Hero.

LuciosHighFive_lucio.name: Lúcio's High Five
LuciosHighFive_lucio.description: Quickly skate to an allied Hero. Upon arrival, the ally is granted Unstoppable for 1 second and is healed for 250.

WhitemanesHighInquisitor_whitemane.name: Whitemane's High Inquisitor
WhitemanesHighInquisitor_whitemane.description: Casting Inquisition instantly removes all stacks of Desperation and restores 50 Mana per stack removed.

VariansHighKingsQuest_varian.name: Varian's High King's Quest
VariansHighKingsQuest_varian.description: Quest: Hit 50 Heroes with Basic Attacks. Quest: Participate in 5 Hero Takedowns. Quest: Gather 20 Regeneration Globes. Reward: Completing a Quest grants 10 Base Attack Damage. Completing all 3 Quests grants an additional 30 Base Attack Damage.

AlaraksHinderedMotion_alarak.name: Alarak's Hindered Motion
AlaraksHinderedMotion_alarak.description: Telekinesis Slows enemies by 25% for 2 seconds.

MalfurionsHinderingMoonfire_malfurion.name: Malfurion's Hindering Moonfire
MalfurionsHinderingMoonfire_malfurion.description: Moonfire Slows enemy Heroes by 25% for 2 seconds.

LiLisHinderingWinds_lili.name: Li Li's Hindering Winds
LiLisHinderingWinds_lili.description: Blinding Wind Slows enemy Hero Movement Speed by 25% for 1.5 seconds.

FalstadsHinterlandBlast_falstad.name: Falstad's Hinterland Blast
FalstadsHinterlandBlast_falstad.description: After 1 second, deal 475 (+4.8% per level) damage to enemies within a long line. The cooldown is reduced by 25 seconds for every enemy Hero hit.

LunarasHippityHop_lunara.name: Lunara's Hippity Hop
LunarasHippityHop_lunara.description: After not Basic Attacking or taking damage for 4 seconds, increase the Move Speed bonus of Dryad's Swiftness by 10%.

GazlowesHiredGoons_gazlowe.name: Gazlowe's Hired Goons
GazlowesHiredGoons_gazlowe.description: Friendly non-Boss Mercenaries near Gazlowe deal 50% more damage. Rock-it! Turrets gain 50 Armor against Minions and Mercenaries, reducing their damage taken by 50%.

ZaryasHitMe_zarya.name: Zarya's Hit Me
ZaryasHitMe_zarya.description: Damage absorbed by Zarya's Shields contributes 15% more Energy.

DVasHittheNitrous_dva.name: D.Va's Hit the Nitrous
DVasHittheNitrous_dva.description: Initial speed of Boosters is increased to 325%, then decays to normal boost speed over 0.5 seconds. During this time, Boosters deals 50% extra damage.

AnubaraksHiveMaster_anubarak.name: Anub'arak's Hive Master
AnubaraksHiveMaster_anubarak.description: Gain a permanent Vampire Locust that attacks a nearby enemy every 3 seconds. The Vampire Locust deals 153 (+4% per level) damage and returns to heal Anub'arak for 37 (+4% per level) health.

AbathursHivemind_abathur.name: Abathur's Hivemind
AbathursHivemind_abathur.description: Symbiote creates an additional Symbiote on a nearby allied Hero.  This Symbiote mimics the commands of the first, but does half damage and shielding.

JohannasHoldYourGround_johanna.name: Johanna's Hold Your Ground
JohannasHoldYourGround_johanna.description: Increases Iron Skin's Shield by 60% and its cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

NovasHoloStability_nova.name: Nova's Holo Stability
NovasHoloStability_nova.description: Increases the cast range of Holo Decoy by 100% and its duration by 120%.

TyraelsHolyArena_tyrael.name: Tyrael's Holy Arena
TyraelsHolyArena_tyrael.description: Increases duration of Sanctification by 1 second and increases the damage of allies by 25%.

YrelsHolyAvenger_yrel.name: Yrel's Holy Avenger
YrelsHolyAvenger_yrel.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Avenging Wrath at maximum charge reduces its cooldown to 1 second.

ImperiussHolyFervor_imperius.name: Imperius's Holy Fervor
ImperiussHolyFervor_imperius.description: Activate to cause the next 4 Basic Attacks within 10 seconds to cleave for 30% additional damage.

UthersHolyFire_uther.name: Uther's Holy Fire
UthersHolyFire_uther.description: Deal 13 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes increase this damage by 20% for 3 seconds. This can stack up to 3 times.

JohannasHolyFury_johanna.name: Johanna's Holy Fury
JohannasHolyFury_johanna.description: Deal 12 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Each Hero hit by Condemn increases this damage by 40% for 5 seconds.

TyraelsHolyGround_tyrael.name: Tyrael's Holy Ground
TyraelsHolyGround_tyrael.description: Create a ring that blocks enemies from entering the area teleported to using El'druin's Might.

AnduinsHolyNova_anduin.name: Anduin's Holy Nova
AnduinsHolyNova_anduin.description: After Anduin catches Divine Star, it explodes, healing nearby allied Heroes for 105 and damaging enemies for 105.

AnduinsHolyReach_anduin.name: Anduin's Holy Reach
AnduinsHolyReach_anduin.description: After hitting an enemy with Chastise, Anduin's next Basic Attack has 75% more range, 50% more damage, and heals allied Heroes near Anduin for 100.

JohannasHolyRenewal_johanna.name: Johanna's Holy Renewal
JohannasHolyRenewal_johanna.description: Every enemy Hero affected by Shield Glare restores 114 (+4% per level) health.

UthersHolyShock_uther.name: Uther's Holy Shock
UthersHolyShock_uther.description: Holy Light can be used on an enemy to do 50% of its healing amount as damage. When used this way, Uther receives its self-healing benefits, its cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds, and it refunds 45 Mana.

AnduinsHolyWordSalvation_anduin.name: Anduin's Holy Word: Salvation
AnduinsHolyWordSalvation_anduin.description: After 0.5 seconds, Channel to invoke the Light for 3 seconds. While nearby, allied Heroes heal for up to 25% of their max Health and are Protected.

YrelsHolyWrath_yrel.name: Yrel's Holy Wrath
YrelsHolyWrath_yrel.description: After casting a Basic Ability, Yrel's next Basic Attack splashes for 20% increased damage around the target.

LeoricsHopelessness_leoric.name: Leoric's Hopelessness
LeoricsHopelessness_leoric.description: Increase the range of Drain Hope by 25%.

TyraelsHoradricReforging_tyrael.name: Tyrael's Horadric Reforging
TyraelsHoradricReforging_tyrael.description: Tyrael's Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of El'druin's Might by 1.5 seconds.

DeckardsHoradricStaff_deckard.name: Deckard's Horadric Staff
DeckardsHoradricStaff_deckard.description: Every 5 seconds, Deckard's next Basic Attack Stuns Heroes for 0.75 seconds.

GuldansHorrify_guldan.name: Gul'dan's Horrify
GuldansHorrify_guldan.description: After 0.5 seconds, deal 120 (+4% per level) damage and fear enemy Heroes in the area for 2 seconds.

VallasHotPursuit_valla.name: Valla's Hot Pursuit
VallasHotPursuit_valla.description: When at 10 stacks of Hatred, the Movement Speed bonus increases to 20% total and Valla gains 4 Mana per second.

LuciosHouseParty_lucio.name: Lúcio's House Party
LuciosHouseParty_lucio.description: For each ally affected by Crossfade, Lúcio gains 8% increased healing.

SgtHammersHoverSiegeMode_sgthammer.name: Sgt. Hammer's Hover Siege Mode
SgtHammersHoverSiegeMode_sgthammer.description: Sgt. Hammer can move at 40% Movement Speed while in Siege Mode.

NazeebosHumongoid_nazeebo.name: Nazeebo's Humongoid
NazeebosHumongoid_nazeebo.description: Reduce Gargantuan's cooldown by 40 seconds and its Mana cost by 50%.

GuldansHungerforPower_guldan.name: Gul'dan's Hunger for Power
GuldansHungerforPower_guldan.description: Increases Spell Power by 15% but reduces healing received from allies by 25%.

RehgarsHungeroftheWolf_rehgar.name: Rehgar's Hunger of the Wolf
RehgarsHungeroftheWolf_rehgar.description: Ghost Wolf attacks against Heroes deal an additional 5% of the target's maximum Health and heal Rehgar for 5% of his maximum Health.

KelThuzadsHungeringCold_kelthuzad.name: Kel'Thuzad's Hungering Cold
KelThuzadsHungeringCold_kelthuzad.description: Enemies that are Rooted take an additional 55 (+2.5% per level) damage each time they are damaged by Kel'Thuzad.

RexxarsHungryBear_rexxar.name: Rexxar's Hungry Bear
RexxarsHungryBear_rexxar.description: Misha's Basic Attacks heal her for 4.5% of her maximum Health.

StitchessHungryforMore_stitches.name: Stitches's Hungry for More
StitchessHungryforMore_stitches.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Stitches's maximum Health by 30. Reward: Every 15 Globes gathered permanently increases Stitches's Movement Speed by 5%, up to 20%.

StitchessHungryHungryStitches_stitches.name: Stitches's Hungry Hungry Stitches
StitchessHungryHungryStitches_stitches.description: For 4 seconds after using Gorge, Stitches can teleport a short distance to additional targets and Gorge them.

TheLostVikingssHunkaBurningOlaf_thelostv.name: The Lost Vikings's Hunka' Burning Olaf
TheLostVikingssHunkaBurningOlaf_thelostv.description: Olaf deals 34 (+4% per level) damage every second to nearby enemies.

GreymanesHuntersBlunderbuss_greymane.name: Greymane's Hunter's Blunderbuss
GreymanesHuntersBlunderbuss_greymane.description: Human Basic Attacks splash for 100% damage behind the target.

IllidansHuntersOnslaught_illidan.name: Illidan's Hunter's Onslaught
IllidansHuntersOnslaught_illidan.description: Basic Abilities heal for 25% of the damage they deal. This bonus is doubled versus Heroes.

RexxarsHunterGatherer_rexxar.name: Rexxar's Hunter-Gatherer
RexxarsHunterGatherer_rexxar.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Rexxar's Health Regeneration by 1.25 per second, up to 25 per second. Reward: After gathering 20 Globes, Rexxar and Misha gain 15 Armor.

TyrandesHuntressFury_tyrande.name: Tyrande's Huntress' Fury
TyrandesHuntressFury_tyrande.description: Increase the cast range and duration of Hunter's Mark by 25%. Tyrande's Basic Attacks against targets with Hunter's Mark splash to nearby enemies.

SonyasHurricane_sonya.name: Sonya's Hurricane
SonyasHurricane_sonya.description: Reduces the cooldown of Whirlwind by 2 second and Whirlwind removes all slows and roots on Sonya.

BrightwingsHush_brightwing.name: Brightwing's Hush!
BrightwingsHush_brightwing.description: Enemy Heroes hit by the center of Arcane Flare are Silenced for 1 seconds and deal 25% less damage for 3 seconds.

ZagarasHydraliskTransfusion_zagara.name: Zagara's Hydralisk Transfusion
ZagarasHydraliskTransfusion_zagara.description: Zagara is healed for 75% of the damage dealt by Hunter Killers' Basic Attacks to Heroes.

BrightwingsHyperShift_brightwing.name: Brightwing's Hyper Shift
BrightwingsHyperShift_brightwing.description: Increase Phase Shift's healing by an additional 10% of the target's maximum Health. Nearby enemy Minion deaths reduce Phase Shift's cooldown by 2 seconds.

SgtHammersHyperCoolingEngines_sgthammer.name: Sgt. Hammer's Hyper-Cooling Engines
SgtHammersHyperCoolingEngines_sgthammer.description: While in Siege Mode, hitting Heroes with Basic Attacks reduces the cooldown of Thrusters by 5 seconds.

LtMoralessHyperactivity_ltmorales.name: Lt. Morales's Hyperactivity
LtMoralessHyperactivity_ltmorales.description: Reduce the cooldown of Stim Drone from 90 seconds to 45 seconds, and increase the Movement Speed bonus from 25% to 50%.

GazlowesHyperfocusCoils_gazlowe.name: Gazlowe's Hyperfocus Coils
GazlowesHyperfocusCoils_gazlowe.description: The mana cost of Deth Lazor is reduced by 30 and it charges twice as fast.

RaynorsHyperion_raynor.name: Raynor's Hyperion
RaynorsHyperion_raynor.description: Order the Hyperion to make a strafing run dealing 66 (+4% per level) damage a second, hitting up to 4 enemies. Also occasionally fires its Yamato Cannon on Structures for 794 (+4% per level) damage. Lasts 12 seconds.

MephistosHysteria_mephisto.name: Mephisto's Hysteria
MephistosHysteria_mephisto.description: Lord of Hatred also reduces the cooldown of Mephisto's Heroic Ability.

ZaryasIAmtheStrongest_zarya.name: Zarya's I Am the Strongest
ZaryasIAmtheStrongest_zarya.description: Personal Barrier absorbs an additional 140 (+4% per level) damage.

JainasIceBarrier_jaina.name: Jaina's Ice Barrier
JainasIceBarrier_jaina.description: Gain a Shield for 25% of Ability damage dealt to Chilled targets. The shield lasts 4 seconds.

JainasIceBlink_jaina.name: Jaina's Ice Blink
JainasIceBlink_jaina.description: Activate to teleport a short distance and Chill all nearby enemies.

NazeebosIceBlock_nazeebo.name: Nazeebo's Ice Block
NazeebosIceBlock_nazeebo.description: Activate to place yourself in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 3 seconds.

KelThuzadsIceCold_kelthuzad.name: Kel'Thuzad's Ice Cold
KelThuzadsIceCold_kelthuzad.description: Reduce the cooldown of Glacial Spike by 5 seconds and increase its damage by 300%.

JainasIceFloes_jaina.name: Jaina's Ice Floes
JainasIceFloes_jaina.description: Increase the width of Cone of Cold by 100% and cause each chilled Hero hit to reduce its cooldown by 3 seconds, up to a maximum of 6 seconds per use.

JainasIceLance_jaina.name: Jaina's Ice Lance
JainasIceLance_jaina.description: Hitting a Chilled target with Frostbolt reduces its cooldown by 1.5 seconds and restores 10 Mana.

TyrandesIcebladeArrows_tyrande.name: Tyrande's Iceblade Arrows
TyrandesIcebladeArrows_tyrande.description: Increase Attack Speed by 20%. Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes reduce their damage dealt by 8% for 2 seconds. This effect stacks up to 5 times.

ArthassIceboundFortitude_arthas.name: Arthas's Icebound Fortitude
ArthassIceboundFortitude_arthas.description: Activate to gain 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25%, and reduce the duration of Stuns, Slows, and Roots against Arthas by 75% for 3 seconds.

JainasIcefuryWand_jaina.name: Jaina's Icefury Wand
JainasIcefuryWand_jaina.description: Basic Attacks against Chilled Heroes deal 100% more damage and lower the cooldown of Blizzard by 2 seconds.

KelThuzadsIcyGrasp_kelthuzad.name: Kel'Thuzad's Icy Grasp
KelThuzadsIcyGrasp_kelthuzad.description: Increase Frost Nova's Slow by 15%. Each time Kel'thuzad damages enemies Slowed by Frost Nova, its Slow duration is increased by 0.5 seconds.

ArthassIcyTalons_arthas.name: Arthas's Icy Talons
ArthassIcyTalons_arthas.description: Gain 3% Attack Speed for 1.5 seconds every time a Hero is damaged by Frozen Tempest, to a maximum of 60%.

JainasIcyVeins_jaina.name: Jaina's Icy Veins
JainasIcyVeins_jaina.description: Activate to make Jaina's Basic Abilities' cooldowns recharge 200% faster and reduce their Mana cost by 50% for 5 seconds.

KaelthassIgnite_kaelthas.name: Kael'thas's Ignite
KaelthassIgnite_kaelthas.description: Flamestrikes apply Living Bomb to the enemy Hero closest to its center who is not currently affected by Living Bomb.

HanzosIgnoreAllDistractions_hanzo.name: Hanzo's Ignore All Distractions
HanzosIgnoreAllDistractions_hanzo.description: Basic Attacks instantly kill Minions and increase Hanzo's Basic Attack range by 2 for 3 seconds.

IgnorePain_sonya.name: Ignore Pain
IgnorePain_sonya.description: Activate to gain 60 Armor for 4 seconds, taking 60% less damage.  Usable while Whirlwinding.

SamurosIllusionMaster_samuro.name: Samuro's Illusion Master
SamurosIllusionMaster_samuro.description: Mirror Images can be controlled individually or as a group and their damage is increased by 100%.  Passive: Image Transmission's cooldown is reduced to 10 seconds.

LiMingsIllusionist_liming.name: Li-Ming's Illusionist
LiMingsIllusionist_liming.description:
If Li-Ming loses more than 20% of her Health at once, its cooldown is instantly refreshed.  This effect has a 4 second cooldown. 
Passive: Increases Teleport range by 50%

IllidansImmolation_illidan.name: Illidan's Immolation
IllidansImmolation_illidan.description: After using Sweeping Strike, burn nearby enemies for 22 (+4% per level) damage a second for 4 seconds.

ArthassImmortalCoil_arthas.name: Arthas's Immortal Coil
ArthassImmortalCoil_arthas.description: Gain the healing effect of Death Coil even when used on enemies. If Death Coil is used on Arthas, it heals for an additional 50% bonus healing.

CassiasImpale_cassia.name: Cassia's Impale
CassiasImpale_cassia.description: Enemies below 60% Health take 50% increased damage from Fend.

ImperiussImpalingLight_imperius.name: Imperius's Impaling Light
ImperiussImpalingLight_imperius.description: Celestial Charge's final damage is increased by 50% and cooldown is reduced by 1 second for each Valorous Brand on the target when the Stun completes.

TheLostVikingssImpatienceIsaVirtue_thelo.name: The Lost Vikings's Impatience Is a Virtue
TheLostVikingssImpatienceIsaVirtue_thelo.description: Enemies damaged by a Viking's Basic Attack reduce the cooldown of all Viking Abilities by 0.25 seconds.

ImperiussImpervious_imperius.name: Imperius's Impervious
ImperiussImpervious_imperius.description: Activate to become Unstoppable and gain 75 Spell Armor for 3 seconds. Hitting Heroes with the center of Solarion's Fire reduces this cooldown by 5 seconds.

ImposingPresence_etc.name: Imposing Presence
ImposingPresence_etc.description: Activate to slow the Attack Speed by 50% and Movement Speed by 20% of nearby Heroes and Summons for 2.5 seconds.  Passive: Heroes and Summons that attack your Hero have their Attack Speed slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

CassiasImprisoningLight_cassia.name: Cassia's Imprisoning Light
CassiasImprisoningLight_cassia.description: Upon impaling a Hero, Cassia's Valkyrie creates a wave of light that deals 200 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and Roots them for 3 seconds.

GarroshsInFortheKill_garrosh.name: Garrosh's In For the Kill
GarroshsInFortheKill_garrosh.description: Increase Bloodthirst's damage against non-Heroes by 70%. Killing enemies with Bloodthirst resets its cooldown and refunds its Mana cost.

TychussIntheRhythm_tychus.name: Tychus's In the Rhythm
TychussIntheRhythm_tychus.description: Quest: While Minigun is active, Basic Attacks against Heroes permanently increase future Minigun durations by .03 seconds.

GreymanesIncendiaryElixir_greymane.name: Greymane's Incendiary Elixir
GreymanesIncendiaryElixir_greymane.description: Quest: Every time Greymane hits an enemy Hero with the explosion damage from Gilnean Cocktail, increase its explosion damage by 20, up to 300. Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, the cooldown is also reduced by 4 seconds.

BlazesIncineratorGauntlets_blaze.name: Blaze's Incinerator Gauntlets
BlazesIncineratorGauntlets_blaze.description: Increase Basic Attack area by 15%, and Basic Attack damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters by 70%. Additionally, Basic Attack splashes Ignite Oil Spills.

AurielsIncreasingClarity_auriel.name: Auriel's Increasing Clarity
AurielsIncreasingClarity_auriel.description: Quest: Every time Sacred Sweep hits a Hero in the center, increase the center damage by 2, up to 50. Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes, this center damage bonus is increased to 180.

JohannasIndestructible_johanna.name: Johanna's Indestructible
JohannasIndestructible_johanna.description: Upon taking fatal damage, Johanna gains a Shield equal to her maximum Health for 5 seconds. This effect has a 120 second cooldown.

GarroshsIndomitable_garrosh.name: Garrosh's Indomitable
GarroshsIndomitable_garrosh.description: Activate to become Unstoppable for 1.5 seconds.

RaynorsIndomitableResolve_raynor.name: Raynor's Indomitable Resolve
RaynorsIndomitableResolve_raynor.description: Give 'Em Some Pepper lowers the cooldown of Hyperion by 5 seconds if the primary target is a Hero. Inspire grants Raynor Unstoppable for 2 seconds.

WhitemanesIndulgence_whitemane.name: Whitemane's Indulgence
WhitemanesIndulgence_whitemane.description: Searing Lash's first strike restores 20 Mana per Hero hit, and its second strike restores 40 Mana per Hero hit.

MalthaelsInevitableEnd_malthael.name: Malthael's Inevitable End
MalthaelsInevitableEnd_malthael.description: Activate to become Unstoppable for 2 seconds, but remove all active Reaper's Marks.

ZagarasInfest_zagara.name: Zagara's Infest
ZagarasInfest_zagara.description: Nearby Ranged Minions deal an additional 100% damage, plus an additional 1% per 1000 Siege damage Zagara has dealt. Can be toggled on or off.

CassiasInfiniteLightning_cassia.name: Cassia's Infinite Lightning
CassiasInfiniteLightning_cassia.description: Ball Lightning can now bounce indefinitely, and its cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds every time an enemy Hero is hit.

FenixsInhibitingEnergy_fenix.name: Fenix's Inhibiting Energy
FenixsInhibitingEnergy_fenix.description: While Phase Bomb is active, Basic Attacks against Slowed Heroes Slow all enemies in the area by 30% for 3 seconds. Does not spread from Inhibiting Energy's Slow.

ValeerasInitiative_valeera.name: Valeera's Initiative
ValeerasInitiative_valeera.description: Ambush, Cheap Shot, and Garrote grant 15% Movement Speed for 3 seconds and award 2 Combo Points.

AnduinsInnerFire_anduin.name: Anduin's Inner Fire
AnduinsInnerFire_anduin.description: Increase Attack Speed by 20% and Basic Attack range by 15%.

AnduinsInnerFocus_anduin.name: Anduin's Inner Focus
AnduinsInnerFocus_anduin.description: Activate to reset the cooldown of Flash Heal and its next cast heals for 40% more.  Damaging enemy Heroes with Divine Star reduces this cooldown by 8 seconds.

CassiasInnerLight_cassia.name: Cassia's Inner Light
CassiasInnerLight_cassia.description:
Whenever Cassia is Stunned or Rooted, Blinding Light is cast at her location.  This effect has a 6 second cooldown. 
Passive: Blinding Light's radius is increased by 25%.

GarroshsInnerRage_garrosh.name: Garrosh's Inner Rage
GarroshsInnerRage_garrosh.description: Body Check gains an additional charge, and its cooldown recharges 100% faster while Armor Up's bonus is at or above 25.

GreymanesInsatiable_greymane.name: Greymane's Insatiable
GreymanesInsatiable_greymane.description: Inner Beast causes Basic Attacks to restore 10 Mana.

OrpheasInsatiable_orphea.name: Orphea's Insatiable
OrpheasInsatiable_orphea.description: Hitting a Hero with Chomp sets its cooldown to 1.5 seconds.

TheButchersInsatiableBlade_thebutcher.name: The Butcher's Insatiable Blade
TheButchersInsatiableBlade_thebutcher.description: While facing a branded enemy, The Butcher's Movement Speed is increased by 25%.

KharazimsInsight_kharazim.name: Kharazim's Insight
KharazimsInsight_kharazim.description: Quest: Every 3rd Basic Attack restores 14 (+4% per level) Mana and grants a stack of Insight and gives 25% increased move speed for 2 seconds. Reward: Upon getting 100 stacks of Insight, every 3rd attack also reduces the cooldown of all of Kharazim's Basic Abilities by 1.75 second.

LunarasIntensifyingToxin_lunara.name: Lunara's Intensifying Toxin
LunarasIntensifyingToxin_lunara.description: At 3 stacks, Nature's Toxin deals 40% more damage.

BrightwingsIntensiveWinds_brightwing.name: Brightwing's Intensive Winds
BrightwingsIntensiveWinds_brightwing.description: Permanently reduce Emerald Wind's cooldown to 5 seconds and increase its Mana cost to 200.

WhitemanesIntercession_whitemane.name: Whitemane's Intercession
WhitemanesIntercession_whitemane.description: Activate to make an ally Unstoppable for 1 second and gain 1 stack of Desperation.

ProbiussInterference_probius.name: Probius's Interference
ProbiussInterference_probius.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Warp Rift detonations have their Spell Power reduced by 35% for 5 seconds.

GarroshsIntimidation_garrosh.name: Garrosh's Intimidation
GarroshsIntimidation_garrosh.description: Groundbreaker reduces the Attack Speed of Heroes hit by 40% for 4 seconds.

GarroshsIntotheFray_garrosh.name: Garrosh's Into the Fray
GarroshsIntotheFray_garrosh.description: Activate to throw a nearby ally and grant them 25 Armor for 3 seconds. Deals 91 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies upon impact and Slows them by 30% for 2.5 seconds.  While in flight, allied Heroes are Unstoppable.

OrpheasInvasiveMiasma_orphea.name: Orphea's Invasive Miasma
OrpheasInvasiveMiasma_orphea.description: Activate to deal 150 damage to all nearby enemies after 2 seconds. For each Hero hit, heal for 182 and gain 1 Chaos.

LunarasInvigoratingSpores_lunara.name: Lunara's Invigorating Spores
LunarasInvigoratingSpores_lunara.description: Crippling Spores grants 30% Attack Speed for 6 seconds. Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes with 3 stacks of Nature's Toxin deal damage equal to 1.5% of their maximum Health.

TheButchersInvigoration_thebutcher.name: The Butcher's Invigoration
TheButchersInvigoration_thebutcher.description: If Hamstring hits a Hero, half of the Mana cost is refunded and the cooldown is reduced by 1 second.

BrightwingsInvisibleFriends_brightwing.name: Brightwing's Invisible Friends
BrightwingsInvisibleFriends_brightwing.description: Blink Heal grants Stealth to Brightwing. If Blink Heal is cast on a Hero, they are also granted Stealth. While Stealthed by Invisible Friends, Heroes heal for 20 Health per second and are Unrevealable for the first 0.5 seconds.  Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.

NovasIonicForceField_nova.name: Nova's Ionic Force Field
NovasIonicForceField_nova.description: Gain 25 Armor for 3 seconds after losing Stealth.

KharazimsIronFists_kharazim.name: Kharazim's Iron Fists
KharazimsIronFists_kharazim.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack deals 110% bonus damage and gives 30% increased Move Speed for 2 seconds.

MuradinsIronforgedMomentum_muradin.name: Muradin's Iron-forged Momentum
MuradinsIronforgedMomentum_muradin.description: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Storm Bolt and Thunderclap by 0.75 seconds.

LtMoralessIrradiate_ltmorales.name: Lt. Morales's Irradiate
LtMoralessIrradiate_ltmorales.description: Enemies near Healing Beam's target take 22 (+4% per level) damage a second.

TracersIsThataHealthPack_tracer.name: Tracer's Is That a Health Pack?!
TracersIsThataHealthPack_tracer.description: Increases Regeneration Globe and Healing Fountain healing by 100%.

DehakasIsolation_dehaka.name: Dehaka's Isolation
DehakasIsolation_dehaka.description: Launch biomass that hits the first enemy Hero dealing 200 (+4% per level) damage, Silencing and Slowing them 30% for 3 seconds. Additionally, their vision radius is greatly reduced for 6 seconds.

StukovsItHungers_stukov.name: Stukov's It Hungers
StukovsItHungers_stukov.description: Increase the range of Lurking Arm by 20%. If Lurking Arm damages enemy Heroes 10 times, its cooldown is reset and its Mana cost is refunded.

TheLostVikingssItsaSabotage_thelostvikin.name: The Lost Vikings's It's a Sabotage!
TheLostVikingssItsaSabotage_thelostvikin.description: Erik's Basic Attacks against Structures light them on fire for 5 seconds, causing 250 (+4% per level) damage.

GazlowesItsRainingScrap_gazlowe.name: Gazlowe's It's Raining Scrap
GazlowesItsRainingScrap_gazlowe.description: Activate to create 5 Scrap around Gazlowe over 5 seconds.

XulsJailors_xul.name: Xul's Jailors
XulsJailors_xul.description: Bone Prison spawns 2 Skeletal Warriors.  These do not count towards Xul's Raise Skeleton maximum. Quest: Spawn 80 Skeletal Warriors. Reward: While fixating on an enemy, Skeletal Warriors gain 50% Movement and Attack Speed.

TyraelsJudgment_tyrael.name: Tyrael's Judgment
TyraelsJudgment_tyrael.description: After 0.75 seconds, charge an enemy Hero dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage and stunning them for 1.5 seconds. Nearby enemies are knocked away and take 75 (+4% per level) damage.

WhitemanesJudgmentDay_whitemane.name: Whitemane's Judgment Day
WhitemanesJudgmentDay_whitemane.description: Divine Reckoning deals 30% more damage and pulls enemies to its center the first time it hits them.

LiLisJugof1000Cups_lili.name: Li Li's Jug of 1,000 Cups
LiLisJugof1000Cups_lili.description: Channel for up to 6 seconds. Every 0.25 seconds, heal the lowest Health nearby allied Hero for 66.5 (+4% per level) Health and increase the cooldown of Jug of 1,000 Cups by 2 seconds, up to 50.

LiLisJugof1000000Cups_lili.name: Li Li's Jug of 1,000,000 Cups
LiLisJugof1000000Cups_lili.description: Jug of 1,000 Cups heals two allies at a time.

VariansJuggernaut_varian.name: Varian's Juggernaut
VariansJuggernaut_varian.description: Charge deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 4% of their maximum Health.

BlazesJuggernautPlating_blaze.name: Blaze's Juggernaut Plating
BlazesJuggernautPlating_blaze.description: Activate to gain 50 Spell Armor for 3 seconds. Upon expiration, gain a Shield equal to 125% of the Spell Damage reduced by Juggernaut Plating.

TheLostVikingssJump_thelostvikings.name: The Lost Vikings's Jump!
TheLostVikingssJump_thelostvikings.description: Makes all Vikings Invulnerable and able to pass over enemies for 1.5 seconds.

TracersJumper_tracer.name: Tracer's Jumper
TracersJumper_tracer.description: Increases Blink's charges by 1, but also increase Blink's cooldown by 2 seconds.

TyraelsJusticeforAll_tyrael.name: Tyrael's Justice for All
TyraelsJusticeforAll_tyrael.description: Increase the Shield applied to allies by Righteousness to 75% of the Shield gained by Tyrael.

XulsKalansEdict_xul.name: Xul's Kalan's Edict
XulsKalansEdict_xul.description: Skeletal Warrior attacks reduce the cooldown of Xul's Heroic Ability by 1%.

TyrandesKaldoreiResistance_tyrande.name: Tyrande's Kaldorei Resistance
TyrandesKaldoreiResistance_tyrande.description: Light of Elune grants the target 10 Spell Armor for 2 seconds. This effect stacks up to 2 times.

DeckardsKanaisCube_deckard.name: Deckard's Kanai's Cube
DeckardsKanaisCube_deckard.description: Horadric Cube reduces Hero damage dealt by 30% for 4 seconds.

Kawarimi_samuro.name: Kawarimi
Kawarimi_samuro.description: Wind Walk creates a Mirror Image at Samuro's location that will continue whatever he was doing.

GallsKeepMoving_gall.name: Gall's Keep Moving!
GallsKeepMoving_gall.description: Increases the duration of Shove's movement speed bonus by 2 seconds.

TassadarsKhalasCelerity_tassadar.name: Tassadar's Khala's Celerity
TassadarsKhalasCelerity_tassadar.description: Plasma Shield also grants 20% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

TassadarsKhalasEmbrace_tassadar.name: Tassadar's Khala's Embrace
TassadarsKhalasEmbrace_tassadar.description: Increase the Life Steal of Plasma Shield to 75%.

TassadarsKhalasLight_tassadar.name: Tassadar's Khala's Light
TassadarsKhalasLight_tassadar.description: Upon expiration or breaking, the target of Plasma Shield gains 20 Armor for 3 seconds, causing them to take 20% less damage.

TassadarsKhaydarinResonance_tassadar.name: Tassadar's Khaydarin Resonance
TassadarsKhaydarinResonance_tassadar.description: Quest: Regeneration Globes grant an additional 100% Mana. Reward: After collecting 15 Regeneration Globes, Plasma Shield's value is increased by 20%. Reward: After collecting 30 Regeneration Globes, Plasma Shield's value is increased by 40%.

RexxarsKillCommand_rexxar.name: Rexxar's Kill Command
RexxarsKillCommand_rexxar.description: Unleash the Boars deals 50% more damage and roots for 1.5 seconds.

KerrigansKineticFulmination_kerrigan.name: Kerrigan's Kinetic Fulmination
KerrigansKineticFulmination_kerrigan.description: Damaging an enemy increase the damage of Kerrigan's next Impaling Blades within 10 seconds by 10%, up to 100%.

LeoricsKneelPeasants_leoric.name: Leoric's Kneel, Peasants!
LeoricsKneelPeasants_leoric.description: Skeletal Swing deals 100% more damage to Minions and Mercenaries.

GazlowesKwikReleaseCharge_gazlowe.name: Gazlowe's Kwik Release Charge
GazlowesKwikReleaseCharge_gazlowe.description: Xplodium Charge gains a second charge.

ZuljinsLacerate_zuljin.name: Zul'jin's Lacerate
ZuljinsLacerate_zuljin.description: Increase the Slow amount of each Twin Cleave axe by 10%.

StitchessLacerate_stitches.name: Stitches's Lacerate
StitchessLacerate_stitches.description: Slam afflicts enemies with Vile Gas, and Heroes hit by Slam have their Armor reduced by 10 for 4 seconds.

TheButchersLambtotheSlaughter_thebutcher.name: The Butcher's Lamb to the Slaughter
TheButchersLambtotheSlaughter_thebutcher.description: Throw a hitching post that attaches to the nearest enemy Hero after a 1 second delay. This deals 171 (+4% per level) damage and causes the enemy to be chained to the post and Silenced for 3 seconds.

MuradinsLandingMomentum_muradin.name: Muradin's Landing Momentum
MuradinsLandingMomentum_muradin.description: Increases Muradin's Movement Speed by 25% for 5 seconds upon landing with Dwarf Toss.

TheLostVikingssLargeandInCharge_thelostv.name: The Lost Vikings's Large and In Charge
TheLostVikingssLargeandInCharge_thelostv.description: When Olaf charges enemies, they are stunned for 1 second.

WhitemanesLashingOut_whitemane.name: Whitemane's Lashing Out
WhitemanesLashingOut_whitemane.description: Searing Lash's second strike deals 25% more damage and reduces Searing Lash's cooldown to 1 second if it hits a Hero.

AlaraksLastLaugh_alarak.name: Alarak's Last Laugh
AlaraksLastLaugh_alarak.description: Activate teleport to the chosen location and remove all Roots, Slows, and damage over time effects. If Alarak fails to hit enemy Heroes 3 times with Basic Abilities within 4 seconds of using Last Laugh, his Health is reduced to 1.

MalthaelsLastRites_malthael.name: Malthael's Last Rites
MalthaelsLastRites_malthael.description: Apply a death sentence to an enemy Hero that, after 2 seconds, deals damage equal to 50% of their missing Health. Repeatable Quest: Enemies killed between the application of Last Rites and within 1.5 seconds of it dealing damage permanently reduce its cooldown by 5 seconds, to a minimum of 15 seconds.

RagnarossLavaSurge_ragnaros.name: Ragnaros's Lava Surge
RagnarossLavaSurge_ragnaros.description: Lava Wave gains an additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 30 seconds.

RagnarossLavaWave_ragnaros.name: Ragnaros's Lava Wave
RagnarossLavaWave_ragnaros.description: Release a wave of lava from Ragnaros's Core that travels down the targeted lane, dealing 240 (+4% per level) damage per second to non-Structure enemies in its path and instantly killing enemy Minions. Damage increased by 100% versus Heroes.

TyraelsLawandOrder_tyrael.name: Tyrael's Law and Order
TyraelsLawandOrder_tyrael.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Smite reduces the cooldown of Righteousness by 1 second. Each allied Hero Shielded by Righteousness increases the damage of the next Smite by 25%.

JohannasLawsofHope_johanna.name: Johanna's Laws of Hope
JohannasLawsofHope_johanna.description: Activate to heal 30% of Johanna's max Health over 4 seconds.  Passive: Regenerate 1.5 (+4% per level) Health per second.

TychussLeadRain_tychus.name: Tychus's Lead Rain
TychussLeadRain_tychus.description: Overkill also slows enemy movement speed by 30%.

GallsLeadenOrb_gall.name: Gall's Leaden Orb
GallsLeadenOrb_gall.description: Dread Orb stuns enemy Heroes for 0.75 seconds.

SonyasLeap_sonya.name: Sonya's Leap
SonyasLeap_sonya.description: Leap into the air, dealing 135 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies, and stunning them for 1.25 seconds.

LunarasLeapingStrike_lunara.name: Lunara's Leaping Strike
LunarasLeapingStrike_lunara.description: Leap over an enemy, slowing them by 80% for 0.35 seconds and dealing 271 (+4% per level) damage.  Stores up to 2 charges.

TracersLeechingRounds_tracer.name: Tracer's Leeching Rounds
TracersLeechingRounds_tracer.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes heal Tracer for 20% of their damage dealt.

AnubaraksLeechingScarabs_anubarak.name: Anub'arak's Leeching Scarabs
AnubaraksLeechingScarabs_anubarak.description: Beetles gain 20% bonus attack damage and they heal Anub'arak for 50% of their damage with each attack if he is nearby.

AnubaraksLegionofBeetles_anubarak.name: Anub'arak's Legion of Beetles
AnubaraksLegionofBeetles_anubarak.description: Beetles have 30 Spell Armor. Automatically spawn a Beetle every 12 seconds. Can be toggled on and off.

ArthassLegionofNorthrend_arthas.name: Arthas's Legion of Northrend
ArthassLegionofNorthrend_arthas.description: 3 additional Ghouls are created.  Ghouls heal for an additional 50% and last 5 seconds longer.

ZuljinsLettheKillingBegin_zuljin.name: Zul'jin's Let the Killing Begin
ZuljinsLettheKillingBegin_zuljin.description: When Zul'jin kills an enemy, his Attack Speed is increased by 5%, up to 40%, for 12 seconds. Basic Attacks refresh the duration.  Hero Takedowns instantly grant 40% Attack Speed.

LunarasLetThemWither_lunara.name: Lunara's Let Them Wither
LunarasLetThemWither_lunara.description: Increases Crippling Spores' Slow duration by 1 second and causes it to no longer decay.

LiLisLetsGo_lili.name: Li Li's Let's Go!
LiLisLetsGo_lili.description: Activate to heal an allied Hero for 140 (+4% per level) and make them Unstoppable for 1 second. Let's Go's cooldown is affected by Fast Feet.  Cannot be used on Li Li.

NovasLethalDecoy_nova.name: Nova's Lethal Decoy
NovasLethalDecoy_nova.description: Holo Decoy deals 30% of Nova's damage.

AlaraksLethalOnslaught_alarak.name: Alarak's Lethal Onslaught
AlaraksLethalOnslaught_alarak.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Discord Strike grants 50% of Sadism's damage bonus to Alarak's Basic Attacks for 4 seconds. Basic Attacks against Heroes refresh this duration.

MedivhsLeyLineSeal_medivh.name: Medivh's Ley Line Seal
MedivhsLeyLineSeal_medivh.description: After 0.5 seconds, unleash a wave of energy that places enemy Heroes in Time Stop for 3 seconds.

SylvanassLifeDrain_sylvanas.name: Sylvanas's Life Drain
SylvanassLifeDrain_sylvanas.description: Heal for 15% of damage dealt by Sylvanas to enemies with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse. Healing is doubled against Heroes.

SonyasLifeFunnel_sonya.name: Sonya's Life Funnel
SonyasLifeFunnel_sonya.description: Increases the healing of Whirlwind to 35%, tripled versus Heroes.

DiablosLifeLeech_diablo.name: Diablo's Life Leech
DiablosLifeLeech_diablo.description: Diablo gains 1 Soul and heals for 1.5% of his maximum Health when Basic Attacking an enemy Hero. While at 100 Souls, increase this healing to 3% of his maximum Health.

LtMoralessLifeSupport_ltmorales.name: Lt. Morales's Life Support
LtMoralessLifeSupport_ltmorales.description: Generate 2 Energy each time Safeguard reduces damage, up to a maximum of 20 Energy per use.

AlexstraszasLifeUnbound_alexstrasza.name: Alexstrasza's Life Unbound
AlexstraszasLifeUnbound_alexstrasza.description:
Activate to heal an allied Hero for 14.84% of their maximum Health and deal 200 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.  Healing a Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced ally reduces Life Unbound's cooldown by 30 seconds. 
Cannot be used on Alexstrasza.

AlexstraszasLifeBinder_alexstrasza.name: Alexstrasza's Life-Binder
AlexstraszasLifeBinder_alexstrasza.description: Bind Alexstrasa's life force with an allied Hero. Both her and her target are healed for 480 Health over 2 seconds. Afterwards, the Hero with a lower percentage of health is set to the same Health percentage as the other Hero.

MalfurionsLifebloom_malfurion.name: Malfurion's Lifebloom
MalfurionsLifebloom_malfurion.description: Regrowth instantly heals its target for 10% of their missing Health.

AlexstraszasLifeblossom_alexstrasza.name: Alexstrasza's Lifeblossom
AlexstraszasLifeblossom_alexstrasza.description: While Alexstrasza is above 75% Health, Gift of Life creates a Lifeblossom at the target's location. Alexstrasza can collect the Lifeblossom to make her next Gift of Life cost no Health.

YrelsLightofKarabor_yrel.name: Yrel's Light of Karabor
YrelsLightofKarabor_yrel.description: Increase Vindication's radius by 15%. Hitting an enemy Hero increases Vindication's healing by 40%. If more than one Hero is hit, the bonus is increased by 80%.

AnduinsLightofStormwind_anduin.name: Anduin's Light of Stormwind
AnduinsLightofStormwind_anduin.description: Holy Word: Salvation healing is increased to up to 30% of maximum Health and upon ending, allied Heroes gain 40% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

AurielsLightSpeed_auriel.name: Auriel's Light Speed
AurielsLightSpeed_auriel.description: Resurrected allies gain 200% increased Movement Speed, decaying over 4 seconds.  While a resurrected ally remains alive, Resurrect's next cooldown recharges 100% faster.

AnduinsLightbomb_anduin.name: Anduin's Lightbomb
AnduinsLightbomb_anduin.description: Imbue an allied Hero with the Light. After 1.5 seconds, it explodes, dealing 150 damage to enemies and Stunning them for 1.25 seconds.  The target gains a Shield that absorbs 165 damage per enemy Hero hit. Lasts for 5 seconds.

AlaraksLightningBarrage_alarak.name: Alarak's Lightning Barrage
AlaraksLightningBarrage_alarak.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with the center of Lightning Surge allows it to be cast again for free on a different primary target within the next 2 seconds. This free cast cannot benefit from Lightning Barrage.

DiablosLightningBreath_diablo.name: Diablo's Lightning Breath
DiablosLightningBreath_diablo.description: After 0.5 seconds, become Unstoppable and Channel for up to 4 seconds, dealing 50 damage every 0.25 seconds to enemies in front of Diablo. Enemies affected are Slowed by 4% for 2 seconds, up to 40%.  Lightning Breath's direction changes with your mouse cursor position.

MephistosLightningReaction_mephisto.name: Mephisto's Lightning Reaction
MephistosLightningReaction_mephisto.description: Skull Missile explodes on contact with Lightning Nova, dealing 138 damage to nearby enemies.

LiLisLightningSerpent_lili.name: Li Li's Lightning Serpent
LiLisLightningSerpent_lili.description: Cloud Serpent attacks bounce to hit 2 additional Heroes for 50% (+4% per level) damage and healing.

AnduinsLightwell_anduin.name: Anduin's Lightwell
AnduinsLightwell_anduin.description: Summon a Lightwell that periodically heals a nearby allied Hero for 75. The well only fades after healing 10 times or when recast.  This cooldown is reduced by 1 second each time Anduin heals an allied Hero.

QhirasLingeringAilment_qhira.name: Qhira's Lingering Ailment
QhirasLingeringAilment_qhira.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Revolving Sweep's initial impact or swing have their Armor reduced by 15 for 3 seconds.

JainasLingeringChill_jaina.name: Jaina's Lingering Chill
JainasLingeringChill_jaina.description: Increase the duration of Chill from 4 seconds to 6 seconds.

StukovsLingeringSpines_stukov.name: Stukov's Lingering Spines
StukovsLingeringSpines_stukov.description: Lurking Arm persists for 1.5 seconds after it is canceled.

VariansLionsMaw_varian.name: Varian's Lion's Maw
VariansLionsMaw_varian.description: Quest: Every time Lion's Fang hits a Hero, increase its damage by 5, up to 120. Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes, the slow is increased to 50% and its duration is increased to 2 seconds.

VariansLionheart_varian.name: Varian's Lionheart
VariansLionheart_varian.description: Increase Lion's Fang's healing from Heroes by 50%.

AlexstraszasLiveandLetLive_alexstrasza.name: Alexstrasza's Live and Let Live
AlexstraszasLiveandLetLive_alexstrasza.description: While Alexstrasza is above 75% Health, Gift of Life's cooldown recharges 100% faster.

MurkysLivingtheDream_murky.name: Murky's Living the Dream
MurkysLivingtheDream_murky.description: Quest: Every 15 seconds Murky is alive, he gains 5% Spell Power, up to 20%. This bonus is reset upon his death.

GenjisLivingWeapon_genji.name: Genji's Living Weapon
GenjisLivingWeapon_genji.description: Each enemy Hero hit by X-Strike reduces its cooldown by 12 seconds.

TracersLockedandLoaded_tracer.name: Tracer's Locked and Loaded
TracersLockedandLoaded_tracer.description: Reactivate Reload within the last 50% of its cast time to increase Tracer's Basic Attack damage by 40% for that magazine.

AbathursLocustBrood_abathur.name: Abathur's Locust Brood
AbathursLocustBrood_abathur.description: Activate to spawn 3 Locusts at a nearby location.

AbathursLocustNest_abathur.name: Abathur's Locust Nest
AbathursLocustNest_abathur.description: Activate to create a nest that periodically spawns Locusts. Only one Locust Nest can be active at a time.

AnubaraksLocustSwarm_anubarak.name: Anub'arak's Locust Swarm
AnubaraksLocustSwarm_anubarak.description: Deal 62 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Each enemy damaged restores 21 (+4% per level) Health. Lasts 6 seconds.

TheLostVikingssLongboatRaid_thelostvikin.name: The Lost Vikings's Longboat Raid!
TheLostVikingssLongboatRaid_thelostvikin.description: Hop into an Unstoppable Longboat that fires at nearby enemies for 112 (+4% per level) damage per second and can fire a mortar that deals 205 (+4% per level) damage in an area.  The boat has increased Health for each Viking inside. If the boat is destroyed by enemies, all Vikings are stunned for 1.5 seconds. Lasts 15 seconds.  Requires all surviving Vikings to be nearby.

NovasLongshot_nova.name: Nova's Longshot
NovasLongshot_nova.description: Increases the cast range of Pinning Shot by 30%. Pinning Shot also increases the range of Nova's next Basic Attack by 2.

DiablosLordofTerror_diablo.name: Diablo's Lord of Terror
DiablosLordofTerror_diablo.description: Activate to steal 10% of the maximum Health of nearby enemy Heroes and gain 5 Souls per Hero hit.

DeckardsLorenado_deckard.name: Deckard's Lorenado
DeckardsLorenado_deckard.description: Vector Targeting Create a swirling lorenado that travels in the targeted direction, continually knocking away enemies that come into contact with it.

SylvanassLostSoul_sylvanas.name: Sylvanas's Lost Soul
SylvanassLostSoul_sylvanas.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse reduce the cooldown of Shadow Dagger by 1.75 seconds.

ETCsLoudSpeakers_etc.name: E.T.C.'s Loud Speakers
ETCsLoudSpeakers_etc.description: Increases Face Melt range and knockback by 50%.

StukovsLowBlow_stukov.name: Stukov's Low Blow
StukovsLowBlow_stukov.description: Lurking Arm deals 100% more damage to enemy Heroes below 30% Health.

TyrandesLunarBlaze_tyrande.name: Tyrande's Lunar Blaze
TyrandesLunarBlaze_tyrande.description: Increase Lunar Flare's range by 30%. Quest: Hitting a Hero with Lunar Flare increases its damage by 5%, up to 100%.

MalfurionsLunarShower_malfurion.name: Malfurion's Lunar Shower
MalfurionsLunarShower_malfurion.description: If Moonfire hits a Hero, its cooldown its reduces by 1 second and the next Moonfire within 6 seconds deals 20% more damage. This damage bonus stacks up to 60%.

CassiasLungingStrike_cassia.name: Cassia's Lunging Strike
CassiasLungingStrike_cassia.description: Increase Fend's range and area by 20%, and its duration by 0.5 seconds.

DehakasLurkerStrain_dehaka.name: Dehaka's Lurker Strain
DehakasLurkerStrain_dehaka.description: Reduce the cooldown of Burrow by 4 seconds. Emerging from Burrow grants Dehaka Stealth for 3 seconds and also knocks nearby enemies back, Slowing them by 30% for 3 seconds.

OrpheasLurkingTerror_orphea.name: Orphea's Lurking Terror
OrpheasLurkingTerror_orphea.description: After Dread erupts and for 2 seconds after, activate to cast Chomp from the eruption area.

KerrigansMaelstrom_kerrigan.name: Kerrigan's Maelstrom
KerrigansMaelstrom_kerrigan.description: Deals 74 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Lasts for 7 seconds.

SgtHammersMaelstromRounds_sgthammer.name: Sgt. Hammer's Maelstrom Rounds
SgtHammersMaelstromRounds_sgthammer.description: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage dealt by 35% for 5 seconds. Hitting Structures with Basic Attacks reduces the cooldown of Maelstrom Rounds by 5 seconds.  Stores up to 3 charges.

ThrallsMaelstromWeapon_thrall.name: Thrall's Maelstrom Weapon
ThrallsMaelstromWeapon_thrall.description: Repeatable Quest: Basic Attacks against Heroes while Windfury's Movement Speed bonus is active increase Attack Damage by 1. Reward: After gaining 20 Attack Damage, increase the Movement Speed bonus of Windfury to 40%. Reward: After gaining 40 Attack Damage, Thrall permanently gains 15% increased Movement Speed.

MedivhsMageArmor_medivh.name: Medivh's Mage Armor
MedivhsMageArmor_medivh.description: The first time an Ally uses a Portal, they gain 25 Armor for 4 seconds, reducing their damage taken by 25%.

BrightwingsMagicSpit_brightwing.name: Brightwing's Magic Spit
BrightwingsMagicSpit_brightwing.description: Increase Basic Attack range by 1.1. Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Soothing Mist by 5 seconds.

AurielsMajesticSpan_auriel.name: Auriel's Majestic Span
AurielsMajesticSpan_auriel.description: Increases the radius of Sacred Sweep by 15%.

MurkysMakingInky_murky.name: Murky's Making Inky
MurkysMakingInky_murky.description: Reduces the Cooldown of Slime from 4 seconds to 2 seconds.

DiablosMalevolence_diablo.name: Diablo's Malevolence
DiablosMalevolence_diablo.description: Basic Attacks cause Diablo's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds to deal an additional 100 Spell Damage. Stores up to 2 charges.

MephistosMaliciousIntent_mephisto.name: Mephisto's Malicious Intent
MephistosMaliciousIntent_mephisto.description: Shade of Mephisto grants 20% Spell Power while active and for 2.5 seconds after ending.

KaelthassManaAddict_kaelthas.name: Kael'thas's Mana Addict
KaelthassManaAddict_kaelthas.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Kael'thas's maximum Mana by 15. Reward: After gathering 20 Globes, Kael'thas can activate Arcane Barrier to gain a Shield equal to 100% of his maximum Mana for 4 seconds. 45 second cooldown.

KaelthassManaTap_kaelthas.name: Kael'thas's Mana Tap
KaelthassManaTap_kaelthas.description: Activating Verdant Spheres restores 4% of Kael'thas's maximum Mana.

ThrallsManaTide_thrall.name: Thrall's Mana Tide
ThrallsManaTide_thrall.description: Frostwolf Resilience restores 15 Mana and reduces Basic Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.

VallasManticore_valla.name: Valla's Manticore
VallasManticore_valla.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack against the same Heroic target deals an additional 5% of their maximum Health as damage.

YrelsMaraadsInsight_yrel.name: Yrel's Maraad's Insight
YrelsMaraadsInsight_yrel.description: After damaging an enemy Hero with a Basic Ability, Yrel's next Basic Attack heals her for 128.

AzmodansMarchofSin_azmodan.name: Azmodan's March of Sin
AzmodansMarchofSin_azmodan.description: Increases Azmodan's Movement Speed while channeling All Shall Burn to 80% of normal speed.

LeoricsMarchoftheBlackKing_leoric.name: Leoric's March of the Black King
LeoricsMarchoftheBlackKing_leoric.description: Leoric becomes Unstoppable and walks forward, swinging his mace 3 times. Enemies hit take 250 (+4% per level) damage, and Heroes hit heal Leoric for 12% of his maximum Health.

MurkysMarchoftheMurlocs_murky.name: Murky's March of the Murlocs
MurkysMarchoftheMurlocs_murky.description: After 0.75 seconds, Murky commands a legion of Murlocs to march in a target direction, each one leaping onto the first enemy Hero or Structure they find. Each Murloc deals 125 (+4% per level) damage and slows its target by 15% for 5 seconds. Murlocs deal 50% damage to Structures.

TyrandesMarkofMending_tyrande.name: Tyrande's Mark of Mending
TyrandesMarkofMending_tyrande.description: Tyrande's Basic Attacks heal her for 2% of her maximum Health. Basic Attacks against targets with Hunter's Mark heal the attacker for 2% of their maximum Health.

IllidansMarkedforDeath_illidan.name: Illidan's Marked for Death
IllidansMarkedforDeath_illidan.description: Dive deals an extra 180 (+4% per level) damage if used consecutively on a target within 10 seconds.

CassiasMartialLaw_cassia.name: Cassia's Martial Law
CassiasMartialLaw_cassia.description: Basic Attacks against Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 3% of the Hero's maximum Health.

WhitemanesMartyrdom_whitemane.name: Whitemane's Martyrdom
WhitemanesMartyrdom_whitemane.description: Each stack of Desperation increases Desperate Plea's healing by 30%.

LiLisMassVortex_lili.name: Li Li's Mass Vortex
LiLisMassVortex_lili.description: Increase the number of enemies hit by Blinding Wind from 2 to 3. Blinding Wind deals 75% additional damage if all 3 enemies hit are Heroes.

MalthaelsMassacre_malthael.name: Malthael's Massacre
MalthaelsMassacre_malthael.description: Wraith Strike now damages and applies Reaper's Mark to enemies around its target.

StukovsMassiveShove_stukov.name: Stukov's Massive Shove
StukovsMassiveShove_stukov.description: Extend Stukov's arm. If it hits an enemy Hero, they are rapidly shoved until they collide with terrain, taking 190 (+4% per level) damage. Stukov gains 50 Armor while shoving an enemy.

TychussMasterAssassin_tychus.name: Tychus's Master Assassin
TychussMasterAssassin_tychus.description: Quest: Hero Takedowns increase Tychus's Attack Speed by 1%, up to 15%. Reward: After getting 15 Takedowns, Tychus's Attack Speed is increased by an additional 10%.

VariansMasteratArms_varian.name: Varian's Master at Arms
VariansMasteratArms_varian.description: Colossus Smash affects all enemies near the target, and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.

AzmodansMasterofDestruction_azmodan.name: Azmodan's Master of Destruction
AzmodansMasterofDestruction_azmodan.description: All Shall Burn's final damage applies to all enemies in an area around the target and grants 3 Annihilation per Hero hit.

KaelthassMasterofFlames_kaelthas.name: Kael'thas's Master of Flames
KaelthassMasterofFlames_kaelthas.description: Living Bomb's spread from explosions can now also spread Living Bomb.

ZeratulsMasterWarpBlade_zeratul.name: Zeratul's Master Warp-Blade
ZeratulsMasterWarpBlade_zeratul.description: Every third consecutive Basic Attack against the same target deals 125% bonus damage.

ZaryasMaximumCharge_zarya.name: Zarya's Maximum Charge
ZaryasMaximumCharge_zarya.description: Regen Globes now instantly grant 20 Energy. Quest: Spend 150 seconds at or above 50 Energy. Reward: Gain an additional 20 maximum Energy.

QhirasMaximumEffort_qhira.name: Qhira's Maximum Effort
QhirasMaximumEffort_qhira.description: If Carnage damages the same enemy Hero 3 times, it deals an additional 112 damage and slows them by 20% for 2 seconds.

StitchessMeatHook_stitches.name: Stitches's Meat Hook
StitchessMeatHook_stitches.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Hook heals Stitches for 20% of his maximum Health over 4 seconds. For 4 seconds, Stitches Basic Attacks against the Hero hit refreshes the healing duration.

TheButchersMeatShield_thebutcher.name: The Butcher's Meat Shield
TheButchersMeatShield_thebutcher.description: When Ruthless Onslaught impacts an enemy Hero, The Butcher gains 50 Spell Armor for 2.5 seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by 50%.

GazlowesMechaLord_gazlowe.name: Gazlowe's Mecha-Lord
GazlowesMechaLord_gazlowe.description: Basic Attacks deal an additional 100% damage.  Passive: Gain 25 Armor.

SgtHammersMechanicalKnowhow_sgthammer.name: Sgt. Hammer's Mechanical Know-how
SgtHammersMechanicalKnowhow_sgthammer.description: Neosteel Plating grants 5% maximum Health as a Shield for 2 seconds. If this Shield is destroyed, Basic Attack damage is increased by 50% for 5 seconds.

LtMoralessMedivacDropship_ltmorales.name: Lt. Morales's Medivac Dropship
LtMoralessMedivacDropship_ltmorales.description: Target a location for a Medivac transport. For up to 10 seconds before takeoff, allies can right-click to enter the Medivac.

MedivhsMedivhCheats_medivh.name: Medivh's Medivh Cheats!
MedivhsMedivhCheats_medivh.description: Increase the duration of the Time Stop by 33% and gain the ability to redirect the wave once while it's active.

ZagarasMedusaBlades_zagara.name: Zagara's Medusa Blades
ZagarasMedusaBlades_zagara.description: Basic Attacks deal 33% damage to three nearby targets.

DVasMEKAfall_dva.name: D.Va's MEKAfall
DVasMEKAfall_dva.description: Call Mech is instant and can target a location. Upon landing, the Mech deals 202 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the impact area.

BlazesMeltdown_blaze.name: Blaze's Meltdown
BlazesMeltdown_blaze.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Pyromania reduces their damage dealt by 7% for 2.5 seconds, up to 35%.

ImperiussMeltingTouch_imperius.name: Imperius's Melting Touch
ImperiussMeltingTouch_imperius.description: Consuming a Molten Armor mark reduces the target's Armor by 25% for 4 seconds.

MalthaelsMementoMori_malthael.name: Malthael's Memento Mori
MalthaelsMementoMori_malthael.description: Reaper's Mark deals 80% increased damage after afflicting an enemy for more than 4 seconds.

ZeratulsMendingStrikes_zeratul.name: Zeratul's Mending Strikes
ZeratulsMendingStrikes_zeratul.description: Basic Attacks heal for 35% of the damage dealt.

TassadarsMentalAcuity_tassadar.name: Tassadar's Mental Acuity
TassadarsMentalAcuity_tassadar.description: Quest: Each Takedown earned lowers the cooldown of Oracle by 3 seconds, to a maximum of 15 seconds. Reward: Upon getting 5 Takedowns, the sight range of Oracle is increased by 50%.

MercenaryLord_thelostvikings.name: Mercenary Lord
MercenaryLord_thelostvikings.description: Friendly non-Boss Mercenaries near your Hero deal 50% more damage. Gain 50 Armor against Minions and Mercenaries, reducing the damage taken by 50%.

SylvanassMercenaryQueen_sylvanas.name: Sylvanas's Mercenary Queen
SylvanassMercenaryQueen_sylvanas.description: Friendly non-Elite Mercenaries near Sylvanas deal 60% more damage. Sylvanas Stuns and deals 30% additional damage to Mercenaries with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse.

SamurosMercilessStrikes_samuro.name: Samuro's Merciless Strikes
SamurosMercilessStrikes_samuro.description: Samuro's Basic Attacks against Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed enemies are always Critical Strikes.

IllidansMetamorphosis_illidan.name: Illidan's Metamorphosis
IllidansMetamorphosis_illidan.description: Transform into Demon Form at the target location, dealing 46 (+4% per level) damage in the area. Temporarily increases maximum Health by 220 (+4% per level) for each Hero hit by the initial impact. Lasts for 18 seconds.

RagnarossMeteorBomb_ragnaros.name: Ragnaros's Meteor Bomb
RagnarossMeteorBomb_ragnaros.description: Living Meteor explodes at the end of its path, dealing 220 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies.

MicCheck_etc.name: Mic Check
MicCheck_etc.description: Hitting at least 2 targets with Face Melt reduces its cooldown by 6 seconds.

MalGanissMightofSargeras_malganis.name: Mal'Ganis's Might of Sargeras
MalGanissMightofSargeras_malganis.description: Necrotic Embrace's Armor is increased to 50, but the duration is reduced to 2.5 seconds.

SylvanassMightoftheBansheeQueen_sylvanas.name: Sylvanas's Might of the Banshee Queen
SylvanassMightoftheBansheeQueen_sylvanas.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Withering Fire increases Sylvanas' Attack Speed and Spell Power by 5% for 6 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.

ZeratulsMightoftheNerazim_zeratul.name: Zeratul's Might of the Nerazim
ZeratulsMightoftheNerazim_zeratul.description: Activate to cast an untalented version of Zeratul's most recently used Basic Ability, dealing 50% less damage.  Passive: After using an Ability, Zeratul's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 30% more damage.

KelThuzadsMightoftheScourge_kelthuzad.name: Kel'Thuzad's Might of the Scourge
KelThuzadsMightoftheScourge_kelthuzad.description: Hitting a Hero with Shadow Fissure resets it cooldown.

FalstadsMightyGust_falstad.name: Falstad's Mighty Gust
FalstadsMightyGust_falstad.description: Push enemies away, and slow their Movement Speed by 40% decaying over 4 seconds.

MephistosMimic_mephisto.name: Mephisto's Mimic
MephistosMimic_mephisto.description: While both Shade of Mephisto and Lightning Nova are active, Lightning Nova also casts from the Shade's location.

SylvanassMindControl_sylvanas.name: Sylvanas's Mind Control
SylvanassMindControl_sylvanas.description: After 0.25 seconds, fire a missile that Mind Controls the first enemy Hero hit. Heroes hit are Silenced, Slowed by 30%, and forced to walk towards Sylvanas for 1.75 seconds.

OrpheasMindDevourer_orphea.name: Orphea's Mind Devourer
OrpheasMindDevourer_orphea.description: Quest: Hitting Heroes with Dread increases its damage by 4, up to 200. Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes, hitting an enemy Hero with Dread's eruption sets its cooldown to 6 seconds and refunds 50 Mana.

AnasMindNumbingAgent_ana.name: Ana's Mind-Numbing Agent
AnasMindNumbingAgent_ana.description: Every Dose a Hero has reduces their Spell Power by 10%.

SgtHammersMineField_sgthammer.name: Sgt. Hammer's Mine Field
SgtHammersMineField_sgthammer.description: Increase the number of mines by 2.

GazlowesMiniatureBlackHole_gazlowe.name: Gazlowe's Miniature Black Hole
GazlowesMiniatureBlackHole_gazlowe.description: Increases Grav-O-Bomb radius by 25% and damage by 50%.

SamurosMirage_samuro.name: Samuro's Mirage
SamurosMirage_samuro.description: Mirror Image grants Samuro and his Images 40 Spell Armor against the next 2 sources of Spell damage, reducing their damage by 40%.

LiMingsMirrorball_liming.name: Li-Ming's Mirrorball
LiMingsMirrorball_liming.description: Magic Missiles fires an additional 2 missiles, but its Mana cost is increased by 5.

SamurosMirroredSteel_samuro.name: Samuro's Mirrored Steel
SamurosMirroredSteel_samuro.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Mirror Image by 1 second.

LiLisMistweaver_lili.name: Li Li's Mistweaver
LiLisMistweaver_lili.description: Activate to heal nearby allied Heroes for 149 (+4% per level). Basic Attacks and Cloud Serpent attacks reduce the cooldown of Mistweaver by 1 second.

LeoricsMithrilMace_leoric.name: Leoric's Mithril Mace
LeoricsMithrilMace_leoric.description: Increase Leoric's Attack Speed by 20%. Repeatable Quest: Nearby enemy Minion deaths grant 0.3% permanent Attack Speed, and Takedowns grant 3% permanent Attack Speed, up to 30%.

LuciosMixingFire_lucio.name: Lúcio's Mixing Fire
LuciosMixingFire_lucio.description: High Five can now be cast on enemy Heroes, dealing 225 damage and reducing all healing received by 50% for 3 seconds.  Passive: Increase the duration of Amp It Up by 1 second.

FenixsMobileOffense_fenix.name: Fenix's Mobile Offense
FenixsMobileOffense_fenix.description: After moving unmounted, Fenix's next Basic Attack deals 35% more damage to Heroes.

ChromiesMobiusLoop_chromie.name: Chromie's Mobius Loop
ChromiesMobiusLoop_chromie.description: Hitting a Hero with Dragon's Breath reduces its cooldown by 1.5 seconds and restores 40 Mana.

AlaraksMockingStrikes_alarak.name: Alarak's Mocking Strikes
AlaraksMockingStrikes_alarak.description: Basic Attacks against Stunned, Silenced, Slowed, or Rooted Heroes reduce the cooldown of Alarak's Basic Abilities by 3 seconds.

ChosMoltenBlock_cho.name: Cho's Molten Block
ChosMoltenBlock_cho.description: Activate to enter Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 3 seconds, damaging nearby enemies for 92 (+4% per level) damage per second.

RagnarossMoltenPower_ragnaros.name: Ragnaros's Molten Power
RagnarossMoltenPower_ragnaros.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Living Meteor increases the damage of the next Living Meteor by 20%, up to a maximum of 100%.

VallasMonsterHunter_valla.name: Valla's Monster Hunter
VallasMonsterHunter_valla.description: Reduces the Mana cost of Hungering Arrow by 40 and increases the damage it deals to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters by 150%.

OrpheasMonsterWithin_orphea.name: Orphea's Monster Within
OrpheasMonsterWithin_orphea.description: Eternal Feast grants 1 Chaos each time it hits a Hero. While Eternal Feast is active, Orphea's Attack Speed is increased by 50%.

MalfurionsMoonburn_malfurion.name: Malfurion's Moonburn
MalfurionsMoonburn_malfurion.description: Increase Moonfire's damage to Minions by 75%. Repeatable Quest: Every 5 Minions killed nearby increase this bonus by 1%, up to 25%. After reaching a 25% bonus, Moonburn's bonus damage also applies to Mercenaries and Monsters.

TyrandesMoonlitArrows_tyrande.name: Tyrande's Moonlit Arrows
TyrandesMoonlitArrows_tyrande.description: Basic Attacks decrease the cooldown of Light of Elune by an additional 0.25 seconds.

MalfurionsMoonlitHarmony_malfurion.name: Malfurion's Moonlit Harmony
MalfurionsMoonlitHarmony_malfurion.description: Increase Moonfire's heal by 15% per ally affected by Regrowth.

AnduinsMoralCompass_anduin.name: Anduin's Moral Compass
AnduinsMoralCompass_anduin.description: Divine Star fires Basic Attacks at 2 Heroes close to its apex for 70% damage.

DeckardsMorenados_deckard.name: Deckard's Morenados!
DeckardsMorenados_deckard.description: Lorenado's cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds every time an enemy Hero is knocked back. This effect can only occur once per 0.5 seconds.

GarroshsMortalCombo_garrosh.name: Garrosh's Mortal Combo
GarroshsMortalCombo_garrosh.description: Hitting a Hero with Groundbreaker's Stun and throwing them with Wrecking Ball within 3 seconds reduces Wrecking Ball's cooldown by 10 seconds, regardless of order.

VariansMortalStrike_varian.name: Varian's Mortal Strike
VariansMortalStrike_varian.description: Heroes hit by Heroic Strike receive 40% reduced healing for 4 seconds.

XulsMortalWound_xul.name: Xul's Mortal Wound
XulsMortalWound_xul.description: Enemies hit by Spectral Scythe receive 75% less healing for 4 seconds.

MalthaelsMortality_malthael.name: Malthael's Mortality
MalthaelsMortality_malthael.description: When damaging a Hero, Wraith Strike deals bonus damage equal to 8% of the Hero's maximum Health.

ETCsMoshPit_etc.name: E.T.C.'s Mosh Pit
ETCsMoshPit_etc.description: After 0.75 seconds, channel to stun nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

HanzosMountedArchery_hanzo.name: Hanzo's Mounted Archery
HanzosMountedArchery_hanzo.description: Upon mounting, gain 20% additional Movement Speed for 5 seconds. Using Natural Agility instantly mounts.

KerrigansMountingPotency_kerrigan.name: Kerrigan's Mounting Potency
KerrigansMountingPotency_kerrigan.description: Ravage grants 5% Spell Power for 5 seconds, up to 40%.

ZeratulsMoveUnseen_zeratul.name: Zeratul's Move Unseen
ZeratulsMoveUnseen_zeratul.description: Reduce the cooldown of Permanent Cloak by 1 second. Gain 30% Movement Speed while Stealthed.

ZagarasMutalisk_zagara.name: Zagara's Mutalisk
ZagarasMutalisk_zagara.description: Hunter Killer now spawns a Mutalisk. Mutalisks have a bounce attack and last for 30 seconds.

ValeerasMutilate_valeera.name: Valeera's Mutilate
ValeerasMutilate_valeera.description: Sinister Strike now hits with both blades, dealing 125% additional damage, but its range is reduced by 1.

MedivhsMysticAssault_medivh.name: Medivh's Mystic Assault
MedivhsMysticAssault_medivh.description: If Arcane Rift hits an enemy Hero, Medivh's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 50% more damage and Heals for 50% of the damage dealt.

SonyasMysticalSpear_sonya.name: Sonya's Mystical Spear
SonyasMysticalSpear_sonya.description: Ancient Spear always pulls Sonya to the target location even if it doesn't hit an enemy. When used this way, Ancient Spear's cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

MaievsNaishasMemento_maiev.name: Maiev's Naisha's Memento
MaievsNaishasMemento_maiev.description: Activate to make primary Basic Attacks bounce between nearby enemies up to 2 times. Lasts 8 seconds.  Recharge Naisha's Memento by hitting at least 2 Heroes with a single Fan of Knives.

AnasNanoBoost_ana.name: Ana's Nano Boost
AnasNanoBoost_ana.description: Instantly boost an allied Hero, restoring 200 Mana. For the next 8 seconds, they gain 30% Spell Power and their Basic Ability cooldowns recharge 150% faster.  Cannot be used on Ana.

AnasNanoInfusion_ana.name: Ana's Nano Infusion
AnasNanoInfusion_ana.description: Allies affected by Nano Boost heal for 50% of Spell Damage dealt.

BlazesNanomachineCoating_blaze.name: Blaze's Nanomachine Coating
BlazesNanomachineCoating_blaze.description: Enemies standing in Oil Spills and Ignited Oil Spills have their Attack Speed reduced by 50% for 2.5 seconds.

DVasNanoweaveSuit_dva.name: D.Va's Nanoweave Suit
DVasNanoweaveSuit_dva.description: For 4 seconds after ejecting from her Mech, D.Va gains 50 Armor and her Basic Attacks grant 50% more cooldown reduction towards Call Mech.

SgtHammersNapalmStrike_sgthammer.name: Sgt. Hammer's Napalm Strike
SgtHammersNapalmStrike_sgthammer.description: Deals 164 (+4% per level) damage on impact, and leaves a napalm area that deals 50 (+4% per level) damage per second. Lasts for 4 seconds.

LunarasNaturalPerspective_lunara.name: Lunara's Natural Perspective
LunarasNaturalPerspective_lunara.description: Nature's Toxin reveals enemies for its duration.

MalfurionsNaturesBalance_malfurion.name: Malfurion's Nature's Balance
MalfurionsNaturesBalance_malfurion.description: Increase Moonfire's area by 25% and Regrowth's duration by 3 seconds.

LunarasNaturesCulling_lunara.name: Lunara's Nature's Culling
LunarasNaturesCulling_lunara.description: Increases Nature's Toxin's damage by 125% to non-Heroes.

MalfurionsNaturesCure_malfurion.name: Malfurion's Nature's Cure
MalfurionsNaturesCure_malfurion.description: Activate to remove all Stuns, Roots, and Slows from allies affected by Regrowth.

MalfurionsNaturesSwiftness_malfurion.name: Malfurion's Nature's Swiftness
MalfurionsNaturesSwiftness_malfurion.description: Malfurion gains 6% Movement Speed per ally Hero affected by Regrowth.

AbathursNeedlespine_abathur.name: Abathur's Needlespine
AbathursNeedlespine_abathur.description: Increases the damage and range of Symbiote's Stab by 20%.

AlaraksNegativelyCharged_alarak.name: Alarak's Negatively Charged
AlaraksNegativelyCharged_alarak.description: Increase the Lightning Surge damage bonus to enemies between Alarak and his victim to 150%. Repeatable Quest: Each Hero hit by the center of Lightning Surge permanently increases the damage bonus by 4%.

TychussNeosteelCoating_tychus.name: Tychus's Neosteel Coating
TychussNeosteelCoating_tychus.description: Activate to gain 75 Spell Armor for 3 seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by 75%.

AnubaraksNerubianArmor_anubarak.name: Anub'arak's Nerubian Armor
AnubaraksNerubianArmor_anubarak.description: Increase Harden Carapace's Spell Armor by 20.

NervesofSteel_sonya.name: Nerves of Steel
NervesofSteel_sonya.description: Activate to gain 25% of your maximum Health as a Shield for 3 seconds. Usable while Whirlwinding.

KaelthassNetherWind_kaelthas.name: Kael'thas's Nether Wind
