KaelthassNetherWind_kaelthas.description: Increases Gravity Lapse's range by 30%. When Gravity Lapse hits an enemy Hero, refund 80 Mana.

AbathursNetworkedCarapace_abathur.name: Abathur's Networked Carapace
AbathursNetworkedCarapace_abathur.description: Using Symbiote's Carapace also applies an untalented Carapace Shield to all nearby allied Heroes, Minions, and Mercenaries.

BlazesNeuralStimpack_blaze.name: Blaze's Neural Stimpack
BlazesNeuralStimpack_blaze.description: Activate to gain 30 Mana and cause Basic Ability cooldowns to recharge 100% faster for 5 seconds.

HanzosNeverOutmatched_hanzo.name: Hanzo's Never Outmatched
HanzosNeverOutmatched_hanzo.description: Reduce Scatter Arrow's Mana cost from 40 to 20. Basic Attacks against Heroes lower the cooldown of Scatter Arrow by 3 seconds.

MurkysNeverEndingMurlocs_murky.name: Murky's Never-Ending Murlocs
MurkysNeverEndingMurlocs_murky.description: March of the Murlocs can be channeled, sending little Murlocs indefinitely.

BlazesNewHabits_blaze.name: Blaze's New Habits
BlazesNewHabits_blaze.description: Collecting Regeneration Globes reduces the cooldown of Pyromania by 8 seconds. Quest: Collect 15 Regeneration Globes. Reward: Pyromania grants Unstoppable for 2 seconds.

NexusBlades_illidan.name: Nexus Blades
NexusBlades_illidan.description: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and Slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

NexusFrenzy_falstad.name: Nexus Frenzy
NexusFrenzy_falstad.description: Increases Attack Speed by 20% and Attack Range by 1.1.

AnasNightTerrors_ana.name: Ana's Night Terrors
AnasNightTerrors_ana.description: Upon waking, enemy Heroes take 10% of their Maximum Health in damage. If a Hero is not woken up early, set the cooldown of Sleep Dart to 5 seconds.

MalGanissNightmareFuel_malganis.name: Mal'Ganis's Nightmare Fuel
MalGanissNightmareFuel_malganis.description: Casting Night Rush while in a bush increases its duration to 2.75 seconds. Basic Attacks deal 200% more damage to Sleeping targets.

IllidansNimbleDefender_illidan.name: Illidan's Nimble Defender
IllidansNimbleDefender_illidan.description: If Sweeping Strikes hits an enemy Hero, gain 25 Armor for 2 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

LunarasNimbleWisp_lunara.name: Lunara's Nimble Wisp
LunarasNimbleWisp_lunara.description: Increases Wisp Movement Speed by 100% and vision radius by 50%.

HanzosNinjaAssassin_hanzo.name: Hanzo's Ninja Assassin
HanzosNinjaAssassin_hanzo.description: Hitting Heroes with Storm Bow lowers Natural Agility's cooldown by 10 seconds. Additionally, Hero Takedowns reset Natural Agility's cooldown.

SonyasNoEscape_sonya.name: Sonya's No Escape
SonyasNoEscape_sonya.description: Increases the Movement Speed bonus from using Basic and Heroic Abilities to 20%.

ZuljinsNoMercy_zuljin.name: Zul'jin's No Mercy!
ZuljinsNoMercy_zuljin.description: Zul'jin's Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes marked with Grievous Throw ignore Armor.

MalthaelsNoOneCanStopDeath_malthael.name: Malthael's No One Can Stop Death
MalthaelsNoOneCanStopDeath_malthael.description: Activate while dead to immediately respawn at the Altar but increase Malthael's next respawn time by 25%.

QhirasNoSanctuary_qhira.name: Qhira's No Sanctuary
QhirasNoSanctuary_qhira.description: Nearby enemy Heroes below 50% Health are revealed. Qhira gains 20% Movement Speed while an enemy is revealed this way and deals 20% more damage to them.

TheLostVikingssNordicAttackSquad_thelost.name: The Lost Vikings's Nordic Attack Squad
TheLostVikingssNordicAttackSquad_thelost.description: Activate to have all Viking Basic Attacks deal bonus damage equal to 1.25% of a Hero's maximum Health for 5 seconds.

TheLostVikingssNorseForce_thelostvikings.name: The Lost Vikings's Norse Force!
TheLostVikingssNorseForce_thelostvikings.description: All Vikings gain a 130 (+4% per level) to 260 (+4% per level) point Shield, increasing in strength for each Viking alive. Lasts 4 seconds.

JainasNorthernExposure_jaina.name: Jaina's Northern Exposure
JainasNorthernExposure_jaina.description: Enemies damaged by Cone of Cold have their Armor lowered by 20 for 2 seconds, increasing their damage taken by 20%.

IllidansNowheretoHide_illidan.name: Illidan's Nowhere to Hide
IllidansNowheretoHide_illidan.description: The Hunt gains unlimited range. Illidan passively reveals enemy Heroes below 25% Health anywhere on the Battleground.

DVasNuclearOption_dva.name: D.Va's Nuclear Option
DVasNuclearOption_dva.description: Increase Self Destruct's detonation timer by 3 seconds. Detonation damage increased by 70%.  A new Mech can still be called after 4 seconds.

ProbiussNullGate_probius.name: Probius's Null Gate
ProbiussNullGate_probius.description: Vector Targeting Project a barrier of negative energy in the target direction that lasts 4 seconds. Enemies who touch the barrier take 68 (+4% per level) damage per second and are slowed by 80% for as long as they remain in contact with it.

TassadarsNullification_tassadar.name: Tassadar's Nullification
TassadarsNullification_tassadar.description: Activate to reduce the damage the target enemy Hero deals by 75% for 4 seconds.

JainasNumbingBlast_jaina.name: Jaina's Numbing Blast
JainasNumbingBlast_jaina.description: Cone of Cold Roots Chilled targets for 1 second.

ZagarasNydusNetwork_zagara.name: Zagara's Nydus Network
ZagarasNydusNetwork_zagara.description:
Summon a Nydus Worm on Creep anywhere that Zagara has vision. Zagara can enter a Nydus Worm and travel to any other Nydus Worm by right-clicking near it. While inside a Nydus Worm, Zagara regenerates 10% Health and Mana per second.  Stores up to 2 charges. Maximum of 4 Nydus Worms at a time. 
Passive: Creep spreads 15% farther.
Passive: While on Creep, each Basic Attack reduces all of Zagara's cooldowns by .4 seconds.

MurkysOctoGrab_murky.name: Murky's Octo-Grab
MurkysOctoGrab_murky.description: Murky summons an octopus to stun target enemy Hero for 3 seconds while he hits them for 1 damage a second.

LuciosOfftheWall_lucio.name: Lúcio's Off the Wall
LuciosOfftheWall_lucio.description: If Soundwave is cast while having Wall Ride's speed bonus, the cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds.

FenixsOffensiveCadence_fenix.name: Fenix's Offensive Cadence
FenixsOffensiveCadence_fenix.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack against Heroes while Repeater Cannon is active deals an additional 6% of the target's maximum Health as damage.

GallsOgreRampage_gall.name: Gall's Ogre Rampage
GallsOgreRampage_gall.description: Increase the damage of Ogre Rage by 75% faster for 5 seconds after Cho activates Ogre Hide.

BlazesOilDispersal_blaze.name: Blaze's Oil Dispersal
BlazesOilDispersal_blaze.description: Increase Oil Spill's area by 20%. Each Enemy Hero hit by Flame Stream reduces the cooldown of Oil Spill by 1 second and refunds 5 Mana.

TheLostVikingssOlaftheStout_thelostvikin.name: The Lost Vikings's Olaf the Stout
TheLostVikingssOlaftheStout_thelostvikin.description: Every 5 seconds, Olaf gains 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

KerrigansOmegastorm_kerrigan.name: Kerrigan's Omegastorm
KerrigansOmegastorm_kerrigan.description: Maelstrom's duration is increased by 0.25 seconds every time it damages a Hero.

LeoricsOminousWraith_leoric.name: Leoric's Ominous Wraith
LeoricsOminousWraith_leoric.description: Increase Wraith Walk's duration by 100%. Enemy Heroes that come in contact with the wraith deal 50% less damage for 4 seconds.

MalthaelsOnaPaleHorse_malthael.name: Malthael's On a Pale Horse
MalthaelsOnaPaleHorse_malthael.description: Gain an additional 20% Movement Speed while mounted.

AlexstraszasOnRubyWings_alexstrasza.name: Alexstrasza's On Ruby Wings
AlexstraszasOnRubyWings_alexstrasza.description: Healing or damaging Heroes 8 or more times with Cleansing Flame activates Dragonqueen for 15 seconds upon landing.

GreymanesOntheProwl_greymane.name: Greymane's On the Prowl
GreymanesOntheProwl_greymane.description: Inner Beast increases Movement Speed by 30% once it has been active for 3 seconds.

ChromiesOnceAgaintheFirstTime_chromie.name: Chromie's Once Again the First Time
ChromiesOnceAgaintheFirstTime_chromie.description: Quest: Hit 40 Heroes with Sand Blast. Reward: Increase the maximum number of active Echoes to 2.

StukovsOneGoodSpread_stukov.name: Stukov's One Good Spread...
StukovsOneGoodSpread_stukov.description: After a Healing Pathogen infests 3 targets, restore 10 Mana and reduce the cooldown of Healing Pathogen by 2 seconds.

NovasOneintheChamber_nova.name: Nova's One in the Chamber
NovasOneintheChamber_nova.description: After using an Ability, Nova's next Basic Attack within 3 seconds deals 60% additional damage.

SamurosOneWithTheWind_samuro.name: Samuro's One With The Wind
SamurosOneWithTheWind_samuro.description: While Samuro has Wind Walk and for 3 seconds after breaking it, both he and his Mirror Images gain 30 Armor, taking 30% reduced damage from all sources.

DehakasOneWhoCollects_dehaka.name: Dehaka's One-Who-Collects
DehakasOneWhoCollects_dehaka.description: Increases Essence collected from Minions by 50%.

GarroshsOppressor_garrosh.name: Garrosh's Oppressor
GarroshsOppressor_garrosh.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the target's Spell Power by 40% for 2.5 seconds.

SgtHammersOrbitalBFG_sgthammer.name: Sgt. Hammer's Orbital BFG
SgtHammersOrbitalBFG_sgthammer.description: Blunt Force Gun's missile orbits the planet every 5 seconds. Only the last missile fired orbits.

ArtanissOrbitalBombardment_artanis.name: Artanis's Orbital Bombardment
ArtanissOrbitalBombardment_artanis.description: Suppression Pulse gains an additional charge.  There is a 10 second cooldown between uses.

LeoricsOsseinRenewal_leoric.name: Leoric's Ossein Renewal
LeoricsOsseinRenewal_leoric.description: Activate to heal Leoric for 30% of his maximum Health over 5 seconds. Regeneration Globes lower the cooldown of this Ability by 20 seconds.

AnasOverdose_ana.name: Ana's Overdose
AnasOverdose_ana.description: Hitting enemies with Sleep Dart applies 4 Doses. While Aim Down Sights is active, Sleep Dart now pierces all enemy Heroes.

TyrandesOverflowingLight_tyrande.name: Tyrande's Overflowing Light
TyrandesOverflowingLight_tyrande.description: While Tyrande is above 60% Health, Light of Elune's healing is increased by 30%.

VariansOverpower_varian.name: Varian's Overpower
VariansOverpower_varian.description: When Parry blocks a Hero's Basic Attack, Heroic Strike's cooldown is refreshed and the next one does 30% more damage.

DiablosOverpoweringNightmare_diablo.name: Diablo's Overpowering Nightmare
DiablosOverpoweringNightmare_diablo.description: Gain 2 additional charges of Overpower, with a 2 second cooldown between uses.

AlexstraszasOverprotective_alexstrasza.name: Alexstrasza's Overprotective
AlexstraszasOverprotective_alexstrasza.description: Heroes healed by Abundance gain a Shield for 3 seconds equal to 60% of the amount healed.

SylvanassOverwhelmingAffliction_sylvanas.name: Sylvanas's Overwhelming Affliction
SylvanassOverwhelmingAffliction_sylvanas.description: Enemy Heroes with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse are Slowed by 15%. Sylvanas' Basic Attacks against Slowed enemy Heroes deal 1% of their maximum Health as damage.

AlexstraszasPacify_alexstrasza.name: Alexstrasza's Pacify
AlexstraszasPacify_alexstrasza.description: Activate to Slow and reduce an enemy Hero's damage by 50% for 3 seconds.  Healing a Stunned, Silenced, or Rooted ally reduces Pacify's cooldown by 30 seconds.

TheLostVikingssPainDontHurt_thelostvikin.name: The Lost Vikings's Pain Don't Hurt
TheLostVikingssPainDontHurt_thelostvikin.description: Baleog's Basic Attacks and splash damage heal for 20% of the damage dealt. Healing is doubled against Heroes.

ZaryasPainisTemporary_zarya.name: Zarya's Pain is Temporary
ZaryasPainisTemporary_zarya.description: Activate to consume all Energy and gain a shield that absorbs 0.5% of Zarya's maximum Health per Energy consumed and lasts for 3 seconds. Zarya may only have one personal shield active on herself at a time.

KerrigansPainfulSpikes_kerrigan.name: Kerrigan's Painful Spikes
KerrigansPainfulSpikes_kerrigan.description: Enemies hit by Impaling Blades take an additional 70 damage the next 6 times Kerrigan damages them within 5 seconds.

RaynorsPaintThemRed_raynor.name: Raynor's Paint Them Red
RaynorsPaintThemRed_raynor.description: Increase the damage of Penetrating Round by 50% and heal for 90% of the damage it deals to Heroes.

NazeebosPandemic_nazeebo.name: Nazeebo's Pandemic
NazeebosPandemic_nazeebo.description: Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes with Plague of Toads, it spawns 2 additional toads.

DehakasParalyzingEnzymes_dehaka.name: Dehaka's Paralyzing Enzymes
DehakasParalyzingEnzymes_dehaka.description: Drag slows enemies by 50% for 2 seconds after it ends.

LeoricsParalyzingRage_leoric.name: Leoric's Paralyzing Rage
LeoricsParalyzingRage_leoric.description: Increase the Slow of Skeletal Swing by 20%.

ProbiussParticleAccelerator_probius.name: Probius's Particle Accelerator
ProbiussParticleAccelerator_probius.description: Disruption Pulse deals 10% more damage for each enemy or Warp Rift hit, up to 50%.

TracersPartingGift_tracer.name: Tracer's Parting Gift
TracersPartingGift_tracer.description: Recall leaves behind 3 bombs that deal 240 (+4% per level) damage each to different targets.

LuciosPartyMix_lucio.name: Lúcio's Party Mix
LuciosPartyMix_lucio.description: Quest: Play Lúcio's Crossfade tracks to nearby Allies for a total of 8 minutes. Multiple Allies provide additional time. Reward: Permanently increase Crossfade's range by 20%.

StitchessPatchworkCreation_stitches.name: Stitches's Patchwork Creation
StitchessPatchworkCreation_stitches.description: Increase regeneration effects and all healing received by 15%. Whenever a nearby enemy Minion dies, restore 30 Health. Takedowns restore 240 Health.

ImperiussPatheticMortals_imperius.name: Imperius's Pathetic Mortals
ImperiussPatheticMortals_imperius.description: Stunning enemy Heroes with Celestial Charge reduces their damage by 35% for 4 seconds.

GenjisPathfinder_genji.name: Genji's Pathfinder
GenjisPathfinder_genji.description: Jumping over terrain with Cyber Agility increases Genji's Movement Speed by 25% for 6 seconds.

KharazimsPeacefulRepose_kharazim.name: Kharazim's Peaceful Repose
KharazimsPeacefulRepose_kharazim.description: Divine Palm's cooldown is set to 5 seconds if the Hero does not die.

BrightwingsPeekaboo_brightwing.name: Brightwing's Peekaboo!
BrightwingsPeekaboo_brightwing.description: Phase Shifting to an ally grants both Brightwing and her target a 335 point Shield and reveals a large area around them for 5 seconds.

CassiasPenetrate_cassia.name: Cassia's Penetrate
CassiasPenetrate_cassia.description: Enemies take 3% increased damage from Fend each consecutive hit.

HanzosPerfectAgility_hanzo.name: Hanzo's Perfect Agility
HanzosPerfectAgility_hanzo.description: Natural Agility gains a 2nd charge and its cooldown by reduced by 10 seconds.

GreymanesPerfectAim_greymane.name: Greymane's Perfect Aim
GreymanesPerfectAim_greymane.description: Increases Gilnean Cocktail's range by 30% and refunds 45 Mana if it hits an enemy Hero.

GenjisPerfectDefense_genji.name: Genji's Perfect Defense
GenjisPerfectDefense_genji.description: Deflected damage reduces the cooldown of Deflect by 2 seconds, up to a maximum of 10 seconds.

DeckardsPerfectGems_deckard.name: Deckard's Perfect Gems
DeckardsPerfectGems_deckard.description: Reduce the cooldown of all Gems by 25 seconds and the cooldown of Horadric Cube by 6 seconds.

NovasPerfectShot_nova.name: Nova's Perfect Shot
NovasPerfectShot_nova.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Snipe reduces the cooldown by 4 seconds and refunds its mana cost.

MuradinsPerfectStorm_muradin.name: Muradin's Perfect Storm
MuradinsPerfectStorm_muradin.description: Quest: Every time Storm Bolt hits a Hero, increase its damage by 5.

DVasPewPewPew_dva.name: D.Va's Pew! Pew! Pew!
DVasPewPewPew_dva.description: Instead of a single shot, Big Shot fires 3 shots over 0.5 seconds. Each shot deals 50% damage.

SamurosPhantomPain_samuro.name: Samuro's Phantom Pain
SamurosPhantomPain_samuro.description: Samuro's Critical Strikes deal an additional 45% of his Basic Attack damage for each Mirror Image that is active.

ArtanissPhaseBulwark_artanis.name: Artanis's Phase Bulwark
ArtanissPhaseBulwark_artanis.description: Shield Overload grants 50 Spell Armor while active and for 2 seconds after it expires.

TassadarsPhaseDisruption_tassadar.name: Tassadar's Phase Disruption
TassadarsPhaseDisruption_tassadar.description: Enemy Heroes being hit by Psionic Storm have their Physical Armor reduced by 25, causing them to take 25% more damage from Basic Attacks.

BrightwingsPhaseOut_brightwing.name: Brightwing's Phase Out
BrightwingsPhaseOut_brightwing.description: Activate to place Brightwing in Stasis for 0.75 seconds.

KaelthassPhoenix_kaelthas.name: Kael'thas's Phoenix
KaelthassPhoenix_kaelthas.description: Launch a Phoenix to an area, dealing 78 (+4% per level) damage to enemies along the way. The Phoenix persists for 7 seconds, attacking enemies for 78 (+4% per level) damage and splashing for 50%.

ProbiussPhotonBarrier_probius.name: Probius's Photon Barrier
ProbiussPhotonBarrier_probius.description: While a Photon Cannon is alive and powered, Probius gains 30 Spell Armor.

FenixsPhotonicWeaponry_fenix.name: Fenix's Photonic Weaponry
FenixsPhotonicWeaponry_fenix.description: Fenix deals 15% more damage while he has a Shield from Shield Capacitor.

KelThuzadsPhylacteryofKelThuzad_kelthuza.name: Kel'Thuzad's Phylactery of Kel'Thuzad
KelThuzadsPhylacteryofKelThuzad_kelthuza.description: Quest: Collect 12 Regeneration Globes to charge Kel'Thuzad's Phylactery. Reward: Kel'Thuzad's Phylactery can be activated while dead to immediately respawn at the Hall of Storms, but must be charged again.  Passive: Kel'Thuzad heals for 10% of all Spell Damage dealt while the Phylactery is charged.

LtMoralessPhysicalTherapy_ltmorales.name: Lt. Morales's Physical Therapy
LtMoralessPhysicalTherapy_ltmorales.description: Safeguard removes all Slows from its target and its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.

LiLisPickMeUp_lili.name: Li Li's Pick Me Up
LiLisPickMeUp_lili.description: Healing Brew's healing for Heroes is increased by 33% (+4% per level) if they are under 50% Health.

CassiasPierce_cassia.name: Cassia's Pierce
CassiasPierce_cassia.description: The primary missile of Lightning Fury now pierces, but splits only when hitting Heroes.

HanzosPiercingArrows_hanzo.name: Hanzo's Piercing Arrows
HanzosPiercingArrows_hanzo.description: Storm Bow and Scatter Arrow pierce, hitting an additional enemy. Additionally, Scatter Arrow can pierce through 1 enemy each time it ricochets.

MuradinsPiercingBolt_muradin.name: Muradin's Piercing Bolt
MuradinsPiercingBolt_muradin.description: Penetrates through the first target hit, hitting 1 additional target.

AurielsPiercingLash_auriel.name: Auriel's Piercing Lash
AurielsPiercingLash_auriel.description: Detainment Strike now pierces and hits all enemy Heroes in a line, reducing the cooldown by 2 seconds for each Hero hit.

ChromiesPiercingSands_chromie.name: Chromie's Piercing Sands
ChromiesPiercingSands_chromie.description: Sand Blast will now hit all Heroes in its path. Additional hits do not grant bonus damage or Quest progress.

MaievsPinDown_maiev.name: Maiev's Pin Down
MaievsPinDown_maiev.description: Quest: Hit 3 enemy Heroes with a single Fan of Knives. Reward: Increase Fan of Knives damage by 25%. Reward: Each additional time 3 enemy Heroes are hit by a single Fan of Knives, gain an additional 5% damage, up to 30%. Reward: Hit 4 enemy Heroes with a single Fan of Knives to instantly gain all Rewards.

PinballWizard_etc.name: Pinball Wizard
PinballWizard_etc.description: Face Melt does 300% more damage to enemies recently affected by Powerslide.

ZaryasPinpointAccuracy_zarya.name: Zarya's Pinpoint Accuracy
ZaryasPinpointAccuracy_zarya.description: Particle Grenade deals 40% more damage to enemies hit by the center of the blast.

WhitemanesPitytheFrail_whitemane.name: Whitemane's Pity the Frail
WhitemanesPitytheFrail_whitemane.description: Allies below 50% Health receive 25% more healing from Zeal.

BrightwingsPixieBoost_brightwing.name: Brightwing's Pixie Boost
BrightwingsPixieBoost_brightwing.description: Pixie Dust gives 40% bonus Move Speed, decaying to 20% over 3 seconds.

BrightwingsPixieCharm_brightwing.name: Brightwing's Pixie Charm
BrightwingsPixieCharm_brightwing.description: Activate to consume 20 stacks of Bribe to instantly defeat an uncaptured Mercenary.  Passive: Gain 1 stack of Bribe when a nearby enemy Minion dies, and 5 stacks when hitting an enemy Hero with Arcane Flare's center. Maximum 80 stacks.

BrightwingsPixiePower_brightwing.name: Brightwing's Pixie Power
BrightwingsPixiePower_brightwing.description: Reduce the cooldown of Pixie Dust by 3 seconds and increase the Spell Armor granted by 25.

MalGanissPlagueBats_malganis.name: Mal'Ganis's Plague Bats
MalGanissPlagueBats_malganis.description: Necrotic Embrace unleashes a wave of bats in front of Mal'Ganis, dealing 81 damage.

FenixsPlanetCracker_fenix.name: Fenix's Planet Cracker
FenixsPlanetCracker_fenix.description: After 0.5 seconds, Channel a powerful beam that spans across the battleground for 4 seconds, dealing 105 damage every 0.25 seconds to non-Structure enemies hit.

ArtanissPlasmaBurn_artanis.name: Artanis's Plasma Burn
ArtanissPlasmaBurn_artanis.description: While Shield Overload is active, deal 70 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.

ZaryasPlasmaShock_zarya.name: Zarya's Plasma Shock
ZaryasPlasmaShock_zarya.description: Particle Grenade slows Movement Speed by 35% for 2 seconds to enemies near the center.

CassiasPlateoftheWhale_cassia.name: Cassia's Plate of the Whale
CassiasPlateoftheWhale_cassia.description: Regenerate 5 Health per second while Avoidance is active. Quest: For every 5 Basic Attacks absorbed with Avoidance, it regenerates an additional 1 Health per second. Reward: After absorbing 75 Basic Attacks, increase Cassia's maximum Health by 10%.

TheLostVikingssPlayAgain_thelostvikings.name: The Lost Vikings's Play Again!
TheLostVikingssPlayAgain_thelostvikings.description: Summon, fully heal, and revive all Lost Vikings at target location after a Viking channels for 2 seconds.  Only one Viking may attempt to summon at a time.

HanzosPlayoftheGame_hanzo.name: Hanzo's Play of the Game
HanzosPlayoftheGame_hanzo.description: While in flight or for up to 2 seconds after impacting a target, Dragon's Arrow can be reactivated to teleport to its location and jump backwards. If used after impact, Hanzo shoots arrows that deal 137 damage to each target hit by the impact.  Hanzo is Unstoppable during Play of the Game.

StitchessPlaytime_stitches.name: Stitches's Playtime!
StitchessPlaytime_stitches.description: Heroes hit by Slam reduce the cooldowns of Stitches's other Basic Abilities by 0.5 seconds, increased to 2 seconds for Heroes that are hit by its inner impact area.

ChromiesPocketofTime_chromie.name: Chromie's Pocket of Time
ChromiesPocketofTime_chromie.description: Remove Slowing Sands Mana cost and increase the Slow from 60% to 80%.

XulsPoisonNova_xul.name: Xul's Poison Nova
XulsPoisonNova_xul.description: After 0.5 seconds, release poisonous missiles that deal 570 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies hit over 10 seconds.

SonyasPoisonedSpear_sonya.name: Sonya's Poisoned Spear
SonyasPoisonedSpear_sonya.description: Ancient Spear deals an additional 100% damage over 6 seconds.

MedivhsPolyBomb_medivh.name: Medivh's Poly Bomb
MedivhsPolyBomb_medivh.description: Polymorph an enemy Hero, suppressing their attacks and Silencing them for 2 seconds. On expiration, Poly Bomb spreads to other nearby enemy Heroes.

StukovsPoppinPustules_stukov.name: Stukov's Poppin' Pustules
StukovsPoppinPustules_stukov.description: Detonating Weighted Pustule with Bio-Kill Switch within 1.5 seconds of its expiration increases its damage by 150% and applies its damage and Slow in an area. Enemy Heroes hit have a Weighted Pustule applied to them.

MedivhsPortalMastery_medivh.name: Medivh's Portal Mastery
MedivhsPortalMastery_medivh.description: Medivh can manually place both Portal locations and it no longer breaks Raven Form.  Activate Medivh's Trait to cancel an unlinked Portal.

SylvanassPossession_sylvanas.name: Sylvanas's Possession
SylvanassPossession_sylvanas.description: Activate to force an enemy Minion to fight for Sylvanas's team. Catapults require 3 charges. Stores up to 3 charges.

StitchessPotentBile_stitches.name: Stitches's Potent Bile
StitchessPotentBile_stitches.description: Putrid Bile lasts 6 seconds longer and its slow amount is increased from 35% to 45%.

DeckardsPotionofRevival_deckard.name: Deckard's Potion of Revival
DeckardsPotionofRevival_deckard.description: When a Healing Potion is picked up, it also heals all nearby allied Heroes for 50% of the healing amount.

DeckardsPotionofShielding_deckard.name: Deckard's Potion of Shielding
DeckardsPotionofShielding_deckard.description: Whenever an ally is healed by a Healing Potion, they gain a 122 Shield for 6 seconds.

LiMingsPowerHungry_liming.name: Li-Ming's Power Hungry
LiMingsPowerHungry_liming.description: Regeneration Globes restore 100% more Mana and grant 10% Spell Power for 20 seconds.

KelThuzadsPowerofIcecrown_kelthuzad.name: Kel'Thuzad's Power of Icecrown
KelThuzadsPowerofIcecrown_kelthuzad.description: Stunning, Rooting, or Slowing a Hero grants 6% Spell Power for 10 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.

ProbiussPowerOverflowing_probius.name: Probius's Power Overflowing
ProbiussPowerOverflowing_probius.description: Pylon's Power Field grants allied Heroes 10% increased Spell Power and 2 Mana per second.

ChosPowerSurge_cho.name: Cho's Power Surge
ChosPowerSurge_cho.description: Each Hero hit by Surging Fist reduces its cooldown by 5 seconds.

AnduinsPowerWordShield_anduin.name: Anduin's Power Word: Shield
AnduinsPowerWordShield_anduin.description: If Divine Star his an enemy Hero, gain a Shield that absorbs 172 damage for 4 seconds.

StukovsPoxPopuli_stukov.name: Stukov's Pox Populi
StukovsPoxPopuli_stukov.description: Bio-Kill Switch no longer removes Healing Pathogen but instead sets its duration to 3 seconds.

NovasPrecisionBarrage_nova.name: Nova's Precision Barrage
NovasPrecisionBarrage_nova.description: Precision Strike gains a 2nd charge and its cooldown is reduced by 30 seconds.

NovasPrecisionStrike_nova.name: Nova's Precision Strike
NovasPrecisionStrike_nova.description: After a 1.5 second delay, deals 456 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within an area. Unlimited range.

KaelthassPresenceOfMind_kaelthas.name: Kael'thas's Presence Of Mind
KaelthassPresenceOfMind_kaelthas.description: Increases Pyroblast's explosion radius by 50%. Heroes that are hit by Flamestrike or have Living Bomb spread to them reduce the cooldown of Pyroblast by 10 seconds.

ImperiussPressForward_imperius.name: Imperius's Press Forward
ImperiussPressForward_imperius.description: Damaging an enemy Hero sets the duration of an active Regeneration Globe on Imperius to 8 seconds (unless it is already higher).

TychussPresstheAdvantage_tychus.name: Tychus's Press the Advantage
TychussPresstheAdvantage_tychus.description: Run and Gun increases Tychus's Basic Attack range by 1.5 for 3 seconds.

SamurosPresstheAttack_samuro.name: Samuro's Press the Attack
SamurosPresstheAttack_samuro.description: While Advancing Strikes is active, Samuro and his Mirror Images gain 10% Attack Speed every time they Basic Attack, up to 40%.

ChensPressurePoint_chen.name: Chen's Pressure Point
ChensPressurePoint_chen.description: Flying Kick slows the target enemy by 35% for 1 second, or by 70% if Chen has Shields from Fortifying Brew.

AbathursPressurizedGlands_abathur.name: Abathur's Pressurized Glands
AbathursPressurizedGlands_abathur.description: Increases the range of Symbiote's Spike Burst by 25% and decreases the cooldown by 1 second.

AzmodansPride_azmodan.name: Azmodan's Pride
AzmodansPride_azmodan.description: After gaining 400 Annihilation, the area of Globe of Annihilation is increased by 15% and it deals 100 additional damage.

RexxarsPrimalIntimidation_rexxar.name: Rexxar's Primal Intimidation
RexxarsPrimalIntimidation_rexxar.description: Activate to slow the Attack Speed by 50% and Movement Speed by 20% of nearby Heroes and Summons near Rexxar and Misha for 2.5 seconds.  Passive: Heroes and Summons that attack Rexxar or Misha have their Attack Speed slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

DehakasPrimalRage_dehaka.name: Dehaka's Primal Rage
DehakasPrimalRage_dehaka.description: Gain 1% increased Attack Damage per Essence stored.

DehakasPrimalSwarm_dehaka.name: Dehaka's Primal Swarm
DehakasPrimalSwarm_dehaka.description: Dark Swarm causes enemies hit to lose 10 Armor for 0.75 seconds, causing them to take 10% extra damage.

TassadarsPrismaticLink_tassadar.name: Tassadar's Prismatic Link
TassadarsPrismaticLink_tassadar.description: Basic Attacks bounce to hit 2 additional targets for 40% damage.

DVasProMoves_dva.name: D.Va's Pro Moves
DVasProMoves_dva.description: D.Va's Mech gains 2% Movement Speed for 1.5 seconds every time it takes damage, up to 30%.

ProbiussProbiusLoop_probius.name: Probius's Probius Loop
ProbiussProbiusLoop_probius.description: Whenever a Rift explosion hits 1 or more enemy Heroes, create a new Warp Rift in the same location.

ProgRock_etc.name: Prog Rock
ProgRock_etc.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe permanently increases the healing per second of Guitar Solo by 5, to a maximum of 100 Reward: After gathering 20 Regeneration Globes, Guitar Solo also heals nearby allied Heroes for 50 (+4% per level) Health every second while it is active.

AbathursProlificDispersal_abathur.name: Abathur's Prolific Dispersal
AbathursProlificDispersal_abathur.description: Increases the range of Toxic Nest by 30%, reduce its cooldown by 2 seconds, and add 2 additional charges.

ZagarasProtectiveCoating_zagara.name: Zagara's Protective Coating
ZagarasProtectiveCoating_zagara.description: While on Creep, Zagara gains 20 Armor, taking 20% less damage.

TassadarsPsiInfusion_tassadar.name: Tassadar's Psi-Infusion
TassadarsPsiInfusion_tassadar.description: Quest: Gain 1 Mana for every non-Structure enemy hit by Psionic Storm. Reward: After hitting 500 enemies, increase the size of Psionic Storm by 20%. Reward: After hitting 1000 enemies, increase the damage of Psionic Storm by 20%

KerrigansPsionicBarrier_kerrigan.name: Kerrigan's Psionic Barrier
KerrigansPsionicBarrier_kerrigan.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Primal Grasp grants 20 Spell Armor for 4 seconds.

TassadarsPsionicEcho_tassadar.name: Tassadar's Psionic Echo
TassadarsPsionicEcho_tassadar.description: A second Psionic Storm can be cast within 2 seconds of casting the first. Enemies can only be affected by one Psionic Storm at a time.

NovasPsionicEfficiency_nova.name: Nova's Psionic Efficiency
NovasPsionicEfficiency_nova.description: Snipe's range is increased by 15%, and hitting a Hero grants an additional stack of Precision Sniper.

TassadarsPsionicProjection_tassadar.name: Tassadar's Psionic Projection
TassadarsPsionicProjection_tassadar.description: Increases the cast range of Plasma Shield and Psionic Storm by 40%.

KerrigansPsionicPulse_kerrigan.name: Kerrigan's Psionic Pulse
KerrigansPsionicPulse_kerrigan.description: Primal Grasp explodes a second time 2.5 seconds after its first explosion.

KerrigansPsionicShift_kerrigan.name: Kerrigan's Psionic Shift
KerrigansPsionicShift_kerrigan.description: Activate to teleport to a nearby location, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies. Generates 300% increased Assimilation Shields from the damage dealt.

ZeratulsPsionicStrength_zeratul.name: Zeratul's Psionic Strength
ZeratulsPsionicStrength_zeratul.description: Dealing damage to enemy Heroes increases all damage dealt by 6% for 3 seconds, stacking up to 30%.

ArtanissPsionicSynergy_artanis.name: Artanis's Psionic Synergy
ArtanissPsionicSynergy_artanis.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Phase Prism grants 30 Armor for 3 seconds.

GallsPsychoticBreak_gall.name: Gall's Psychotic Break
GallsPsychoticBreak_gall.description: Upon dying, Gall gains Ogre Rage and can use Abilities for 10 seconds.

JunkratsPuckishScamp_junkrat.name: Junkrat's Puckish Scamp
JunkratsPuckishScamp_junkrat.description: Reduce Rocket Ride's cooldown by 45 seconds and increase its damage by 15%.

SgtHammersPulseDetonationCore_sgthammer.name: Sgt. Hammer's Pulse Detonation Core
SgtHammersPulseDetonationCore_sgthammer.description: Spider Mines detonate 3 times over 3 seconds.

TracersPulseRounds_tracer.name: Tracer's Pulse Rounds
TracersPulseRounds_tracer.description: Increases Pulse Bomb's range and charge rate from Basic Attacks against Heroes by 100%.

TracersPulseStrike_tracer.name: Tracer's Pulse Strike
TracersPulseStrike_tracer.description: Increases Melee's Pulse Bomb charge from 10% to 20% against Heroes.

QhirasPulsingPain_qhira.name: Qhira's Pulsing Pain
QhirasPulsingPain_qhira.description: Each additional enemy Hero hit by Revolving Sweep causes the primary target to take an additional 120 damage.

StitchessPulverize_stitches.name: Stitches's Pulverize
StitchessPulverize_stitches.description: All enemies hit by Slam are Slowed by 75% for 0.75 seconds.

VallasPuncturingArrow_valla.name: Valla's Puncturing Arrow
VallasPuncturingArrow_valla.description: Quest: Hitting an enemy Hero with the initial impact of Hungering Arrow increases its damage by 5, up to a maximum of 100. Reward: After gaining 100 bonus damage, gain an additional 75 bonus damage and Hungering Arrow also bounces 1 additional time.

VallasPunishment_valla.name: Valla's Punishment
VallasPunishment_valla.description: Each stack of Hatred increases the damage of Multishot by 4%.

AlaraksPureMalice_alarak.name: Alarak's Pure Malice
AlaraksPureMalice_alarak.description: Increase Sadism by 10% any time an allied Hero dies, up to 40%.  Sadism gained from Pure Malice is lost on death.

TyraelsPurgeEvil_tyrael.name: Tyrael's Purge Evil
TyraelsPurgeEvil_tyrael.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Smite increases Tyrael's Basic Attack damage by 55% for 4 seconds.

WhitemanesPurgetheWicked_whitemane.name: Whitemane's Purge the Wicked
WhitemanesPurgetheWicked_whitemane.description: Activate to blast an enemy Hero with holy fire, reducing their Armor by 25 and dealing 300 damage over 4 seconds.

FenixsPurificationSalvo_fenix.name: Fenix's Purification Salvo
FenixsPurificationSalvo_fenix.description: Channel for 1.5 seconds, sweeping a laser in front of Fenix that locks onto enemy Heroes. Once Channeling finishes, fire 5 missiles at each locked Hero, dealing 79 damage each. Deals 50% increased damage to Slowed targets.

ArtanissPurifierBeam_artanis.name: Artanis's Purifier Beam
ArtanissPurifierBeam_artanis.description: Target an enemy Hero with an orbital beam from the Spear of Adun, dealing 184 (+4% per level) damage per second for 8 seconds. The beam will chase the target as they move.  Unlimited range.

ChensPurifyingBrew_chen.name: Chen's Purifying Brew
ChensPurifyingBrew_chen.description: Casting Fortifying Brew grants Chen Unstoppable for 1.5 seconds.

AnasPurifyingDarts_ana.name: Ana's Purifying Darts
AnasPurifyingDarts_ana.description: Healing Dart removes Roots and Slows from the target, and heals for 20% more when doing so.

AnduinsPursuedbyGrace_anduin.name: Anduin's Pursued by Grace
AnduinsPursuedbyGrace_anduin.description: Damaging an enemy Hero heals the lowest Health allied Hero near Anduin for 33.

GuldansPursuitofFlame_guldan.name: Gul'dan's Pursuit of Flame
GuldansPursuitofFlame_guldan.description: Quest: Hit 30 enemy Heroes with Fel Flame. Reward: Fel Flame's radius is increased by 10%.

UthersPursuitofJustice_uther.name: Uther's Pursuit of Justice
UthersPursuitofJustice_uther.description: Hammer of Justice increases Uther's Movement Speed by 25% for 3 seconds.

PursuitofVengeance_maiev.name: Pursuit of Vengeance
PursuitofVengeance_maiev.description: Each Hero tethered by Umbral Bind reduces the cooldown of Spirit of Vengeance by 2.5 seconds.

StukovsPushComesToShove_stukov.name: Stukov's Push Comes To Shove
StukovsPushComesToShove_stukov.description: Massive Shove slows its target by 50% for 4 seconds upon colliding with terrain. If Massive Shove pushes a target for more than 1.25 seconds, its cooldown is reduced by 15 seconds.

AnduinsPushForward_anduin.name: Anduin's Push Forward!
AnduinsPushForward_anduin.description: Damaging an enemy Hero grants 2.5% Movement Speed for 6 seconds, up to 20%.

JunkratsPutSomeEnglishOnIt_junkrat.name: Junkrat's Put Some English On It
JunkratsPutSomeEnglishOnIt_junkrat.description: Increase Frag Launcher's travel distance by 50%, but does not increase its speed.

StitchessPutridBile_stitches.name: Stitches's Putrid Bile
StitchessPutridBile_stitches.description: Emit bile that deals 37 (+4% per level) damage per second to enemies within, slowing them by 35%. Stitches gains 20% Movement Speed while emitting bile. Lasts 8 seconds.

ProbiussPylonOvercharge_probius.name: Probius's Pylon Overcharge
ProbiussPylonOvercharge_probius.description: Increase the size of Pylon power fields and allow them to attack enemies within it for 96 (+4% per level) damage per second. Lasts 10 seconds.

KaelthassPyroblast_kaelthas.name: Kael'thas's Pyroblast
KaelthassPyroblast_kaelthas.description: After 1.5 seconds, cast a slow-moving fireball that deals 810 (+5% per level) damage to an enemy Hero and 405 (+5% per level) damage to enemies nearby.

KaelthassPyromaniac_kaelthas.name: Kael'thas's Pyromaniac
KaelthassPyromaniac_kaelthas.description: Each time Living Bomb deals periodic damage, Kael'thas's Basic Ability cooldowns are reduced by 0.5 second.

ProbiussQuantumEntanglement_probius.name: Probius's Quantum Entanglement
ProbiussQuantumEntanglement_probius.description: Enemies continue to be slowed for 3 seconds after their last contact with a Warp Rift.

ChromiesQuantumOverdrive_chromie.name: Chromie's Quantum Overdrive
ChromiesQuantumOverdrive_chromie.description: Activate to increase Spell Power by 25% for 8 seconds. Hitting an Enemy Hero with Sand Blast reduces this cooldown by 3 seconds.

TracersQuantumSpike_tracer.name: Tracer's Quantum Spike
TracersQuantumSpike_tracer.description: Pulse Bomb deals an additional 7% of the primary target's maximum Health.

TychussQuarterback_tychus.name: Tychus's Quarterback
TychussQuarterback_tychus.description: Increases the range of Frag Grenade by 50%.

KerrigansQueenofBlades_kerrigan.name: Kerrigan's Queen of Blades
KerrigansQueenofBlades_kerrigan.description: Damaging a Hero with Primal Grasp reduces Ravage's cooldown by 6 seconds.

TyrandesQuickeningBlessing_tyrande.name: Tyrande's Quickening Blessing
TyrandesQuickeningBlessing_tyrande.description: Gain 5% Movement Speed. Light of Elune increases the target's Movement Speed by 15% for 3 seconds.

KharazimsQuicksilver_kharazim.name: Kharazim's Quicksilver
KharazimsQuicksilver_kharazim.description: Radiant Dashing to an ally gives Kharazim and the target 30% bonus Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

GreymanesQuicksilverBullets_greymane.name: Greymane's Quicksilver Bullets
GreymanesQuicksilverBullets_greymane.description: Increases Greymane's Human Basic Attack range by 1.1.

WhitemanesRadiance_whitemane.name: Whitemane's Radiance
WhitemanesRadiance_whitemane.description: Upon reaching 3 stacks of Desperation, all allies with Zeal are healed for 175.

JohannasRadiatingFaith_johanna.name: Johanna's Radiating Faith
JohannasRadiatingFaith_johanna.description: Increase the number of enemies hit by Blessed Shield by 2. Its Stun duration is increased to 2 seconds and all targets hit are Stunned for the maximum duration.

TheLostVikingssRagnaroknRoll_thelostviki.name: The Lost Vikings's Ragnarok 'n' Roll!
TheLostVikingssRagnaroknRoll_thelostviki.description: The Longboat can attack two targets at once and the range of its Mortar is increased by 100%.

GuldansRainofDestruction_guldan.name: Gul'dan's Rain of Destruction
GuldansRainofDestruction_guldan.description: After 1.5 seconds, summon a rain of meteors in an area for 7 seconds. Each meteor deals 165 (+4% per level) damage in a small area.

VallasRainofVengeance_valla.name: Valla's Rain of Vengeance
VallasRainofVengeance_valla.description: Launch a wave of Shadow Beasts that deals 250 (+4% per level) damage and stuns enemies in the target area for 0.5 seconds.  Stores up to 2 charges.

RaynorsRallyingCry_raynor.name: Raynor's Rallying Cry
RaynorsRallyingCry_raynor.description: Increase the duration of Inspire by 1 second. Casting Inspire grants nearby allied Heroes 10% Movement and Attack Speed for its duration.

SonyasRampage_sonya.name: Sonya's Rampage
SonyasRampage_sonya.description: Increase Basic Attack damage by 25%. Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Ancient Spear by 0.5 seconds.

GuldansRampantHellfire_guldan.name: Gul'dan's Rampant Hellfire
GuldansRampantHellfire_guldan.description: Fel Flame's damage is increased by 10% for 5 seconds when hitting an enemy Hero. This can stack up to 5 times.

VallasRancor_valla.name: Valla's Rancor
VallasRancor_valla.description: Each stack of Hatred also increases Attack Speed by 2%. While at 10 stacks of Hatred, gain an additional 30% Attack Speed.

TyrandesRanger_tyrande.name: Tyrande's Ranger
TyrandesRanger_tyrande.description: Activate to make the next Sentinel pierce through all Heroes hit.  Passive: Sentinel's width is increased by 25% and deals up to 250% more damage based on distance traveled.

TyrandesRangersMark_tyrande.name: Tyrande's Ranger's Mark
TyrandesRangersMark_tyrande.description: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Hunter's Mark by 1 second. Basic Attacks against marked targets increase the duration of Hunter's Mark by "0.5 second.

IllidansRapidChase_illidan.name: Illidan's Rapid Chase
IllidansRapidChase_illidan.description: Dive grants 20% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

XulsRapidHarvest_xul.name: Xul's Rapid Harvest
XulsRapidHarvest_xul.description: Gain 5% Attack Speed for 3 seconds each time Cursed Strikes hits an enemy, up to 75%.

NovasRapidProjection_nova.name: Nova's Rapid Projection
NovasRapidProjection_nova.description: Reduces Holo Decoy's cooldown and Mana cost by 50%.

FenixsRapidRecharge_fenix.name: Fenix's Rapid Recharge
FenixsRapidRecharge_fenix.description: Whenever Fenix is healed, Shield Capacitor's Shield recharges for 60% of the healing received.

MedivhsRavenFamiliar_medivh.name: Medivh's Raven Familiar
MedivhsRavenFamiliar_medivh.description: A Raven Familiar joins allies each time they use a Portal. The Raven will dive at the ally's next Basic Attack against a Hero within 5 seconds, dealing 114 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing them by 30% for 2.5 seconds.

MedivhsRavensIntellect_medivh.name: Medivh's Raven's Intellect
MedivhsRavensIntellect_medivh.description: Raven Form increases Medivh's Mana and Health Regeneration by 75%.

OrpheasRavenousHunger_orphea.name: Orphea's Ravenous Hunger
OrpheasRavenousHunger_orphea.description: Quest: Minions that die within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Chomp permanently increase its damage by 2 and heal Orphea for 60.  Heroes that die increase its damage by 40 and heal Orphea for 25% of her maximum Health.

NazeebosRavenousSpirit_nazeebo.name: Nazeebo's Ravenous Spirit
NazeebosRavenousSpirit_nazeebo.description: Channel a Ravenous Spirit that deals 207 (+4% per level) damage per second. Cannot move while channeling. Lasts for 8 seconds.

RaynorsRaynorsRaider_raynor.name: Raynor's Raynor's Raider
RaynorsRaynorsRaider_raynor.description: Summon a Banshee that assists Raynor. The Banshee deals 84 damage per second and regenerates 75 Health per second if it hasn't taken damage in the last 4 seconds. Can reactivate to retarget or move the Banshee.  The Banshee respawns automatically after 45 seconds.

MedivhsReabsorption_medivh.name: Medivh's Reabsorption
MedivhsReabsorption_medivh.description: Increase the amount of healing from Force of Will to 70% of the damage it absorbed.

StukovsReactiveBallistospores_stukov.name: Stukov's Reactive Ballistospores
StukovsReactiveBallistospores_stukov.description: When taking damage below 50% Health, instantly spread a Weighted Pustule to all nearby enemy Heroes and reset the cooldown of Bio-Kill Switch.  This effect has a 15 second cooldown.

ArtanissReactiveParry_artanis.name: Artanis's Reactive Parry
ArtanissReactiveParry_artanis.description: Using Twin Blades grants 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing its damage by 75%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

MalthaelsReaperofSouls_malthael.name: Malthael's Reaper of Souls
MalthaelsReaperofSouls_malthael.description: Increase Tormented Souls' duration by 2 seconds. While Tormented Souls is active, Hero Takedowns refresh the duration.

XulsReapersToll_xul.name: Xul's Reaper's Toll
XulsReapersToll_xul.description: Quest: Hit 16 Heroes with Spectral Scythe. Reward: Reduce the cooldown of Spectral Scythe by 3 seconds and its Mana cost by 20.

KaelthassRebirth_kaelthas.name: Kael'thas's Rebirth
KaelthassRebirth_kaelthas.description: Increases Phoenix duration by 100%. While alive, the Phoenix may be ordered to move to a different location.

TyraelsReciprocate_tyrael.name: Tyrael's Reciprocate
TyraelsReciprocate_tyrael.description: When Righteousness expires, it explodes for 170 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

ZuljinsRecklessness_zuljin.name: Zul'jin's Recklessness
ZuljinsRecklessness_zuljin.description: While Zul'jin is below 75% Health, he gains 10% Spell Power. While he is below 50% Health, his Basic Attack damage is increased by 20%

HanzosRedemption_hanzo.name: Hanzo's Redemption
HanzosRedemption_hanzo.description: Quest: Every 2 Basic Attacks against the same Hero within 10 seconds grants 1 Redemption, stacking up to 12. Dying decreases Redemption by 3, and Redemption can be lost even at maximum stacks. Reward: At 12 Redemption, gain 50% Attack Speed.

UthersRedemption_uther.name: Uther's Redemption
UthersRedemption_uther.description: After Eternal Vanguard ends, Uther revives at the spirit's location with 50% of his maximum Health.  This effect has a 180 second cooldown.

GazlowesReduceReuseRecycle_gazlowe.name: Gazlowe's Reduce, Reuse, Recycle
GazlowesReduceReuseRecycle_gazlowe.description: Enemy Minions that die nearby have a 15% chance to drop Scrap.

GenjisReflect_genji.name: Genji's Reflect
GenjisReflect_genji.description: Deflect also deals an additional 33% of the damage blocked.

IllidansReflexiveBlock_illidan.name: Illidan's Reflexive Block
IllidansReflexiveBlock_illidan.description: Using Dive grants 75 Physical Armor against the next 3 Hero Basic Attacks for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%.

AnubaraksRegenerationMaster_anubarak.name: Anub'arak's Regeneration Master
AnubaraksRegenerationMaster_anubarak.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases your Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 30. Reward: After gathering 30 Regeneration Globes, you also gain 500 Health.

SgtHammersRegenerativeBioSteel_sgthammer.name: Sgt. Hammer's Regenerative Bio-Steel
SgtHammersRegenerativeBioSteel_sgthammer.description: Basic Attacks while in Siege Mode heal for 10% of the damage dealt.

JohannasReinforce_johanna.name: Johanna's Reinforce
JohannasReinforce_johanna.description: Using a Basic Ability grants 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing damage taken by 75%.  Stores up to 3 charges.

AbathursReinforcedCarapace_abathur.name: Abathur's Reinforced Carapace
AbathursReinforcedCarapace_abathur.description: Increase the Shield amount of Carapace by 30%.

LtMoralessReinforcements_ltmorales.name: Lt. Morales's Reinforcements
LtMoralessReinforcements_ltmorales.description: Activate to call down a Medivac Dropship at your Altar for your allies. After 10 seconds, or when the Ability is activated again, the Medivac will travel to the original cast location to unload its passengers. Cooldown is shared with Medivac Dropship.  Passive: Reduce the cooldown of Medivac Dropship from 60 to 30 seconds.

MurkysRejuvenatingBubble_murky.name: Murky's Rejuvenating Bubble
MurkysRejuvenatingBubble_murky.description: Safety Bubble restores 40% of Murky's maximum Health.

MalfurionsRejuvenation_malfurion.name: Malfurion's Rejuvenation
MalfurionsRejuvenation_malfurion.description: Malfurion regenerates 5 Health per second for every active Regrowth.

DeckardsRejuvenationPotion_deckard.name: Deckard's Rejuvenation Potion
DeckardsRejuvenationPotion_deckard.description: Healing Potions restore 10 Mana and heal for an additional 108 over 4 seconds.

LuciosRejuvenescencia_lucio.name: Lúcio's Rejuvenescência
LuciosRejuvenescencia_lucio.description: While Amp It Up is active, Crossfade's Healing Boost heals for an additional 2.5% of the target's maximum health each second.

TychussRelentlessSoldier_tychus.name: Tychus's Relentless Soldier
TychussRelentlessSoldier_tychus.description: Being Stunned or Rooted grants 25 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

ValeerasRelentlessStrikes_valeera.name: Valeera's Relentless Strikes
ValeerasRelentlessStrikes_valeera.description: Reduces the Energy cost of Sinister Strike by 15.

SylvanassRemorseless_sylvanas.name: Sylvanas's Remorseless
SylvanassRemorseless_sylvanas.description: Increase Sylvanas's Basic Attack range by 1. Sylvanas's Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse shoot an untalented shot of Withering Fire. This shot of Withering Fire applies Banshee's Curse.

ArthassRemorselessWinter_arthas.name: Arthas's Remorseless Winter
ArthassRemorselessWinter_arthas.description: Damage slows targets Movement and Attack Speeds by 5% for 1.5 seconds. This can stack up to 5 times.

ZeratulsRendingCleave_zeratul.name: Zeratul's Rending Cleave
ZeratulsRendingCleave_zeratul.description: Cleave deals an additional 40% damage over 3 seconds.

AnduinsRenew_anduin.name: Anduin's Renew
AnduinsRenew_anduin.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes empower the next Flash Heal to also heal for 130 over 5 seconds.

AurielsRepeatedOffense_auriel.name: Auriel's Repeated Offense
AurielsRepeatedOffense_auriel.description: Enemies hit by Detainment Strike are knocked back 25% farther. Quest: Every time Detainment Strike stuns a Hero, increase the stun damage by 10, up to 60. Reward: After stunning 6 Heroes, increase this damage bonus to 250.

VallasRepeatingArrow_valla.name: Valla's Repeating Arrow
VallasRepeatingArrow_valla.description: The cooldown for Hungering Arrow is reset when Vault is used.

YrelsRepentance_yrel.name: Yrel's Repentance
YrelsRepentance_yrel.description: Increase Avenging Wrath's Slow by 25% and duration by 0.75 seconds.

LiMingsRepulsion_liming.name: Li-Ming's Repulsion
LiMingsRepulsion_liming.description: Increases Wave of Force knockback distance by 150% and increases its cast range by 100%.

ProbiussRepulsor_probius.name: Probius's Repulsor
ProbiussRepulsor_probius.description: Enemies hit by a Warp Rift explosion are knocked away from the center.

AurielsReservoirofHope_auriel.name: Auriel's Reservoir of Hope
AurielsReservoirofHope_auriel.description: Quest: Each maximum energy Ray of Heaven Auriel casts increases the maximum amount of energy that can be stored by 75.

RagnarossResilientFlame_ragnaros.name: Ragnaros's Resilient Flame
RagnarossResilientFlame_ragnaros.description: When Ragnaros is Stunned, he gains 40 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 40%.  This effect has a 15 second cooldown.

SgtHammersResistant_sgthammer.name: Sgt. Hammer's Resistant
SgtHammersResistant_sgthammer.description: Being Stunned or Rooted while in Siege Mode grants 50 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 50%.

TassadarsResonation_tassadar.name: Tassadar's Resonation
TassadarsResonation_tassadar.description: Distortion Beam slows enemies affected by Psionic Storm by 50%.

DeckardsRespecttheElderly_deckard.name: Deckard's Respect the Elderly
DeckardsRespecttheElderly_deckard.description: Stay Awhile and Listen Silences and Blinds enemies for 3 seconds upon waking up from Sleep.

AurielsResurrect_auriel.name: Auriel's Resurrect
AurielsResurrect_auriel.description: Channel on the spirit of a dead ally for 0.5 seconds. After a 5 second delay, they are brought back to life with 50% of their maximum Health at the location where they died.

MuradinsReverberation_muradin.name: Muradin's Reverberation
MuradinsReverberation_muradin.description: Increases the Attack Speed slow of Thunder Clap from 25% to 50% and the duration from 2.5 seconds to 3.5 seconds. Each enemy Hero hit reduces your Heroic Ability cooldown by 5%.

LuciosReverseAmp_lucio.name: Lúcio's Reverse Amp
LuciosReverseAmp_lucio.description: Blast Lúcio's Crossfade track at enemy Heroes. While Amp It Up, Healing Boost deals 50 (+4% per level) damage per second and Speed Boost Slows by 20%.  This ability is unaffected by Crossfade talents.

MalfurionsRevitalize_malfurion.name: Malfurion's Revitalize
MalfurionsRevitalize_malfurion.description: Using Innervate also grants Malfurion 50 Mana and causes his Basic Ability cooldowns to refresh 50% faster for 5 seconds.

Rewind_anubarak.name: Rewind
Rewind_anubarak.description: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.

TracersRicochet_tracer.name: Tracer's Ricochet
TracersRicochet_tracer.description: Tracer's Basic Attacks have a 50% chance to hit another nearby enemy, prioritizing Heroes.

ProbiussRiftShock_probius.name: Probius's Rift Shock
ProbiussRiftShock_probius.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Warp Rift explosion increases Probius's damage against them by 20% for 10 seconds.

AurielsRighteousAssault_auriel.name: Auriel's Righteous Assault
AurielsRighteousAssault_auriel.description: Reduces the cooldown of Sacred Sweep by 3 seconds for each enemy Hero hit by its center.

WhitemanesRighteousFlame_whitemane.name: Whitemane's Righteous Flame
WhitemanesRighteousFlame_whitemane.description: Searing Lash deals 75% more damage to enemies who are Stunned, Rooted, Silenced or Slowed.

YrelsRighteousMomentum_yrel.name: Yrel's Righteous Momentum
YrelsRighteousMomentum_yrel.description: Gain 5%. Yrel is no longer slowed while Channeling Righteous Hammer, and instead this bonus is quadrupled.

JohannasRighteousSmash_johanna.name: Johanna's Righteous Smash
JohannasRighteousSmash_johanna.description: Punish restores 10 Mana per enemy hit.

ArthassRime_arthas.name: Arthas's Rime
ArthassRime_arthas.description: Every 5 seconds, gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%. Stores up to 3 charges.

ChensRingofFire_chen.name: Chen's Ring of Fire
ChensRingofFire_chen.description: After Igniting an enemy, become bathed in a fiery aura, dealing 60 (+4% per level) damage every second to nearby enemies for 5 seconds.

JainasRingofFrost_jaina.name: Jaina's Ring of Frost
JainasRingofFrost_jaina.description: After a 1.5 second delay, create a Ring of Frost in an area that deals 310 (+4% per level) damage and Roots enemies for 3 seconds. The ring persists for 3 seconds afterward, Chilling any enemies who touch it.

NazeebosRingofPoison_nazeebo.name: Nazeebo's Ring of Poison
NazeebosRingofPoison_nazeebo.description: Zombie Wall lasts 1 second longer, and the center is filled with poison that deals a total of 319 (+4% per level) damage over 4 seconds. This damage starts small and increases over the duration.

CassiasRingoftheLeech_cassia.name: Cassia's Ring of the Leech
CassiasRingoftheLeech_cassia.description: Cassia heals for 25% of the damage she deals to Blinded enemies.

JunkratsRIPTire_junkrat.name: Junkrat's RIP-Tire
JunkratsRIPTire_junkrat.description: Create a motorized bomb with 530 (+4% per level) Health that lasts 15 seconds. While active, Junkrat is immobile but gains control of RIP-Tire's movement.  RIP-Tire can be reactivated to detonate immediately, knocking nearby enemies back and dealing 475 (+4% per level), 625 (+4% per level), or 775 (+4% per level) damage to enemies depending on how close they are to the center of the blast (with the highest amount near the center).

JunkratsRipperAir_junkrat.name: Junkrat's Ripper Air
JunkratsRipperAir_junkrat.description: Junkrat is knocked back 50% farther by Concussion Mine. Additionally, Concussion Mine's cooldown is reduced by 12 seconds if only Junkrat is hit.

GallsRisingDread_gall.name: Gall's Rising Dread
GallsRisingDread_gall.description: Each bounce of Dread Orb increases its radius by 25% and damage by 25%.

RehgarsRisingStorm_rehgar.name: Rehgar's Rising Storm
RehgarsRisingStorm_rehgar.description: Casting Lightning Shield on an anlly also casts an untalented version on Rehgar. Every time Lighting Shield damages an enemy Hero, increase the damage of both Lightning Shields damage by 10%. Stacks up to 15 times.

AlaraksRiteofRakShir_alarak.name: Alarak's Rite of Rak'Shir
AlaraksRiteofRakShir_alarak.description:
Activate to mark an enemy Hero for 300 seconds.  Hitting the marked Hero with Discord Strike increases Sadism by 3%. Killing the marked Hero increases Sadism by 5% and lowers the cooldown of Rite of Rak'Shir to 10 seconds. 
Sadism gained from Rite of Rak'Shir is lost on death.

JohannasRoar_johanna.name: Johanna's Roar
JohannasRoar_johanna.description: Increase Punish's damage by 25%. This bonus is increased to 150% whenever Punish hits 2 or more Heroes.

GazlowesRoboGoblin_gazlowe.name: Gazlowe's Robo-Goblin
GazlowesRoboGoblin_gazlowe.description: Activate to gain 40 Armor and 30% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.  Passive: Basic Attacks deal 100% bonus damage.

GazlowesRockItTurretXL_gazlowe.name: Gazlowe's Rock-It! Turret XL
GazlowesRockItTurretXL_gazlowe.description: Rock-It! Turrets attack up to 2 additional enemies for 60% damage.

JunkratsRocketRide_junkrat.name: Junkrat's Rocket Ride
JunkratsRocketRide_junkrat.description: After 1.25 seconds, Junkrat launches into the air. While in the air, he can steer the landing location by moving.  After 3.5 seconds, Junkrat lands, dealing 750 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and activating Total Mayhem. 5 seconds after landing, Junkrat reappears at the Altar and gains 150% additional Movement Speed until dismounted.

ChosRollback_cho.name: Cho's Rollback
ChosRollback_cho.description: Rune Bomb rolls back to Cho, damaging enemies in its path.

ThrallsRollingThunder_thrall.name: Thrall's Rolling Thunder
ThrallsRollingThunder_thrall.description: For 10 seconds after hitting an enemy with Chain Lightning, Thrall's next Basic Attack against them restores 15 Mana and 2.5% of his maximum Health.  Passive: Increase the number of Chain Lightning bounces by 1.

GarroshsRoughLanding_garrosh.name: Garrosh's Rough Landing
GarroshsRoughLanding_garrosh.description: Increase Groundbreaker's Slow amount by 10% and duration by 1 second.

LeoricsRoyalFocus_leoric.name: Leoric's Royal Focus
LeoricsRoyalFocus_leoric.description: Wraith Walk increases the damage of the next Skeletal Swing within 5 seconds by 50%. Each enemy Hero hit by this Skeletal Swing reduces the cooldown of Wraith Walk by 7 seconds.

DeckardsRuby_deckard.name: Deckard's Ruby
DeckardsRuby_deckard.description: Activate to make the next Horadric Cube spawn 3 Lesser Healing Potions from each enemy Hero hit, healing allied Heroes for 250 when picked up. Lesser Healing Potions last for 10 seconds.  Only 1 Gem may be active at a time.

GuldansRuinousAffliction_guldan.name: Gul'dan's Ruinous Affliction
GuldansRuinousAffliction_guldan.description: Corruption deals an additional 78 (+4% per level) damage on impact. If the enemy is hit by all three strikes, the third strike deals 233 (+4% per level) damage.

ArthassRuneTap_arthas.name: Arthas's Rune Tap
ArthassRuneTap_arthas.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack heals Arthas for 4% of his max Health.

ChosRunedGauntlet_cho.name: Cho's Runed Gauntlet
ChosRunedGauntlet_cho.description: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Cho and Gall's Heroic Abilities by 5%.

ChosRunicFeedback_cho.name: Cho's Runic Feedback
ChosRunicFeedback_cho.description: Gall's Runic Blast reduces Cho's Rune Bomb cooldown by 1 seconds per enemy hit, and 2 seconds for each Hero hit.

GallsRunicPersistence_gall.name: Gall's Runic Persistence
GallsRunicPersistence_gall.description: Runic Blast deals an additional 180 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds in an area around the detonation point.

GreymanesRunningWild_greymane.name: Greymane's Running Wild
GreymanesRunningWild_greymane.description: Increases Darkflight and Disengage's range by 35%.

ValeerasRupture_valeera.name: Valeera's Rupture
ValeerasRupture_valeera.description: Increase Garrote's damage over time by 100%. Valeera's Basic Attacks refresh the duration of Garrote.

DVasRushdown_dva.name: D.Va's Rush-down
DVasRushdown_dva.description: If D.Va neither takes nor deals damage during Boosters, its cooldown is lowered by 7 seconds.

SonyasRuthless_sonya.name: Sonya's Ruthless
SonyasRuthless_sonya.description: Whirlwind deals an additional 50% damage per second to Heroes below 33% Health. Does not generate additional healing.

AlaraksRuthlessMomentum_alarak.name: Alarak's Ruthless Momentum
AlaraksRuthlessMomentum_alarak.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Telekinesis from 30 to 20. Telekinesis's cooldown recharges 100% faster while above 75% Health.

MaievsRuthlessSpirit_maiev.name: Maiev's Ruthless Spirit
MaievsRuthlessSpirit_maiev.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Spirit of Vengeance increases all damage Maiev deals by 15% for 4 seconds, stacking up to 30%.

YrelsSacredGround_yrel.name: Yrel's Sacred Ground
YrelsSacredGround_yrel.description: Yrel sanctifies the ground around her, gaining 50 Armor until she leaves the area.

DiablosSacrificialSoul_diablo.name: Diablo's Sacrificial Soul
DiablosSacrificialSoul_diablo.description: Stunning a Hero with Shadow Charge grants 5 Souls and 25 Armor for 4 seconds. While at 100 Souls, increase this Armor to 50.

LtMoralessSafeZone_ltmorales.name: Lt. Morales's Safe Zone
LtMoralessSafeZone_ltmorales.description: After exiting the Medivac, allies are Protected from all damage for 2 seconds.

BrightwingsSafetyDust_brightwing.name: Brightwing's Safety Dust
BrightwingsSafetyDust_brightwing.description: Increase Pixie Dust's duration by 1 second. Brightwing heals allies with an active Pixie Dust for 25% more.

DeckardsSafetyinNumbers_deckard.name: Deckard's Safety in Numbers
DeckardsSafetyinNumbers_deckard.description: If at least 3 allied Heroes are nearby, Fortitude of the Faithful grants an additional 15 Armor and causes Deckard's Basic Abilities to recharge an additional 50% faster.

LiLisSafetySprint_lili.name: Li Li's Safety Sprint
LiLisSafetySprint_lili.description: Activate to gain Fast Feet for 3 seconds and increase its Movement Speed bonus to 30% while active.  Passive: Increase the movement speed bonus of Fast Feet by 15%.

TyraelsSalvation_tyrael.name: Tyrael's Salvation
TyraelsSalvation_tyrael.description: Increase the Shield amount Tyrael gains from Righteousness by 25% and heal Tyrael for 140 Health if his Shield is destroyed. Does not increase the Shield amount gained by allies.

TyraelsSanctification_tyrael.name: Tyrael's Sanctification
TyraelsSanctification_tyrael.description: After 0.5 seconds create a field of holy energy that makes allied Heroes Invulnerable. Lasts 3 seconds.

DeckardsSapphire_deckard.name: Deckard's Sapphire
DeckardsSapphire_deckard.description: Activate to increase the Slow of the next Horadric Cube by 30%.  Only 1 Gem may be active at a time.

TheButchersSavageCharge_thebutcher.name: The Butcher's Savage Charge
TheButchersSavageCharge_thebutcher.description: Ruthless Onslaught deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 10% of their maximum Health.

StitchessSavortheFlavor_stitches.name: Stitches's Savor the Flavor
StitchessSavortheFlavor_stitches.description: When Devour hits a Hero, Stitches heals for an additional 8% of his maximum Health and Mana over 4 seconds. Quest: Hitting enemy Heroes with Devour increases Stitches' Health Regeneration by 1.5.

WhitemanesScarletAegis_whitemane.name: Whitemane's Scarlet Aegis
WhitemanesScarletAegis_whitemane.description: Bolster the spirits of nearby allied Heroes, healing them for 250 and granting them 40 Armor for 4 seconds.

WhitemanesScarletCrusade_whitemane.name: Whitemane's Scarlet Crusade
WhitemanesScarletCrusade_whitemane.description: Scarlet Aegis heals for 50% more and makes affected allies Unstoppable for 1.

GazlowesScrapoMaticSmelter_gazlowe.name: Gazlowe's Scrap-o-Matic Smelter
GazlowesScrapoMaticSmelter_gazlowe.description: Increases the Mana restored from Scrap by 100%.

DeckardsScrollofIdentify_deckard.name: Deckard's Scroll of Identify
DeckardsScrollofIdentify_deckard.description: Quest: Hitting an enemy Hero with Scroll of Sealing reveals them for 8 seconds. Reward: After hitting 16 Heroes, Scroll of Sealing also reduces Armor by 15 for 4 seconds and the reveal duration is doubled.

DeckardsScrollofStoneCurse_deckard.name: Deckard's Scroll of Stone Curse
DeckardsScrollofStoneCurse_deckard.description: Scroll of Sealing does 200% more damage when hitting at least 2 Heroes.

ValeerasSealFate_valeera.name: Valeera's Seal Fate
ValeerasSealFate_valeera.description: Sinister Strike deals 50% additional damage and generates an additional Combo Point when used against silenced, rooted, or stunned enemy Heroes.

TyraelsSealofElDruin_tyrael.name: Tyrael's Seal of El'Druin
TyraelsSealofElDruin_tyrael.description: Using a Basic Ability grants 50% Attack Speed for 3 seconds.

ChosSearedFlesh_cho.name: Cho's Seared Flesh
ChosSearedFlesh_cho.description: Each consecutive Basic Attack to an enemy Hero deals 20% more damage, to a maximum of 60% damage. This bonus lasts 5 seconds or until a different enemy is attacked.

AurielsSearingLight_auriel.name: Auriel's Searing Light
AurielsSearingLight_auriel.description: Ray of Heaven also deals damage to enemies in the area equal to 30% of the energy consumed.

GallsSearingShadows_gall.name: Gall's Searing Shadows
GallsSearingShadows_gall.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Shadowflame take an additional 2% of their maximum Health as damage.

SeasonedMarksman_artanis.name: Seasoned Marksman
SeasonedMarksman_artanis.description: Quest: Every Minion killed near you grants 0.2 Attack Damage, and Takedowns grant 0.5 Attack Damage. Reward: Upon gaining 40 bonus Attack Damage, you can also activate Seasoned Marksman to increase your Attack Speed by 40% for 3 seconds. 60 second cooldown.

StitchessSecondHelping_stitches.name: Stitches's Second Helping
StitchessSecondHelping_stitches.description: Devour gains 1 additional charge. Enemy Heroes hit by Devour reduce the cooldown of Stitches's Heroic Ability by 5 seconds.

LtMoralessSecondOpinion_ltmorales.name: Lt. Morales's Second Opinion
LtMoralessSecondOpinion_ltmorales.description: Hitting 2 or more Heroes with Displacement Grenade reduces its cooldown to 2 seconds.

VariansSecondWind_varian.name: Varian's Second Wind
VariansSecondWind_varian.description: Basic Attacks heal Varian for 1% of his maximum Health. While below 50% Health, they also heal him for 50% of the damage dealt.

FenixsSecondaryFire_fenix.name: Fenix's Secondary Fire
FenixsSecondaryFire_fenix.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Plasma Cutter fires a Purification Salvo missile at them after 0.5 seconds, dealing 86 damage. Deals 50% increased damage to Slowed targets.

FalstadsSecretWeapon_falstad.name: Falstad's Secret Weapon
FalstadsSecretWeapon_falstad.description: Increases Hammerang's range by 30% and Basic Attacks deal 80% bonus damage while Hammerang is in flight.

LiMingsSeeker_liming.name: Li-Ming's Seeker
LiMingsSeeker_liming.description: If three Magic Missiles hit the same target, the third one deals an additional 125 (+4% per level) damage.

ZeratulsSeekerintheDark_zeratul.name: Zeratul's Seeker in the Dark
ZeratulsSeekerintheDark_zeratul.description: Singularity Spike takes 50% longer to explode. It can be reactivated to teleport to the target, granting 30% increased Move Speed for 3 seconds.

MalGanissSeekerSwarm_malganis.name: Mal'Ganis's Seeker Swarm
MalGanissSeekerSwarm_malganis.description: Upon expiring, Carrion Swarm's bats seek nearby enemy Heroes, dealing 132 damage and Sleeping them for 2.5 seconds.

VallasSeethingHatred_valla.name: Valla's Seething Hatred
VallasSeethingHatred_valla.description: While at 10 stacks of Hatred, gain 15% Spell Power. Basic Attacks now grant 2 stacks of Hatred.

WhitemanesSelfRighteous_whitemane.name: Whitemane's Self-Righteous
WhitemanesSelfRighteous_whitemane.description: Casting Desperate Plea on an ally heals Whitemane for 135. Does not grant Zeal.

ZeratulsSentencedtoDeath_zeratul.name: Zeratul's Sentenced to Death
ZeratulsSentencedtoDeath_zeratul.description: Deal 25% increased damage to enemies while they are marked or Slowed by Singularity Spike.

LunarasSentinelWisp_lunara.name: Lunara's Sentinel Wisp
LunarasSentinelWisp_lunara.description: After remaining in a bush for 5 seconds, Wisp's vision radius is increased by 200% and reveals the surrounding area.

CassiasSeraphsHymn_cassia.name: Cassia's Seraph's Hymn
CassiasSeraphsHymn_cassia.description: Reduce the cooldown and Mana cost of Blinding Light by 33%. Basic Attacks against Blinded enemies deal 100% more damage.

YrelsSeraphim_yrel.name: Yrel's Seraphim
YrelsSeraphim_yrel.description: Activate to become Unstoppable for 2 seconds.

MalfurionsSerenity_malfurion.name: Malfurion's Serenity
MalfurionsSerenity_malfurion.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Moonfire reduces the cooldown of Tranquility by 3 seconds. Increase Tranquility's healing by 10% per ally affected by Regrowth.

LiLisSerpentSidekick_lili.name: Li Li's Serpent Sidekick
LiLisSerpentSidekick_lili.description: Cloud Serpent's duration is increased by 0.6 seconds every time it attacks an Hero.

HanzosSerratedArrows_hanzo.name: Hanzo's Serrated Arrows
HanzosSerratedArrows_hanzo.description: Scatter Arrow deals 100% more damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

StitchessSerratedEdge_stitches.name: Stitches's Serrated Edge
StitchessSerratedEdge_stitches.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Hook deals bonus damage equal to 5% of their maximum Health and reduces Hook's cooldown by 3 seconds.

ZagarasSerratedSpines_zagara.name: Zagara's Serrated Spines
ZagarasSerratedSpines_zagara.description: Quest: Each Basic Attack against a Hero increases Zagara's Attack Damage by 0.3.

KharazimsSevenSidedStrike_kharazim.name: Kharazim's Seven-Sided Strike
KharazimsSevenSidedStrike_kharazim.description: Become Invulnerable and strike 7 times over 2 seconds. Each strike hits the highest Health nearby Hero for 7% of their maximum Health.

XulsShackler_xul.name: Xul's Shackler
XulsShackler_xul.description: While Bone Armor is active, nearby enemies are Slowed by 35% for 1 second. Basic Attacks against Heroes that are Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed reduce the cooldown of Bone Armor by 2 seconds.

XulsShade_xul.name: Xul's Shade
XulsShade_xul.description: While Bone Armor is active, Xul evades all Basic Attacks, but increases the cooldown of Bone Armor by 20 seconds.

MephistosShadeLord_mephisto.name: Mephisto's Shade Lord
MephistosShadeLord_mephisto.description: Activate to swap locations with Shade of Mephisto and refresh its duration.  Passive: Shade of Mephisto benefits from all of Mephisto's level 7 Talents

MaievsShadowArmor_maiev.name: Maiev's Shadow Armor
MaievsShadowArmor_maiev.description: Blink grants 20 Armor for 3.5 seconds. Maiev's Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes refresh this duration.

ZeratulsShadowAssault_zeratul.name: Zeratul's Shadow Assault
ZeratulsShadowAssault_zeratul.description: Basic Attacks cause Zeratul to charge at enemies and have 20% increased Attack Speed. Lasts for 4 seconds.

GallsShadowBoltVolley_gall.name: Gall's Shadow Bolt Volley
GallsShadowBoltVolley_gall.description: After 1 second, unleash 20 Shadow Bolts over 4 seconds, each dealing 87 (+4% per level) damage to the first target hit. The bolts fire towards your mouse.

KelThuzadsShadowFissure_kelthuzad.name: Kel'Thuzad's Shadow Fissure
KelThuzadsShadowFissure_kelthuzad.description: Create a fissure anywhere on the Battleground that explodes after 1.5 seconds, dealing 360 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemy Heroes in its area.

ZeratulsShadowHunter_zeratul.name: Zeratul's Shadow Hunter
ZeratulsShadowHunter_zeratul.description: Quest: Gather Regeneration Globes to lower the Mana cost of Blink by 3. Reward: Upon gathering 15 Regeneration Globes, Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Blink by 1.5 second.

ZeratulsShadowMending_zeratul.name: Zeratul's Shadow Mending
ZeratulsShadowMending_zeratul.description: Heal for 60% of Spell Damage dealt to Heroes.

MaievsShadowOrbHuntress_maiev.name: Maiev's Shadow Orb: Huntress
MaievsShadowOrbHuntress_maiev.description: Activate to increase Movement Speed and Attack Speed by 40% for 5 seconds.  Recharge Shadow Orb by dealing Physical Damage to enemy Heroes 10 times.

MaievsShadowOrbShadowStrike_maiev.name: Maiev's Shadow Orb: Shadow Strike
MaievsShadowOrbShadowStrike_maiev.description: Activate to deal 75 damage to an enemy Hero, Slowing them by 30% and reducing their Armor by 20 for 4 seconds.  Recharge Shadow Orb by dealing Spell Damage to enemy Heroes 10 times.

MaievsShadowOrbVengeance_maiev.name: Maiev's Shadow Orb: Vengeance
MaievsShadowOrbVengeance_maiev.description: Activate to reset the cooldown of Spirit of Vengeance.  Recharge Shadow Orb by damaging enemy Heroes with Spirit of Vengeance 5 times.

GallsShadowfury_gall.name: Gall's Shadowfury
GallsShadowfury_gall.description: Shadow Bolt Volley hits all enemies in its path.

GallsShadowsnare_gall.name: Gall's Shadowsnare
GallsShadowsnare_gall.description: Shadowflame slows enemy Heroes by 15% for 4 seconds. This effect can stack up to 2 times.

TyrandesShadowstalk_tyrande.name: Tyrande's Shadowstalk
TyrandesShadowstalk_tyrande.description: Grant all allied Heroes Stealth for 10 seconds and heal them for 380 Health over 10  seconds. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.

LiLisShakeItOff_lili.name: Li Li's Shake It Off
LiLisShakeItOff_lili.description: Gain 8 Armor per second while Fast Feet is active, up to 30 Armor.

StitchessShamblingHorror_stitches.name: Stitches's Shambling Horror
StitchessShamblingHorror_stitches.description: Activate to gain 50 Armor for 4 seconds.  Passive: Stitches cannot have his Movement Speed reduced below 100%.

MalfurionsShandosClarity_malfurion.name: Malfurion's Shan'do's Clarity
MalfurionsShandosClarity_malfurion.description: Innervate's cooldown recharges 25% faster per ally affected by Regrowth.

MephistosShardofHate_mephisto.name: Mephisto's Shard of Hate
MephistosShardofHate_mephisto.description: Basic Attacks hit enemies near the primary target and activate Lord of Hatred against enemy Heroes, reducing Basic Ability cooldowns by 1 second per Hero hit.

WhitemanesSharedPunishment_whitemane.name: Whitemane's Shared Punishment
WhitemanesSharedPunishment_whitemane.description: Upon casting, Inquisition can chain to an additional enemy Hero near its target, dealing 35 damage every 0.5 seconds.

HanzosSharpenedArrowheads_hanzo.name: Hanzo's Sharpened Arrowheads
HanzosSharpenedArrowheads_hanzo.description: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow or Basic Attacks reduces their Armor by 2 for 3 seconds, up to a maximum reduction of 20 Armor.

KerrigansSharpenedBlades_kerrigan.name: Kerrigan's Sharpened Blades
KerrigansSharpenedBlades_kerrigan.description:
Quest: Minions and Heroes that die within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Ravage increase its damage up to a maximum of 75.  Minions grant 1 increased damage and Heroes grant 5 increased damage. 
Reward: After reaching a 50 damage increase, Ravage gains 50 additional damage.

GenjisSharpenedStars_genji.name: Genji's Sharpened Stars
GenjisSharpenedStars_genji.description: Shuriken now pierce all enemies hit.

AnasSharpshooter_ana.name: Ana's Sharpshooter
AnasSharpshooter_ana.description: Healing Dart's healing is increased by 5% each time it heals a Hero, up to 50%. This bonus is reset if Healing Dart fails to hit a Hero.

ArthassShatteredArmor_arthas.name: Arthas's Shattered Armor
ArthassShatteredArmor_arthas.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Howling Blast have their Armor reduced by 15 for 4 seconds.

SonyasShatteredGround_sonya.name: Sonya's Shattered Ground
SonyasShatteredGround_sonya.description: Increase the length of Seismic Slam's splash by 66% and increase its splash damage to 100% of its base damage.

VariansShatteringThrow_varian.name: Varian's Shattering Throw
VariansShatteringThrow_varian.description: Activate to throw a sword at a target Hero that deals 50 (+4% per level) damage, and up to 1400 (+4% per level) bonus damage to their Shields.  Passive: Basic Attacks against Heroes deal up to 200% bonus damage to Shields.

AnubaraksShedExoskeleton_anubarak.name: Anub'arak's Shed Exoskeleton
AnubaraksShedExoskeleton_anubarak.description: Harden Carapace grants 30% increased Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

ArtanissShieldBattery_artanis.name: Artanis's Shield Battery
ArtanissShieldBattery_artanis.description: Shield Overload's cooldown recharges 125% faster while its Shield is active, and the Shield duration is increased by 1 second.

ProbiussShieldBattery_probius.name: Probius's Shield Battery
ProbiussShieldBattery_probius.description: Pylon's Power Field grants allied Heroes 29 (+4% per level) Shields per second, up to 116 (+4% per level). Shields persist for 2 seconds after exiting a Pylon Power Field.

TassadarsShieldBattery_tassadar.name: Tassadar's Shield Battery
TassadarsShieldBattery_tassadar.description: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes an untalented Plasma Shield.

ProbiussShieldCapacitor_probius.name: Probius's Shield Capacitor
ProbiussShieldCapacitor_probius.description: Probius gains permanent Shields equal to 10% of his max Health. Shields regenerate quickly as long as he hasn't taken damage recently.

AurielsShieldofHope_auriel.name: Auriel's Shield of Hope
AurielsShieldofHope_auriel.description: Activate to grant all nearby allied Heroes a shield for 3 seconds equal to 50% of the amount of Health they are missing.

ArtanissShieldSurge_artanis.name: Artanis's Shield Surge
ArtanissShieldSurge_artanis.description: Increases Shield Overload's Shields by 75% while below 25% Health.

VariansShieldWall_varian.name: Varian's Shield Wall
VariansShieldWall_varian.description: Parry now grants Protected, preventing all incoming damage while active. Additionally, Parry's cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds, but it loses 1 charge.

KelThuzadsShiftingMalice_kelthuzad.name: Kel'Thuzad's Shifting Malice
KelThuzadsShiftingMalice_kelthuzad.description: Activate to dash forward, dealing 150 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemies in the path. Takedowns reset the cooldown of Shifting Malice.

RagnarossShiftingMeteor_ragnaros.name: Ragnaros's Shifting Meteor
RagnarossShiftingMeteor_ragnaros.description: Each time an enemy is hit by the same Living Meteor, they take 5% increased damage from it. Quest: Hit 75 Heroes with Living Meteor. Reward: After hitting 75 Heroes with Living Meteor, its duration is increased to 2.25 seconds, and it can be reactivated to change its direction once per use.

GallsShiftingNether_gall.name: Gall's Shifting Nether
GallsShiftingNether_gall.description: Twisting Nether now teleports Cho to a targeted location before it begins channeling.

ChromiesShiftingSands_chromie.name: Chromie's Shifting Sands
