ChromiesShiftingSands_chromie.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Sand Blast grants 5% Spell Power for 8 seconds, up to a maximum of 50%. The duration is refreshed whenever an enemy is damaged by Sand Blast.

GenjisShingan_genji.name: Genji's Shingan
GenjisShingan_genji.description: Hitting an enemy with all 3 Shuriken deals 115 (+4% per level) bonus damage.

ProbiussShootEmUp_probius.name: Probius's Shoot 'Em Up
ProbiussShootEmUp_probius.description: Hitting a Warp Rift with Disruption Pulse causes 4 additional pulses that deal 50% damage to be fired from the impact location in different directions.  Additional Pulses do not benefit from Echo Pulse or Particle Accelerator.

TyrandesShootingStar_tyrande.name: Tyrande's Shooting Star
TyrandesShootingStar_tyrande.description: Increase Basic Attack range by 1. Every 8th Basic Attack casts a free Lunar Flare at a random enemy near Tyrande's position. This prefers Heroic targets.

SonyasShotofFury_sonya.name: Sonya's Shot of Fury
SonyasShotofFury_sonya.description: Activate to gain 50 Fury. Usable while Whirlwinding.  Passive: After casting Seismic Slam, your next Basic Attack deals 40% more damage.

AlaraksShowofForce_alarak.name: Alarak's Show of Force
AlaraksShowofForce_alarak.description: Heroes hit with 3 of Alarak's Abilities within 2 seconds take an additional 68 (+4% per level) damage and increase Sadism by 2%, stacking up to 20%.  Sadism gained from Show of Force is lost on death.

ShowStopper_etc.name: Show Stopper
ShowStopper_etc.description: After using Powerslide, gain 35 Armor for 4 seconds, reducing all damage taken by 35%.

SgtHammersShrapnelMines_sgthammer.name: Sgt. Hammer's Shrapnel Mines
SgtHammersShrapnelMines_sgthammer.description: Upon detonating, Spider Mines reduce the armor of enemy Heroes hit by 10 for 4 seconds.

ZeratulsShroudofAdun_zeratul.name: Zeratul's Shroud of Adun
ZeratulsShroudofAdun_zeratul.description: Zeratul gains a shield equal to 15% of his Maximum Health over 5 seconds while under Permanent Cloak.

LeoricsShroudoftheDeadKing_leoric.name: Leoric's Shroud of the Dead King
LeoricsShroudoftheDeadKing_leoric.description: Activate to become Protected for 3 seconds, preventing all damage.

MalthaelsShroudofWisdom_malthael.name: Malthael's Shroud of Wisdom
MalthaelsShroudofWisdom_malthael.description: After 2 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor for 4 seconds.

SamurosShukuchi_samuro.name: Samuro's Shukuchi
SamurosShukuchi_samuro.description: Wind Walk teleports Samuro a short distance in the direction he's currently facing.

GenjisShurikenMastery_genji.name: Genji's Shuriken Mastery
GenjisShurikenMastery_genji.description: Quest: Hit enemy Heroes with Shuriken. Reward: After hitting 35 Heroes, Shuriken damage is increased by 25. Reward: After hitting 75 Heroes, Cyber Agility now refunds 2 charges of Shuriken.

SgtHammersSiegeTactics_sgthammer.name: Sgt. Hammer's Siege Tactics
SgtHammersSiegeTactics_sgthammer.description: Using Neosteel Plating while in Siege Mode grants Unstoppable for 2 seconds.

AzmodansSiegebreaker_azmodan.name: Azmodan's Siegebreaker
AzmodansSiegebreaker_azmodan.description: Azmodan's Demons deal 50% increased damage to Structures.

QhirasSilentKiller_qhira.name: Qhira's Silent Killer
QhirasSilentKiller_qhira.description: The initial cast of Unrelenting Strikes Silences all nearby enemy Heroes for 2 seconds. All damage against enemy Heroes with this ability reduces its cooldown by 3 seconds.

UthersSilverTouch_uther.name: Uther's Silver Touch
UthersSilverTouch_uther.description: Quest: Reduce damage from Heroic sources with Devotion. Reward: After reducing damage 40 times, Holy Light's Mana cost is reduced from 90 to 70. Reward: After reducing damage 80 times, Holy Light's Mana cost is reduced to 50, and its range is increased by 50%.

HanzosSimpleGeometry_hanzo.name: Hanzo's Simple Geometry
HanzosSimpleGeometry_hanzo.description: Quest: Hit a Hero with multiple arrows from the same Scatter Arrow cast 20 times. Each arrow hit after the second grants additional progress. Reward: Upon hitting terrain for the first time, Scatter Arrow creates 2 additional arrows.

AzmodansSinsGrasp_azmodan.name: Azmodan's Sin's Grasp
AzmodansSinsGrasp_azmodan.description: If All Shall Burn channel for its full duration, a Demon Warrior is summoned at the target's location and all Demon Warriors deal 100% increased damage for 5 seconds.

FenixsSingularityCharge_fenix.name: Fenix's Singularity Charge
FenixsSingularityCharge_fenix.description: Repeater Cannon grants 100% more Attack Speed, and Phase Bomb grants 2.5 more range.

JohannasSinsExposed_johanna.name: Johanna's Sins Exposed
JohannasSinsExposed_johanna.description: Shield Glare marks enemies for 4 seconds. The next time any ally damages them, they take 90 (+4% per level) extra damage and the mark is removed.

VallasSiphoningArrow_valla.name: Valla's Siphoning Arrow
VallasSiphoningArrow_valla.description: Valla heals for 75% of the damage dealt to Heroes by Hungering Arrow.

KerrigansSiphoningImpact_kerrigan.name: Kerrigan's Siphoning Impact
KerrigansSiphoningImpact_kerrigan.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Ravage grants 90 points of Assimilation Shields.

QhirasSiphoningLink_qhira.name: Qhira's Siphoning Link
QhirasSiphoningLink_qhira.description: Damaging an enemy Hero with the initial impact or revolution of Revolving Sweep causes Qhira to regenerate 100 Health over 4 seconds (stacking up to 5 times)

LunarasSiphoningToxin_lunara.name: Lunara's Siphoning Toxin
LunarasSiphoningToxin_lunara.description: While at least one enemy is afflicted by Nature's Toxin, heal for 9 per second. When an enemy Hero has 3 stacks of Nature's Toxin, increase this healing by 19 per second.

KharazimsSixthSense_kharazim.name: Kharazim's Sixth Sense
KharazimsSixthSense_kharazim.description: While Stunned or Rooted, gain 75 Physical Armor against Hero Basic Attacks for 4 seconds, reducing their damage by 75%.

IllidansSixthSense_illidan.name: Illidan's Sixth Sense
IllidansSixthSense_illidan.description: Evasion grants Illidan 75 Spell Armor against the next 2 sources of Spell Damage, reducing their damage by 75%.

TychussSizzlinAttacks_tychus.name: Tychus's Sizzlin' Attacks
TychussSizzlinAttacks_tychus.description: Basic Attacks deal bonus damage to Heroes equal to 1% of their maximum Health. Stacks with Minigun.

XulsSkeletalMages_xul.name: Xul's Skeletal Mages
XulsSkeletalMages_xul.description: Vector Targeting Summon 4 Frost Mages in a line that attack nearby enemies for 47 (+4% per level) damage a second and Slow them by 30% for 2 seconds. Last up to 15 seconds.

MuradinsSkullcracker_muradin.name: Muradin's Skullcracker
MuradinsSkullcracker_muradin.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack against the same enemy deals 90% bonus damage and Stuns them for 0.25 seconds.

TheButchersSlaughterhouse_thebutcher.name: The Butcher's Slaughterhouse
TheButchersSlaughterhouse_thebutcher.description: Lamb to the Slaughter now chains all enemy Heroes in range.

MuradinsSledgehammer_muradin.name: Muradin's Sledgehammer
MuradinsSledgehammer_muradin.description: Stormbolt deals 350% damage to non-Heroic enemies. Hitting a Hero grants an additional stack of his baseline quest.

TracersSleightofHand_tracer.name: Tracer's Sleight of Hand
TracersSleightofHand_tracer.description: Reduces Reload time by 50%. This equals 20% more damage per second.

ValeerasSliceandDice_valeera.name: Valeera's Slice and Dice
ValeerasSliceandDice_valeera.description: Eviscerating an enemy with 3 Combo Points grants 150% Attack Speed. Lasts 3 seconds or 3 Basic Attacks.  Passive: Basic Attacks restore 2 Energy.

MurkysSlimeTime_murky.name: Murky's Slime Time
MurkysSlimeTime_murky.description: Quest: Slime enemy Heroes that are already Slimed. Reward: After Sliming 15 Heroes, increase Slime's bonus damage by 125. Reward: After Sliming 30 Heroes, increase Slime's slow amount to 30%.

LuciosSlip_lucio.name: Lúcio's Slip
LuciosSlip_lucio.description: While Wall Ride is active, passing near an enemy Hero increases its Movement Speed bonus 40% for 1 second.  Passive: Wall Ride grants 20 Armor.

MurkysSlipperyWhenWet_murky.name: Murky's Slippery When Wet
MurkysSlipperyWhenWet_murky.description: Gain 50% Movement Speed and move through units while in Safety Bubble.

TracersSlipstream_tracer.name: Tracer's Slipstream
TracersSlipstream_tracer.description: Increases the amount of time Recalled by 1 second.

RagnarossSlowBurn_ragnaros.name: Ragnaros's Slow Burn
RagnarossSlowBurn_ragnaros.description: Blast Wave slows enemies hit by 40% for 2 seconds.

ChromiesSlowingSands_chromie.name: Chromie's Slowing Sands
ChromiesSlowingSands_chromie.description: Summon a sand vortex that Slows enemies by 5% every 0.25 seconds, up to 70%.

AnasSlumberShells_ana.name: Ana's Slumber Shells
AnasSlumberShells_ana.description: Upon waking, enemy Heroes are Slowed by 25% for 3 seconds.

AnasSmellingSalts_ana.name: Ana's Smelling Salts
AnasSmellingSalts_ana.description: Healing Dart removes Stuns from the target, and grants them 50 Armor for 2 seconds when doing so.

TyraelsSmitetheWicked_tyrael.name: Tyrael's Smite the Wicked
TyraelsSmitetheWicked_tyrael.description: While El'druin's Might is active, and for 2 seconds after teleporting, Smite's cooldown recharges 125% faster.

ValeerasSmokeBomb_valeera.name: Valeera's Smoke Bomb
ValeerasSmokeBomb_valeera.description: Create a cloud of smoke. While in the smoke, Valeera is Unrevealable, can pass through other units, and gains 30 Armor, reducing damage taken by 30%. Valeera can continue to attack and use abilities without being revealed. Lasts 5 seconds.  Using this Ability does not break Stealth.

LuciosSmoothMoves_lucio.name: Lúcio's Smooth Moves
LuciosSmoothMoves_lucio.description: While Wall Ride is active, Basic Attacks heal for 30% of the damage dealt and restore 0.5 Mana.  Passive: Increase Wall Ride duration by 1 second.

JainasSnowstorm_jaina.name: Jaina's Snowstorm
JainasSnowstorm_jaina.description: The damage of the second wave of Blizzard is increased by 20%. The damage of the third wave is increased by 60%.

ArtanissSolariteReaper_artanis.name: Artanis's Solarite Reaper
ArtanissSolariteReaper_artanis.description: Increases the damage of the first dash of Blade Dash by 150%.

AbathursSomaTransference_abathur.name: Abathur's Soma Transference
AbathursSomaTransference_abathur.description: Symbiote's Spike Burst heals the host for 64 (+4% per level) Health per enemy Hero hit.

MalthaelsSoulCollector_malthael.name: Malthael's Soul Collector
MalthaelsSoulCollector_malthael.description: Reduce Soul Rip's cooldown by 0.5 seconds and increase its range by 25%.

NazeebosSoulHarvest_nazeebo.name: Nazeebo's Soul Harvest
NazeebosSoulHarvest_nazeebo.description: Activate to increase Nazeebo's Health and Spell Power by 7% for each nearby enemy, up to a maximum of 35%. Lasts 15 seconds.

DiablosSoulShield_diablo.name: Diablo's Soul Shield
DiablosSoulShield_diablo.description: Activate to gain 25 plus 50% of Diablo's current Souls as Spell Armor for 4 seconds. Every time Diablo damages an enemy Hero, reduce this cooldown by 1 second.

MalthaelsSoulSiphon_malthael.name: Malthael's Soul Siphon
MalthaelsSoulSiphon_malthael.description: Increase Soul Rip's bonus healing from Heroes to 4.75% of the Hero's maximum Health.

DiablosSoulstotheFlame_diablo.name: Diablo's Souls to the Flame
DiablosSoulstotheFlame_diablo.description: Fire Stomp grants 1 Soul every 3 times it damages an enemy Hero, and heals for an additional 1.3% of its damage dealt per Soul.

LuciosSoundBarrier_lucio.name: Lúcio's Sound Barrier
LuciosSoundBarrier_lucio.description: After 1 second, Lúcio and nearby Allied Heroes gain a 1296 (+4% per level) point shield that rapidly decays over 6 seconds.

ImperiussSovereignArmor_imperius.name: Imperius's Sovereign Armor
ImperiussSovereignArmor_imperius.description: Molten Armor grants 50 Armor for 1.5 seconds. Damaging an enemy Hero with Molten Armor increases the duration of the Armor by 0.5 seconds.

TracersSpatialEcho_tracer.name: Tracer's Spatial Echo
TracersSpatialEcho_tracer.description: Hero Takedowns grant 2 charges of Blink.

AbathursSpatialEfficiency_abathur.name: Abathur's Spatial Efficiency
AbathursSpatialEfficiency_abathur.description: Symbiote's Stab gains 1 additional charge and its Cooldown is reduced by .5 seconds.

LeoricsSpectralLeech_leoric.name: Leoric's Spectral Leech
LeoricsSpectralLeech_leoric.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 2.5% of the Hero's maximum Health and heal Leoric for twice that amount.

ZaryasSpeedBarrier_zarya.name: Zarya's Speed Barrier
ZaryasSpeedBarrier_zarya.description: Shield Ally increases the allied Hero's Movement Speed by 50% for the duration.

SpeedMetal_etc.name: Speed Metal
SpeedMetal_etc.description: Using a Basic or Heroic ability also gives nearby allied Heroes 20% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

AnduinsSpeedofthePious_anduin.name: Anduin's Speed of the Pious
AnduinsSpeedofthePious_anduin.description: While Divine Star is traveling, gain 30% Movement Speed.

AnasSpeedSerum_ana.name: Ana's Speed Serum
AnasSpeedSerum_ana.description: Healing Dart grants 25% Movement Speed to affected Heroes for 1.5 seconds.

ZaryasSpellBarrier_zarya.name: Zarya's Spell Barrier
ZaryasSpellBarrier_zarya.description: Upon expiration or breaking, Personal Barrier grants Zarya 75 Spell Armor for 3 Seconds, reducing the damage taken from Abilities by 75%.

SpellShield_kharazim.name: Spell Shield
SpellShield_kharazim.description: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

NazeebosSpiderColony_nazeebo.name: Nazeebo's Spider Colony
NazeebosSpiderColony_nazeebo.description: Every time a Spider attacks an enemy Hero, reduce the cooldown of Wall of Zombies and Plague of Toads by .25 seconds.

TheLostVikingssSpinToWin_thelostvikings.name: The Lost Vikings's Spin To Win!
TheLostVikingssSpinToWin_thelostvikings.description: Activate to have each Viking deal 101 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

StukovsSpineLauncher_stukov.name: Stukov's Spine Launcher
StukovsSpineLauncher_stukov.description: Basic Attacks become ranged and Slow enemies by 20% for 1.5 seconds, but deal 40% less damage.

KharazimsSpiritAlly_kharazim.name: Kharazim's Spirit Ally
KharazimsSpiritAlly_kharazim.description: Place a Spirit Ally that heals allies in a large area around it for 2% of their maximum Health every second. Has 150 (+4% per level) Health and lasts 10 seconds. Kharazim can Radiant Dash to Spirit Allies.

RexxarsSpiritBond_rexxar.name: Rexxar's Spirit Bond
RexxarsSpiritBond_rexxar.description: Increases the duration of Bestial Wrath by 50% and Misha's Basic Attacks heal Rexxar for 50% of her damage dealt during Bestial Wrath.

NazeebosSpiritofArachyr_nazeebo.name: Nazeebo's Spirit of Arachyr
NazeebosSpiritofArachyr_nazeebo.description: If Corpse Spiders hits only one enemy, it creates 2 additional spiders.

ThrallsSpiritShield_thrall.name: Thrall's Spirit Shield
ThrallsSpiritShield_thrall.description: Every 45 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 1.5 seconds. Frostwolf Resilience reduces this cooldown by 10 seconds.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

MephistosSpite_mephisto.name: Mephisto's Spite
MephistosSpite_mephisto.description: Increase Regeneration Globe healing duration by 125%. Every tick of Regeneration Globe healing activates Lord of Hatred, reducing Basic Ability cooldowns by 0.75 seconds

LunarasSplinteredSpear_lunara.name: Lunara's Splintered Spear
LunarasSplinteredSpear_lunara.description: Using Noxious Blossom causes Lunara's next Basic Attack to hit up to 4 enemies. These extra attacks can apply Nature's Toxin.

JunkratsSpreadVolley_junkrat.name: Junkrat's Spread Volley
JunkratsSpreadVolley_junkrat.description: Activate to make Frag Launcher fire 2 additional grenades in a spread. Works for up to 4 total charges, or until Frag Launcher runs out of charges.

MalGanissSpreadingPlague_malganis.name: Mal'Ganis's Spreading Plague
MalGanissSpreadingPlague_malganis.description: After Night Rush expires, deal 30 damage per second to nearby enemies for 5 seconds. Basic Attacks against Heroes refresh this.  Does not wake Sleeping targets.

TheLostVikingssSpyGames_thelostvikings.name: The Lost Vikings's Spy Games
TheLostVikingssSpyGames_thelostvikings.description: After standing still for 3 seconds, Erik gains Stealth and his Sight Radius is increased by 75%. The Stealth persists for 3 seconds after moving.

MedivhsStablePortal_medivh.name: Medivh's Stable Portal
MedivhsStablePortal_medivh.description: Decrease Portal cooldown by 25% and increase Portal duration by 50%.

ETCsStageDive_etc.name: E.T.C.'s Stage Dive
ETCsStageDive_etc.description: Leap to target location, landing after 2.75 seconds, dealing 330 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the area, and slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds.

TyraelsStalwartAngel_tyrael.name: Tyrael's Stalwart Angel
TyraelsStalwartAngel_tyrael.description: Gain 25 Armor while El'druin's Might is active, and for 2 seconds after teleporting.

LunarasStarWoodSpear_lunara.name: Lunara's Star Wood Spear
LunarasStarWoodSpear_lunara.description: Using Crippling Spores increases Lunara's Basic Attack range by 2.75 for 6 seconds.

TyrandesStarfall_tyrande.name: Tyrande's Starfall
TyrandesStarfall_tyrande.description: Deal 91 (+4% per level) damage per second and slow enemies by 20% in an area. Lasts 6 seconds.

MephistosStaticBarrier_mephisto.name: Mephisto's Static Barrier
MephistosStaticBarrier_mephisto.description: At the end of its duration, Lightning Nova grants Mephisto a Shield equal to 40% of the damage it dealt to Heroes. Lasts 5 seconds.

MephistosStaticField_mephisto.name: Mephisto's Static Field
MephistosStaticField_mephisto.description: When Lightning Nova's damage bonus reaches 40%, enemy Heroes within its radius take damage equal to 10% of their maximum Health.

FalstadsStaticShield_falstad.name: Falstad's Static Shield
FalstadsStaticShield_falstad.description: Gain a Shield equal to 4% of Falstad's maximum Health after every Lightning Rod strike. Lasts 4 seconds and stacks.

DeckardsStayAwhileandListen_deckard.name: Deckard's Stay Awhile and Listen
DeckardsStayAwhileandListen_deckard.description: After 1 second, Channel for 3 seconds, putting enemy Heroes in front of Deckard to Sleep while Channeling, and for 2 seconds after.  Enemies can only be put to Sleep once per cast, and Sleep's effects end instantly if they take damage.

GenjisSteadyBlade_genji.name: Genji's Steady Blade
GenjisSteadyBlade_genji.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Swift Strike increases the damage of the next Swift Strike by 20%. This bonus stacks up to 3 times.

TracersStickyBomb_tracer.name: Tracer's Sticky Bomb
TracersStickyBomb_tracer.description: Increases Pulse Bomb's radius by 50% and enemies hit are slowed by 70% for 3 seconds.

BrightwingsStickyFlare_brightwing.name: Brightwing's Sticky Flare
BrightwingsStickyFlare_brightwing.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Arcane Flare have their Movement Speed Slowed by 20% for 3 seconds. Increase the Slow to 40% if they are hit by the center portion.

JunkratsStickyWicket_junkrat.name: Junkrat's Sticky Wicket
JunkratsStickyWicket_junkrat.description: Steel Trap no longer Roots enemies, and instead Slows them by 90% for 3.5 seconds.

LtMoralessStimDrone_ltmorales.name: Lt. Morales's Stim Drone
LtMoralessStimDrone_ltmorales.description: Grant an allied Hero 75% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed for 10 seconds.

MuradinsStoneform_muradin.name: Muradin's Stoneform
MuradinsStoneform_muradin.description: Activate to heal Muradin for 30% of his maximum Health over 10 seconds. Second Wind is disabled during this time.

DVasStopandPop_dva.name: D.Va's Stop and Pop
DVasStopandPop_dva.description: Bunny Hop deals 200% more damage if D.Va isn't moving at the moment of impact.

JainasStormFront_jaina.name: Jaina's Storm Front
JainasStormFront_jaina.description: Increase cast range of Blizzard by 75% and its radius by 30%.

VallasStormofVengeance_valla.name: Valla's Storm of Vengeance
VallasStormofVengeance_valla.description: Basic Attacks reduce the charge cooldown of Rain of Vengeance by 5 seconds.

StormShield_etc.name: Storm Shield
StormShield_etc.description: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.

ChensStormEarthFire_chen.name: Chen's Storm, Earth, Fire
ChensStormEarthFire_chen.description:
After 1 second, Chen splits into three elemental spirits for 12 seconds, each with 70% of Chen's maximum Health and a unique ability. The last spirit Ability that is case is empowered. If all three spirits are killed, Chen will die as well.  Storm can grant the spirits a Shield. Earth can leap to an area and Slow enemies.
Fire can grant the spirits Attack Speed, damage.

RehgarsStormcaller_rehgar.name: Rehgar's Stormcaller
RehgarsStormcaller_rehgar.description: When Lightning Shield damages an enemy it restores 4 Mana, up to 100.

ChensStormstoutSecretRecipe_chen.name: Chen's Stormstout Secret Recipe
ChensStormstoutSecretRecipe_chen.description: Chen heals for 2.5% of his maximum Health when his Basic Abilities hit an enemy Hero.

VallasStrafe_valla.name: Valla's Strafe
VallasStrafe_valla.description: Rapidly attack enemies within 10 range for 60 (+4% per level) damage per hit, prioritizing Heroes over Minions. Valla is able to move and use Vault while strafing. Lasts for 4 seconds.

ValeerasStrangle_valeera.name: Valeera's Strangle
ValeerasStrangle_valeera.description: Using Garrote on a Hero reduces their Spell Power by 40% for 6 seconds.

MalfurionsStranglingVines_malfurion.name: Malfurion's Strangling Vines
MalfurionsStranglingVines_malfurion.description: Enemy Heroes Rooted by Entangling Roots receive 40% less healing from all sources for 3 seconds.

SonyasStridingGiant_sonya.name: Sonya's Striding Giant
SonyasStridingGiant_sonya.description: Wrath of the Berserker increases maximum Health by 10% and grants Striding Giant, which can be activated to become Unstoppable for 2 seconds. 30 second cooldown.

GenjisStrikeAtTheHeart_genji.name: Genji's Strike At The Heart
GenjisStrikeAtTheHeart_genji.description: Enemies hit by the end of Swift Strike take an additional 138 (+4% per level) damage over 2 seconds.

KelThuzadsStripShields_kelthuzad.name: Kel'Thuzad's Strip Shields
KelThuzadsStripShields_kelthuzad.description: Pulling a Hero with Chains of Kel'Thuzad grants Kel'Thuzad a permanent 128 (+4% per level) Shield, stacking up to 2 times.  Additionally, Chains of Kel'Thuzad deals up to 270 (+2.5% per level) bonus damage to Shields.

ChromiesStuckinaLoop_chromie.name: Chromie's Stuck in a Loop
ChromiesStuckinaLoop_chromie.description: Temporal Loop teleports the target a second time after the first, and Basic Abilities continue recharging for an additional 3 seconds. Increase the cooldown recharge rate from 500% to 700%.

JohannasSubdue_johanna.name: Johanna's Subdue
JohannasSubdue_johanna.description: Hitting 2 or more Heroes at the same time with Punish increases the Slow to 80% and the Slow amount does not decay. Quest: Hit 4 or more Heroes at the same time with Punish. Reward: Punish always Slows by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">80% and the Slow amount no longer decays.

WhitemanesSubjugation_whitemane.name: Whitemane's Subjugation
WhitemanesSubjugation_whitemane.description: Inquisition reduces all damage the target deals by 75%.

RagnarossSubmerge_ragnaros.name: Ragnaros's Submerge
RagnarossSubmerge_ragnaros.description: Ragnaros submerges below, entering Stasis and healing for 600 (+4% per level) Health over 3 seconds.

AnubaraksSubterraneanShield_anubarak.name: Anub'arak's Subterranean Shield
AnubaraksSubterraneanShield_anubarak.description: Burrow Charge also grants a 345 (+4% per level) point Shield for 5 seconds.

ValeerasSubtlety_valeera.name: Valeera's Subtlety
ValeerasSubtlety_valeera.description: After teleporting with Ambush, Cheap Shot, or Garrote, regenerate 10 Energy per second for 5 seconds.

LuciosSubwoofer_lucio.name: Lúcio's Subwoofer
LuciosSubwoofer_lucio.description: Enemies within the first half of Soundwave's range are knocked back 75% farther. Quest: Hit 3 enemy Heroes with a single Soundwave. Reward: Increase Soundwave's arc by 50% and its range by 20%.

MaievsSuddenVengeance_maiev.name: Maiev's Sudden Vengeance
MaievsSuddenVengeance_maiev.description: After blinking with Spirit of Vengeance, the shadow explodes, damaging all nearby enemy Heroes for 6% of their maximum Health.

RagnarossSulfurasHungers_ragnaros.name: Ragnaros's Sulfuras Hungers
RagnarossSulfurasHungers_ragnaros.description: Quest: Every time Empower Sulfuras kills a Minion, its damage is increased by 1, up to 30. Reward: After killing 30 Minions, increase its damage by an additional 90.

RagnarossSulfurasSmash_ragnaros.name: Ragnaros's Sulfuras Smash
RagnarossSulfurasSmash_ragnaros.description: Hurl Sulfuras at the target area, landing after 0.75 seconds, dealing 198 (+4% per level) damage. Enemies in the center take 594 (+4% per level) damage instead and are Stunned for 0.5 seconds.

SummerAnthem_lucio.name: Summer Anthem
SummerAnthem_lucio.description: Activate for all other allies affected by Crossfade to become Unkillable for 1.5 seconds.

ArthassSummonSindragosa_arthas.name: Arthas's Summon Sindragosa
ArthassSummonSindragosa_arthas.description: Deals 230 (+4% per level) damage and slows enemies by 60% for 3.5 seconds.  Also disables non-Heroic enemies and Structures for 20 seconds.

KerrigansSummonUltralisk_kerrigan.name: Kerrigan's Summon Ultralisk
KerrigansSummonUltralisk_kerrigan.description: After 0.5 seconds, summon an Ultralisk rushes forward upon spawning, dealing 250 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy Hero hit and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.  The Ultralisk's Basic Attacks deal 50% of their damage in an area around their target. Reactivate to retarget the Ultralisk.

JainasSummonWaterElemental_jaina.name: Jaina's Summon Water Elemental
JainasSummonWaterElemental_jaina.description: Summon a Water Elemental at target location. The Water Elemental's Basic Attacks deal 62 (+4% per level) damage, splash for 25% damage and Chill. The Ability can be reactivated to retarget the Water Elemental. Lasts 20 seconds.

KaelthassSunKingsFury_kaelthas.name: Kael'thas's Sun King's Fury
KaelthassSunKingsFury_kaelthas.description: Living Bombs that spread to enemy Heroes deal 35% more damage.

Sundering_thrall.name: Sundering
Sundering_thrall.description: After 0.5 seconds, sunder the earth in a long line, dealing 290 (+4% per level) damage and shoving enemies to the side, Stunning them for 1 second.

KaelthassSunfireEnchantment_kaelthas.name: Kael'thas's Sunfire Enchantment
KaelthassSunfireEnchantment_kaelthas.description: Activating Verdant Spheres causes Kael'thas's next 2 Basic Attacks to instead deal 115 (+4% per level) Spell Damage. If both of these Attacks hit enemy Heroes, gain 15% Spell Power for 10 seconds.

DeckardsSuperHealingPotion_deckard.name: Deckard's Super Healing Potion
DeckardsSuperHealingPotion_deckard.description: If a Healing Potion isn't picked up for at least 2 seconds, it heals for 120% more.

GazlowesSuperiorSchematics_gazlowe.name: Gazlowe's Superior Schematics
GazlowesSuperiorSchematics_gazlowe.description: Gazlowe's Rock-It! Turrets have 25% increased range while he is within their attack range.

LuciosSupersonic_lucio.name: Lúcio's Supersonic
LuciosSupersonic_lucio.description: While Wall Ride is active, Push Off's cooldown recharges 100% faster.

NazeebosSuperstition_nazeebo.name: Nazeebo's Superstition
NazeebosSuperstition_nazeebo.description: Gain 40 Spell Armor, taking 40% less damage from Abilities. Basic Attacks from enemy Heroes remove this bonus for 3 seconds.

StukovsSuperstrain_stukov.name: Stukov's Superstrain
StukovsSuperstrain_stukov.description: Whenever an ally with Healing Pathogen is Stunned or Rooted, they are instantly healed for 250 (+4% per level) Health.

DVasSuppressingFire_dva.name: D.Va's Suppressing Fire
DVasSuppressingFire_dva.description: Pilot Mode Basic Attacks have 20% increased range and Slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

ArtanissSuppressionPulse_artanis.name: Artanis's Suppression Pulse
ArtanissSuppressionPulse_artanis.description: Fire a large area pulse from the Spear of Adun, dealing 114 (+4% per level) damage and Blinding enemies for 4 seconds. Unlimited range.

BlazesSuppressiveFire_blaze.name: Blaze's Suppressive Fire
BlazesSuppressiveFire_blaze.description: Each stream of Flame Stream reduces the Spell Power of Heroes hit by 25% for 4 seconds, up to 50%.

CassiasSurgeofLight_cassia.name: Cassia's Surge of Light
CassiasSurgeofLight_cassia.description: After taking 500 (+4% per level) damage with Avoidance active, Cassia can activate Avoidance to deal 210 (+4% per level) damage to enemies around her.

AlexstraszasSurgeofVitality_alexstrasza.name: Alexstrasza's Surge of Vitality
AlexstraszasSurgeofVitality_alexstrasza.description: Abundance's healing burst grants allied Heroes 30% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

ChosSurgingDash_cho.name: Cho's Surging Dash
ChosSurgingDash_cho.description: While channeling Surging Fist, Cho heals for 150 (+4% per level) Health per second.

LiLisSurgingWinds_lili.name: Li Li's Surging Winds
LiLisSurgingWinds_lili.description: If Blinding Wind hits 2 Heroes, its cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds and Li Li gains 10% Spell Power for 10 seconds.

AbathursSurvivalInstincts_abathur.name: Abathur's Survival Instincts
AbathursSurvivalInstincts_abathur.description: Increases Locust's Health by 100% and damage by 60%.

AlaraksSustainingPower_alarak.name: Alarak's Sustaining Power
AlaraksSustainingPower_alarak.description: Increase the healing received from damaging Heroes with Lightning Surge by 40%.

RaynorsSustainingRounds_raynor.name: Raynor's Sustaining Rounds
RaynorsSustainingRounds_raynor.description: Give 'Em Some Pepper heals Raynor for 3% of his maximum Health, increased to 6% if the primary target is a Hero.

GenjisSwiftastheWind_genji.name: Genji's Swift as the Wind
GenjisSwiftastheWind_genji.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Swift Strike increases Genji's Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds.

TyraelsSwiftRetribution_tyrael.name: Tyrael's Swift Retribution
TyraelsSwiftRetribution_tyrael.description: Smite grants 20% more Movement Speed and also grants 25% Attack Speed for 2 seconds.

AurielsSwiftSweep_auriel.name: Auriel's Swift Sweep
AurielsSwiftSweep_auriel.description: Increases the cast speed of Sacred Sweep by 50%.

QhirasSwingLifeAway_qhira.name: Qhira's Swing Life Away
QhirasSwingLifeAway_qhira.description: While rotating, Revolving Sweep's cooldown regenerates 150% faster. Upon reactivation, Qhira gains 50 Spell Armor for 2 seconds.

ZuljinsSwirlingDeath_zuljin.name: Zul'jin's Swirling Death
ZuljinsSwirlingDeath_zuljin.description: Twin Cleave's Axes cycle twice and can hit enemies on each revolution, but its cooldown is increased by 4 seconds.

TyraelsSwordofJustice_tyrael.name: Tyrael's Sword of Justice
TyraelsSwordofJustice_tyrael.description: Upon teleporting using El'druin's Might, El'druin swaps places with Tyrael, and El'druin's Might can be reactivated to teleport an additional time.

DehakasSymbiosis_dehaka.name: Dehaka's Symbiosis
DehakasSymbiosis_dehaka.description: Every time Dark Swarm damages an enemy Hero, reduce its cooldown by 0.4 seconds.

LtMoralessSystemShock_ltmorales.name: Lt. Morales's System Shock
LtMoralessSystemShock_ltmorales.description: Heroes hit by Displacement Grenade deal 30% less damage for 4 seconds.

SgtHammersTacticalMineDeployment_sgthamm.name: Sgt. Hammer's Tactical Mine Deployment
SgtHammersTacticalMineDeployment_sgthamm.description: Moving while Thrusters is active leaves a trail of up to 5 Spider Mines. Additionally, increase the Slow of Spider Mines by 15%.

RexxarsTakingFlight_rexxar.name: Rexxar's Taking Flight
RexxarsTakingFlight_rexxar.description: Increases Spirit Swoop's range by 20%. If Spirit Swoop hits an enemy Hero, the Mana cost is refunded and its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.

LiMingsTalRashasElements_liming.name: Li-Ming's Tal Rasha's Elements
LiMingsTalRashasElements_liming.description: Using Abilities grants 5% Spell Power, to a maximum of 20%.  This bonus is reset when the same Ability is used within a chain.

FenixsTargetAcquired_fenix.name: Fenix's Target Acquired
FenixsTargetAcquired_fenix.description: Basic Attacks against Slowed Heroes with Repeater Cannon active grants 10% Movement Speed for 4 seconds, up to 40%.

HanzosTargetPractice_hanzo.name: Hanzo's Target Practice
HanzosTargetPractice_hanzo.description: Quest: Hit every enemy Hero with Storm Bow. Reward: After hitting every enemy Hero once with Storm Bow, its range is increased by 30%. Reward: After hitting every enemy Hero 3 times with Storm Bow, its damage is increased by 10.

ArtanissTargetPurified_artanis.name: Artanis's Target Purified
ArtanissTargetPurified_artanis.description: Increase the speed of Purifier Beam by 15%. If the target of Purifier Beam dies, it automatically recasts on the next visible enemy Hero.

StukovsTargetedExcision_stukov.name: Stukov's Targeted Excision
StukovsTargetedExcision_stukov.description: Detonating exactly 1 Weighted Pustule (but any number of Healing Pathogens) with Bio-Kill Switch reduces the cooldown of Bio-Kill Switch to 5 seconds and other Basic Abilities by 1.5 seconds.

GallsTaskmaster_gall.name: Gall's Taskmaster
GallsTaskmaster_gall.description: Every time Cho is hit by a Hero Basic Attack, reduce the Cooldown of Shove by 1 second.

JunkratsTasteForExplosions_junkrat.name: Junkrat's Taste For Explosions
JunkratsTasteForExplosions_junkrat.description: Quest: Hitting a Hero with Frag Launcher increases its damage by 0.5, up to 100.

VariansTaunt_varian.name: Varian's Taunt
VariansTaunt_varian.description: Force the target Hero to attack Varian for 1.25 seconds.  Passive: Maximum Health increased by 30%.

ZuljinsTazdingo_zuljin.name: Zul'jin's Taz'dingo!
ZuljinsTazdingo_zuljin.description: For the next 4 seconds, Zul'jin is Unkillable, and cannot be reduced to less than 1 Health. Taz'dingo!

VallasTemperedbyDiscipline_valla.name: Valla's Tempered by Discipline
VallasTemperedbyDiscipline_valla.description: While at 10 stacks of Hatred, Basic Attacks heal for 25% of the damage dealt.

RagnarossTemperedFlame_ragnaros.name: Ragnaros's Tempered Flame
RagnarossTemperedFlame_ragnaros.description: When Blast Wave damages an enemy Hero, gain a Shield equal to 100% of the damage dealt for 3 seconds.

ThrallsTempestFury_thrall.name: Thrall's Tempest Fury
ThrallsTempestFury_thrall.description: The final strike of Windfury hits 3 times for 75% normal damage.

YrelsTemplarsVerdict_yrel.name: Yrel's Templar's Verdict
YrelsTemplarsVerdict_yrel.description: Righteous Hammer reduces the Armor of enemy Heroes hit by 20 for 4 seconds and deals bonus damage equal to 6% of their Maximum Health.

TassadarsTemplarsWill_tassadar.name: Tassadar's Templar's Will
TassadarsTemplarsWill_tassadar.description: Quest: Attacking enemy Heroes restores 8 mana per second. Reward: After spending 30 seconds attacking Heroes, Distortion Beam's damage is increased by 125%. Reward: After spending 60 seconds attacking Heroes, Distortion Beam's range is increased by an additional 1.

ArtanissTemplarsZeal_artanis.name: Artanis's Templar's Zeal
ArtanissTemplarsZeal_artanis.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Blade Dash from 50 to 25. Each time that Shield Overload activates, reduce the cooldown of Blade Dash by 6 seconds.

LiMingsTemporalFlux_liming.name: Li-Ming's Temporal Flux
LiMingsTemporalFlux_liming.description: Disintegrate gradually slows enemies caught in its beam, to a maximum of 60%.

MedivhsTemporalFlux_medivh.name: Medivh's Temporal Flux
MedivhsTemporalFlux_medivh.description: Basic Attacks reduce Medivh's Heroic Ability cooldown by 3%. Each enemy Hero hit by Arcane Rift reduces Medivh's Heroic Ability cooldown by 9%.

ChromiesTemporalLoop_chromie.name: Chromie's Temporal Loop
ChromiesTemporalLoop_chromie.description: Choose an enemy Hero. After 3 seconds, they are teleported back to the location where Temporal Loop was cast on them.  Basic Abilities recharge 500% faster for 3 seconds after casting Temporal Loop.

MalfurionsTenaciousRoots_malfurion.name: Malfurion's Tenacious Roots
MalfurionsTenaciousRoots_malfurion.description: Increase the Root duration of Entangling Roots by 0.3 seconds. When Malfurion is Stunned, the cooldown of Entangling Roots instantly resets. This can only occur every 10 seconds.

StitchessTenderizer_stitches.name: Stitches's Tenderizer
StitchessTenderizer_stitches.description: Basic Attacks Slow enemies 25% for 2.5 seconds and refresh the duration of Slam's inner impact area Slow.

TychussThatstheStuff_tychus.name: Tychus's That's the Stuff!
TychussThatstheStuff_tychus.description: Minigun heals Tychus for 100% of the bonus damage dealt after it expires.

TychussTheBiggerTheyAre_tychus.name: Tychus's The Bigger They Are...
TychussTheBiggerTheyAre_tychus.description: Lowers the cooldown of Minigun by 2 seconds and increase the damage bonus to 4% while enemy Heroes are above 35% Health, but Minigun no longer has any effect on targets below 35%.

JohannasTheCrusadeMarchesOn_johanna.name: Johanna's The Crusade Marches On
JohannasTheCrusadeMarchesOn_johanna.description: Basic and Heroic Abilities lower the cooldown of Iron Skin by 1.5 seconds.

KelThuzadsTheDamnedReturn_kelthuzad.name: Kel'Thuzad's The Damned Return
KelThuzadsTheDamnedReturn_kelthuzad.description: Activate to create a Shade of Naxxramas that lasts 15 seconds and mimics Kel'Thuzad's casts of Death and Decay.

HanzosTheDragonAwakens_hanzo.name: Hanzo's The Dragon Awakens
HanzosTheDragonAwakens_hanzo.description: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow, Scatter Arrow, or Basic Attacks reduces the cooldown of Dragonstrike by 5 seconds.

GenjisTheDragonBecomesMe_genji.name: Genji's The Dragon Becomes Me
GenjisTheDragonBecomesMe_genji.description: Each time Dragonblade hits an enemy Hero, the duration of Dragonblade is increased by 0.5 seconds. If an Hero is killed within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Dragonblade, Swift Strike's cooldown is reset.

HanzosTheDragonHungers_hanzo.name: Hanzo's The Dragon Hungers
HanzosTheDragonHungers_hanzo.description: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow grants 5% Spell Power for 10 seconds, stacking up to 20%.

LiLisTheGoodStuff_lili.name: Li Li's The Good Stuff
LiLisTheGoodStuff_lili.description: Healing Brew heals for an additional 42 (+4% per level) over 3 seconds. While Fast Feet is active, this heal amount is increased by 100%.

IllidansTheHunt_illidan.name: Illidan's The Hunt
IllidansTheHunt_illidan.description: Charge to target unit, dealing 251 (+4% per level) damage on impact and stunning for 1 second.

QhirasTheHunted_qhira.name: Qhira's The Hunted
QhirasTheHunted_qhira.description: Basic Attacking an enemy Hero increases your Basic Attack damage against them by 25% for 4 seconds (stacking up to 4 times). This bonus is reset if a different Hero is attacked.

StukovsTheLongPitch_stukov.name: Stukov's The Long Pitch
StukovsTheLongPitch_stukov.description: Increase the range of Weighted Pustule by 50%. Detonating 2 or more Weighted Pustules causes Stukov's Bio-Kill Switch and Basic Ability cooldowns to recharge 100% faster for 3 seconds.

MalGanissTheNightBeckons_malganis.name: Mal'Ganis's The Night Beckons
MalGanissTheNightBeckons_malganis.description: After Night Rush's Sleep ends, targets are Slowed by 30% for 2.5 seconds.

KelThuzadsThePlaguelands_kelthuzad.name: Kel'Thuzad's The Plaguelands
KelThuzadsThePlaguelands_kelthuzad.description: Increase Death and Decay's duration by 1 second. After gaining 30 Blight, increase the radius of Death and Decay's pool by 30%.

TheLostVikingssTheSequel_thelostvikings.name: The Lost Vikings's The Sequel!
TheLostVikingssTheSequel_thelostvikings.description: Reduces the Lost Vikings' death timer by 50%.

QhirasTheThirst_qhira.name: Qhira's The Thirst
QhirasTheThirst_qhira.description: Anytime Carnage damages an enemy Hero, Qhira's next Basic Attack within 4 seconds deals 12% additional damage and restores 50% of the total damage dealt as Health. Damage stacks up to 10 times.

ChosTheWillofCho_cho.name: Cho's The Will of Cho
ChosTheWillofCho_cho.description: Takedowns permanently increase the Armor granted by Ogre Hide by 2, to a max of 50 extra Armor.

GallsTheWillofGall_gall.name: Gall's The Will of Gall
GallsTheWillofGall_gall.description: Takedowns permanently increase the bonus of Ogre Rage by 2%.

BlazesThermalProtection_blaze.name: Blaze's Thermal Protection
BlazesThermalProtection_blaze.description: Each enemy hit by Jet Propulsion grants 10 Armor for 3% seconds and reduces its cooldown by 1.25 seconds.

GreymanesThickSkin_greymane.name: Greymane's Thick Skin
GreymanesThickSkin_greymane.description: Using Darkflight grants 50 Physical Armor against the next 2 Hero Basic Attacks while in Worgen Form, reducing the damage taken by 50%.

NazeebosThingoftheDeep_nazeebo.name: Nazeebo's Thing of the Deep
NazeebosThingoftheDeep_nazeebo.description: Increases the range of Nazeebo's Basic Abilities by 20%.

MuradinsThirdWind_muradin.name: Muradin's Third Wind
MuradinsThirdWind_muradin.description: Increases Health Restoration rate to 90 (+4% per level) per second, and raises Health threshold to 60% Health for improved 180 (+4% per level) per second Restoration.

GarroshsThirstforBattle_garrosh.name: Garrosh's Thirst for Battle
GarroshsThirstforBattle_garrosh.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Bloodthirst by 2 seconds.

IllidansThirstingBlade_illidan.name: Illidan's Thirsting Blade
IllidansThirstingBlade_illidan.description: Betrayer's Thirst's healing from Basic Attacks is increased from 30% to 50% while Sweeping Strike's damage bonus is active.

ValeerasThistleTea_valeera.name: Valeera's Thistle Tea
ValeerasThistleTea_valeera.description: Activate to instantly restore 100 Energy.  Activating Thistle Tea does not break Vanish.

LunarasThornwoodVine_lunara.name: Lunara's Thornwood Vine
LunarasThornwoodVine_lunara.description: Send forth vines that deal 176 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in a line.  Stores up to 3 charges.

SamurosThreeBladeStyle_samuro.name: Samuro's Three Blade Style
SamurosThreeBladeStyle_samuro.description: Samuro's Images gain an additional 50% of his Health and last up to 36 seconds.

RexxarsThrilloftheHunt_rexxar.name: Rexxar's Thrill of the Hunt
RexxarsThrilloftheHunt_rexxar.description: Rexxar's Basic Attacks increase both his and Misha's Movement Speed by 25% for 2 seconds.

MalthaelsThrowingShade_malthael.name: Malthael's Throwing Shade
MalthaelsThrowingShade_malthael.description: Quest: Hit 12 Heroes with Death Shroud. Reward: Permanently increase Death Shroud's range by 33%, reduce its cooldown by 4 seconds, and reduce its Mana cost from 50 to 25.

MuradinsThunderBurn_muradin.name: Muradin's Thunder Burn
MuradinsThunderBurn_muradin.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Thunder Clap triggers a second explosion 2 seconds later in the same location that deals 50% (+4% per level) damage.

MuradinsThunderStrike_muradin.name: Muradin's Thunder Strike
MuradinsThunderStrike_muradin.description: Thunder Clap deals 300% damage if only one target is hit.  Passive: Increase the duration of Dwarf Toss's Armor by 2 seconds.

CassiasThundergodsVigor_cassia.name: Cassia's Thundergod's Vigor
CassiasThundergodsVigor_cassia.description: Enemy Heroes hit by the primary missile of Lightning Fury reduce its cooldown by 1 second.

ThrallsThunderstorm_thrall.name: Thrall's Thunderstorm
ThrallsThunderstorm_thrall.description: Casting Chain Lightning on a Hero other than the last Hero it was cast on causes it to Slow targets by 8% for 2 seconds. Repeatable Quest: Each consecutive cast against a new Hero increases this bonus by 8%, up to 40%. Bonuses are reset if Thrall dies or casts Chain Lightning on the same Hero twice. Reward: While at a 40% bonus, Chain Lightning's damage is increased by 25%.

FalstadsThunderstrikes_falstad.name: Falstad's Thunderstrikes
FalstadsThunderstrikes_falstad.description: Lightning Rod deals 20% more damage each subsequent strike.

CassiasThunderstroke_cassia.name: Cassia's Thunderstroke
CassiasThunderstroke_cassia.description: Quest: Hit Heroes with Lightning Fury. Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, increase Lightning Fury's damage by 100. Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes, Lightning Fury gains a 2nd charge and its Mana cost is reduced from 30 to 15.

RehgarsTidalWaves_rehgar.name: Rehgar's Tidal Waves
RehgarsTidalWaves_rehgar.description: Reduces Chain Heal's cooldown by 0.75 second for each Hero healed, and reduces its Mana cost from 55 to 40.

AzmodansTideofSin_azmodan.name: Azmodan's Tide of Sin
AzmodansTideofSin_azmodan.description: Activate to make the next Globe of Annihilation cost no Mana and deal 50% more damage.

ChromiesTimeOut_chromie.name: Chromie's Time Out
ChromiesTimeOut_chromie.description: Activate to place Chromie in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for up to 7 seconds. Can be reactivated to end the effect early.

MalGanissTimetoFeed_malganis.name: Mal'Ganis's Time to Feed
MalGanissTimetoFeed_malganis.description: Mal'Ganis heals for 52 when damaging a nearby enemy Hero. This can occur once every 6 seconds against each enemy Hero.

MurkysTimetoKrill_murky.name: Murky's Time to Krill
MurkysTimetoKrill_murky.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes deal an additional 7 (+4% per level) damage a second and slow the target by 7% for 4 seconds. This effect can stack up to 5 times.

ChromiesTimeTroubles_chromie.name: Chromie's Time Troubles
ChromiesTimeTroubles_chromie.description: After its Time Stop ends, enemies affected by Time Trap lose 20 Armor for 3 seconds and allies gain 20 Armor for 3 seconds.

ChromiesTimewalkersPursuit_chromie.name: Chromie's Timewalker's Pursuit
ChromiesTimewalkersPursuit_chromie.description: Activate to reveal the targeted area for 2 seconds. Enemies seen are revealed for 4 seconds. Quest: Gather 15 Regeneration Globes. Reward: After gathering 15 Globes, Chromie gains 10% Spell Power.

DehakasTissueRegeneration_dehaka.name: Dehaka's Tissue Regeneration
DehakasTissueRegeneration_dehaka.description: Regeneration Globes grant 10 Essence. Repeatable Quest: Every 50 Essence collected permanently increases Health Regeneration by 4, up to 40, and maximum Essence by 1, up to 10.

TychussTitanGrenade_tychus.name: Tychus's Titan Grenade
TychussTitanGrenade_tychus.description: Frag Grenade deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 5% of their maximum Health.

ArtanissTitanKiller_artanis.name: Artanis's Titan Killer
ArtanissTitanKiller_artanis.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes deal an bonus damage equal to 0.5% of the target's maximum Health in damage, increased to 1.5% when empowered by Twin Blades.

CassiasTitansRevenge_cassia.name: Cassia's Titan's Revenge
CassiasTitansRevenge_cassia.description: Cassia's Basic Attacks now ignore Armor, and her Basic Attack range is increased by 2.

GarroshsTitanicMight_garrosh.name: Garrosh's Titanic Might
GarroshsTitanicMight_garrosh.description: Wrecking Ball now throws the 2 closest enemies.

ZaryasTotheLimit_zarya.name: Zarya's To the Limit
ZaryasTotheLimit_zarya.description: While above 50 Energy, Zarya's Basic Attack size is increased by 35%.

NazeebosToadsofHugeness_nazeebo.name: Nazeebo's Toads of Hugeness
NazeebosToadsofHugeness_nazeebo.description: Increase the damage and explosion radius of Plague of Toads by 25% after each hop, up to a maximum of 100%.

ZaryasTogetherWeAreStrong_zarya.name: Zarya's Together We Are Strong
ZaryasTogetherWeAreStrong_zarya.description: Every 5 (+4% per level) damage done by allies while under Shield Ally contributes 1 Energy, up to 40 Energy per shield.

GreymanesToothandClaw_greymane.name: Greymane's Tooth and Claw
GreymanesToothandClaw_greymane.description: Worgen Basic Attacks cleave for 100% damage.

StukovsTopOff_stukov.name: Stukov's Top Off
StukovsTopOff_stukov.description: Healing Pathogen's heal over time is increased by 30% while its target is above 60% Health.

MalthaelsTormentedSouls_malthael.name: Malthael's Tormented Souls
MalthaelsTormentedSouls_malthael.description: Unleash a torrent of souls, continually applying Reaper's Mark to nearby enemies for 4 seconds. When Tormented Souls is cast and when it expires, reset the cooldown of Wraith Strike

DVasTorpedoDash_dva.name: D.Va's Torpedo Dash
DVasTorpedoDash_dva.description: D.Va gains the Torpedo Dash ability, allowing her to dash forward and pass through enemies.  Requires Pilot Mode.

KerrigansTorrasque_kerrigan.name: Kerrigan's Torrasque
KerrigansTorrasque_kerrigan.description: The Ultralisk morphs into an egg when it dies. If the egg isn't killed within 4 seconds, a new Ultralisk is born.

AzmodansTotalAnnihilation_azmodan.name: Azmodan's Total Annihilation
AzmodansTotalAnnihilation_azmodan.description: Globe of Annihilation damages Heroes for an additional 4% of their maximum Health.

TracersTotalRecall_tracer.name: Tracer's Total Recall
TracersTotalRecall_tracer.description: Recall's cooldown is increased by 8 seconds, but it heals Tracer equal to the amount of Health she lost during that time.

RehgarsTotemicProjection_rehgar.name: Rehgar's Totemic Projection
RehgarsTotemicProjection_rehgar.description: Increases Earthbind Totem's duration from 8 to 12 seconds, and it can be reactivated to move an existing totem to a new location once.

MalthaelsTouchofDeath_malthael.name: Malthael's Touch of Death
MalthaelsTouchofDeath_malthael.description: Activate to reduce healing received by Heroes afflicted by Reaper's Mark by 50% for 4 seconds.

SonyasToughAsNails_sonya.name: Sonya's Tough As Nails
SonyasToughAsNails_sonya.description: Every 16 seconds, gain 60 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 60%.  Stores up to 3 charges. Charges refresh 200% faster while Fury's Movement Speed bonus is active.

AlexstraszasToughLove_alexstrasza.name: Alexstrasza's Tough Love
AlexstraszasToughLove_alexstrasza.description: While Alexstrasza is above 75% Health, Gift of Life grants its target 20 Armor for 2 seconds.

ETCsTourBus_etc.name: E.T.C.'s Tour Bus
ETCsTourBus_etc.description: Mosh Pit refreshes the cooldown of Powerslide. E.T.C. can Powerslide during Mosh Pit, which also increases its duration by 2 seconds.

ProbiussTowerDefense_probius.name: Probius's Tower Defense
ProbiussTowerDefense_probius.description: When Photon Cannon damages an enemy Hero, its cooldown is reduced by 1.25 seconds.

MurkysToxicBuildup_murky.name: Murky's Toxic Buildup
MurkysToxicBuildup_murky.description: Every 3rd consecutive Basic Attack against an enemy Hero causes a free Slime to be cast upon them.

TracersTracerRounds_tracer.name: Tracer's Tracer Rounds
TracersTracerRounds_tracer.description: Basic Attacks reveal enemies for 4 seconds.

XulsTragOulsEssence_xul.name: Xul's Trag'Oul's Essence
XulsTragOulsEssence_xul.description: Every time a Skeletal Warrior attacks an enemy, restore 0.5% of Xul's maximum Health and 0.2% of his maximum Mana.

AzmodansTrample_azmodan.name: Azmodan's Trample
AzmodansTrample_azmodan.description: Activate to charge a short distance, dealing 240 damage and Slowing enemies caught in the path by 60% for 1 second.

MalfurionsTranquility_malfurion.name: Malfurion's Tranquility
MalfurionsTranquility_malfurion.description: Heal nearby allied Heroes for 80 (+4% per level) Health per second for 8 seconds. Allies affected by Regrowth within Tranquility's area gain 10 Armor.

KharazimsTranscendence_kharazim.name: Kharazim's Transcendence
KharazimsTranscendence_kharazim.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack heals the lowest nearby allied Hero for 103 (+4% per level) and gives 25% increased move speed for 2 seconds.

LtMoralessTraumaTrigger_ltmorales.name: Lt. Morales's Trauma Trigger
LtMoralessTraumaTrigger_ltmorales.description: Taking damage while below 40% Health grants 40 Armor for 3 seconds.  This effect has a 30 second cooldown.

MephistosTrickery_mephisto.name: Mephisto's Trickery
MephistosTrickery_mephisto.description: Shade of Mephisto grants 20% Movement Speed while active and for 2.5 seconds after it ends. After Shade of Mephisto expires, all Slows and Roots are removed from Mephisto.

JunkratsTrickyShuffles_junkrat.name: Junkrat's Tricky Shuffles
JunkratsTrickyShuffles_junkrat.description: While Frag Launcher has no charges left, gain 15% Movement Speed.

ArtanissTripleStrike_artanis.name: Artanis's Triple Strike
ArtanissTripleStrike_artanis.description: Increases Twin Blades's number of Basic Attacks to 3, but increase its cooldown by 1 second.

NovasTripleTap_nova.name: Nova's Triple Tap
NovasTripleTap_nova.description: Locks in on the target Hero, then fires 3 shots that hit the first Hero or Structure they come in contact with for 372 (+4% per level) damage each.

LiMingsTriumvirate_liming.name: Li-Ming's Triumvirate
LiMingsTriumvirate_liming.description: If Arcane Orb hits an enemy Hero after traveling at least 50% of its base range, the cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

ZuljinsTrollsBlood_zuljin.name: Zul'jin's Troll's Blood
ZuljinsTrollsBlood_zuljin.description: Increase Regeneration's healing by 25%. If Regeneration fully finishes, restore 10% of Zul'jin's maximum Mana.

TyrandesTrueshotAura_tyrande.name: Tyrande's Trueshot Aura
TyrandesTrueshotAura_tyrande.description: Activate to reset the cooldown of Hunter's Mark and grant 15% increased Basic Attack damage to nearby allied Heroes for 5 seconds.  Passive: Basic Attack damage increased by 15%.

MurkysTufferfish_murky.name: Murky's Tufferfish
MurkysTufferfish_murky.description: Pufferfish gains 50 Spell Armor and deals 50% more damage to Slimed targets.

ProbiussTurboCharged_probius.name: Probius's Turbo Charged
ProbiussTurboCharged_probius.description: Worker Rush grants an additional 10% passive Movement Speed while in a Power Field, and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.

GazlowesTurretStorage_gazlowe.name: Gazlowe's Turret Storage
GazlowesTurretStorage_gazlowe.description: Increases Rock-It! Turret maximum charges from 2 to 3.

TassadarsTwilightArchon_tassadar.name: Tassadar's Twilight Archon
TassadarsTwilightArchon_tassadar.description: Basic Attacks while in Archon form increase its duration by 2 seconds.

MalfurionsTwilightDream_malfurion.name: Malfurion's Twilight Dream
MalfurionsTwilightDream_malfurion.description: After 0.5 seconds, deal 310 (+4% per level) damage in a large area around Malfurion, Silencing enemies making them unable to use Abilities for 3 seconds.

ZeratulsTwilightFalls_zeratul.name: Zeratul's Twilight Falls
ZeratulsTwilightFalls_zeratul.description: Might of the Nerazim resets the cooldown of all Basic Abilities.

GallsTwilightNova_gall.name: Gall's Twilight Nova
GallsTwilightNova_gall.description: After the first bounce of Dread Orb, 2 extra bombs bounce to the sides once.

ChosTwilightVeil_cho.name: Cho's Twilight Veil
ChosTwilightVeil_cho.description: Activate to increase the Armor bonus of Ogre Hide by 300% for 4 seconds. If cast while Ogre Rage is active, it instantly swaps to Ogre Hide.

VariansTwinBladesofFury_varian.name: Varian's Twin Blades of Fury
VariansTwinBladesofFury_varian.description: Basic Attacks reduce Heroic Strike's cooldown by 9 seconds, and increase Varian's Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds.  Passive: Attack Speed increased by 100%. Passive: Base Attack Damage reduced by 20%.

KaelthassTwinSpheres_kaelthas.name: Kael'thas's Twin Spheres
KaelthassTwinSpheres_kaelthas.description: Verdant Spheres gains a second charge.

GallsTwistingNether_gall.name: Gall's Twisting Nether
GallsTwistingNether_gall.description: After 1 second, nearby enemies are slowed by 50% while Gall channels, up to 5 seconds. Activate to deal 353 (+5% per level) damage.

LiLisTwoForOne_lili.name: Li Li's Two For One
LiLisTwoForOne_lili.description: Increases the number of allies healed by Healing Brew to 2, but increases the cooldown by 1 second.

UthersTyrsDeliverance_uther.name: Uther's Tyr's Deliverance
UthersTyrsDeliverance_uther.description: Allies healed by Holy Radiance receive 40% increased healing from all sources for 6 seconds.

ZagarasTyrantMaw_zagara.name: Zagara's Tyrant Maw
ZagarasTyrantMaw_zagara.description: Devouring Maw deals 50% more damage and getting a Takedown reduce its cooldown by 25 seconds.

AbathursUltimateEvolution_abathur.name: Abathur's Ultimate Evolution
AbathursUltimateEvolution_abathur.description: Clone target allied Hero and control it for 20 seconds. Abathur has perfected the clone, granting it 20% Spell Power, 20% bonus Attack Damage, and 10% bonus Movement Speed. Cannot use their Heroic Ability.

SgtHammersUltraCapacitors_sgthammer.name: Sgt. Hammer's Ultra Capacitors
SgtHammersUltraCapacitors_sgthammer.description: Hitting enemy Heroes with Basic Attacks while in Siege Mode grants 5% Attack Speed for 5 seconds, up to 40%.

IllidansUnbound_illidan.name: Illidan's Unbound
IllidansUnbound_illidan.description: Sweeping Strike can go over walls and terrain. Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes with Sweeping Strike, gain a second charge.

KerrigansUnbridledEnergy_kerrigan.name: Kerrigan's Unbridled Energy
KerrigansUnbridledEnergy_kerrigan.description: Damaging a Hero with a Heroic Ability grants 35% Spell Power for 4 seconds.

FenixsUnconqueredSpirit_fenix.name: Fenix's Unconquered Spirit
FenixsUnconqueredSpirit_fenix.description: Upon taking fatal damage, Shield Capacitor regains 800 Shields. This effect has a 120 second cooldown.

AnubaraksUnderking_anubarak.name: Anub'arak's Underking
AnubaraksUnderking_anubarak.description: Increases Burrow Charge range by 20% and damage by 100%.

IllidansUnendingHatred_illidan.name: Illidan's Unending Hatred
IllidansUnendingHatred_illidan.description: Quest: Minion kills grant 0.2 Basic Attack Damage. Hero Takedowns grant 1 Basic Attack Damage. Reward: After gaining 20 increased Basic Attack Damage, receive an additional 20 Basic Attack Damage.

LunarasUnfairAdvantage_lunara.name: Lunara's Unfair Advantage
LunarasUnfairAdvantage_lunara.description: Nature's Toxin deals 60% more damage to Heroes that are Slowed, Rooted, or Stunned.

GreymanesUnfetteredAssault_greymane.name: Greymane's Unfettered Assault
GreymanesUnfetteredAssault_greymane.description: Increases Razor Swipe's lunge distance by 60%, and Worgen Basic Attacks reduce Razor Swipe's cooldown by 1.5 seconds.

SylvanassUnfurlingShadows_sylvanas.name: Sylvanas's Unfurling Shadows
SylvanassUnfurlingShadows_sylvanas.description: Quest: Each time an enemy Hero with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse is hit by Shadow Dagger, its damage is permanently increased by 0.5%.

StukovsUniversalCarrier_stukov.name: Stukov's Universal Carrier
StukovsUniversalCarrier_stukov.description: Healing Pathogen can continually spread through Stukov, but its healing is reduced by 40%.

RexxarsUnleashtheBoars_rexxar.name: Rexxar's Unleash the Boars
RexxarsUnleashtheBoars_rexxar.description: Release a herd of boars that track down all enemy Heroes in a direction, dealing 110 (+4% per level) damage, revealing, and slowing enemies by 40% for 5 seconds.

GreymanesUnleashed_greymane.name: Greymane's Unleashed
GreymanesUnleashed_greymane.description: If the free cast of Go for the Throat kills its target, another free cast is provided that deals 35% more damage, up to 140%.

QhirasUnleashedPotential_qhira.name: Qhira's Unleashed Potential
QhirasUnleashedPotential_qhira.description: Damage to enemy Heroes below 50% Health is increased from 25% to 50%. If an enemy Hero dies within 1.5 seconds of being hit with Final Strike, reset it and all other Basic Ability cooldowns.

ChromiesUnravelling_chromie.name: Chromie's Unravelling
ChromiesUnravelling_chromie.description: Every 0.25 seconds, enemy Heroes Slowed by Slowing Sands have their Spell Armor reduced by 5 up to 30.

ImperiussUnrelentingDescent_imperius.name: Imperius's Unrelenting Descent
ImperiussUnrelentingDescent_imperius.description: Consuming a Valorous Brand reduces the cooldown of Wrath of the Angiris by 5 seconds.

TheButchersUnrelentingPursuit_thebutcher.name: The Butcher's Unrelenting Pursuit
TheButchersUnrelentingPursuit_thebutcher.description: Reduces the cooldown of Ruthless Onslaught by 33% upon impact.

QhirasUnrelentingStrikes_qhira.name: Qhira's Unrelenting Strikes
QhirasUnrelentingStrikes_qhira.description: Deal 46 damage to all nearby enemies every .5 seconds for 2.5 seconds as your sword grows outward. Upon expiring, deal 86 damage to all nearby enemy Heroes and Stun them for .75 seconds.

GarroshsUnrivaledStrength_garrosh.name: Garrosh's Unrivaled Strength
GarroshsUnrivaledStrength_garrosh.description: Increase Wrecking Ball's throw range by 25% and its damage by 125%.

MephistosUnspeakableHorror_mephisto.name: Mephisto's Unspeakable Horror
MephistosUnspeakableHorror_mephisto.description: Durance of Hate Silences enemies for 3 seconds after its Root expires.

BrightwingsUnstableAnomaly_brightwing.name: Brightwing's Unstable Anomaly
BrightwingsUnstableAnomaly_brightwing.description: Increase Polymorph's Slow by 15%. Upon expiration, Polymorph deals damage to nearby enemy Heroes equal to 2% of their maximum Health.

RaynorsUnstableCompound_raynor.name: Raynor's Unstable Compound
RaynorsUnstableCompound_raynor.description: Increase the area of Give 'Em Some Pepper by 15%, and enemies hit by it are Slowed by 10% for 2.5 seconds.

SylvanassUnstablePoison_sylvanas.name: Sylvanas's Unstable Poison
SylvanassUnstablePoison_sylvanas.description: Minions that die under the effects of Shadow Dagger or Sylvanas' Traits explode, dealing 130 damage to nearby Minions, Mercenaries, and Summons.

ZaryasUnstoppableCompetitor_zarya.name: Zarya's Unstoppable Competitor
ZaryasUnstoppableCompetitor_zarya.description: Personal Barrier makes Zarya Unstoppable for up to 2 seconds.

MuradinsUnstoppableForce_muradin.name: Muradin's Unstoppable Force
MuradinsUnstoppableForce_muradin.description: While active, Avatar grants 20 Armor and causes Muradin's Basic Attacks to reduce the cooldowns of Thunder Clap and Dwarf Toss by 0.75 seconds.

ChensUntappedPotential_chen.name: Chen's Untapped Potential
ChensUntappedPotential_chen.description: Increase Wandering Keg's Movement Speed bonus from 70% to 125% and grants 75 Armor for its duration and 3 seconds afterwards, reducing damage taken by 75%.

TracersUntouchable_tracer.name: Tracer's Untouchable
TracersUntouchable_tracer.description: Quest: Takedowns increase Tracer's Basic Attack damage by 2%, up to 30%. These bonuses are lost on death.

WhitemanesUnwaveringFaith_whitemane.name: Whitemane's Unwavering Faith
WhitemanesUnwaveringFaith_whitemane.description: Reduce Desperate Plea's Mana cost by 15.  Upon reaching 3 stacks of Desperation, gain a 250 Shield for 5 seconds.

ZaryasUnyieldingDefender_zarya.name: Zarya's Unyielding Defender
ZaryasUnyieldingDefender_zarya.description: Activate to reset the cooldown of Personal Barrier and Shield Ally.

LeoricsUnyieldingDespair_leoric.name: Leoric's Unyielding Despair
LeoricsUnyieldingDespair_leoric.description: Drain Hope's cooldown is reduced by 0.5 seconds for every 1 second it is active. If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, its cooldown is reduced by an additional 2 seconds.

MephistosUnyieldingPower_mephisto.name: Mephisto's Unyielding Power
MephistosUnyieldingPower_mephisto.description: Quest: Hit Heroes with Skull Missile. Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, increase Skull Missile's damage by 100. Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes, Skull Missile's cooldown is permanently reduced to 5 seconds.

LuciosUptheFrequency_lucio.name: Lúcio's Up the Frequency
LuciosUptheFrequency_lucio.description: Hitting enemy Heroes with Basic Attacks reduces the cooldown of Amp It Up by 0.4 seconds.  Passive: Wall Ride increases Basic Attack range by 2.2.

LuciosUptoEleven_lucio.name: Lúcio's Up to Eleven
LuciosUptoEleven_lucio.description: Activate to extend the duration of Amp It Up by 2 seconds.

FalstadsUpdraft_falstad.name: Falstad's Updraft
FalstadsUpdraft_falstad.description: Increases Barrel Roll's range and Shield amount by 60%.

ChosUpheaval_cho.name: Cho's Upheaval
ChosUpheaval_cho.description: After 1 second, pull enemies towards Cho'gall, slowing them by 25% for 3 seconds and dealing 175 (+4% per level) damage.

ChosUppercut_cho.name: Cho's Uppercut
ChosUppercut_cho.description: Surging Fist deals additional damage to Heroes equal to 7% of their max Health.

QhirasUpstage_qhira.name: Qhira's Upstage
QhirasUpstage_qhira.description: Damaging at least 2 Heroes with Blood Rage causes Qhira to Evade the next 4 Basic Attacks within 12 seconds.

AnubaraksUrticatingSpines_anubarak.name: Anub'arak's Urticating Spines
AnubaraksUrticatingSpines_anubarak.description: Casting Harden Carapace will also deal 80 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies. Deals double damage against Heroes.

QhirasUtilityBelt_qhira.name: Qhira's Utility Belt
QhirasUtilityBelt_qhira.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Revolving Sweep resets your Grappling Hook cooldown and it recharges 900% faster after you have been out of combat for 5 seconds.

CassiasValkyrie_cassia.name: Cassia's Valkyrie
CassiasValkyrie_cassia.description: Summon a Valkyrie that rushes to Cassia after 0.75 seconds, pulling the first enemy Hero hit, dealing 225 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds at the end of her path. The Valkyrie knocks back all other enemy Heroes in her way.

ImperiussValorousPursuit_imperius.name: Imperius's Valorous Pursuit
ImperiussValorousPursuit_imperius.description: Activate to teleport to an enemy that has been marked by Valorous Brand and gain 25 Armor for 3 seconds.

MalGanissVampiricAura_malganis.name: Mal'Ganis's Vampiric Aura
MalGanissVampiricAura_malganis.description: Mal'Ganis and nearby allied Heroes heal for 15% of Physical Damage dealt.

AnasVampiricRounds_ana.name: Ana's Vampiric Rounds
AnasVampiricRounds_ana.description: Quest: Stack 5 Doses on an enemy Hero. Reward: Increase Shrike's healing by an additional 1.5%.

LtMoralessVanadiumPlating_ltmorales.name: Lt. Morales's Vanadium Plating
LtMoralessVanadiumPlating_ltmorales.description: While an ally affected by Safeguard is Stunned or Rooted, Safeguard grants an additional 25 Armor and its duration is paused.

MalGanissVanquishtheWeak_malganis.name: Mal'Ganis's Vanquish the Weak
MalGanissVanquishtheWeak_malganis.description: Damage from Fel Claws and Basic Attacks Slows enemy by 15% for 1.5 seconds, and Vampiric Touch converts 10% more damage into healing versus Slowed Heroes.

AnduinsVariansLegacy_anduin.name: Anduin's Varian's Legacy
AnduinsVariansLegacy_anduin.description: Basic Attacks burn enemies for 87 damage over 3 seconds and Anduin heals for 50% of the damage dealt.

YrelsVelensChosen_yrel.name: Yrel's Velen's Chosen
YrelsVelensChosen_yrel.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with a Basic Ability at maximum charge grants 10% Spell Power for 10 seconds, up to 30%.

MaievsVengefulKnives_maiev.name: Maiev's Vengeful Knives
MaievsVengefulKnives_maiev.description: For each enemy Hero Spirit of Vengeance hits, Maiev's next Fan of Knives deals 1.5% maximum Health as bonus damage to enemy Heroes.

MalfurionsVengefulRoots_malfurion.name: Malfurion's Vengeful Roots
MalfurionsVengefulRoots_malfurion.description: Entangling Roots spawns a Treant that deals 58 damage per second and lasts 10 seconds. Repeatable Quest: Hitting enemy Heroes with Entangling Roots permanently increases the Treant's damage per second by 7.

AlexstraszasVerdantFlourish_alexstrasza.name: Alexstrasza's Verdant Flourish
AlexstraszasVerdantFlourish_alexstrasza.description: Alexstrasza receives 30% more healing from Abundance and 100% more healing from Regeneration Globes.

RaynorsVeteranMarksman_raynor.name: Raynor's Veteran Marksman
RaynorsVeteranMarksman_raynor.description: Quest: Every time the primary target of Give 'Em Some Pepper is a Hero, permanently increase its damage bonus by 0.75%.

ZuljinsViciousAssault_zuljin.name: Zul'jin's Vicious Assault
ZuljinsViciousAssault_zuljin.description: Increase Grievous Throw's damage bonus by 35% and duration by 3 seconds.

GreymanesViciousness_greymane.name: Greymane's Viciousness
GreymanesViciousness_greymane.description: Increases Inner Beast's duration to 4 seconds, and causes Ability damage to also refresh its duration.

VariansVictoryRush_varian.name: Varian's Victory Rush
VariansVictoryRush_varian.description: Every 30 seconds, Varian's next Basic Attack will heal him for 350 (+4% per level) Health. When a nearby enemy Minion or Monster dies, the cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.

TheButchersVictuals_thebutcher.name: The Butcher's Victuals
TheButchersVictuals_thebutcher.description: Every time a nearby enemy minion dies, The Butcher heals 5% of his maximum health.

VariansVigilance_varian.name: Varian's Vigilance
VariansVigilance_varian.description: Being hit by a Hero Basic Attack reduces the cooldown of Taunt by 1 seconds.

ValeerasVigor_valeera.name: Valeera's Vigor
ValeerasVigor_valeera.description: Valeera regenerates an additional 3 Energy per second. Reward: After Gathering 20 Regen Globes, increase Valeera's maximum Energy to 120.

StukovsVigorousReuptake_stukov.name: Stukov's Vigorous Reuptake
StukovsVigorousReuptake_stukov.description: Bio-Kill Switch heals for 30% more when detonating 3 or more Healing Pathogens.

TheLostVikingssVikingBribery_thelostviki.name: The Lost Vikings's Viking Bribery
TheLostVikingssVikingBribery_thelostviki.description: Enemy Minions or captured Mercenaries killed near The Lost Vikings grant stacks of Bribe. Use 40 stacks to bribe target Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Bosses. Maximum stacks available: 200. If a camp is defeated entirely with Bribe, the camp respawns 50% faster.

TheLostVikingssVikingFuryoftheStorm_thel.name: The Lost Vikings's Viking Fury of the Storm
TheLostVikingssVikingFuryoftheStorm_thel.description: Every 5 seconds, the next Basic Attack will deal an additional 41 (+4% per level) damage to the target, and 105 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby Minions, Mercenaries and Monsters.  Each Viking has their own cooldown.

NazeebosVileInfection_nazeebo.name: Nazeebo's Vile Infection
NazeebosVileInfection_nazeebo.description: Quest: Reach 175 stacks of Voodoo Ritual. Reward: After reaching 175 stacks of Voodoo Ritual, it can also be applied to Heroes and its damage is increased by 150%.

AbathursVileNest_abathur.name: Abathur's Vile Nest
AbathursVileNest_abathur.description: Toxic Nests slow enemy Movement Speed by 40% for 2.5 seconds.

StukovsVirulentReaction_stukov.name: Stukov's Virulent Reaction
StukovsVirulentReaction_stukov.description: Detonating a Weighted Pustule on an enemy who is inside of Lurking Arm Roots them for 2 seconds.

ZagarasViscousAcid_zagara.name: Zagara's Viscous Acid
ZagarasViscousAcid_zagara.description: Banelings slow enemies by 25% for 2.5 seconds.

ZeratulsVoidPrison_zeratul.name: Zeratul's Void Prison
ZeratulsVoidPrison_zeratul.description: Slows time in an area to a near standstill, placing allies and enemies in Time Stop for 5 seconds. Zeratul is not affected.

ZeratulsVoidSlash_zeratul.name: Zeratul's Void Slash
ZeratulsVoidSlash_zeratul.description: If Cleave hits more than one enemy Hero, it deals 40% increased damage and its cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds.

ZagarasVolatileAcid_zagara.name: Zagara's Volatile Acid
ZagarasVolatileAcid_zagara.description: Banelings can travel 50% further before exploding and their damage to non-Heroes is increased by 50%.

AbathursVolatileMutation_abathur.name: Abathur's Volatile Mutation
AbathursVolatileMutation_abathur.description: Ultimate Evolution clones and Monstrosities deal 257 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies every 3 seconds and when they die. Enemy Heroes hit heal the clone or Monstrosity for 75% of the damage dealt.

KerrigansVolatilePower_kerrigan.name: Kerrigan's Volatile Power
KerrigansVolatilePower_kerrigan.description: Increase the amount of Assimilation Shields granted from damage dealt by 10%, but reduce duration of Assimilation by 3 seconds.

ZuljinsVoodooShuffle_zuljin.name: Zul'jin's Voodoo Shuffle
ZuljinsVoodooShuffle_zuljin.description: Activate to remove Roots and Slows.  Passive: Lower the cooldown and Mana cost of Regeneration by 40%.

ZeratulsVorpalBlade_zeratul.name: Zeratul's Vorpal Blade
ZeratulsVorpalBlade_zeratul.description: Activate to teleport to Zeratul's last non-structure Basic Attack target within 3 seconds. The target is revealed during these 3 seconds.

SylvanassWailingArrow_sylvanas.name: Sylvanas's Wailing Arrow
SylvanassWailingArrow_sylvanas.description: Shoot an arrow that can be reactivated to deal 228 (+4% per level) damage and silence enemies in an area making them unable to use Abilities for 2.5 seconds. The arrow detonates automatically if it reaches maximum range.

ChensWanderingKeg_chen.name: Chen's Wandering Keg
ChensWanderingKeg_chen.description: Roll around inside an Unstoppable barrel with 70% increased Movement Speed and 25 Armor, dealing 59 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the way and knocking them back. Lasts for 5 seconds.

SonyasWarPaint_sonya.name: Sonya's War Paint
SonyasWarPaint_sonya.description: Basic Attacks heal Sonya for 30% of the damage dealt.

CassiasWarTraveler_cassia.name: Cassia's War Traveler
CassiasWarTraveler_cassia.description: Cassia gains 4% Movement Speed every 0.5 seconds while Avoidance is active, up to 20%.  This bonus is reset when Cassia stops moving or uses an Ability.

GarroshsWarbreaker_garrosh.name: Garrosh's Warbreaker
GarroshsWarbreaker_garrosh.description: Quest: Stun Heroes with Groundbreaker. Reward: After stunning 5 Heroes, Groundbreaker deals an additional 165 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds to Heroes. Reward: After stunning 15 Heroes, reduce Groundbreaker's cooldown by 2 seconds.

VariansWarbringer_varian.name: Varian's Warbringer
VariansWarbringer_varian.description: Reduces Charge's cooldown by 8 seconds and Mana cost from 45 to 22. Additionally, Charge can be cast on allied Heroes.

MaievsWardensCage_maiev.name: Maiev's Warden's Cage
MaievsWardensCage_maiev.description: Summon 8 Warden Avatars as a cage around Maiev. After 1.5 seconds, enemy Heroes that come in contact with an Avatar consume it and are knocked to the center of the cage. Warden Avatars last 5 seconds.

GarroshsWarlordsChallenge_garrosh.name: Garrosh's Warlord's Challenge
GarroshsWarlordsChallenge_garrosh.description: Silence nearby Heroes and force them to attack Garrosh for 2 seconds.

ProbiussWarpResonance_probius.name: Probius's Warp Resonance
ProbiussWarpResonance_probius.description: Quest: Hit Heroes with Warp Rift explosions. Reward: After hitting 10 Heroes with Warp Rift explosions, increase the explosion damage by 100. Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes with Warp Rift explosions, Warp Rift gains 1 additional charge.

ArtanissWarpSickness_artanis.name: Artanis's Warp Sickness
ArtanissWarpSickness_artanis.description: Phase Prism also slows the enemy's Movement Speed by 35% for 4 seconds.

ZeratulsWarpSkirmisher_zeratul.name: Zeratul's Warp Skirmisher
ZeratulsWarpSkirmisher_zeratul.description: Vorpal Blade gains a 2nd charge. Teleporting to an enemy with Vorpal Blade or entering Permanent Cloak causes Zeratul's next Basic Attack to deal 50% more damage.

FenixsWarpWarfare_fenix.name: Fenix's Warp Warfare
FenixsWarpWarfare_fenix.description: After arriving with Warp, gain 175% Attack Speed for 4 seconds while in Repeater Cannon mode. Hero Takedowns reset Warp's cooldown.

LiLisWaterDragon_lili.name: Li Li's Water Dragon
LiLisWaterDragon_lili.description: Li Li channels for 2 seconds, summoning a Water Dragon that hits the nearest enemy Hero within 12 range and all enemies near them, dealing 318 (+4% per level) damage and slowing their Movement Speed by 70% for 4 seconds.

LiMingsWaveOfForce_liming.name: Li-Ming's Wave Of Force
LiMingsWaveOfForce_liming.description: Knock away all enemies from an area and deal 160 (+5% per level) damage.

UthersWaveofLight_uther.name: Uther's Wave of Light
UthersWaveofLight_uther.description: Quest: Damage or heal Heroes 60 times with Holy Radiance. Reward: Increase the duration of Devotion by 0.5 second.  Passive: Damaging or healing Heroes with Holy Radiance refunds 5 Mana and reduces its cooldown by 1 second.

SamurosWayofIllusion_samuro.name: Samuro's Way of Illusion
SamurosWayofIllusion_samuro.description: Quest: Every time a Mirror Image Critically Strikes a Hero, Samuro gains 0.25 Attack Damage, up to 10. Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes, Samuro gains an additional 20 Attack Damage.

SamurosWayoftheBlade_samuro.name: Samuro's Way of the Blade
SamurosWayoftheBlade_samuro.description: Critical Strike now happens for Samuro and his Mirror Images every 3rd Basic Attack. Samuro's Critical Strikes against enemy Heroes reduces their Physical Armor by 10 for 2 seconds.

KharazimsWayoftheHundredFists_kharazim.name: Kharazim's Way of the Hundred Fists
KharazimsWayoftheHundredFists_kharazim.description: Radiant Dashing to an enemy launches a rapid volley of 6 Basic Attacks dealing 45% damage each.

SamurosWayoftheWind_samuro.name: Samuro's Way of the Wind
SamurosWayoftheWind_samuro.description: Gain 40% Movement Speed for 3 seconds after entering or exiting Wind Walk. Samuro's Critical Strikes reduce the cooldown of Windwalk by 1.5 seconds.

GallsWeSeeYou_gall.name: Gall's We See You!
GallsWeSeeYou_gall.description: Eye of Kilrogg's cooldown is decreased by 25 seconds and its range is increased by 33%.

RaynorsWeakSpotAcquired_raynor.name: Raynor's Weak Spot Acquired
RaynorsWeakSpotAcquired_raynor.description: Enemy Heroes that are the primary target of Give 'Em Some Pepper have their Armor reduced by 25 for 2 seconds.

XulsWeaken_xul.name: Xul's Weaken
XulsWeaken_xul.description: Increase the Attack Speed reduction of Cursed Strikes by 35% and the duration by 1 second.

UthersWellMet_uther.name: Uther's Well Met
UthersWellMet_uther.description: When used against Heroes, Hammer of Justice reduces the target's Movement Speed and damage dealt by 25% for 3 seconds.

NazeebosWidowmakers_nazeebo.name: Nazeebo's Widowmakers
NazeebosWidowmakers_nazeebo.description: Reward: After Corpse Spiders attack Heroes 100 times, their attack damage is increased by 30%.

MalfurionsWildGrowth_malfurion.name: Malfurion's Wild Growth
MalfurionsWildGrowth_malfurion.description: Each enemy hit by Moonfire extends the duration of currently active Regrowths by 1 second.

LunarasWildVigor_lunara.name: Lunara's Wild Vigor
LunarasWildVigor_lunara.description: Using Crippling Spores increases the damage of Lunara's next 4 Basic Attacks by 50%.

RexxarsWildfireBear_rexxar.name: Rexxar's Wildfire Bear
RexxarsWildfireBear_rexxar.description: Misha deals 28 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.

AurielsWillofHeaven_auriel.name: Auriel's Will of Heaven
AurielsWillofHeaven_auriel.description: Allies with Bestow Hope gain 20% Attack Speed.

SylvanassWilloftheForsaken_sylvanas.name: Sylvanas's Will of the Forsaken
SylvanassWilloftheForsaken_sylvanas.description: Activate to become Unstoppable and gain 40% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

MalGanissWillofTichondrius_malganis.name: Mal'Ganis's Will of Tichondrius
MalGanissWillofTichondrius_malganis.description: The third slash of Fel Claws steals 4% of maximum Health from enemy Heroes.

LeoricsWillingVessel_leoric.name: Leoric's Willing Vessel
