LeoricsWillingVessel_leoric.description: Increase the healing from Drain Hope to 25% of Leoric's maximum Health. If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, Leoric instantly heals for an additional 5% of his maximum Health.

ThrallsWindRush_thrall.name: Thrall's Wind Rush
ThrallsWindRush_thrall.description: Activate to immediately teleport to a target location and gain Windfury.

LiLisWindSerpent_lili.name: Li Li's Wind Serpent
LiLisWindSerpent_lili.description: Casting Cloud Serpent also launches a Blinding Wind at the nearest enemy to the target (prioritizing Heroes).

SamurosWindStrider_samuro.name: Samuro's Wind Strider
SamurosWindStrider_samuro.description: Wind Walk's cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds.

FalstadsWindTunnel_falstad.name: Falstad's Wind Tunnel
FalstadsWindTunnel_falstad.description: Mighty Gust creates a wind tunnel for 4 seconds. Enemies caught in the tunnel will periodically be pushed back.

SylvanassWindrunner_sylvanas.name: Sylvanas's Windrunner
SylvanassWindrunner_sylvanas.description: Haunting Wave can be cast a second time for free within 5 seconds after teleporting. Teleporting with Haunting Wave resets the cooldown of Withering Fire.

MedivhsWindsofCelerity_medivh.name: Medivh's Winds of Celerity
MedivhsWindsofCelerity_medivh.description: Increases Raven Form's Movement Speed bonus by 50%.

MalGanissWingedGuardian_malganis.name: Mal'Ganis's Winged Guardian
MalGanissWingedGuardian_malganis.description: Each time Necrotic Embrace hits an enemy Hero, gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack.  If Winged Guard has no charges, Mal'Ganis will gain 1 charge after 6 seconds.

FalstadsWingman_falstad.name: Falstad's Wingman
FalstadsWingman_falstad.description: Lowers the cooldown of Lightning Rod by 3 seconds. Enemy Minions killed near Falstad grant a stack of Bribe. Falstad can use 20 stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them and permanently increasing the damage of Lightning Rod by 5%. Does not work on Bosses. Maximum of 80 stacks.

JainasWintersReach_jaina.name: Jaina's Winter's Reach
JainasWintersReach_jaina.description: Increase the range of Frostbolt by 30%.

JainasWintermute_jaina.name: Jaina's Wintermute
JainasWintermute_jaina.description: Increases the cast range of Water Elemental by 50%, and the Water Elemental will now mimic Jaina's Basic Abilities for 50% damage.

SylvanassWitheringBarrage_sylvanas.name: Sylvanas's Withering Barrage
SylvanassWitheringBarrage_sylvanas.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Withering Fire reduce its cooldown by 0.75 seconds.

ChensWitheringFlames_chen.name: Chen's Withering Flames
ChensWitheringFlames_chen.description: Igniting an enemy Hero reduces their Spell Power by 40% for 4 seconds.

GreymanesWizenedDuelist_greymane.name: Greymane's Wizened Duelist
GreymanesWizenedDuelist_greymane.description: Quest: Every 6 Human Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes increase Basic Attack damage by 1%, up to 30%. Worgen Basic Attacks grant credit for 3 Basic Attacks. Half of this bonus is lost upon death.

RehgarsWolfRun_rehgar.name: Rehgar's Wolf Run
RehgarsWolfRun_rehgar.description: Increases the Movement Speed of Ghost Wolf from 20% to 30%.

GreymanesWolfheart_greymane.name: Greymane's Wolfheart
GreymanesWolfheart_greymane.description: Increase the cooldown reduction from Basic Attacks during Inner Beast from 0.5 to 1 second.

YrelsWordofGlory_yrel.name: Yrel's Word of Glory
YrelsWordofGlory_yrel.description: Ardent Defender heals nearby allied Heroes for 100% of the healing received by Yrel.

ThrallsWorldbreaker_thrall.name: Thrall's Worldbreaker
ThrallsWorldbreaker_thrall.description: Lower the cooldown of Sundering by 20 seconds. After Sundering impacts, it leaves behind an impassable rift, blocking unit movement for 3 seconds.

ZeratulsWormhole_zeratul.name: Zeratul's Wormhole
ZeratulsWormhole_zeratul.description: After 1.25 seconds, reactivate Blink to return to the point where it was cast from within 4 seconds.

ValeerasWoundPoison_valeera.name: Valeera's Wound Poison
ValeerasWoundPoison_valeera.description: Activate to make Valeera's next damaging Ability and subsequent Abilities within 4 seconds reduce enemy healing received by 50% for 4 seconds.  Activating Wound Poison does not break Stealth.

AzmodansWrath_azmodan.name: Azmodan's Wrath
AzmodansWrath_azmodan.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes under 75% Health grant 1 Annihilation. Quest: After gaining 200 Annihilation, hitting a Hero with Globe of Annihilation increases the damage of Azmodan's next Basic Attack against them within 3 seconds by 75% the amount of Annihilation he has.

MurkysWrathofCod_murky.name: Murky's Wrath of Cod
MurkysWrathofCod_murky.description: Heroes hit by Pufferfish take additional damage equal to 15% of their maximum Health over 5 seconds.

AurielsWrathofHeaven_auriel.name: Auriel's Wrath of Heaven
AurielsWrathofHeaven_auriel.description: Allies with Bestow Hope gain 10% Spell Power.

MalGanissWrathofNathreza_malganis.name: Mal'Ganis's Wrath of Nathreza
MalGanissWrathofNathreza_malganis.description: Enemy Heroes near the target suffer 75% of the transferred Health as damage over 3 seconds.  Does not benefit from Vampiric Touch.

ImperiussWrathoftheAngiris_imperius.name: Imperius's Wrath of the Angiris
ImperiussWrathoftheAngiris_imperius.description: After 0.75 seconds, charge in the target direction, lifting the first enemy Hero hit into the Heavens. While in the air, Imperius can steer the landing location by moving.  After 2 seconds, slam the target into the ground, dealing 375 damage and Stunning them for 1 second.

SonyasWrathoftheBerserker_sonya.name: Sonya's Wrath of the Berserker
SonyasWrathoftheBerserker_sonya.description: Increase damage dealt by 40%. Reduce the duration of stuns, slows, and roots against Sonya by 50%. Lasts 15 seconds, and extends by 1 second for every 10 Fury gained.

ZuljinsWrongPlaceWrongTime_zuljin.name: Zul'jin's Wrong Place Wrong Time
ZuljinsWrongPlaceWrongTime_zuljin.description: If an enemy is hit by both Twin Cleave axes at the same time, they take an additional 100 (+4% per level) damage and count as 5 Hero hits for You Want Axe?.

GenjisXStrike_genji.name: Genji's X-Strike
GenjisXStrike_genji.description: Perform two slashes dealing 135 (+4% per level) damage. The slashes detonate after 1.25 seconds causing an additional 270 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in their area.

GazlowesXTraLargeBombs_gazlowe.name: Gazlowe's X-Tra Large Bombs
GazlowesXTraLargeBombs_gazlowe.description: Increases Xplodium Charge radius by 30%. Being stunned or rooted causes an Xplodium Charge to drop at Gazlowe's feet.  This effect has a 10 second cooldown.

ZuljinsYouWantAxe_zuljin.name: Zul'jin's You Want Axe?
ZuljinsYouWantAxe_zuljin.description: Quest: Every 5 Basic Attacks against Heroes increases Zul'jin's Basic Attack damage by 1.25. Reward: After attacking Heroes 120 times, his Attack Range is increased by 1.1.

QhirasYourPainMyGain_qhira.name: Qhira's Your Pain, My Gain
QhirasYourPainMyGain_qhira.description: Basic Attacking an enemy Hero grants Qhira 10 Armor for 3 seconds (stacking up to 3 times).

MalfurionsYserasGift_malfurion.name: Malfurion's Ysera's Gift
MalfurionsYserasGift_malfurion.description: While Malfurion is above 75% Health, Regrowth's healing-over-time is increased by 60%.

GenjisZanshin_genji.name: Genji's Zanshin
GenjisZanshin_genji.description: Quest: Block 6500 damage with Deflect, including damage blocked so far. Reward: Deflect hits all nearby enemy Heroes.

ArtanissZealotCharge_artanis.name: Artanis's Zealot Charge
ArtanissZealotCharge_artanis.description: Increase Twin Blades' charge distance by 100%.

JohannasZealousGlare_johanna.name: Johanna's Zealous Glare
JohannasZealousGlare_johanna.description: Increase the Blind duration of Shield Glare by 1 seconds. Johanna's Basic Attacks against Heroes with Shield Glare extend its duration by 1 second, up to a maximum of 3 seconds.

WhitemanesZealousSpirit_whitemane.name: Whitemane's Zealous Spirit
WhitemanesZealousSpirit_whitemane.description: Upon reaching 2 stacks of Desperation, Whitemane gains Zeal.

LiMingsZeisVengeance_liming.name: Li-Ming's Zei's Vengeance
LiMingsZeisVengeance_liming.description: Arcane Orb does up to 25% more damage to enemies based on distance. Additionally, its cooldown is reduced by 1 second.
